papers.title: Mining of intrusion attack in SCADA network using clustering and genetically seeded flora-based optimal classification algorithm
papers.authors: Shitharth Selvarajan, Masood Shaik, Sirajudeen Ameerjohn, Sangeetha Kannan
papers.abstract: The applications such as the remote communication and the control system are in critically integrated arrangement. The controlling of these network is specified by supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) systems. This study discusses about the attack prediction and classification process by using an enhanced model of machine learning technology. The attack types are classified by the optimal selection of features extracted from the sensor data. In this, the features are labelled and cluster between the matrixes are extracted. These cluster forms the initial processing of attack identification which prevents the mismatched result. This clustering of data is performed by mean-shift clustering algorithm. From that clustered data, the features that are irrelevant for classification process is identified and suppressed by using the genetically seeded flora optimisation algorithm. In this optimisation process, the flora seeds are selected genetically to select best features. Then, from that optimally selected clustered data, the relevancy vector is predicted and the types are classified. The classification process is performed by the Boltzmann machine learning algorithm. The classified results of the proposed method for testing SCADA dataset are analysed and the performance metrics are evaluated and compared with the state-of-the-art methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 远程通信和控制系统等应用程序处于严格集成的状态。这些网络的控制由监控和数据采集(SCADA)系统规定。本研究通过使用机器学习技术的增强模型来讨论攻击预测和分类过程。攻击类型通过从传感器数据中提取的特征的最佳选择来分类。在这种情况下，特征被标记并且矩阵之间的聚类被提取。这些聚类构成了攻击识别的初始处理，防止了误匹配的结果。这种数据聚类是通过均值漂移聚类算法来执行的。通过使用遗传播种菌群优化算法，从聚类数据中识别和抑制与分类过程无关的特征。在这个优化过程中，植物种子被遗传选择以选择最佳特征。然后，从最佳选择的聚类数据中，预测相关性向量并对类型进行分类。分类过程由玻尔兹曼机器学习算法执行。对所提出的用于测试SCADA数据集的方法的分类结果进行了分析，并且对性能度量进行了评估，并且与最先进的方法进行了比较。
papers.title_zh: 基于聚类和遗传种子菌群优化分类算法的SCADA网络入侵攻击挖掘

papers.title: MILP-aided bit-based division property for primitives with non-bit-permutation linear layers
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors settle the feasibility of mixed integer linear programming (MILP)-aided bit-based division property for ciphers with non-bit-permutation linear layers. First, they transform the complicated linear layers to their primitive representations. Then, the original Copy and exclusive OR models are generalised, and these models are exploited to depict the primitive representations. Accord- ingly, the MILP-aided bit-based division property can be applied to much more primitives with complicated linear layers. As an illus- tration, they rst evaluate the bit-based division properties of some word-oriented block ciphers. For Midori64, they obtain a 7-round integral distinguisher, which achieves one more round than the previous results. At the same time, the data requirements of some existing distinguishers are also reduced. They decrease the data complexities of 4-round and 5-round distinguishers for LED and Joltik-BC by half. Then, the bit-based division properties of some bit-oriented ciphers such as Serpent and Noekeon are considered. The data complexities of their distinguishers for short rounds are reduced. Besides, they evaluate the bit-based division properties of the internal permutations in some hash functions. An 18-round zero-sum distinguisher for SPONGENT-88 is proposed, which achieves four more rounds than the previous ones. Some integral distinguishers for PHOTON permutations are improved.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者解决了混合整数线性规划(MILP)辅助的非比特置换线性层密码的基于比特的除法性质的可行性。首先，他们将复杂的线性图层转换为原始表示。然后，将原始副本和异或模型一般化，并利用这些模型来描述原始表示。因此，MILP辅助的基于位的划分属性可以应用于具有复杂线性层的更多图元。作为一个例子，他们首先评估了一些面向字的分组密码的基于位的除法性质。对于Midori64，他们获得了一个7轮积分区分器，比以前的结果多了一轮。同时，也降低了一些现有区分器的数据要求。它们将LED和Joltik-BC的4轮和5轮识别器的数据复杂性降低了一半。然后，考虑了Serpent和Noekeon等一些面向比特的密码的基于比特的除法性质。减少了短轮识别器的数据复杂度。此外，他们还评估了一些哈希函数内部置换的基于位的除法性质。针对SPONGENT-88提出了一个18轮零和鉴别器，它比以前多实现了4轮。改进了一些光子排列的积分鉴别器。
papers.title_zh: 具有非比特置换线性层的图元的MILP辅助的基于比特的划分特性

papers.title: An efficient authentication and key agreement protocol for a group of vehicles devices in 5G cellular networks
papers.authors: Ikram Gharsallah, Salima Smaoui, Faouzi Zarai
papers.abstract: In recent years, the world of wireless telecommunications is in full progress. Indeed, although the evolution of 4G mobile networks continues, the standardization work of the 5G networks is in full progress. The connected vehicle is part of the services expected from 5G. Indeed, the interconnection between vehicles promises a safer and more enjoyable driving experience. However, as the huge number of vehicle devices are increasing day by day and each vehicle must perform a full authentication procedure to reach to the network, network congestion may occur when a group of vehicles requires simultaneous access, moreover this can have a decisive effect on the promised high rate of 5G. The EPS-AKA authentication mechanism used in 4G networks is too insufficient to handle a large number of mobile devices. In this context, our article aims to define a reliable solution for the authentication of a group of vehicles simultaneous in 5G cellular networks. A reauthentication procedure is also proposed. Analysis results obtained using the SPAN tool has proven that authentication and privacy objectives are met. In addition, elaborate performance evaluations in terms of communication signalling and computational overhead demonstrate that our protocol is more efficient than those existing protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，无线电信的世界正在飞速发展。事实上，尽管4G移动网络的演进仍在继续，但5G网络的标准化工作正在全面推进。联网车辆是5G预期服务的一部分。事实上，车辆之间的互联有望带来更安全、更愉快的驾驶体验。然而，随着数量庞大的车辆设备与日俱增，每辆车必须执行完整的认证程序才能访问网络，当一组车辆需要同时访问时，可能会发生网络拥塞，此外，这可能会对承诺的5G高速率产生决定性影响。4G网络中使用的EPS-AKA认证机制不足以处理大量移动设备。在这种背景下，我们的文章旨在定义一种可靠的解决方案，用于在5G蜂窝网络中同时认证一组车辆。还提出了重新认证过程。使用SPAN工具获得的分析结果已经证明满足了身份验证和隐私目标。此外，在通信信令和计算开销方面的详细性能评估表明，我们的协议比那些现有的协议更有效。
papers.title_zh: 5G蜂窝网络中一组车辆设备的高效认证和密钥协商协议

papers.title: Implementing confidential transactions with lattice techniques
papers.authors: Huang Zhang, Fangguo Zhang, Baodian Wei, Yusong Du
papers.abstract: The notion of confidential transactions plays a central role in ensuring the confidentiality of transaction amounts in a block-chain-based cryptocurrency. Past researches have confirmed that the access policy of transaction amounts influences the anonymity of a cryptocurrency. Most of the current techniques of confidential transactions are based on the discrete logarithm problem. Because of the threats from quantum algorithms, clients are eager to enjoy security guarantees in a post-quantum scenario. Lattices are an ideal source of hardness, due to its exclusive worst-case to the average-case phenomenon. Nevertheless, the distinctions between the discrete logarithm problem and lattice problems build an obstacle in the way of borrowing the ideas from the former to the latter directly. In this study, inspired by the notion of commitments to polynomials and zero-knowledge arguments of knowledge for the inhomogeneous short integer solution problem, the authors give an approach to implement confidential transactions using lattice techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 在基于区块链的加密货币中，保密交易的概念在确保交易金额的保密性方面起着核心作用。过去的研究已经证实，交易金额的访问策略影响加密货币的匿名性。当前大多数保密交易技术都是基于离散对数问题的。由于来自量子算法的威胁，客户渴望在后量子场景中享受安全保障。晶格是硬度的一个理想来源，因为它是平均情况现象中唯一的最坏情况。然而，离散对数问题和格问题之间的区别阻碍了将前者的思想直接借用到后者。在本研究中，受多项式承诺概念和非齐次短整数解问题的零知识论证的启发，作者给出了一种利用格技术实现保密交易的方法。
papers.title_zh: 用格技术实现保密交易

papers.title: Correlation-based sequence alignment models for detecting masquerades in cloud computing
papers.authors: Hisham A. Kholidy
papers.abstract: Despite the important benefits that cloud computing could offer, security remains one of the major concern that is hindering the development of this paradigm. Masquerades attacks and malicious insiders are often listed among the most dangerous challenges faced by cloud computing. The detection of masquerade attacks in cloud systems has to integrate host and network detection by correlating the user's behaviours in several virtual machines. The author has introduced two approaches that use sequences of events from the operating system and data from the network environment. Then, he integrated these approaches through a neural network that also considers information about the active session. Both approaches use his DDSGA method, a data-driven semi-global alignment approach for detecting masquerade attacks based on the alignment technique. He evaluated the efficiency and accuracy of the approaches through the Cloud Intrusion Detection Dataset. He also shows that the integrated approach results in the best accuracy and the proposed approaches outperform a recent masquerade detection framework that works in the cloud computing systems called the Sliding Window-based Anomaly Detection using Maximum Mean Discrepancy.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管云计算可以提供重要的好处，但安全性仍然是阻碍这种模式发展的主要问题之一。伪装攻击和恶意内部人员通常被列为云计算面临的最危险的挑战。云系统中伪装攻击的检测必须通过关联用户在几个虚拟机中的行为来集成主机和网络检测。作者介绍了两种方法，它们使用来自操作系统的事件序列和来自网络环境的数据。然后，他通过一个神经网络整合了这些方法，该网络还考虑了关于活动会话的信息。这两种方法都使用了他的DDSGA方法，这是一种数据驱动的半全局比对方法，用于基于比对技术检测伪装攻击。他通过云入侵检测数据集评估了这些方法的效率和准确性。他还表明，集成方法导致最佳的准确性，并且所提出的方法优于最近在云计算系统中工作的伪装检测框架，该框架被称为使用最大平均差异的基于滑动窗口的异常检测。
papers.title_zh: 云计算中基于相关性的序列比对模型检测伪装

papers.title: Secure signal processing using fully homomorphic encryption
papers.authors: Thomas Shortell, Ali Shokoufandeh
papers.title_zh: 使用全同态加密的安全信号处理

papers.title: How to build a vulnerability benchmark to overcome cyber security attacks
papers.authors: Junaid Akram, Ping Luo
papers.abstract: Cybercrimes are on a dramatic rise worldwide. The crime rate is growing day by day in every field or department which is directly or indirectly connected to the internet including Government, business or any individual. The main objective of this study is to evaluate the vulnerabilities in different software systems at the source code level by tracing their patch files. The authors have collected the source code of different types of vulnerabilities at a different level of granularities. They have proposed different ways to collect or trace the vulnerability code, which can be very helpful for security experts, organisations and software developers to maintain security measures. By following their proposed method, you can build your own vulnerability data-set and can detect vulnerabilities in any system by using suitable code clone detection technique. The study also includes a discussion of reasons for the rise in cybercrimes including zero-day exploits. A case study has been discussed with results and research questions to show the effectiveness of this study. This study concludes with the effective key findings of published and non-published vulnerabilities and the ways to prevent from different security attacks to overcome cybercrimes.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络犯罪在全球范围内急剧上升。犯罪率在与互联网直接或间接相关的各个领域或部门日益增长，包括政府、企业或任何个人。本研究的主要目的是通过跟踪不同软件系统的补丁文件，在源代码级别评估它们的漏洞。作者收集了不同粒度级别的不同类型漏洞的源代码。他们提出了不同的方法来收集或跟踪漏洞代码，这对安全专家、组织和软件开发人员维护安全措施非常有帮助。通过遵循他们提出的方法，您可以构建自己的漏洞数据集，并通过使用合适的代码克隆检测技术来检测任何系统中的漏洞。该研究还讨论了包括零日漏洞在内的网络犯罪上升的原因。一个案例研究已经讨论了结果和研究问题，以显示本研究的有效性。本研究总结了已公布和未公布漏洞的有效关键发现，以及防范不同安全攻击以战胜网络犯罪的方法。
papers.title_zh: 如何建立漏洞基准以克服网络安全攻击

papers.title: Cube distinguisher extraction using division property in block ciphers
papers.authors: Zahra Eskandari, Abbas Ghaemi Bafghi
papers.abstract: Cube attack, a simplified type of algebraic attack, is widely utilised to cryptanalyse ciphers. However, since the cube attack works without considering the cipher structure, it is highly complex. In 2017, division property, a successful approach to finding integral distinguishers, was used to extract cube distinguishers in a non-blackbox manner for stream ciphers, which led to a significant improvement of the previous results. This is the first paper employing division property for cube distinguisher extraction in block ciphers. To do this, first, an approach relying on Boolean satisfiability problem (SAT) is presented to evaluate the propagation of division property. Indeed, extraction of zero-sum distinguisher is mapped on a SAT problem and SAT solvers are used to finding division trails efficiently and automatically. Then, this approach is extended and adapted to extract cube distinguishers in block ciphers. However, there are similarities between our contribution and others but the different structure of block and stream ciphers lead to disparity in applying division property to extract cube distinguisher for block ciphers. To prove the efficiency of the presented approach, it is applied to the lightweight block cipher Katan and the cube distinguishers are extended to a higher round in comparison with previous results.
papers.abstract_zh: 立方体攻击是一种简化的代数攻击，广泛用于密码分析。然而，由于立方体攻击在不考虑密码结构的情况下工作，所以它非常复杂。2017年，除法性质(division property)是一种成功的寻找整数区分符的方法，用于以非黑盒方式提取流密码的立方体区分符，这导致了对以往结果的显著改进。这是第一篇在分组密码中利用除法性质提取立方体区分符的论文。为此，首先提出了一种基于布尔可满足性问题的方法来评估除法性质的传播。事实上，零和区分符的提取被映射到SAT问题上，SAT解算器被用来有效地和自动地寻找除法轨迹。然后，该方法被扩展并适用于提取分组密码中的立方体区分符。然而，我们的贡献和其他的贡献有相似之处，但是分组密码和流密码的不同结构导致了在应用除法性质提取分组密码的立方体区分符时的差异。为了证明该方法的有效性，将该方法应用于轻量级分组密码卡坦，并将立方体鉴别器扩展到更高轮次。
papers.title_zh: 分组密码中利用除法性质提取立方体区分符

papers.title: Dynamic resource virtualisation method for survivability enhancement based on SDN
papers.authors: Jian Wang, Guosheng Zhao, Zhong-Nan Zhao, Zhixin Li
papers.abstract: To enhance system survivability when the original mapping scheme fails caused by the change of underlying infrastructures, a dynamic resource virtualisation method based on software definition network (SDN) is proposed. First of all, modelling and formalisation of dynamic resource remapping under SDN environment are constructed, which make the entity resources controlled in the network. Then, resource constraints and evaluation objectives of mapping are considered, and the remapping procedures of nodes and links are described in the case of failure of physical resources. During the process, the detachment factor is introduced as the index to evaluate whether the virtual nodes and links need to be separated, and further be allocated by the greedy algorithm reasonably and dynamically, to realise the virtual network requests. Finally, the simulation experiments are carried out and show that the proposed method is superior to other related methods in virtual request acceptance rate, resource utilisation and average waiting time of service; as a result, improving survivability under the condition that the underlying physical resources change in real time.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了提高底层基础设施变化导致原映射方案失效时的系统可生存性，提出了一种基于软件定义网络的动态资源虚拟化方法。首先，构建了SDN环境下动态资源重映射的模型和形式化描述，使得实体资源在网络中可控。然后，考虑映射的资源约束和评价目标，描述了物理资源失效情况下节点和链路的重映射过程。在此过程中，引入分离因子作为评价虚拟节点和链路是否需要分离的指标，并通过贪婪算法进行合理的动态分配，以实现虚拟网络请求。最后，通过仿真实验表明，该方法在虚拟请求接受率、资源利用率和服务平均等待时间方面优于其他相关方法；从而提高底层物理资源实时变化情况下的生存性。
papers.title_zh: 基于SDN的可生存性增强动态资源虚拟化方法

papers.title: Contextual-based approach to reduce false positives
papers.authors: Nadjah Chergui, Boustia Narhimene
papers.abstract: The high rate of false positive alerts generated by the intrusion detection system (IDS), raises a crucial problem in the face of the security operator to differentiate between true attacks and failed ones. In order to solve this problem, several approaches have been developed relying on contextual information such as applications, services, network location, and vulnerabilities. The change of the context can be an effective factor to reduce false positive rate. However, most approaches in the literature have not dealt with this factor. Therefore, the authors propose non-monotonic ontology contextual-based approach (NOC-IDS), which represents a set of helpful contextual information in flexible format and dynamic reasoning. NOC-IDS aims in general to filter false positive alerts and to figure out relevant alerts, and helping the security operator to analyse relevant ones. NOC-IDS is defined by the description logic J C l a s s i c δ ϵ that provides non-monotonic reasoning. They illustrate the effectiveness and the powerfulness of the authors’ approach using the well-known DARPA 2000 data set.
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统(IDS)所产生的高比率的假阳性警报给安全操作员提出了一个关键问题，即区分真正的攻击和失败的攻击。为了解决这个问题，已经开发了几种依赖于诸如应用、服务、网络位置和漏洞之类的上下文信息的方法。上下文的改变可以是降低假阳性率的有效因素。然而，文献中的大多数方法都没有处理这个因素。因此，作者提出了基于非单调本体上下文的方法(NOC-IDS ),它以灵活的格式和动态的推理来表示一组有用的上下文信息。NOC-IDS的总体目标是过滤误报警报，找出相关警报，并帮助安全操作员分析相关警报。NOC-IDS是由提供非单调推理的描述逻辑J C l a s s i c δ ϵ定义的。他们使用著名的DARPA 2000数据集说明了作者方法的有效性和强大功能。
papers.title_zh: 减少误报的基于上下文的方法

papers.title: Secure hierarchical authentication protocol in VANET
papers.authors: Xuelian Li, Yue Han, Juntao Gao, Jie Niu
papers.abstract: The 5G technology will promote the development of vehicle ad hoc networks (VANET). However, almost all the existing authentication protocols rely on a completely trusted authority (TA), which undoubtedly raises a heavy burden on the TA. On the other hand, these protocols can rarely resist some special attacks, such as registration authority leaks registration information attack and ephemeral secret leakage attack. To address these problems, based on the self-certified public keys and Schnorr signatures, the authors propose a hierarchical revocable authentication protocol in VANET. The proposed protocol is provably secure in the random oracle model under the Diffie-Hellman assumption. Performance analysis illustrates that the protocol greatly saves computation resources and satisfies the well-known security requirements. Therefore, the proposed protocol is suitable for the VANET environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 5G技术将促进车辆自组织网络的发展(VANET)。然而，几乎所有现有的认证协议都依赖于一个完全可信的机构(TA ),这无疑增加了TA的负担。另一方面，这些协议很少能抵抗一些特殊的攻击，如注册机构泄漏注册信息攻击和短暂秘密泄漏攻击。为了解决这些问题，基于自认证公钥和Schnorr签名，作者在VANET提出了一个分层可撤销认证协议。在Diffie-Hellman假设下，该协议在随机预言模型下是可证明安全的。性能分析表明，该协议大大节省了计算资源，并满足众所周知的安全要求。因此，建议的协议适用于VANET环境。
papers.title_zh: VANET中的安全分层认证协议

papers.title: Specifications and improvements of LPN solving algorithms
papers.authors: Lin Jiao
papers.abstract: The hardness of LPN problems serves as security source of many primitives in lightweight and post-quantum cryptography, which enjoy extreme simplicity and efficiency for various applications. Accordingly there are several LPN solving algorithms proposed over past decade, and received quite a lot of attention recently. In this paper, we propose a new LPN solving algorithm using covering codes in the existing algorithmic framework with a new data structure of numerical value instead of vector quantity for convenience in table look-up, integrate the optimized procedures, and further presenting four main improvements. Firstly, we apply the technique of binary tree sum in Gaussian elimination and new BKW iterations. Secondly, we propose a global BKW collision optimization with tweakable reduction length, which is proved optimized. Thirdly, we extend the covering codes scope in service for lager bias and smaller data requirement with a bias estimation strategy. Finally, we propose a detailed parameter selection principle for given LPN instances. The best known classic results are given for the (512/532/592,1/8)-instances suggested in cryptographic schemes. Besides, we evaluate the performance on low-noise LPN and (k,1/4)-LPN instances, and further correct the lower length bounds of LPN instances with various bias for security levels of NIST's Post-Quantum Call.
papers.abstract_zh: LPN问题的困难性是轻量级和后量子密码术中许多原语的安全来源，这些原语在各种应用中享有极端的简单性和效率。因此，在过去的十年中提出了几种LPN求解算法，并且最近受到了相当多的关注。本文提出了一种新的LPN求解算法，该算法在现有算法框架下使用覆盖码，用数值的数据结构代替向量的数据结构以方便查表，集成了优化后的程序，并进一步提出了四个主要的改进。首先，我们在高斯消去法和新的BKW迭代中应用二叉树和技术。其次，我们提出了一个缩减长度可调的全局BKW碰撞优化算法，并证明了该算法的优化性。第三，针对较大的偏差和较小的数据需求，采用偏差估计策略扩展了覆盖码的服务范围。最后，我们为给定的LPN实例提出了一个详细的参数选择原则。对于密码方案中提出的(512/532/592，1/8)-实例，给出了最著名的经典结果。此外，我们评估了在低噪声LPN和(k，1/4)-LPN实例上的性能，并进一步修正了LPN实例在不同的NIST后量子呼叫安全等级下的长度下限。
papers.title_zh: LPN求解算法的规范和改进

papers.title: Integral distinguishers for Grøstl-512 and Kupyna-512 permutation functions
papers.authors: Rongjia Li, Chenhui Jin, Hongchen Pan
papers.abstract: Grostl is one of the SHA-3 finalist hash functions. Kupyna is the new Ukrainian hash standard, which is structurally very similar to Grostl. The authors investigate the randomness of the two permutations used in Grostl-512 and one of the two permutations used in Kupyna-512, in this study. New integral distinguishers of the three permutations are constructed. First, using an automatic search tool of division property, they find improved integral distinguishers of the permutations in both the forward and backward directions. Then, subspace trails are utilised to extend the length of the backward integral distinguishers by one round. Finally, the forward and backward integral distinguishers are combined using the inside-out method. As far as they know, they decrease the computational cost of 8, 9 and 10-round distinguishers and their 12-round distinguishers are the longest distinguishers for the three permutations.
papers.abstract_zh: Grostl是SHA-3最终入围的哈希函数之一。Kupyna是新的乌克兰哈希标准，在结构上与Grostl非常相似。在这项研究中，作者调查了Grostl-512中使用的两种排列和Kupyna-512中使用的两种排列之一的随机性。构造了三种置换的新的整数判别子。首先，使用除法性质的自动搜索工具，他们在向前和向后两个方向上找到排列的改进的整数区分符。然后，利用子空间轨迹将后向整数区分器的长度延长一轮。最后，使用由内向外的方法将正向和反向积分区分器结合起来。据他们所知，他们降低了8、9和10轮区分器的计算成本，并且他们的12轮区分器是三种排列中最长的区分器。
papers.title_zh: gr STL-512和Kupyna-512置换函数的整数区分符

papers.title: New method for assets sensitivity calculation and technical risks assessment in the information systems
papers.authors: Mohammad Shakibazad, Ali Jabbar Rashidi
papers.abstract: One of the most important components constructing the information security management system is the risk assessment process. Information technology system risks have a direct impact on the mission of organisations. Risk assessment allows organisations to identify weaknesses and security threats, and adopt appropriate solutions to deal with risks. The risk identification and assessment is the most important and complex part of the risk management process. In this study, a method has been presented to asset technical risks with regard to the sensitivity of each of the assets. In this research, the cyber battlefield framework has been presented to analyse the assets' sensitivity and then to determine the risk of each. The cyber battlefield contains exact information about cyber environment, including a vulnerability of knowledge repository, tangible and intangible components of cyber environment, and the relationships between them. Cyber-attacks are performed using vulnerabilities in the cyber environment components, so the present study focuses on the provision of a method to determine the risk due to the vulnerabilities. Considering the cost of risks treatment, the risks have been prioritised.
papers.abstract_zh: 构建信息安全管理系统最重要的组成部分之一是风险评估流程。信息技术系统风险对组织的使命有直接影响。风险评估允许组织识别弱点和安全威胁，并采用适当的解决方案来处理风险。风险识别和评估是风险管理过程中最重要也是最复杂的部分。在这项研究中，提出了一种方法来评估资产技术风险对每项资产的敏感性。在这项研究中，提出了网络战场框架来分析资产的敏感性，然后确定每个资产的风险。网络战场包含关于网络环境的确切信息，包括知识库的脆弱性、网络环境的有形和无形组成部分以及它们之间的关系。网络攻击是利用网络环境组件中的漏洞进行的，因此本研究侧重于提供一种方法来确定漏洞导致的风险。考虑到风险处理的成本，对风险进行了优先排序。
papers.title_zh: 信息系统中资产敏感度计算和技术风险评估的新方法

papers.title: Ways to merge two secret sharing schemes
papers.authors: Arkadii Slinko
papers.abstract: A secret sharing scheme implemented in an organisation is designed to reflect the power structure in that organisation. When two organisations merge, this usually requires a number of substantial changes and, in particular, changes to their secret sharing schemes which have to be merged in the way which reflects a new role of each of the organisations. This study looks at the ways secret sharing scheme can be modified when organisational changes occur. The authors restrict themselves with the class of ideal linear secret sharing schemes and describe how matrices of these linear schemes have to be modified when they take the sum, the product or the composition of two linear access structures.
papers.abstract_zh: 在一个组织中实现的秘密共享方案被设计成反映该组织中的权力结构。当两个组织合并时，这通常需要许多实质性的改变，特别是对它们的秘密共享方案的改变，这些秘密共享方案必须以反映每个组织的新角色的方式合并。这项研究着眼于当组织发生变化时秘密共享方案可以被修改的方式。作者用一类理想的线性秘密共享方案来限制自己，并描述了当它们取两个线性访问结构的和、积或合成时，这些线性方案的矩阵必须如何被修改。
papers.title_zh: 合并两个秘密共享方案的方法

papers.title: New single-trace side-channel attacks on a specific class of Elgamal cryptosystem
papers.authors: Parinaz Mahdion, Hadi Soleimany, Pouya Habibi, Farokhlagha Moazami
papers.abstract: The so-called N − 1 attack is one of the most important order-2 element attacks, as it requires a non-adaptive chosen ciphertext which is considered as a more realistic attack model compared to adaptive chosen ciphertext scenario. To protect the implementation against N − 1 attack, several literatures propose the simplest solution, i.e. ‘block the special message N − 1 ’. In this study, the authors conduct an in-depth research on the N − 1 attack based on the SMA and Montgomery ladder (ML) algorithms. They show that despite the unaccepted ciphertext N − 1 countermeasure, other types of N − 1 attacks are applicable to specific classes of Elgamal cryptosystems. They propose new chosen-message power-analysis attacks with order-4 elements which utilise a chosen ciphertext c such that c 2 = − 1 mod p where p is the prime number used as a modulus in Elgamal. Such a ciphertext can be found simply when p ≡ 1 mod 4 . They demonstrate that ML and SMA algorithms are subjected to the new N − 1 -type attack by utilising a different ciphertext. They implement the proposed attacks on the TARGET Board of the ChipWhisperer CW1173 and the proposed experiments validate the feasibility and effectiveness of the attacks by using only a single power trace.
papers.abstract_zh: 所谓的n1攻击是最重要的2阶元素攻击之一，因为它需要非自适应选择密文，与自适应选择密文相比，非自适应选择密文被认为是更现实的攻击模型。为了保护实现免受n1攻击，一些文献提出了最简单的解决方案，即“阻止特殊消息n1”。在本研究中，作者基于SMA和Montgomery ladder (ML)算法对n1攻击进行了深入的研究。他们表明，尽管不接受密文n1对策，其他类型的n1攻击适用于特定类别的Elgamal密码系统。他们提出了新的具有4阶元素的选择消息功率分析攻击，这种攻击利用选择的密文c，使得C2 = 1 mod p，其中p是在Elgamal中用作模数的素数。当p ≡ 1 mod 4时，可以简单地找到这样的密文。他们证明了ML和SMA算法通过使用不同的密文而受到新的n1型攻击。他们在ChipWhisperer CW1173的目标板上实现了所提出的攻击，并且所提出的实验通过仅使用单个电源迹线来验证攻击的可行性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 对一类特殊Elgamal密码系统的新的单迹旁道攻击

papers.title: Protecting scientific workflows in clouds with an intrusion tolerant system
papers.authors: Yawen Wang, Yunfei Guo, Zehua Guo, Wenyan Liu, Chao Yang
papers.abstract: With the development of cloud computing technology, more and more scientific workflows are delivered to cloud platforms to complete. However, there are many threats in clouds due to the multi-tenant coexistence. In order to protect scientific workflows in clouds, the authors propose an intrusion tolerant scientific workflow system. In this system, the task executors containing multiple virtual machines are used for workflow sub-task execution to enhance reliability. Then lagged decision mechanism is presented to ensure uninterrupted workflow execution while checking the intermediate data, and assessing the confidence of these data. Inspired by moving target defence, they propose a dynamic task scheduling strategy based on resource circulation to periodically generate and recycle task executors, keeping the clean state of the workflow execution environment. Furthermore, temporary workflow intermediate data backup mechanism is presented, the stored intermediate data can be used for the re-execution of workflow sub-tasks with low confidence. Experiments are conducted in both the actual test environment based on OpenStack and the simulated test environment based on WorkflowSim toolkit. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed system can effectively enhance intrusion tolerance of scientific workflows.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算技术的发展，越来越多的科学工作流被交付到云平台上完成。然而，由于多租户共存，云中存在许多威胁。为了保护云中的科学工作流，提出了一种入侵容忍的科学工作流系统。在该系统中，包含多个虚拟机的任务执行器用于工作流子任务执行，以增强可靠性。然后提出滞后决策机制，在检查中间数据和评估这些数据的可信度时，保证工作流的不间断执行。受移动目标防御的启发，他们提出了一种基于资源循环的动态任务调度策略，定期生成和回收任务执行器，保持工作流执行环境的干净状态。此外，提出了临时工作流中间数据备份机制，存储的中间数据可用于低置信度工作流子任务的重新执行。实验在基于OpenStack的实际测试环境和基于WorkflowSim toolkit的模拟测试环境中进行。实验结果表明，该系统能有效提高科学工作流的入侵容忍能力。
papers.title_zh: 利用入侵容忍系统保护云中的科学工作流

papers.title: Network intrusion detection model based on multivariate correlation analysis - long short-time memory network
papers.authors: Rui-Hong Dong, Xue-Yong Li, Qiu-Yu Zhang, Hui Yuan
papers.abstract: For the purpose of improving the low detection performance of network intrusion detection model caused by high-dimensional data, and from the perspective of time correlation characteristics of intrusion detection datasets, the authors present a network intrusion detection model based on the multivariate correlations analysis - long short-term memory network (MCA-LSTM). Firstly, this model selects the optimal feature subsets through the information gain feature selection method, the MCA module is then used to change the feature subset into the triangle area map (TAM) matrix, and finally inputs the TAM matrix into the LSTM module for the training and testing purpose. To better demonstrate the performance of the proposed model, it is compared with those of convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural network, deep forest, support vector machine, and k-nearest neighbour methods proposed by the previous researchers. Experimental results show that the testing accuracy of the proposed model on 5-classification task using NSL-KDD dataset is up to 82.15%, and that on 10-classification task using UNSW-NB15 dataset is up to 77.74%. Moreover, compared with the traditional machine learning and existing deep learning models, the proposed model has shown to achieve better classification detection performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了改善高维数据导致的网络入侵检测模型检测性能低下的问题，从入侵检测数据集的时间相关性特征出发，提出了一种基于多元相关性分析的网络入侵检测模型——长短期记忆网络(MCA-LSTM)。该模型首先通过信息增益特征选择方法选择最优特征子集，然后利用MCA模块将特征子集转化为三角形面积图(TAM)矩阵，最后将TAM矩阵输入LSTM模块进行训练和测试。为了更好地展示该模型的性能，将该模型与卷积神经网络、递归神经网络、deep forest、支持向量机和k-最近邻方法进行了比较。实验结果表明，该模型在NSL-KDD数据集上的测试准确率达到82.15%，在UNSW-NB15数据集上的测试准确率达到77.74%。此外，与传统的机器学习和现有的深度学习模型相比，该模型具有更好的分类检测性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于多元相关分析的网络入侵检测模型——长短时记忆网络

papers.title: Novel non-linear dynamics P2P network worm propagation and immune model
papers.authors: Xiaoyang Liu, Jiamiao Liu
papers.abstract: This study proposes a novel non-linear dynamic worm propagation model in order to describe the dynamics model of conditional triggered worm's propagation in the network, then proposes an immune dynamics model. First, the authors build impact factor according to actual condition; second, the conditions trigger type worm propagation model is established and the corresponding immune model is constructed; third, the epidemic is deduced non-toxic balance and do not sufficient conditions for the flood of worm is proved based on the theory of worm propagation model, and then the conditions of the worm will not overflow sufficient is proved through simulation experiments; finally, according to the simulation analysis and the characteristics of worm propagation, a series of control strategies are proposed, as well as the changing trend of worms in the network with immune ability. A series of simulation results show that the proposed models are reasonable and effective, it can more accurately reflect the worm propagation process in the real peer-to-peer (P2P) network, which can also accurately predict the worm propagation trend in P2P network.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了描述条件触发蠕虫在网络中传播的动力学模型，提出了一种新的非线性动态蠕虫传播模型，进而提出了一种免疫动力学模型。首先，根据实际情况建立影响因子；其次，建立了条件触发型蠕虫传播模型，并构建了相应的免疫模型；第三，基于蠕虫传播模型理论，推导出无毒平衡和不泛滥蠕虫的充分条件，并通过仿真实验证明蠕虫不会泛滥的充分条件；最后，根据仿真分析和蠕虫传播的特点，提出了一系列控制策略，以及具有免疫能力的网络中蠕虫的变化趋势。一系列仿真结果表明，所提出的模型是合理有效的，能够更加准确地反映真实P2P网络中蠕虫的传播过程，也能够准确地预测P2P网络中蠕虫的传播趋势。
papers.title_zh: 新型非线性动态P2P网络蠕虫传播和免疫模型

papers.title: Fingerprint image quality assessment based on BP neural network with hierarchical clustering
papers.authors: Jun Liu, Jia Yan, Dexiang Deng, Ruijue Zhang
papers.abstract: Fingerprint image quality assessment is important because the good performance of the minutiae-based matching algorithm is heavily dependent on fingerprint images with high quality. Many efforts have been made in existing methods, but most methods either use full fingerprint images or use local areas and involve subjective judgments. Unlike previous methods, the proposed method considers both local and global assessments. Local feature vectors are extracted from the fingerprint image block for hierarchical clustering, and the results are used as target outputs of the back-propagation (BP) neural network without any subjective judgments. Global feature vectors based on the local quality assessment results are used for hierarchical clustering and fed into the BP neural network that calculates the overall error rate of genuine and imposter errors to achieve global quality assessment. Furthermore, the minutiae quality assessment method is also proposed and incorporated into the minutiae-based matching algorithm. The experimental results based on the FVC2002 and FVC2004 databases show that the proposed methods can effectively assess the quality of fingerprint images and ensure the overall improvement of matching performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 指纹图像质量评估非常重要，因为基于细节点的匹配算法的良好性能在很大程度上依赖于高质量的指纹图像。在现有的方法中已经做了许多努力，但是大多数方法要么使用完整的指纹图像，要么使用局部区域并涉及主观判断。与以前的方法不同，提出的方法考虑了局部和全局评估。从指纹图像块中提取局部特征向量进行层次聚类，结果作为反向传播(BP)神经网络的目标输出，没有任何主观判断。基于局部质量评估结果的全局特征向量被用于分层聚类，并被馈送到BP神经网络，该BP神经网络计算真实错误和冒充错误的总错误率，以实现全局质量评估。此外，还提出了细节点质量评估方法，并将其融入到基于细节点的匹配算法中。基于FVC2002和FVC2004数据库的实验结果表明，该方法能够有效地评估指纹图像的质量，保证匹配性能的整体提高。
papers.title_zh: 基于层次聚类BP神经网络的指纹图像质量评价

papers.title: Choosing subfields for LUOV and lifting fields for rainbow
papers.authors: Dung Hoang Duong, Le Van Luyen, Ha Thanh Nguyen Tran
papers.abstract: Multivariate public key cryptography is one of the main candidates for post-quantum cryptography. Rainbow, an improved (multi-layer) version of unbalanced oil and vinegar (UOV), is one of the most famous multivariate signature schemes that is a promising candidate for NIST standardisation. At INDOCRYPT 2017, Beullens and Preneel introduced a new variant LUOV of UOV. Their idea is to generate a UOV scheme over the binary field L = F 2 and then lift it into a bigger field K = F 2 r and hence dramatically reduce the public key size. In this study, the authors first theoretically deduce the choice for the subfield L (which is different from F 2 ) which results in smaller signature sizes (up to 40%). Moreover, they extend the idea to Rainbow and theoretically yield the optimal choice for the subfield L over which a Rainbow is generated before being lifted to K. As a result, they can reduce the public key size of the obtained Rainbow scheme up to at least 36%.
papers.abstract_zh: 多元公钥密码是后量子密码的主要候选方案之一。彩虹是不平衡油和醋(UOV)的改进(多层)版本，是最著名的多元签名方案之一，是NIST标准化的有前途的候选方案。在INDOCRYPT 2017上，Beullens和Preneel推出了UOV的新变种LUOV。他们的想法是在二进制域L = F 2上产生一个UOV方案，然后把它提升到一个更大的域K = F 2 r上，从而大大减少公钥的长度。在这项研究中，作者首先从理论上推导出子场L(不同于F 2)的选择，它导致更小的签名大小(高达40%)。此外，他们将该思想扩展到Rainbow，并且在提升到k之前，理论上产生了对于在其上生成Rainbow的子场L的最优选择。结果，他们可以将所获得的Rainbow方案的公钥大小减少至少36%。
papers.title_zh: 为LUOV选择子场，为rainbow选择提升场

papers.title: Framework for faster key search using related-key higher-order differential properties: applications to Agrasta
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Farokhlagha Moazami, Christian Rechberger, Hadi Soleimany
papers.abstract: The relevance of the related-key model is usually controversial. However, in some cases, related-key properties have already been used to reduce the effective key length of the cipher in the single-key model. Hence, research into this direction can be helpful to bridge the gap between theory and practice aspects of the related-key model. Motivated by this challenge, the authors develop a new framework to provide further evidence that deterministic related-key characteristics can be utilised in the single-key model. The authors describe a sound framework for utilising related-key higher-order differential distinguishers that can beat the boundaries given by exhaustive key search. The data required is only one known as plaintext–ciphertext pair if the number of ciphertext bits matches the key length. From a theoretical point of view, the connection between related-key higher-order differential properties and the security of cryptographic primitives in the single-key model are precised. From a practical point of view, the proposed framework is used to evaluate the security of Agrasta cipher which is a variant of Rasta cipher presented at CRYPTO 2018. The proposed method is the first analysis of Agrasta reduced to three rounds that performs better than exhaustive key search and is independent of the used linear layers.
papers.abstract_zh: 相关键模型的相关性通常是有争议的。然而，在某些情况下，相关密钥属性已经被用于减少单密钥模型中密码的有效密钥长度。因此，对这一方向的研究有助于弥合相关键模型的理论和实践方面的差距。在这一挑战的推动下，作者开发了一个新的框架来提供进一步的证据，证明确定性相关密钥特征可以用于单密钥模型。作者描述了一个利用相关键高阶差分区分器的合理框架，它可以击败由穷举键搜索给出的边界。如果密文位数与密钥长度匹配，所需的数据只有一个，即所谓的明文-密文对。从理论角度出发，精确描述了单密钥模型中相关密钥高阶微分性质与密码原语安全性之间的联系。从实用的角度来看，所提出的框架用于评估Agrasta密码的安全性，Agrasta密码是在CRYPTO 2018上展示的rasta密码的变体。所提出的方法是对Agrasta的第一次分析，该分析减少到三轮，比穷举关键字搜索执行得更好，并且独立于所使用的线性层。
papers.title_zh: 使用相关关键字高阶差分属性的快速关键字搜索框架:在Agrasta中的应用

papers.title: Parallel-CNN network for malware detection
papers.authors: Nazanin Bakhshinejad, Ali Hamzeh
papers.abstract: Nowadays, computers and the Internet have become an inseparable part of our life. We accomplish a wide range of our daily tasks through the Internet. A massive number of malwares have been designed annually to infiltrate computers and other electronic devices that endanger their security strikingly. Hence, developing a method that is capable of proactively detect and prevent malware is a perpetual demand. Recently, diverse approaches have been introduced for detecting malware by the help of high-level features and machine learning techniques. Although these methods provide reasonable results, in most of them identifying and extracting proper features from files is one of the most challenging steps. Deep learning techniques that have recently been applied in the area of malware detection, automate the feature extraction operations and represent much better results with respect to multi-layer training. In this study, a novel method is proposed for malware detection by employing a parallel architecture of convolutional neural network (CNN). The proposed method utilises raw bytes of executable files and eliminates the need to extract high-level features. The results of experiments show that the proposed approach can achieve high detection rate, outperforming traditional machine learning based methods which reveals the merit of deep learning techniques in malware detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，电脑和互联网已经成为我们生活中不可分割的一部分。我们通过互联网完成各种各样的日常任务。每年都有大量的恶意软件被设计用来渗透到计算机和其他电子设备中，严重威胁它们的安全。因此，开发一种能够主动检测和防止恶意软件的方法是永恒的需求。最近，在高级特征和机器学习技术的帮助下，已经引入了多种方法来检测恶意软件。虽然这些方法提供了合理的结果，但在大多数方法中，从文件中识别和提取适当的特征是最具挑战性的步骤之一。最近在恶意软件检测领域中应用的深度学习技术，自动化了特征提取操作，并且在多层训练方面表现出好得多的结果。在这项研究中，提出了一种新的恶意软件检测方法，采用并行结构的卷积神经网络(CNN)。所提出的方法利用了可执行文件的原始字节，并且消除了提取高级特征的需要。实验结果表明，该方法具有较高的检测率，优于传统的基于机器学习的方法，揭示了深度学习技术在恶意软件检测中的优势。
papers.title_zh: 用于恶意软件检测的并行CNN网络

papers.title: Threshold trapdoor functions and their applications
papers.authors: Binbin Tu, Yu Chen, Xueli Wang
papers.abstract: We introduce a cryptographic primitive named threshold trapdoor functions (TTDFs), from which we give generic constructions of threshold and revocation encryptions under adaptive corruption model. Then, we show TTDF can be instantiated under the decisional Diffie-Hellman (DDH) assumption and the learning with errors (LWE) assumption. By combining the instantiations of TTDF with the generic constructions, we obtain threshold and revocation encryptions which compare favorably over existing schemes. The experimental results show that our proposed schemes are practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了一种称为门限陷门函数(TTDFs)的密码原语，并由此给出了自适应破坏模型下门限加密和撤销加密的一般构造。然后，我们证明了TTDF可以在判定性迪菲-赫尔曼(DDH)假设和带误差学习(LWE)假设下被实例化。通过将TTDF的实例化与一般构造相结合，我们获得了优于现有方案的门限和撤销加密。实验结果表明，我们提出的方案是可行的。
papers.title_zh: 门限陷门函数及其应用

papers.title: Mutual authentication-based RA scheme for embedded systems
papers.authors: Ziwang Wang, Yi Zhuang, Qingxun Xia
papers.abstract: To improve the security and efficiency of remote attestation (RA) for embedded systems, this study proposes mutual authentication-based RA scheme for embedded systems. Especially, the authors design an RA framework based on authentication agents and measurement agents, which combines the mutually anonymous identity authentication scheme with the platform integrity attestation. During the identity authentication period, based on the traditional direct anonymous authentication scheme, the time-stamping mechanism and the mutual direct anonymous attestation mechanism are proposed to achieve bidirectional anonymous authentication of both parties in the communication. During the platform integrity attestation period, combining with the locality principle, they improve the data structure for storing the integrity measurements of the module and propose an RA mechanism based on locality principle-based hash tree. This mechanism can shorten the length of the certification path and improve the verification efficiency of platform configuration integrity certification. Furthermore, experimental results and analysis show that the efficiency of the proposed scheme is superior to the existing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了提高嵌入式系统远程证明的安全性和效率，提出了一种基于相互认证的嵌入式系统远程证明方案。特别地，作者设计了一个基于认证代理和测量代理的RA框架，将相互匿名的身份认证方案与平台完整性证明相结合。在身份认证阶段，基于传统的直接匿名认证方案，提出了时间戳机制和双向直接匿名证明机制来实现通信双方的双向匿名认证。在平台完整性证明阶段，结合局部性原则，改进了存储模块完整性度量的数据结构，提出了基于局部性原则的哈希树RA机制。该机制可以缩短认证路径的长度，提高平台配置完整性认证的验证效率。实验结果和分析表明，该方案的效率优于现有方案。
papers.title_zh: 基于相互认证的嵌入式系统随机接入方案

papers.title: Call graph obfuscation and diversification: an approach
papers.authors: Miguel Rodríguez-Veliz, Yulier Nuñez-Musa, Roberto Sepúlveda Lima
papers.abstract: Monetary loss due to software piracy nowadays reaches millions. In 2017, the commercial value for this concept rose to $46.3 billion. A way to mitigate this problem from the technological point of view is the use of software protection techniques, especially the obfuscation and diversification of code, highlighting the control obfuscation. There are many proposals connected with obfuscating control flow graph. However, there are few reported works that perform obfuscation of the call graph. In this study, the authors propose a novel mechanism for the static obfuscation and diversification of the call graph of a software. The mechanism is based on the routing of functions calls in order to modify the software call graph. A prototype of the proposed mechanism was developed by extending the functionalities of a compiler. The generated software differed structurally by 25% on average, compared to the original software. There was an increase in the level of obfuscation from 2 to 30% in the tests performed, with only a 3% overhead of the execution time in all cases. The proposal allows to restructure the whole call graph efficiently, increasing the level of protection without affecting significantly the software performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，由于软件盗版造成的经济损失高达数百万。2017年，这一概念的商业价值升至463亿美元。从技术角度缓解这一问题的一种方法是使用软件保护技术，特别是代码的混淆和多样化，突出控制混淆。有许多建议与混淆控制流图有关。然而，很少有报告的工作，执行混淆的调用图。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种新的机制，用于软件调用图的静态混淆和多样化。该机制基于函数调用的路由，以便修改软件调用图。通过扩展编译器的功能，开发了该机制的原型。与原始软件相比，生成的软件在结构上平均有25%的不同。在所执行的测试中，混淆程度从2%增加到30%,所有情况下的执行时间开销只有3%。该建议允许有效地重构整个调用图，在不显著影响软件性能的情况下提高保护级别。
papers.title_zh: 调用图混淆和多样化:一种方法

papers.title: Guest Editorial: Selected Papers from 17th International Conference on Cryptology and Network Security (CANS)
papers.title_zh: 特邀社论:第17届国际密码学与网络安全会议(CANS)论文选

papers.title: Faster privacy-preserving location proximity schemes for circles and polygons
papers.authors: Kimmo Järvinen, Ágnes Kiss, Thomas Schneider, Oleksandr Tkachenko, Zheng Yang
papers.abstract:
In the last decade, location information became 
 easily obtainable using off-the-shelf mobile devices. 
 This gave a momentum to developing Location Based Services (LBSs) 
 such as location proximity detection, which can be used to find 
 friends or taxis nearby. LBSs can, however, be easily misused to 
 track users, which draws attention to the need of protecting 
 privacy of these users. 
 In this work, we address this issue by designing, implementing, 
 and evaluating multiple algorithms for Privacy-Preserving 
 Location Proximity (PPLP) that are based on different secure 
 computation protocols. Our PPLP protocols support both circle and 
 polygon range queries and have runtimes from a few to some 
 hundreds of milliseconds and bandwidth requirements from a few 
 hundreds of bytes to one megabyte. Consequently, they are 
 well-suited for different scenarios and offer faster runtimes and 
 savings in bandwidth and computational power as well as security 
 improvements compared to previous PPLP schemes. In addition, the 
 computationally most expensive parts of the PPLP computation can 
 be precomputed in our protocols, such that the input-dependent 
 online phase runs in just a few milliseconds.
papers.abstract_zh:

这推动了基于位置的服务(LBSs)的发展

papers.title_zh: 圆形和多边形的快速隐私保护位置邻近方案

papers.title: Fully invisible protean signatures schemes
papers.authors: Stephan Krenn, Henrich C. Pöhls, Kai Samelin, Daniel Slamanig
papers.abstract: Protean signatures (PSs), recently introduced by Krenn et al. (CANS ‘18), allow a semi-trusted third party (the sanitiser), to modify a signed message in a controlled way: the signer can define the message parts to be arbitrarily editable by the sanitiser, as well as message parts which can be redacted (but not altered otherwise) by the sanitiser. Thus, PSs generalise both redactable signatures (RSs) and sanitisable signatures (SSs) into a single notion. Invisibility for PSs guarantees that no outsider (i.e. any party not being signer or sanitiser) can decide which message parts can be edited. However, the current definition of invisibility does not prohibit that an outsider can decide which parts are redactable – only which parts can be edited are hidden. This negatively impacts the privacy guarantees provided by this definition. The authors extend PSs to be fully invisible. Their notion guarantees that an outsider can identify neither editable nor redactable parts. They, therefore, introduce the new notions of invisible RSs and invisible non-accountable SSs ( S S ′ ), along with a consolidated framework for aggregate signatures. Using those building blocks, their resulting construction is significantly more efficient than the original scheme by Krenn et al., which they demonstrate in a prototypical implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近由Krenn等人(CANS '18)引入的千变万化签名(PSs)允许半可信的第三方(杀毒程序)以受控的方式修改已签名的消息:签名者可以定义杀毒程序可以任意编辑的消息部分，以及杀毒程序可以编辑(但不能更改)的消息部分。因此，PSs将可编辑签名(RSs)和可净化签名(SSs)归纳为一个概念。PSs的不可见性保证了没有外人(即不是签名者或消毒者的任何一方)可以决定哪些消息部分可以被编辑。然而，当前对不可见性的定义并不禁止外人决定哪些部分是可编辑的——只有哪些部分是可编辑的才是隐藏的。这对该定义提供的隐私保证有负面影响。作者将PSs扩展为完全不可见。他们的观念保证了局外人既不能识别可编辑的部分，也不能识别可编辑的部分。因此，他们引入了不可见RSs和不可见不可问责SSs(S S′)的新概念，以及聚合签名的统一框架。使用这些构建块，其结果构造比Krenn等人的原始方案有效得多，他们在原型实现中演示了该方案。
papers.title_zh: 完全不可见的蛋白质签名方案

papers.title: Impact of the modulus switching technique on some attacks against learning problems
papers.authors: Huy Quoc Le, Pradeep Kumar Mishra, Satoshi Nakamura, Koha Kinjo, Dung Hoang Duong, Masaya Yasuda
papers.abstract: The modulus switching technique has been used in some cryptographic applications as well as in cryptanalysis. For cryptanalysis against the learning with errors (LWE) problem and the learning with rounding (LWR) problem, it seems that one does not know whether the technique is really useful or not. This work supplies a complete view of the impact of this technique on the decoding attack, the dual attack and the primal attack against both LWE and LWR. For each attack, the authors give the optimal formula for the switching modulus. The formulas get involved the number of LWE/LWR samples, which differs from the known formula in the literature. They also attain the corresponding sufficient conditions saying when one should utilise the technique. Surprisingly, restricted to the LWE/LWR problem that the secret vector is much shorter than the error vector, they also show that performing the modulus switching before using the so-called rescaling technique in the dual attack and the primal attack make these attacks worse than only exploiting the rescaling technique as reported by Bai and Galbraith at the Australasian conference on information security and privacy (ACISP) 2014 conference. As an application, they theoretically assess the influence of the modulus switching on the LWE/LWR-based second round NIST PQC submissions.
papers.abstract_zh: 模数转换技术已经用于一些密码应用和密码分析中。对于针对错误学习(LWE)问题和舍入学习(LWR)问题的密码分析，似乎不知道该技术是否真的有用。这项工作提供了一个完整的看法的影响，这种技术的解码攻击，双重攻击和原始攻击对LWE和LWR。对于每一种攻击，作者给出了最佳的转换系数公式。该公式涉及LWE/LWR样本数，与文献中已知的公式不同。他们也获得了相应的充分条件，说明何时应该利用技术。令人惊讶的是，限于秘密向量比错误向量短得多的和问题，他们还表明，在双重攻击和原始攻击中使用所谓的重新标度技术之前执行模数转换，使得这些攻击比仅利用重新标度技术更糟糕，如Bai和Galbraith在澳大利亚信息安全和隐私会议(ACISP) 2014年会议上所报告的。作为应用，他们从理论上评估了模数转换对LWE/LWR第二轮NIST PQC提交的影响。
papers.title_zh: 模数转换技术对某些学习问题攻击的影响

papers.title: Complexity of statistical attacks on QC-LDPC code-based cryptosystems
papers.authors: Paolo Santini, Marco Baldi, Franco Chiaraluce
papers.abstract: Public-key cryptosystems built on quasi-cyclic (QC) low-density parity-check and moderate-density parity-check codes are promising candidates for post-quantum cryptography, since they are characterised by compact keys and high algorithmic efficiency. The main issue with this kind of system is represented by the fact that, since the decoding procedure is probabilistic, it may leak information about the secret key. In this work, the authors study cryptanalysis procedures that aim at recovering the secret key by exploiting this fact. They identify the phenomenon that is at the basis of these procedures and show that the QC structure plays an important role in the success of these attacks. They use a graph analogy to study the complexity of these attacks, and show that their feasibility strongly depends on the QC structure. They also devise an approach to perform full cryptanalysis by combining an information set decoding algorithm with some partial knowledge about the structure of the secret key.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于准循环(QC)低密度奇偶校验码和中密度奇偶校验码的公钥密码系统具有密钥紧凑和算法效率高的特点，是后量子密码的候选方案。这种系统的主要问题在于，由于解码过程是概率性的，所以它可能会泄露关于密钥的信息。在这项工作中，作者研究了旨在利用这一事实恢复密钥的密码分析程序。他们确定了这些程序的基础现象，并表明QC结构在这些攻击的成功中起着重要作用。他们使用图形类比来研究这些攻击的复杂性，并表明它们的可行性强烈依赖于QC结构。他们还设计了一种方法，通过将信息集解码算法与一些关于密钥结构的部分知识相结合来执行完全密码分析。
papers.title_zh: 基于QC-LDPC码的密码系统统计攻击的复杂性

papers.title: Breaking the hardness assumption and IND-CPA security of HQC submitted to NIST PQC project
papers.authors: Zhen Liu, Yanbin Pan, Tianyuan Xie
papers.title_zh: 打破HQC提交给NIST PQC项目的硬度假设和IND-CPA安全性

papers.title: Privacy-preserving constrained spectral clustering algorithm for large-scale data sets
papers.authors: Ji Li, Jianghong Wei, Mao Ye, Wenfen Liu, Xuexian Hu
papers.abstract: With the increasing concern on the preservation of personal privacy, privacy-preserving data mining has become a hot topic in recent years. Spectral clustering is one of the most widely used clustering algorithm for exploratory data analysis and usually has to deal with sensitive data sets. How to conduct privacy-preserving spectral clustering is an urgent problem to be solved. In this study, the authors focus on introducing the notion of differential privacy, which is considered as the de facto standard of privacy-preserving data analysis, into spectral clustering. Specifically, by combining the well-studied constrained spectral clustering with the Wishart mechanism in a novel way, the authors propose a differentially private constrained spectral clustering (DP-CSC) algorithm. The DP-CSC algorithm is proved to capture asymptotic property and achieves ϵ -differential privacy. To illustrate the effectiveness and efficiency of DP-CSC, the authors conduct experiments on five real-word data sets. The results indicate that the DP-CSC algorithm can provide acceptable clustering accuracy with short running time while preserving individual privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着人们对个人隐私保护的日益关注，隐私保护数据挖掘已成为近年来的热门话题。谱聚类是探索性数据分析中应用最广泛的聚类算法之一，通常需要处理敏感数据集。如何进行隐私保护的谱聚类是一个亟待解决的问题。在这项研究中，作者将差分隐私的概念引入谱聚类，差分隐私被认为是隐私保护数据分析的事实标准。具体而言，通过以一种新的方式将研究良好的约束谱聚类与Wishart机制相结合，作者提出了差分私有约束谱聚类(DP-CSC)算法。证明了DP-CSC算法具有渐近性质，实现了ϵ差分隐私。为了说明DP-CSC的有效性和效率，作者在五个真实数据集上进行了实验。结果表明，DP-CSC算法能够在保持个体隐私的同时，以较短的运行时间提供可接受的聚类精度。
papers.title_zh: 面向大规模数据集的隐私保护约束谱聚类算法

papers.title: Data availability improvement in peer-to-peer online social networks
papers.authors: Fariba Khazaei Koohpar, Afsaneh Fatemi, Fatemeh Raji
papers.abstract: One of the main challenges of centralised social networks is having a central provider that stores the data which imposes some limitations to preserve the privacy of users’ data. However, one of the decentralised architectures is peer-to-peer network that every user takes the responsibility of storing and managing his/her data. Although the privacy of data is increased in these networks, authorised friends must have access to the shared data when the user is not online in the network. For this purpose, the user selects some friends and copies his/her data in their space. On the other hand, the amount of used space and the total number of replicas must be reduced as much as possible. In this study, the authors provide some solutions to reduce the amount of used space and the total number of replicas to increase data availability. In this way, they segment the user's data and consider the stability of copy-location, i.e. the selected friends who have a copy of the user's data. The performance evaluation of the proposed methods shows that they considerably reduce the amount of used space as well as the total number of replicas in comparison to other approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 集中式社交网络的主要挑战之一是拥有一个存储数据的中央提供商，这为保护用户数据的隐私施加了一些限制。然而，一种分散的架构是点对点网络，每个用户负责存储和管理他/她的数据。尽管在这些网络中数据的私密性增加了，但是当用户不在线时，授权的朋友必须能够访问共享的数据。为此，用户选择一些朋友，并将他/她的数据复制到他们的空间中。另一方面，必须尽可能减少已用空间量和副本总数。在这项研究中，作者提供了一些解决方案来减少已用空间量和副本总数，以提高数据可用性。通过这种方式，他们对用户的数据进行细分，并考虑复制位置的稳定性，即选择拥有用户数据副本的朋友。对所提出方法的性能评估表明，与其他方法相比，它们大大减少了所使用的空间量以及副本的总数。
papers.title_zh: 对等在线社交网络中的数据可用性改进

papers.title: Improved collusion-resistant unidirectional proxy re-encryption scheme from lattice
papers.authors: Xuyang Wang, Aiqun Hu, Hao Fang
papers.abstract: Proxy re-encryption (PRE) is a promising cryptographic structure for pervasive data sharing in cloud-based social networks, which enables a semi-trusted proxy to convert a ciphertext for Alice into a ciphertext for Bob without seeing the corresponding plaintext. Since the proxy is semi-trust, a PRE scheme which can resist the collusion attack will be of great practical value. Jiang et al. in 2015 and Kim and Jeong in 2016 have proposed collusion-resistant PRE (CR-PRE) schemes from the lattice by a similar technique, respectively. However, through the analysis of their schemes, the authors find that both of them have defects in the construction of the re-encryption key, which will lead to the re-encryption ciphertext cannot be decrypted or decrypted error with high probability. In this study, the authors first point out the defects in the work of Jiang et al.'s work and Kim and Jeong's work and propose an improved collusion-resistant unidirectional PRE scheme from lattice, based on learning with errors problems. In addition to solving the defects, CR-PRE still has many useful properties similar to the previous schemes, such as unidirectional, collusion resistant, chosen-plaintext attack secure and so on.
papers.abstract_zh: 代理重加密(PRE)是一种很有前途的用于基于云的社交网络中普适数据共享的密码结构，它使得半可信代理能够将Alice的密文转换为Bob的密文，而不需要看到相应的明文。由于代理是半信任的，一个能够抵抗共谋攻击的PRE方案将具有很大的实用价值。Jiang等人在2015年和Kim和Jeong在2016年分别利用类似的技术从格中提出了抗共谋预(CR-PRE)方案。然而，通过对两者方案的分析，作者发现两者在重加密密钥的构造上都存在缺陷，这将导致重加密密文不能被解密或解密错误的概率很高。在本研究中，作者首先指出了蒋等人的工作和Kim和Jeong的工作中的缺陷，并基于带错误学习问题提出了一种改进的抗共谋单向PRE方案。除了解决这些缺陷，CR-PRE还具有许多类似于以前方案的有用性质，如单向性、抗合谋攻击、选择明文攻击安全等。
papers.title_zh: 改进的抗共谋单向代理重加密方案

papers.title: ANOVUL: Detection of logic vulnerabilities in annotated programs via data and control flow analysis
papers.authors: Mahmoud Ghorbanzadeh, Hamid Reza Shahriari
papers.abstract: Logic vulnerabilities are largely dependent on the expected functions of web applications. Their appearance depends on both application logic and related security policy which may change based on modifications in business requirements. Accordingly, there are no specific and common patterns for logic vulnerabilities moreover, a security policy is required for their detection. In this study, a vulnerability detection method is proposed to detect logic vulnerabilities via analysing the program source code. Security checks enforce some constraints in the application so that the application behaves according to the logic intended by the programmer. The main goal is to find the vulnerabilities caused by bypassing some security checks. In this method, known as annotation-based vulnerability detection approach (ANOVUL), control and data flows are analysed to detect the application logic vulnerabilities. To analyse the flows of the program, access control and authenticity labelling are used. To evaluate ANOVUL, the authors have collected a data set. This comprises of PHP applications with reported logic vulnerabilities that have common vulnerabilities and exposures (CVE) identifiers. Based on the results, a 73% detection rate was achieved in the data set. The proposed method can detect logic vulnerabilities that are not detectable using conventional methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 逻辑漏洞很大程度上取决于web应用程序的预期功能。它们的外观取决于应用程序逻辑和相关的安全策略，这些策略可能会随着业务需求的变化而变化。因此，逻辑漏洞没有特定的和通用的模式。此外，需要一种安全策略来检测它们。本文提出了一种漏洞检测方法，通过分析程序源代码来检测逻辑漏洞。安全检查在应用程序中强制实施一些约束，以便应用程序根据程序员想要的逻辑运行。主要目标是发现绕过某些安全检查而导致的漏洞。在这种被称为基于注释的漏洞检测方法(ANOVUL)的方法中，控制和数据流被分析以检测应用程序逻辑漏洞。为了分析程序的流程，使用了访问控制和真实性标记。为了评估无排卵，作者收集了一组数据。这包括具有公共漏洞和暴露(CVE)标识符的已报告逻辑漏洞的PHP应用程序。基于该结果，在数据集中实现了73%的检测率。所提出的方法可以检测使用传统方法无法检测的逻辑漏洞。
papers.title_zh: ANOVUL:通过数据和控制流分析检测注释程序中的逻辑漏洞

papers.title: Corrigendum: Public-key encryption indistinguishable under plaintext-checkable attacks
papers.authors: Michel Abdalla, Fabrice Benhamouda, David Pointcheval
papers.title_zh: 勘误表:在明文可检查攻击下不可区分的公钥加密

papers.title: Guest Editorial: Security on Mobile and IoT Devices
papers.abstract: System security is a very active research domain, especially now that systems are all around us in a daily basis. The outcome of such research can be useful and impactful to a broad range of domains realized by modern societies. Nowadays, protecting systems is not only about taking care of server infrastructures or large networks, but of every device that is connected to the Internet. Such devices include mobiles and the Internet of Things (IoT). Developing techniques for protecting mobile devices does not only guarantee the correct functioning of such devices, but also protects other systems from getting attacked. Mobile devices may be weak and not important, as a central server hosting important data can be, but their prevalence can make them the ideal attack platform if they are massively compromised. Moreover, the fact that almost every one of us has one such device on a daily use raises several important privacy problems. Finally, the prevalence of mobile devices can make them ideal for building new applications, such as new authentication techniques. This Special Section is on systems security but with a focus on mobile and IoT devices acknowledging the importance of security problems in a mobile ecosystem. Specifically, the Section was designed to cover security and privacy aspects for mobile and IoT devices, as well as works that expose security and privacy issues on any layer of a mobile or IoT device. The Special Section received several submissions, which were all subjected to a rigorous reviewing procedure. Finally, three submissions were ultimately accepted. This first paper by Ingham et al. on ‘IoT security vulnerabilities and predictive signal jamming attack analysis in LoRaWAN’ aims to explore the security vulnerabilities of IoT devices particularly that use Low Power Wide Area Networks (LPWANs). The paper presents an attack, which is simulated with the use of a predictive model of the device data generation. The paper demonstrates that by predicting the data generation model, a jamming attack can be carried out to block other devices from sending data successfully. The second paper by Shuai et al. on ‘Lightweight and privacypreserving authentication scheme with the resilience of desynchronisation attacks for WBANs’ presents a privacypreserving authentication scheme with adaptive resilience of desynchronization attacks of Wireless Body Area Networks (WBAN), in which lightweight crypto-modules are adopted to pursue the best efficiency. WBANs have attracted attention because of their potential in improving the quality of healthcare services. With the help of WBANs, the user is able to access the patient's life-critical data generated by miniaturized medical sensors, and remote healthcare monitoring services are provided. The proposed scheme adopts several techniques for ensuring forward secrecy and resist de-synchronization attack. The authors provide comparison results, which demonstrate that the proposed scheme achieves a delicate balance between security and efficiency. Finally, the third paper by Roy and Khan on ‘Privacy preservation with RTT-based detection for wireless mesh networks' presents an efficient handoff authentication protocol for resisting against internal and external attacks in Wireless Mesh Networks (WMN). In particular, the proposed work prevents the AODV routing protocol against the wormhole attack in WMNs. The authors demonstrate their results through a simulation, carried out in NS3. We would like to thank all the reviewers and the IET staff for their support in producing this Special Section. We hope the papers in this Section will benefit all researchers that actively work on mobile/IoT security and privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统安全是一个非常活跃的研究领域，尤其是现在系统每天都在我们周围。这种研究的成果对现代社会实现的广泛领域可能是有用和有影响的。如今，保护系统不仅仅是保护服务器基础设施或大型网络，而是保护每一台连接到互联网的设备。这些设备包括手机和物联网(IoT)。开发保护移动设备的技术不仅能保证这些设备的正常运行，还能保护其他系统免受攻击。移动设备可能很弱，不重要，就像托管重要数据的中央服务器一样，但如果它们遭到大规模攻击，它们的普及会使它们成为理想的攻击平台。此外，几乎我们每个人每天都有一台这样的设备，这一事实引发了几个重要的隐私问题。最后，移动设备的普及使它们成为构建新应用的理想选择，比如新的认证技术。这一特别部分是关于系统安全的，但重点是移动和物联网设备，承认安全问题在移动生态系统中的重要性。具体来说，该部分旨在涵盖移动和物联网设备的安全和隐私方面，以及暴露移动或物联网设备任何层上的安全和隐私问题的作品。特别科收到了几份呈件，都经过了严格的审查程序。最后，三份意见书最终被接受。这是英厄姆等人撰写的第一篇关于“洛拉万的物联网安全漏洞和预测信号干扰攻击分析”的论文，旨在探讨物联网设备的安全漏洞，特别是使用低功耗广域网(LPWANs)的设备。本文提出了一种攻击，使用设备数据生成的预测模型来模拟这种攻击。该论文论证了通过预测数据生成模型，可以实施干扰攻击来阻止其他设备成功发送数据。帅等人的第二篇论文“无线体域网抗去同步攻击的轻量级隐私保护认证方案”提出了一种无线体域网(WBAN)抗去同步攻击的自适应隐私保护认证方案。WBANs因其在提高医疗服务质量方面的潜力而受到关注。在WBANs的帮助下，用户能够访问小型化医疗传感器生成的患者生命关键数据，并提供远程医疗监护服务。该方案采用了多种技术来保证前向安全性和抵抗去同步攻击。作者给出了比较结果，表明该方案在安全性和效率之间取得了微妙的平衡。最后，Roy和Khan的第三篇论文“无线网状网络的基于RTT检测的隐私保护”提出了一种有效的切换认证协议，用于抵抗无线网状网络(WMN)中的内部和外部攻击。特别地，所提出的工作防止了AODV路由协议在WMNs中的虫洞攻击。作者通过在NS3中进行的模拟展示了他们的结果。我们要感谢所有的审稿人和IET的工作人员，感谢他们对制作这一特别部分的支持。我们希望本节中的论文将有益于所有积极从事移动/物联网安全和隐私工作的研究人员。
papers.title_zh: 嘉宾社论:移动和物联网设备的安全性

papers.title: IoT security vulnerabilities and predictive signal jamming attack analysis in LoRaWAN
papers.authors: Max Ingham, Jims Marchang, Deepayan Bhowmik
papers.abstract:
Internet of Things (IoT) gains popularity in recent times due to its flexibility, usability, diverse applicability and ease of 
deployment. However, the issues related to security is less explored. The IoT devices are light weight in nature and have low 
computation power, low battery life and low memory. As incorporating security features are resource expensive, IoT devices are 
often found to be less protected and in recent times, more IoT devices have been routinely attacked due to high profile security 
flaws. This paper aims to explore the security vulnerabilities of IoT devices particularly that use Low Power Wide Area Networks 
(LPWANs). In this work, LoRaWAN based IoT security vulnerabilities are scrutinised and loopholes are identified. An attack was 
designed and simulated with the use of a predictive model of the device data generation. The paper demonstrated that by predicting 
the data generation model, jamming attack can be carried out to block devices from sending data successfully. This research will 
aid in the continual development of any necessary countermeasures and mitigations for LoRaWAN and LPWAN functionality of 
IoT networks in general.
papers.abstract_zh:
近年来，物联网因其灵活性、可用性、多种适用性和易用性而广受欢迎
部署。然而，与安全性相关的问题却很少被探讨。物联网设备重量轻，成本低

(LPWANs)。在这项工作中，基于LoRaWAN的物联网安全漏洞被仔细检查并被识别。一次袭击
使用设备数据生成的预测模型进行设计和模拟。论文证明了通过预测
数据生成模型，可以进行干扰攻击来阻止设备成功发送数据。这项研究将
