Finally, they detail different abusive behaviours that authors of undesirable programs use to distribute their programs through download portals.
papers.abstract_zh: 免费软件是可以免费使用的专有软件。分发免费软件的一个流行载体是下载门户，即索引、分类和托管程序的网站。下载门户可能被滥用来分发潜在的有害程序(PUP)和恶意软件。这种滥用可能是由于PUP和恶意软件作者上传他们的软件，良性免费软件作者作为按安装付费(PPI)服务和其他附属程序的附属发行商加入，或者恶意下载门户所有者。作者对下载门户中的滥用进行了系统的研究。他们建立了一个平台来抓取下载门户，并将其应用于从20个下载门户下载191 K Windows免费软件安装程序。他们分析收集的安装程序，并在沙箱中执行它们，以监控它们的安装。他们测量的PUP和恶意软件的总比率在8%(保守估计)和26%(宽松估计)之间。在检查的20个下载门户中的18个中，PUP和恶意软件的数量低于9%。然而，他们也发现了两个专门用于分发PPI下载程序的下载入口。最后，他们详细描述了不良程序的作者通过下载门户发布程序时所使用的各种滥用行为。
papers.title_zh: 昂贵的免费软件:下载门户滥用的系统分析

papers.title: Security evaluation and design elements for a class of randomised encryptions
papers.authors: Miodrag J. Mihaljevic, Frédérique E. Oggier
papers.abstract: This study considers a class of randomised encryption techniques, where the encrypted data suffers from noise through transmission over a communication channel. It focuses on the encoding-encryption framework, where the data is first encoded using error correction coding for reliability, then encrypted with a stream cipher. A dedicated homophonic encoder is added to enhance the protection of the stream cipher key, on which relies the security of all the system transmissions. This study presents a security evaluation of such systems in a chosen plaintext attack scenario, which shows that the computational complexity security is lower bounded by the related LPN (learning from parity with noise) complexity in both the average and worst cases. This gives guidelines to construct a dedicated homophonic encoder which maximises the complexity of the underlying LPN problem for a given encoding overhead. A generic homophonic coding strategy that fulfils the proposed design criteria is then given, which thus both enhances security while minimising the induced overhead. Finally, a comparison of encryption schemes based on the LPN problem with and without homophonic coding is considered.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项研究考虑了一类随机加密技术，其中加密数据通过通信信道传输时会受到噪声的影响。它主要关注编码-加密框架，其中数据首先使用纠错编码进行编码以保证可靠性，然后使用流密码进行加密。增加了一个专用的谐音编码器来增强对流密钥的保护，所有系统传输的安全性都依赖于此。该研究给出了在选择明文攻击场景下这种系统的安全性评估，该评估表明，在平均和最坏情况下，计算复杂度安全性受到相关LPN(带噪声奇偶学习)复杂度的较低限制。这给出了构建专用同音编码器的准则，该编码器对于给定的编码开销最大化了潜在LPN问题的复杂性。然后给出了满足所提出的设计标准的通用谐音编码策略，从而既增强了安全性又最小化了所引起的开销。最后，比较加密方案的基础上的LPN问题有和没有同音编码被考虑。
papers.title_zh: 一类随机加密的安全性评估和设计要素

papers.title: Network intrusion detection algorithm based on deep neural network
papers.authors: Yang Jia, Meng Wang, Yagang Wang
papers.abstract: With the rapid development of network technology, active defending of the network intrusion is more important than before. In order to improve the intelligence and accuracy of network intrusion detection and reduce false alarms, a new deep neural network (NDNN) model based intrusion detection method is designed. A NDNN with four hidden layers is modelled to capture and classify the intrusion features of the KDD99 and NSL-KDD training data. Experiments on KDD99 and NSL-KDD dataset shows that the NDNN-based method improves the performance of the intrusion detection system (IDS) and the accuracy rate can be obtained as high as 99.9%, which is higher when compared with other dozens of intrusion detection methods. This NDNN model can be applied in IDS to make the system more secure.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络技术的飞速发展，主动防御网络入侵变得越来越重要。为了提高网络入侵检测的智能性和准确性，减少误报，设计了一种新的基于深度神经网络模型的入侵检测方法。具有四个隐藏层的NDNN被建模以捕获和分类KDD99和NSL-KDD训练数据的入侵特征。在KDD99和NSL-KDD数据集上的实验表明，基于NDNN的方法提高了入侵检测系统的性能，准确率高达99.9%，高于其他几十种入侵检测方法。该NDNN模型可应用于入侵检测系统，使系统更加安全。
papers.title_zh: 基于深度神经网络的网络入侵检测算法

papers.title: Secure degrees of freedom of two-user X-channel with synergistic alternating channel state information at transmitters
papers.authors: Bardiya Barari, Pedram Kheirkhah Sangdeh, Bahareh Akhbari
papers.abstract: In this study, a two-user single-input single-output X-channel with confidential messages is addressed. In this model, the authors assume that the transmitters have access to synergistic alternating channel state information. During different time slots, the channel state information at transmitters (CSIT) alternate between three states including perfect CSIT, delayed CSIT, and no CSIT. By using the eminent synergistic benefits of the CSIT pattern, some schemes capable of attaining the maximum achievable secure degrees of freedom (SDoF) are presented. Additionally, in devising the schemes, the minimal CSIT patterns required to achieve optimal SDoF are introduced. It is shown that for CSIT patterns which are weaker than minimal ones, using a half-duplex relay can assist the network in obtaining the optimal SDoF. Indeed, the relay alleviates the effects of the lack of knowledge at transmitters on achievable SDoF.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，两个用户的单输入单输出的保密信息的X信道被提出。在该模型中，作者假设发射机可以访问协同交替的信道状态信息。在不同的时隙期间，发射机(CSIT)处的信道状态信息在三种状态之间交替，包括完美CSIT、延迟CSIT和无CSIT。利用CSIT模式突出的协同优势，提出了一些能够获得最大可达安全自由度的方案。此外，在设计方案时，引入了实现最佳SDoF所需的最小CSIT模式。研究表明，对于比最小模式弱的CSIT模式，使用半双工中继可以帮助网络获得最佳的SDoF。事实上，中继减轻了发射机缺乏知识对可实现SDoF的影响。
papers.title_zh: 在发射机处具有协同交替信道状态信息的双用户X信道的安全自由度

papers.title: Privacy preserving weighted similarity search scheme for encrypted data
papers.authors: Cheng Guo, Pengxu Tian, Chin-Chen Chang
papers.abstract: Cloud computing has become increasingly popular among individuals and enterprises because of the benefits it provides by outsourcing their data to cloud servers. However, the security of the outsourced data has become a major concern. For privacy concerns, searchable encryption, which supports searching over encrypted data, has been proposed and developed rapidly in secure Boolean search and similarity search. However, different users may have different requirements on their queries, which mean different weighted searches. This problem can be solved perfectly in the plaintext domain, but hard to be addressed over encrypted data. In this study, the authors use locality-sensitive hashing (LSH) and searchable symmetric encryption (SSE) to deal with a privacy preserving weighted similarity search. In the authors' scheme, data users can generate a search request and set the weight for each attribute according to their requirements. They treat the LSH values as keywords and mix them into the framework of SSE. They use homomorphic encryption to securely address the weight problem and return the top-k data without revealing any weight information of data users. They formally analysed the security strength of their scheme. Extensive experiments on actual datasets showed that their scheme is extremely effective and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算在个人和企业中越来越受欢迎，因为它通过将数据外包给云服务器来提供好处。然而，外包数据的安全性已经成为一个主要问题。出于隐私考虑，支持对加密数据进行搜索的可搜索加密技术在安全布尔搜索和相似性搜索中得到了迅速发展。然而，不同的用户可能对他们的查询有不同的要求，这意味着不同的加权搜索。这个问题可以在明文域中完美地解决，但是在加密数据上很难解决。在这项研究中，作者使用位置敏感哈希(LSH)和可搜索对称加密(SSE)来处理隐私保护加权相似性搜索。在作者的方案中，数据用户可以生成一个搜索请求，并根据他们的要求设置每个属性的权重。他们将LSH价值观视为关键词，并将其融入SSE的框架中。它们使用同态加密来安全地解决权重问题，并返回top-k数据，而不会泄露数据用户的任何权重信息。他们正式分析了他们方案的安全强度。在真实数据集上的大量实验表明，该方案是非常有效和高效的。
papers.title_zh: 加密数据的隐私保护加权相似搜索方案

papers.title: Meet-in-the-middle attacks on round-reduced tweakable block cipher Deoxys-BC
papers.authors: Rongjia Li, Chenhui Jin
papers.abstract:
Deoxys-BC is a tweakable block cipher designed by Jean et al.
 at ASIACRYPT 2014 within the TWEAKEY framework. Then Deoxys-BC is used in the CAESAR finalist Deoxys. In this study, the authors consider the security of Deoxys-BC against meet-in-the-middle attack in the single-key setting. Using the idea that a chosen tweak difference allows to cancel a difference in the state, they can construct 5-round meet-in-the-middle distinguisher on Deoxys-BC-128-128 which can be extended to attack on 8-round Deoxys-BC-128-128. Moreover, they construct 6-round meet-in-the-middle distinguisher on Deoxys-BC-256-128 which can be extended to attack on 10-round Deoxys-BC-256-128. As far as the authors know, these are the best attacks against Deoxys-BC in the single-key setting.
papers.abstract_zh:
代欧奇希斯-BC是由Jean等人设计的一种可调分组密码。
在2014年亚洲加密大会上。然后代欧奇希斯-公元前用于凯撒决赛代欧奇希斯。在该研究中，作者考虑了代欧奇希斯-BC在单密钥环境下抵抗中间人攻击的安全性。利用选择的调整差异允许消除状态差异的思想，他们可以在代欧奇希斯-BC-128-128上构造5轮中间相遇区分器，该区分器可以扩展到攻击8轮代欧奇希斯-BC-128-128。此外，他们在代欧奇希斯-BC-256-128上构造了6轮中间相遇区分器，该区分器可以扩展到对10轮代欧奇希斯-BC-256-128的攻击。据作者所知，这些是在单键设置下对代欧奇希斯-公元前的最好攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对轮约化可调分组密码代欧奇希斯-BC的中间相遇攻击

papers.title: Dynamic reencryption of return addresses
papers.authors: Hyungyu Lee, Changwoo Pyo, Gyungho Lee
papers.abstract: The authors present dynamic reencryption of return addresses to mitigate their leakage. The authors' method enforces programs to save return addresses as encrypted and renew the encryption states with fresh keys before or after vulnerable operations. When a function returns, it should restore the return address from its encryption using the most recent key not to cause a crash. Under the protection of their method, return addresses and keys may leak, but the disclosed bits become garbage because keys govern all return addresses through encryption, while changing before control-flow proceeds into a vulnerable region. As a result, it becomes probabilistically infeasible to build exploits for intercepting control-flow by using leaked return addresses or keys. They implemented the proposed method as an extension of the LLVM compiler that inserts reencryption code where necessary. They also have confirmed its effectiveness against information leak attacks carried out in the early stage of blind return-oriented programming (BROP). The performance overhead ranges below 11.6% for processor-intensive programs and 4.12% or less for web servers.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者提出了返回地址的动态重新加密，以减轻他们的泄漏。作者的方法强制程序将返回地址保存为加密的，并在易受攻击的操作之前或之后用新的密钥更新加密状态。当函数返回时，它应该使用最新的密钥从加密中恢复返回地址，以免导致崩溃。在他们的方法的保护下，返回地址和密钥可能会泄漏，但所公开的位会成为垃圾，因为密钥通过加密来管理所有的返回地址，同时在控制流进入易受攻击的区域之前发生变化。因此，通过使用泄漏的返回地址或密钥来构建拦截控制流的漏洞在概率上变得不可行。他们将提出的方法实现为LLVM编译器的扩展，在必要的地方插入重新加密代码。他们还证实了其对在盲返回导向编程(BROP)的早期阶段进行的信息泄漏攻击的有效性。处理器密集型程序的性能开销低于11.6%，web服务器的性能开销低于4.12%。
papers.title_zh: 返回地址的动态重新加密

papers.title: Division cryptanalysis of block ciphers with a binary diffusion layer
papers.authors: Wenying Zhang, Vincent Rijmen
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors propose an accurate approach to model the propagation of the division property of linear layers by the smallest amount of inequalities. The solutions of the inequalities are exactly the division trails of a linear transformation. Therefore, the description is compact and optimal. As applications of their results, they present a 7-round integral distinguisher for both Midori64 and Midori128. The designers of Midori only obtained a 3.5-round integral characteristic. For Skinny64, they find a 10-round integral distinguisher which was previously found by the designers. It is well to remind that their result proves that 7 rounds and 10 rounds are the upper bounds of Midori and Skinny64 correspondingly when searching for integral distinguishers based on division property. The significance of their result lies in that they shed light on how far division cryptanalysis can influence the security analysis of block ciphers with a binary diffusion layer, and their technique can be used to prove security against division cryptanalysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者提出了一种精确的方法，通过最小数量的不等式来模拟线性层的分割特性的传播。不等式的解正是线性变换的除法轨迹。因此，描述是紧凑的和最优的。作为其结果的应用，他们提出了Midori64和Midori128的7轮积分区分器。美岛莉的设计者仅获得了3.5轮的积分特性。对于Skinny64，他们发现了一个10轮积分区分器，这是设计师以前发现的。值得提醒的是，他们的结果证明了在基于除法性质搜索整数区分符时，7轮和10轮分别是美岛莉和Skinny64的上界。他们的结果的意义在于，他们揭示了除法密码分析能在多大程度上影响具有二进制扩散层的分组密码的安全性分析，并且他们的技术可用于证明对抗除法密码分析的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 具有二进制扩散层的分组密码除法分析

papers.title: Security analysis of ABAC under an administrative model
papers.authors: Sadhana Jha, Shamik Sural, Vijayalakshmi Atluri, Jaideep Vaidya
papers.abstract: In the present day computing environment, where access control decisions are often dependent on contextual information like the location of the requesting user and the time of access request, Attribute Based Access Control (ABAC) has emerged as a suitable choice for expressing security policies. In an ABAC system, access decisions depend on the set of attribute values associated with the subjects, resources and the environment in which an access request is made. In such systems, the task of managing the set of attributes associated with the entities as well as that of analyzing and understanding the security implications of each attribute assignment is of paramount importance. In this paper, we first introduce a comprehensive attribute based administrative model, named as AMABAC (Administrative Model for ABAC), for ABAC systems and then suggest a methodology for analyzing the security properties of ABAC in the presence of the administrative model. For performing analysis, we use μZ, a SMT (Satisfiability Modulo Theories) based model checking tool. We study the impact of the various components of ABAC and AMABAC on the time taken for security analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当今的计算环境中，访问控制决策通常依赖于上下文信息，如请求用户的位置和访问请求的时间，基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)已经成为表达安全策略的合适选择。在ABAC系统中，访问决策取决于与主题、资源和发出访问请求的环境相关联的一组属性值。在这样的系统中，管理与实体相关联的属性集的任务以及分析和理解每个属性分配的安全含义的任务是至关重要的。在本文中，我们首先介绍了一个用于ABAC系统的综合的基于属性的管理模型，命名为AMABAC(ABAC管理模型),然后提出了一个在管理模型下分析ABAC安全属性的方法。为了执行分析，我们使用μZ，一个基于SMT(可满足性模理论)的模型检测工具。我们研究了ABAC和AMABAC的各种组件对安全性分析所用时间的影响。
papers.title_zh: 行政模式下的ABAC安全分析

papers.title: Quantum secret sharing by using Fourier transform on orbital angular momentum
papers.authors: Huawang Qin, Raylin Tso, Yuewei Dai
papers.abstract: A quantum secret sharing scheme based on orbital angular momentum (OAM) is proposed. The dealer generates single particles in OAM basis or angular position (ANG) basis randomly. The participants encode their private keys into the particles through performing quantum Fourier transforms. Then the dealer can use the single-particle measurements to get the shared secret. In the authors' scheme, the secret is protected by the distinguishability of OAM basis and ANG basis. Compared to the traditional two-dimensional schemes, the authors' scheme can use the higher dimension of OAM to increase the detecting rate of eavesdropping, and enhance the security in practice. Besides, only the single particles are needed in their scheme. Compared to the schemes based on entangled particles, the authors' scheme will be more practical with the present technology.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于轨道角动量的量子秘密共享方案。庄家随机生成基于OAM或角度位置(ANG)的单个粒子。参与者通过执行量子傅立叶变换将他们的私钥编码到粒子中。然后，分发者可以使用单粒子测量来获得共享秘密。在作者的方案中，秘密受到OAM基和ANG基的可区分性的保护。与传统的二维方案相比，作者的方案可以利用更高维的OAM来提高窃听的检测率，增强了实际应用中的安全性。此外，在他们的方案中只需要单个粒子。与基于纠缠粒子的方案相比，作者的方案在现有技术条件下更具实用性。
papers.title_zh: 利用轨道角动量的傅里叶变换实现量子秘密共享

papers.title: Detecting anomalous traffic in the controlled network based on cross entropy and support vector machine
papers.authors: Weijie Han, Jingfeng Xue, Hui Yan
papers.abstract: Network anomaly detection is an effective way for analysing and detecting malicious attacks. However, the typical anomaly detection techniques cannot perform the desired effect in the controlled network just as in the general network. In the circumstance of the controlled network, the detection performance will be lowered due to its special characteristics including the stronger regularity, higher dimensionality and subtler fluctuation of its traffic. On the motivation, the study proposes a novel classifier framework based on cross entropy and support vector machine (SVM). The technique first subtracts the representative traffic characteristics from the network traffic and defines a 7-tuple feature vector for the controlled network by extending the traditional 5-tuple representation of the usual network. Then the probability distributions and cross entropies of the 7 tuples are calculated during the defined statistical window so as to generate the 7-tuple cross-entropy feature vector for profiling the network traffic fluctuation in the controlled network. Finally, the multi-class SVM classifier is trained by importing the 7-tuple cross-entropy feature vectors. Experimental results show that the proposed classifier can achieve higher detection rates and is more suitable to be used in the controlled network than the typical detection techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络异常检测是分析和检测恶意攻击的有效方法。然而，典型的异常检测技术在受控网络中不能像在普通网络中一样达到预期的效果。在受控网络环境下，由于网络流量的规律性强、维数高、波动性小等特点，检测性能会有所下降。在动机方面，提出了一种基于交叉熵和支持向量机(SVM)的分类器框架。该技术首先从网络流量中减去代表性流量特征，并通过扩展通常网络的传统5元组表示来定义受控网络的7元组特征向量。然后在定义的统计窗口期间计算7元组的概率分布和交叉熵，以便生成用于描绘受控网络中的网络流量波动的7元组交叉熵特征向量。最后，通过引入七元组交叉熵特征向量来训练多类SVM分类器。实验结果表明，与典型的检测技术相比，该分类器具有更高的检测率，更适合在受控网络中使用。
papers.title_zh: 基于交叉熵和支持向量机的受控网络异常流量检测

papers.title: New second-order threshold implementation of AES
papers.authors: Yongzhuang Wei, Fu Yao, Enes Pasalic, An Wang
papers.abstract:
In this work, the authors propose some alternative hardware efficient masking schemes dedicated to protect the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) against higher order differential power analysis (DPA). In general, the existing masking schemes all have in common an intrinsic trade-off between the two main parameters of interest, namely the generation of fresh random masking values and the cost of hardware implementation. The design of efficient masking schemes which are non-expensive in both aspects appears to be a difficult task. In this study, the authors propose a second-order threshold implementation of AES, which is characterised by a beneficial trade-off between the two parameters. More precisely, compared to the masking scheme of De Cnudde et al.
 at CHES 2016, which currently attains the best practical trade-off, the proposed masking scheme requires 28.4% less random masking bits, whereas the implementation cost is slightly increased for about 13.7% (thus the chip area is 1.4 kGE larger). This masking scheme has been used to implement AES on an field-programmable gate array (FPGA) platform and its resistance against the second-order DPA in a simulated attack environment has been confirmed.
papers.abstract_zh:
在这项工作中，作者提出了一些替代的硬件有效的掩蔽方案，专用于保护高级加密标准(AES)免受高阶差分功耗分析(DPA)。总的来说，现有的屏蔽方案在两个感兴趣的主要参数，即新的随机屏蔽值的生成和硬件实现的成本之间都有一个内在的折衷。在这两个方面都不昂贵的有效掩蔽方案的设计似乎是一项困难的任务。在这项研究中，作者提出了AES的二阶阈值实现，其特征在于两个参数之间的有益权衡。更准确地说，与De Cnudde等人的掩蔽方案相比。
在CHES 2016上，目前实现了最佳的实际折衷，所提出的屏蔽方案需要少28.4%的随机屏蔽位，而实现成本略微增加了约13.7%(因此芯片面积大了1.4 kGE)。这种掩蔽方案已经被用于在现场可编程门阵列(FPGA)平台上实现AES，并且在模拟攻击环境中它对二阶DPA的抵抗性已经被证实。
papers.title_zh: AES的新二阶门限实现

papers.title: On the extension and security of key schedule of GOST
papers.authors: Yafei Zheng, Wenling Wu
papers.abstract: A type of simple key schedule especially suitable for lightweight block ciphers is defined as straightforward key schedule in this study. As a typical example, GOST-type key schedule, which is an extension of the key schedules of Russian Standard GOST and its newly modified version GOST2, is introduced and classified. GOST2 is designed based on the GOST encryption structure with different but the same type of key schedule to overcome the weakness of GOST against self-similarity properties-based attacks. However, it has been shown in Fast Software Encryption 2017, the simple change in the key schedule is insufficient to offer 256-bit security. By constructing an evaluation framework combining self-similarity properties and meet-in-the-middle attack, properties of GOST-type key schedules are evaluated, and candidate key schedules are provided in this work. These candidate key schedules are able to provide much better security for GOST and GOST2 ciphers than their original key schedules, and the pre-existing self-similarity properties-based attacks of full round GOST and GOST2 can be avoided. The designers of GOST and GOST2 should have been more cautious choosing the parameters of key schedules. The evaluation framework proposed can be used for reference in the design of other Feistel ciphers with straightforward key schedules.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，一种特别适用于轻量级分组密码的简单密钥调度被定义为直接密钥调度。作为一个典型的例子，GOST-type密钥表被介绍和分类，它是俄罗斯标准GOST及其新修改版本GOST2的密钥表的扩展。GOST2是基于GOST加密结构设计的，具有不同但相同类型的密钥表，以克服GOST在抗基于自相似性攻击方面的弱点。然而，在Fast Software Encryption 2017中已经表明，密钥计划中的简单变化不足以提供256位安全性。通过构建一个结合自相似特性和中间相遇攻击的评估框架，评估GOST型密钥表的特性，并给出候选密钥表。这些候选密钥表能够为GOST和GOST2密码提供比其原始密钥表更好的安全性，并且可以避免已有的基于自相似性的攻击。GOST和GOST2的设计者在选择关键进度表的参数时应该更加谨慎。该评估框架可用于设计其他密钥表简单的Feistel密码。
papers.title_zh: ghost密钥表的扩展和安全性研究

papers.title: Detecting lateral spear phishing attacks in organisations
papers.authors: Aniket Bhadane, Sunil B. Mane
papers.abstract: Lateral spear phishing attack is a powerful type of social engineering attack carried out using compromised email account(s) within the target organisation. Spear phishing attacks are difficult to detect due to the nature of these attacks. The inclusion of a lateral attack vector makes detection more challenging. The authors present an approach to detect lateral spear phishing attacks in organisations in real-time. Their approach uses features derived from domain knowledge and analysis of characteristics pertaining to such attacks, combined with their scoring technique which works on non-labelled dataset. They evaluate the approach on several years' worth of real-world email dataset collected from volunteers in their institute. They were able to achieve false positive rate of below 1%, and also detected two instances of compromised accounts which were not known earlier. A comparison of their scoring technique with machine learning based anomaly detection techniques shows the proposed technique to be more suited for practical use. The proposed approach is primarily aimed at complementing existing detection techniques on email servers. However, they also developed a Chrome browser extension to demonstrate that such a system can also be used independently by organisations within their network.
papers.abstract_zh: 横向鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击是一种强大的社会工程攻击类型，使用目标组织内受损的电子邮件帐户实施。由于这些攻击的性质，鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击很难被检测到。包含横向攻击向量使得检测更具挑战性。作者提出了一种实时检测组织中横向鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击的方法。他们的方法使用来自领域知识的特征和与此类攻击相关的特征分析，结合他们在非标记数据集上工作的评分技术。他们在从他们研究所的志愿者那里收集的几年的真实世界电子邮件数据集上评估了这种方法。他们能够实现低于1%的误报率，还检测到两个以前不知道的受损帐户。他们的评分技术与基于机器学习的异常检测技术的比较表明，所提出的技术更适合于实际应用。所提出的方法主要旨在补充电子邮件服务器上现有的检测技术。然而，他们还开发了一个Chrome浏览器扩展，以证明这种系统也可以由他们网络内的组织独立使用。
papers.title_zh: 检测组织中的横向鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击

papers.title: Advanced conditional differential attack on Grain-like stream cipher and application on Grain v1
papers.authors: Jun-Zhi Li, Jie Guan
papers.abstract:
Conditional differential attacks against non-linear feedback shift register based cryptosystems were proposed by Knellwolf et al.
 at Asiacrypt 2010. In this study, the authors propose an advanced conditional differential attack on Grain-like stream cipher. They trace propagations of a single bit difference of internal states both inversely and forward. Methods of both searching for the longest inverse difference characteristic with probability one and deriving initial value (IV) conditions with the max inverse round are introduced. When tracing forward, conditions are imposed to limit the propagation of difference to obtain a high bias. Conditions of the proposed method are only imposed on IV bits and the proposed attack works in the single-key setting. Moreover, a method of recovering key expressions as well as bias-complexity-success probability target is presented in this study. Using the proposed method, the authors conduct a key recovery attack on 114-round Grain v1, recovering 6 key expressions with the time complexity of 2
 32
, which is also verified by experiments. With more conditions imposed, this attack can be improved to Grain v1 of 120 rounds, recovering 12 key expressions with the time complexity of 2
 42.75
 and theoretical success probability of about 93%, which is ten rounds longer than the longest previous result of Grain v1 in the single-key setting.
papers.abstract_zh:
Knellwolf等人提出了针对基于非线性反馈移位寄存器的密码系统的条件差分攻击。
在2010年亚洲加密会议上。在本研究中，作者提出了一种改进的对类颗粒流密码的条件差分攻击。他们追踪内部状态的单个位差的反向和正向传播。介绍了以概率1搜索最长反差特征的方法和以最大反轮推导初值条件的方法。当向前追溯时，施加条件来限制差异的传播以获得高偏差。所提出的方法的条件仅施加在IV比特上，并且所提出的攻击在单密钥设置下工作。此外，本文还提出了一种恢复关键表达式以及偏差-复杂度-成功概率目标的方法。使用所提出的方法，作者对114轮粒度v1进行了密钥恢复攻击，恢复了6个密钥表达式，时间复杂度为2
32
，这也是通过实验验证的。通过施加更多的条件，这种攻击可以被改进到120轮的粒度v1，以2的时间复杂度恢复12个密钥表达式
42.75
而理论上的成功概率约为93%，比单键设定中Grain v1之前最长的结果多了十轮。
papers.title_zh: 类颗粒流密码的高级条件差分攻击及其在颗粒v1上的应用

papers.title: Framework for risk assessment in cyber situational awareness
papers.authors: Rongrong Xi, Xiaochun Yun, Zhiyu Hao
papers.abstract: A large number of data is generated to help network analysts to evaluate the network security situation in traditional detection and prevention measures, but it is not used fully and effectively, there is not a holistic view of the network situation on it for now. To address this issue, a framework is proposed to evaluate the security situation of the network from three dimensions: threat, vulnerability and stability, and merge the results at decision level to measure the security situation of the overall network. In the case studies, the authors demonstrate how the framework is deployed in the network and how to use it to reflect the security situation of the network in real time. Results of the case study show that the framework can evaluate the security situation of the network accurately and reasonably.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的检测和防范措施产生了大量的数据来帮助网络分析人员评估网络安全状况，但是这些数据并没有得到充分有效的利用，目前还没有一个关于网络状况的整体视图。针对这一问题，提出了一个框架，从威胁、脆弱性和稳定性三个维度来评估网络的安全状况，并在决策层融合结果来衡量整个网络的安全状况。在案例研究中，作者演示了如何在网络中部署该框架，以及如何使用它来实时反映网络的安全状况。案例研究结果表明，该框架能够准确、合理地评估网络的安全状况。
papers.title_zh: 网络态势感知中的风险评估框架

papers.title: Build a trusted storage system on a mobile phone
papers.authors: Qiang Zhang, Jianzhong Qiao, Qingyang Meng
papers.abstract: The authors introduce their design, implementation and formally verification of a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE)-based trusted storage system (TSS) in mobile devices, which conforms to GlobalPlatform specifications. The authors’ TSS provides not only authenticating the integrity and freshness of data but also many security storage operation properties like atomicity operations of a persistent object. To improve data store efficient when a big persistent object is read or written, a new mechanism that dynamic allocate continuous memory in REE's kernel memory space and map the address to the TEE through a communication pipe is proposed. This method can reduce switching times, allocating memory times and copy memory overloads between two worlds. A formal method is used in their design and development to guarantee the correctness and security of TSS. They consider the functional correctness mainly in this study, and use traditional formal verification tool – VCC verify the functional correctness of TSS. Their evaluation demonstrates its advantage compared to existing systems in addition.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者介绍了他们在移动设备中设计、实现和形式化验证的基于可信执行环境(TEE)的可信存储系统(TSS ),该系统符合全球平台规范。作者的TSS不仅提供了对数据完整性和新鲜度的认证，还提供了许多安全存储操作属性，如持久对象的原子性操作。为了提高读写大型持久对象时的数据存储效率，提出了一种在REE内核存储空间中动态分配连续内存并通过通信管道将地址映射到TEE的机制。这种方法可以减少两个世界之间的切换次数、分配内存次数和复制内存过载。在它们的设计和开发中使用了形式化的方法来保证TSS的正确性和安全性。他们在本研究中主要考虑功能正确性，并使用传统的形式验证工具——VCC来验证TSS的功能正确性。此外，他们的评估显示了其与现有系统相比的优势。
papers.title_zh: 在手机上构建可信存储系统

papers.title: Provably secure certificateless aggregate signature scheme with designated verifier in an improved security model
papers.authors: Limin Shen, Jianfeng Ma, Yinbin Miao, Hai Liu
papers.abstract: An aggregate signature (AS) scheme combines multiple signatures which is generated by many different users into a single one. This feature is very beneficial for diminishing storage cost, bandwidth and verification cost. Many previous attempts have been made for designing AS schemes, while the former security models have not clearly addressed coalition attacks, and most of the existing AS schemes cannot resist these kinds of attacks. In this study, the authors provide a modified security model of certificateless AS (CLAS) schemes and then give a new CLAS scheme. The security of their present scheme can be rigorously proved based on the computational Diffie-Hellman assumption in the random oracle model. Furthermore, their scheme can resist such coalition attacks, i.e. an AS in their scheme is valid iff all single signatures used to generate the AS are valid.
papers.abstract_zh: 聚合签名(AS)方案将许多不同用户生成的多个签名组合成一个签名。这个特性对于降低存储成本、带宽和验证成本非常有益。以前已经进行了许多尝试来设计AS方案，但是以前的安全模型没有清楚地解决联盟攻击，并且大多数现有的AS方案不能抵抗这种攻击。在该研究中，作者提出了一个改进的无证书AS (CLAS)方案的安全模型，然后给出了一个新的CLAS方案。基于随机预言模型中的计算性Diffie-Hellman假设，可以严格证明该方案的安全性。此外，他们的方案可以抵抗这样的联合攻击，即当用于生成AS的所有单个签名都有效时，他们方案中的AS才有效。
papers.title_zh: 一种改进的安全模型下可证安全的指定验证者的无证书聚合签名方案

papers.title: Unsupervised approach for detecting shilling attacks in collaborative recommender systems based on user rating behaviours
papers.authors: Fuzhi Zhang, Zhoujun Ling, Shilei Wang
papers.abstract: Collaborative recommender systems have been known to be extremely vulnerable to shilling attacks. To prevent such attacks, many detection approaches including supervised and unsupervised have been proposed. However, the supervised approaches are only suitable for detecting known types of attacks and the unsupervised approaches require a priori knowledge to ensure the detection performance. To address the limitations, the authors propose an unsupervised approach for detecting shilling attacks based on user rating behaviours. They first use Gibbs latent Dirichlet allocation model to extract latent topics of user preferences from user rating item sequences, then they use mixture transition distribution model to construct the user's preference model and present several metrics to capture the diversity between genuine and attack users in rating behaviours. In the case of unknown attack size, the number of attack users is obtained by analysing the critical point of rating behaviour suspicious degrees between genuine and attack users, and based on which the attack users are identified. The experimental results on the MovieLens 1 M dataset show that the proposed approach outperforms the baseline methods in terms of recall and precision metrics.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，协同推荐系统极易受到先令攻击。为了防止这种攻击，已经提出了许多检测方法，包括有监督的和无监督的。然而，有监督的方法仅适用于检测已知类型的攻击，而无监督的方法需要先验知识来确保检测性能。为了解决这些限制，作者提出了一种基于用户评级行为的无监督方法来检测先令攻击。他们首先使用Gibbs潜在Dirichlet分配模型从用户评分项目序列中提取用户偏好的潜在主题，然后使用混合转移分布模型来构建用户偏好模型，并提出几个度量来捕捉真实用户和攻击用户在评分行为上的差异。在攻击规模未知的情况下，通过分析真实用户和攻击用户行为可疑程度的临界点，得到攻击用户的数量，并以此为基础识别攻击用户。在MovieLens 1 M数据集上的实验结果表明，该方法在查全率和查准率方面优于基线方法。
papers.title_zh: 基于用户评分行为的协同推荐系统中无监督的先令攻击检测方法

papers.title: HAP: detection of HTTP flooding attacks in cloud using diffusion map and affinity propagation clustering
papers.authors: Thankaraja Raja Sree, Somasundaram Mary Saira Bhanu
papers.abstract: The extreme growth of Internet resources leads to several kinds of attacks. Cybercrime is one of the dominant threats apart from data defence mechanism, which enhances the economy, resource management, and service quality. Among them, HTTP flooding attacks in the cloud are one of the most prevalent threats as it depletes the cloud resources and services. It is difficult to distinguish the anomalous traffic by extracting the actual payload since most of the payload could not be accessed as they are encrypted and varies dynamically based on the user input. Hence, the proposed method uses web server logs that can be easily accessed to detect the attacks. This study highlights the detection methods by extracting the features from the web server logs and also deals with the reduction in the dimensionality of the features using diffusion map. The anomalies are detected by affinity propagation clustering technique and also by monitoring the status of the virtual machine. Furthermore, the Dempster-Shafer theory focuses on the identification of the suspicious user. It is inferred from the experimental results that the proposed method enhances the detection performance with very few false alarms than existing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网资源的极度增长导致了几种攻击。网络犯罪是除数据防御机制之外的主要威胁之一，数据防御机制增强了经济、资源管理和服务质量。其中，云中的HTTP洪泛攻击是最普遍的威胁之一，因为它耗尽了云资源和服务。很难通过提取实际有效负载来区分异常流量，因为大多数有效负载都是加密的，并且根据用户输入动态变化，因此无法访问。因此，所提出的方法使用容易访问的web服务器日志来检测攻击。该研究通过从web服务器日志中提取特征来突出检测方法，并且使用扩散图来处理特征的降维。通过相似性传播聚类技术以及通过监控虚拟机的状态来检测异常。此外，Dempster-Shafer理论侧重于可疑用户的识别。从实验结果可以推断，与现有方法相比，所提出的方法提高了检测性能，并且具有非常少的虚警。
papers.title_zh: HAP:利用扩散图和相似传播聚类检测云中的HTTP洪泛攻击

papers.title: Event reconstruction using temporal pattern of file system modification
papers.authors: Somayeh Soltani, Seyed-Amin Hosseini-Seno, Hadi Sadoghi Yazdi
papers.abstract: Nowadays, several digital forensic tools extract a lot of low-level information from different parts of the system. Constructing high-level information from low-level ones is very challenging. This study reconstructs high-level events by using the traces of applications that are found in the file system metadata. In this regard, an event reconstruction framework is proposed that determines which applications have been run on a compromised system. The proposed framework works in two phases. In the training phase, the signatures of various applications are constructed. The signature of an application is the temporal pattern of file system modification of the application. In the detection phase, at first, the temporal pattern of file system modification of the hard disk (TPFSM-D) of the compromised system is constructed. Then in order to determine whether a particular application has been run on the compromised system, the distance between the signature of the application and the TPFSM-D of the hard disk is calculated by using a proposed distance measure. Finally, a decision engine decides whether the application has been run on the compromised system. The proposed event reconstruction framework has been tested on different scenarios. The empirical results suggest that the framework is effective in reconstructing events.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，一些数字取证工具从系统的不同部分提取大量低级信息。从低级信息构建高级信息是非常具有挑战性的。这项研究通过使用在文件系统元数据中找到的应用程序跟踪来重建高级事件。在这点上，提出了事件重构框架，其确定哪些应用已经在受损系统上运行。提议的框架分两个阶段工作。在训练阶段，构建各种应用程序的签名。应用程序的签名是应用程序的文件系统修改的时间模式。在检测阶段，首先，构建受损系统的硬盘文件系统修改的时间模式(TPFSM-D)。然后，为了确定特定应用程序是否已经在受损系统上运行，应用程序的签名和硬盘的TPFSM-D之间的距离通过使用建议的距离度量来计算。最后，决策引擎决定该应用程序是否已经在受损系统上运行。提出的事件重建框架已经在不同的场景下进行了测试。实证结果表明，该框架是有效的重建事件。
papers.title_zh: 使用文件系统修改的时间模式的事件重建

papers.title: Security and fault tolerance evaluation of TMR-QDI circuits
papers.authors: Ghania Ait Abdelmalek, Rezki Ziani, Rabah Mokdad
papers.abstract: The authors report the results of a study on the impact of resistive bridging faults on triple modular redundancy (TMR)-based quasi-delay-insensitive (QDI) asynchronous countermeasures, which is used to provide a secure circuit against power analyses. They have carried out the present study on CADENCE using a resistive bridges fault model. They show that the resistive bridge faults can have serious impacts on the security of integrated circuits and it is possible to discover the secret data. Based on the bridges resistance value, there are three operating intervals of secure circuits, in which TMR-based QDI may or may not function correctly in the presence of two resistive bridge faults depending on the interval of the resistance value.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者报告了电阻性桥接故障对基于三模冗余(TMR)的准延迟不敏感(QDI)异步对策的影响的研究结果，该对策用于提供针对功耗分析的安全电路。他们使用电阻电桥故障模型对CADENCE进行了当前的研究。它们表明阻性电桥故障会对集成电路的安全性产生严重影响，并且有可能发现秘密数据。基于电桥电阻值，安全电路有三个工作间隔，其中基于TMR的QDI在存在两个电阻性电桥故障时可能正确工作，也可能不正确工作，具体取决于电阻值的间隔。
papers.title_zh: TMR-QDI电路的安全性和容错性评估

papers.title: Multi-hop interpersonal trust assessment in vehicular ad-hoc networks using three-valued subjective logic
papers.authors: Muhammad Sohail, Liangmin Wang, Shunrong Jiang, Samar Zaineldeen, Rana Umair Ashraf
papers.abstract:
Future vehicular networks need multi-hop trusted information among car manoeuvres as a solution to the persistent problem of road safety, and news sharing. However, malicious users in vehicular networks can also disseminate fake information among each other. Traditional public key infrastructure is not an efficient solution for recognising these malicious users, as they all have authorised entities. To cope with this problem, this study highlights novel idea, i.e. three-valued subjective logic (3VSL) as a trust model for multi-hop trust assessment among users in vehicular ad-hoc
 network (VANET). Trust among vehicle users is represented in the form of opinion derived from 3VSL and updated frequently due to vehicles random movement on the road. To support the authors' proposed scheme, this study contains two parts in simulation, i.e. numerical and experimental analyses. Numerical analysis shows that 3VSL gives accurate trust assessment even with a bridge or random network topology, which is ignored previously by edge splitting. In the experimental part, we extend widely accepted ad-hoc
 on-demand distance vector routing protocol by directly applying trust fields to the routing table. The simulation experiment shows that their scheme achieves better performance in term of throughput and latencies in low mobility VANET scenario.
papers.abstract_zh:
未来的车辆网络需要汽车操作中的多跳可信信息，以解决道路安全和新闻共享的长期问题。然而，车载网络中的恶意用户也可以在彼此之间传播虚假信息。传统的公钥基础设施不是识别这些恶意用户的有效解决方案，因为他们都有授权的实体。针对这一问题，本研究提出了一种新的思想，即三值主观逻辑(3VSL)作为车载自组织网络中用户间多跳信任评估的信任模型
网络(VANET)。车辆用户之间的信任以从3VSL得出的意见的形式表示，并且由于车辆在道路上的随机运动而频繁更新。为了支持作者提出的方案，本研究包括两个模拟部分，即数值分析和实验分析。数值分析表明，即使在桥或随机网络拓扑下，3VSL也能给出准确的信任评估，这在以前被边分裂所忽略。在实验部分，我们扩展了广泛接受的ad-hoc网络
按需距离矢量路由协议，直接将信任字段应用于路由表。仿真实验表明，在低移动性VANET场景下，该方案在吞吐量和延迟方面取得了更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于三值主观逻辑的车载自组网多跳人际信任评估

papers.title: Fast Montgomery modular multiplier for Rivest-Shamir-Adleman cryptosystem
papers.authors: Aashish Parihar, Sangeeta Nakhate
papers.abstract: A high-speed Montgomery modular multiplier is proposed in this study. This multiplier requires binary input and also generates a modular product in binary form. To speed up the process of multiplication, intermediate operands of the multiplier are kept in carry-save form. This multiplier employs a two-level carry-save adder architecture to keep intermediate operands in carry-save form. This multiplier also employs a look-ahead carry unit (LCU) for conversion of the final output from carry-save form to binary form. LCU is also utilised for pre-computation of intermediate operands. Format conversion and pre-computation require additional clock cycles. In general, each cycle of the Montgomery multipliers involves addition and shift operation followed by computation of the following quotient. The proposed multiplier adds and shifts as well as computes the following two quotients simultaneously to minimise the critical path delay. In addition, the proposed multiplier combines two iterations, which require additional intermediate operands. In this way, the execution time and the number of clock cycles required for multiplication are minimised significantly and extra clock cycles required for format conversion and operand pre-computation can be overlooked. Experimental results show that the proposed approach can achieve significant speed and throughput improvement as compared to previous multipliers.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种高速蒙哥马利模乘法器。这种乘法器需要二进制输入，也产生二进制形式的模乘积。为了加速乘法过程，乘法器的中间操作数保持进位保存形式。该乘法器采用两级进位保存加法器结构，以进位保存形式保存中间操作数。该乘法器还采用了一个先行进位单元(LCU ),用于将最终输出从进位保存形式转换为二进制形式。LCU也用于中间操作数的预计算。格式转换和预计算需要额外的时钟周期。一般来说，蒙哥马利乘法器的每个周期都包括加法和移位运算，随后是下列商的计算。所提出的乘法器同时相加和移位以及计算以下两个商，以最小化关键路径延迟。此外，所提出的乘法器结合了两次迭代，这需要额外的中间操作数。以这种方式，乘法所需的执行时间和时钟周期数显著最小化，并且格式转换和操作数预计算所需的额外时钟周期可以忽略。实验结果表明，与以前的乘法器相比，所提出的方法可以实现显著的速度和吞吐量改进。
papers.title_zh: Rivest-Shamir-Adleman密码系统的快速Montgomery模乘法器

papers.title: Impact assessment of policy expressiveness of an optimised access control model for smart sensors
papers.authors: Mikel Uriarte, Jasone Astorga, Eduardo Jacob, Maider Huarte, Óscar López
papers.abstract: In the incoming internet of things (IoT) applications, smart sensors expose services to interact with them, to be parameterised, managed and maintained. Therefore, fine-grained end-to-end access control enforcement is mandatory to tackle the derived security requirements. However, it is still not feasible in very constrained devices. There is an innovative access control model that conveys an expressive policy language and an optimised codification for tight and flexible access control enforcement in very constrained devices. Such tightness enabled by the expressiveness of the policy language leads to detailed policy instances that might impact on the performance and therefore, in the feasibility and further applicability. In this context, this study assesses how the policy length impacts the performance of the establishment of a security association through the protocol named Hidra proposed by such an adapted access control model. Consequently, the notable results of the performance evaluation prove the feasibility and adequacy of this access control model for the new smart IoT scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 在即将到来的物联网(IoT)应用中，智能传感器暴露服务以与其交互，并被参数化、管理和维护。因此，细粒度的端到端访问控制实施是强制性的，以解决派生的安全需求。然而，这在非常受限的设备中仍然是不可行的。有一种创新的访问控制模型，它传达了一种富于表现力的策略语言和一种优化的编码，可在非常受限的设备中实现紧密而灵活的访问控制实施。这种由策略语言的表达性实现的紧密性导致了详细的策略实例，这些实例可能会影响性能，从而影响可行性和进一步的适用性。在这种背景下，本研究评估了策略长度如何影响通过由这种适应的访问控制模型提出的名为Hidra的协议建立安全关联的性能。因此，性能评估的显著结果证明了该访问控制模型对于新的智能物联网场景的可行性和充分性。
papers.title_zh: 智能传感器的优化访问控制模型的策略表达的影响评估

papers.title: Base for algebraic cryptanalysis based on combined representation of S-box
papers.authors: Bekir Unlu
papers.abstract: This study reveals an organised algebraic view on the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), and in particular the S-box. A clear visualisation of algebraic expressions is granted for both the cipher part and the key schedule part of AES. Additionally, by introducing the combined representation of the S-box, alternative methods can be constructed to serve algebraic cryptanalysis on AES. The process to obtain a combined representation of the S-box, as a combination of four bits, the input value's multiplicative inverse and bytes in hexadecimal notion, may be of high importance for other proposed ciphers too built with layers of S-boxes.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项研究揭示了高级加密标准(AES)，特别是S盒的组织代数观点。AES的密码部分和密钥表部分都有清晰的代数表达式可视化。此外，通过引入S盒的组合表示，可以构造替代方法来为AES上的代数密码分析服务。获得S盒的组合表示(作为四位、输入值的乘法逆元和十六进制概念的字节的组合)的过程对于其他提出的也用S盒层构建的密码可能非常重要。
papers.title_zh: 基于S盒组合表示的代数密码分析基础

papers.title: Re-definable access control over outsourced data in cloud storage systems
papers.authors: Zhigang Zhang, Chaowen Chang, Zhimin Guo, PeiSheng Han
papers.abstract: There is an increasing concern for data privacy when people outsource their data to remote cloud storage servers. To secure outsourced data, cloud users are suggested to employ cryptographic encryption to specify access policies such that only users meeting the policies can access the data. After the application of an encryption, however, users are difficult to modify their access policies since the policies were already formulated by the encryption. To address such problem, the authors propose a new approach referred to as re-definable access control (RDAC). The RDAC utilises identity-based encryption (IBE) and attribute-based encryption (ABE) to secure outsourced data and allows users to choose either to achieve access control according to their capability and requirements. Moreover, the RDAC allows users to change simple access policies into fine-grained access policies by converting IBE encrypted files into ABE encrypted ones, without leaking the underlying data. Surprisingly, the access policy conversion does not require the users to perform any costly computation, nor the storage servers to be disturbed. The authors prove the security of RDAC under a rigorous definition, and empirically show that the introduction of the conversion incurs almost no costs to the outsourcing and access procedures.
papers.abstract_zh: 当人们将数据外包给远程云存储服务器时，人们越来越担心数据隐私。为了保护外包数据，建议云用户采用加密技术来指定访问策略，以便只有符合策略的用户才能访问数据。然而，在应用加密之后，用户很难修改他们的访问策略，因为这些策略已经由加密制定了。为了解决这个问题，作者提出了一种称为可重定义访问控制(RDAC)的新方法。RDAC利用基于身份的加密(IBE)和基于属性的加密(ABE)来保护外包数据，并允许用户根据其能力和要求选择其中一种来实现访问控制。此外，RDAC允许用户通过将IBE加密文件转换为ABE加密文件，将简单的访问策略更改为细粒度的访问策略，而不会泄漏底层数据。令人惊讶的是，访问策略转换不需要用户执行任何昂贵的计算，也不需要干扰存储服务器。作者在严格的定义下证明了RDAC的安全性，并从经验上证明了转换的引入几乎不会给外包和访问过程带来任何成本。
papers.title_zh: 云存储系统中对外包数据的可重新定义的访问控制

papers.title: Analysis of dynamic code updating in Android with security perspective
papers.authors: Ahmet Ilhan Aysan, Fatih Sakiz, Sevil Sen
papers.abstract: Attackers have been searching for security vulnerabilities to exploit in Android applications. Such security vulnerabilities include Android applications that could load code at runtime which helps attackers avoid detection by static analysis tools. In this study, an extensive analysis is conducted in order to see how attackers employ updating techniques to exploit such vulnerabilities and to assess the security risks of applications in the marketplace using these techniques. A comprehensive analysis was carried out on nearly 30,000 applications collected from three different Android markets and two malware datasets. Static, dynamic and permission-based analyses were employed in order to monitor malicious activities in such applications, and new malicious applications using updating techniques were discovered in Google Play. The results show that applications employing code updating techniques are on the rise. It is believed that this is the first study of its kind to monitor updating behaviours of applications during their execution. This analysis allows us to deeply analyse suspicious applications and thereby develop better security solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击者一直在搜索Android应用程序中的安全漏洞。此类安全漏洞包括可以在运行时加载代码的Android应用程序，这有助于攻击者避免被静态分析工具检测到。在这项研究中，进行了广泛的分析，以了解攻击者如何利用更新技术来利用这些漏洞，并评估市场上使用这些技术的应用程序的安全风险。对从三个不同的Android市场和两个恶意软件数据集收集的近30，000个应用程序进行了全面的分析。采用静态、动态和基于权限的分析来监控此类应用程序中的恶意活动，并在Google Play中发现了使用更新技术的新恶意应用程序。结果表明，采用代码更新技术的应用程序正在增加。据信，这是同类研究中首次监测应用程序执行期间的更新行为。这种分析使我们能够深入分析可疑的应用程序，从而开发更好的安全解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 安全视角下的Android动态代码更新分析

papers.title: Threshold verifiable multi-secret sharing based on elliptic curves and Chinese remainder theorem
papers.authors: Maryam Sheikhi-Garjan, Mojtaba Bahramian, Christophe Doche
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors propose a new protocol to share secret shadows for verifiable ( t , n ) secret sharing (VSS) schemes. Unlike traditional VSS schemes, whose communications between the dealer and the participants require a secure channel, the authors’ new scheme relies on the elliptic curve cryptosystem and the Chinese remainder theorem operates over a public channel. The security of the secret shadows and the verification algorithm are based on the hardness of the elliptic curve discrete logarithm problem. They also extend the proposed scheme to an efficient verifiable multi-secret sharing (VMSS) scheme, particularly when the number of secrets is more than the threshold. As a result, their scheme is a multi-use and efficient VMSS on the public channel which provides the same level of security as traditional VMSS schemes with much shorter keys.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者提出了一个新的可验证(t，n)秘密共享(VSS)方案的秘密阴影共享协议。与传统的VSS方案不同，在传统的VSS方案中，分发者和参与者之间的通信需要安全的信道，作者的新方案依赖于椭圆曲线密码系统和中国剩余定理在公共信道上操作。秘密阴影的安全性和验证算法基于椭圆曲线离散对数问题的困难性。他们还将所提出的方案推广到一个有效的可验证多秘密共享(VMSS)方案，特别是当秘密数大于门限时。因此，他们的方案是一个在公共信道上的多用户和有效的VMSS，它提供了与传统的VMSS方案相同的安全级别，而密钥要短得多。
papers.title_zh: 基于椭圆曲线和中国剩余定理的门限可验证多秘密共享

papers.title: Detecting LDoS attack bursts based on queue distribution
papers.authors: Meng Yue, Zhijun Wu, Jingjie Wang
papers.abstract: Low-rate denial of service (LDoS) attacks exploit the congestion control mechanism to degrade the network quality of service. As a classic active queue management algorithm, random early detection (RED) algorithm is widely used to avoid network congestion. However, RED is vulnerable to LDoS attacks. LDoS attacks with well-configured attack parameters force RED queue to fluctuate severely, thereby throttling transmission control protocol (TCP) senders' sending rate. A feedback control model is proposed to describe the process of the congestion control, by which the congestion window and queue behaviours are analysed combined. After that, a two-dimensional queue distribution model composed of the instantaneous queue and the average queue is designed to extract the attack feature. Moreover then, a combination of a simple distance-based approach and an adaptive threshold algorithm is proposed to detect every LDoS attack burst. Test results of network simulator (NS)-2 simulation and test-bed experiments indicate that the proposed detection strategy can almost completely detect LDoS attack bursts and is especially robust to legitimate short bursts.
papers.abstract_zh: 低速率拒绝服务(LDoS)攻击利用拥塞控制机制来降低网络服务质量。随机早期检测(RED)算法作为一种经典的主动队列管理算法，被广泛用于避免网络拥塞。然而，红色很容易受到LDoS的攻击。具有良好配置的攻击参数的LDoS攻击迫使红色队列剧烈波动，从而抑制传输控制协议(TCP)发送者的发送速率。提出了一种反馈控制模型来描述拥塞控制过程，通过该模型对拥塞窗口和队列行为进行了综合分析。然后，设计了由瞬时队列和平均队列组成的二维队列分布模型来提取攻击特征。此外，还提出了一种简单的基于距离的方法和自适应阈值算法的组合来检测每个LDoS攻击突发。网络模拟器(NS)-2仿真和测试床实验的测试结果表明，该检测策略几乎可以完全检测出LDoS攻击突发，并且对合法的短突发具有较强的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 基于队列分布的LDoS攻击爆发检测

papers.title: Detecting new generations of threats using attribute-based attack graphs
papers.authors: Mehran Alidoost Nia, Behnam Bahrak, Mehdi Kargahi, Benjamin Fabian
papers.abstract: In recent years, the increase in cyber threats has raised many concerns about security and privacy in the digital world. However, new attack methods are often limited to a few core techniques. Here, in order to detect new threat patterns, the authors use an attack graph structure to model unprecedented network traffic. This graph for the unknown attack is matched to a pre-known threat database, which contains attack graphs related to each known threat. The main challenge is to associate unknown traffics to a family of known threats. For this, the authors utilise random walks and pattern theorem. The authors utilise the pattern theorem and apply it to a set of proposed algorithms for detecting new generations of malicious traffics. Under the assumption of having a proper threat database, the authors argue that for each unknown threat, which belongs to a family of threats, it is possible to find at least one matching pattern with high matching rate and sensitivity.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，网络威胁的增加引发了人们对数字世界安全和隐私的担忧。然而，新的攻击方法往往局限于少数核心技术。在这里，为了检测新的威胁模式，作者使用攻击图结构来模拟前所未有的网络流量。该未知攻击的图表与预先已知的威胁数据库相匹配，该数据库包含与每个已知威胁相关的攻击图表。主要挑战是将未知流量与一系列已知威胁相关联。为此，作者利用随机漫步和模式定理。作者利用模式定理，并将其应用于一套提出的算法，以检测新一代的恶意流量。假设有一个适当的威胁数据库，作者认为，对于属于威胁家族的每个未知威胁，都有可能找到至少一个具有高匹配率和灵敏度的匹配模式。
papers.title_zh: 使用基于属性的攻击图检测新一代威胁

papers.title: Chosen message strategy to improve the correlation power analysis
papers.authors: Maamar Ouladj, Phillipe Guillot, Farid Mokrane
papers.abstract: Nowadays cryptographic circuits are subject to attacks that no longer focus on the algorithm but on its physical implementation. Attacks exploiting information leaked by the hardware implementation are called side-channel attacks (SCA). In particular, the popular correlation power analysis (CPA) is known by its effectiveness. This paper presents a new method for an original optimisation of the CPA to recover secret keys with less power consumption traces than what is expected from the standard CPA. This improvement is done by choosing appropriate plaintexts, both non-adaptively and adaptively. A mathematical proof of the proposed procedure is provided for any cryptographic device with any known leakage model. The proposed technique is tested on the advanced encryption system (AES) S-box input (resp. output) implemented in an ATMega 163 smartcard, with hamming weight leakage model.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，密码电路受到的攻击不再集中在算法上，而是集中在其物理实现上。利用硬件实现泄露的信息的攻击称为旁道攻击(SCA)。特别是，流行的相关功率分析(CPA)因其有效性而闻名。本文提出了一种新的方法，用于CPA的原始优化，以比标准CPA更少的功耗痕迹来恢复密钥。这种改进是通过选择适当的非自适应和自适应明文来实现的。对于具有任何已知泄漏模型的任何密码设备，提供了所提出的过程的数学证明。所提出的技术在高级加密系统(AES)的S盒输入(resp。输出)在ATMega 163智能卡中实现，具有汉明重量泄漏模型。
papers.title_zh: 改进相关功率分析的选择消息策略

papers.title: PriVeto: a fully private two-round veto protocol
papers.authors: Samiran Bag, Muhammad Ajmal Azad, Feng Hao
papers.abstract: In 2006, Hao and Zielinski presented a two-round veto protocol named anonymous veto network (AV-net), which is exceptionally efficient in terms of the number of rounds, computation and bandwidth usage. However, AV-net has two generic issues: (i) a participant who has submitted a veto can find out whether she is the only one who vetoed; (ii) the last participant who submits her input can pre-compute the Boolean-OR result before submission, and may amend her input based on that knowledge. These two issues generally apply to any multi-round veto protocol where participants commit their input in the last round. In this study, the authors propose a novel solution to address both issues within two rounds, which are the best possible round efficiency for a veto protocol. Their new private veto protocol, called PriVeto, has similar system complexities to AV-net, but it binds participants to their inputs in the very first round, eliminating the possibility of runtime changes to any of the inputs. At the end of the protocol, participants are strictly limited to learning nothing more than the output of the Boolean-OR function and their own inputs.
papers.abstract_zh: 2006年，Hao和Zielinski提出了一个两轮否决协议，命名为匿名否决网络(AV-net ),该协议在轮数、计算量和带宽使用方面都非常有效。然而，AV-net有两个一般性问题:(I)提交了否决的参与者可以发现她是否是唯一否决的人；(ii)提交其输入的最后一个参与者可以在提交之前预先计算布尔或结果，并且可以基于该知识修改其输入。这两个问题通常适用于参与者在最后一轮提交其意见的任何多轮否决协议。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种新的解决方案，在两轮内解决这两个问题，这是否决协议的最佳轮效率。他们新的私人否决协议PriVeto与AV-net具有相似的系统复杂性，但它在第一轮就将参与者绑定到他们的输入，消除了任何输入的运行时变化的可能性。在协议的最后，参与者被严格限制为只学习布尔或函数的输出和他们自己的输入。
papers.title_zh: PriVeto:一个完全私有的两轮否决协议

papers.title: Secure data storage and intrusion detection in the cloud using MANN and dual encryption through various attacks
papers.authors: J. Anitha Ruth, H. Sirmathi, A. Meenakshi
papers.abstract: Nowadays, it is very important to maintain a high level security to ensure safe and trusted communication of information between various organisations. But secured data communication over the Internet and any other network is always under threat of intrusions and misuses. So intrusion detection system (IDS) has become a needful component in terms of computer and network security. In this research, the authors have intended to propose an effective method for text data based IDS and secure data storage. In the proposed preprocessing steps, the input text document is preprocessed and then change to the desired format. Next the resultant output is fed to the IDS. Here user text data is checked; whether the given data is normal or intrusive based on a modified artificial neural network (MANN). Here traditional neural network is modified by means of modified particle swarm optimisation. The final process of the authors' proposed method is to encrypt the file using dual encryption algorithms (RSA and AES). To improve the storage security of the proposed method, steganography techniques are utilised after the dual encryption. Their proposed system is implemented with the help of Cloud simulator in the working platform Java.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，保持高水平的安全性以确保各种组织之间安全和可信的信息通信是非常重要的。但是，互联网和任何其他网络上的安全数据通信总是受到入侵和滥用的威胁。因此，入侵检测系统已经成为计算机和网络安全不可或缺的组成部分。在本研究中，作者试图提出一种有效的基于文本数据的入侵检测和安全数据存储方法。在所提出的预处理步骤中，输入文本文档被预处理，然后被改变成期望的格式。接下来，结果输出被馈送到IDS。这里检查用户文本数据；基于改进的人工神经网络(MANN ),给定数据是正常的还是侵入的。这里用改进的粒子群算法对传统的神经网络进行了改进。作者提出的方法的最后过程是使用双重加密算法(RSA和AES)加密文件。为了提高所提出方法的存储安全性，在双重加密之后使用了隐写技术。他们提出的系统是在工作平台Java中的云模拟器的帮助下实现的。
papers.title_zh: 通过各种攻击使用MANN和双重加密在云中保护数据存储和入侵检测

papers.title: Certifying multi-power RSA
papers.authors: Xiaona Zhang, Li-Ping Wang, Jun Xu
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors present two rigorous algorithms to certify the trapdoor permutation property of the RSA function RS A N , e ( x ) := x e mod N , where N = p r q is a multi-power RSA modulus with unknown factorisation and r is a known positive integer. Their work gives effective certification for a prime exponent e when e ≥ 2 N ( gcd ( r , e − 1 ) ) / ( r + 1 ) 2 + ϵ and for a composite integer e = e 1 s 1 e 2 s 2 ⋯ e u s u when e i ≥ 2 N ( gcd ( r , e i − 1 ) ) / ( r + 1 ) 2 + ϵ for i = 1 , … , u , where e i is a known prime, s i is a positive integer, and ϵ > 0 is some small enough constant. The algorithms apply Coppersmith's method for solving univariate modular polynomial equations and run in time O ( ϵ − 7 C log 2 N ) , where C ≤ u r 2 is a constant number.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者提出了两个严格的算法来证明RS A函数RS A N，e ( x ) := x e mod N的陷门置换性质，其中N = p r q是具有未知因式分解的多幂RSA模数，r是已知的正整数。他们的工作给出了当e ≥ 2 N ( gcd ( r，E1))/(r+1)2+ϵ时素数指数e的有效证明，以及当e i ≥ 2 N ( gcd ( r， e i 1)/(r+1)2+ϵ，i = 1，…，u，其中ei是一个已知的素数，s i是一个正整数，ϵ > 0是一个足够小的常数。 该算法应用Coppersmith的方法求解一元模多项式方程，运行时间为o(ϵ7 c log 2n)，其中C ≤ u r 2是一个常数。
papers.title_zh: 认证多权力RSA

papers.title: Public key authenticated encryption with keyword search: revisited
papers.authors: Mahnaz Noroozi, Ziba Eslami
papers.abstract: In 2017, the notion of public key authenticated encryption with keyword search (PAEKS) and its security model was defined by Huang and Li. Their main motivation was providing security against inside keyword guessing attacks (KGA). They also proposed a concrete PAEKS scheme secure in their proposed model. In this study, the authors first show that their security model has an important drawback and therefore, cannot handle multi-user settings. As such settings are a necessity in the public-key environment, it is vital to improving the model to capture multiple users. This is what they do in the first part of this study. Then, they consider Huang and Li's PAEKS scheme and prove that it is not secure against inside (and even outside) KGA. Finally, they propose a modified scheme to fix the problem without any additional communication or computation costs. They further prove that the new scheme is secure in the improved model.
papers.abstract_zh: 2017年，黄和李定义了带关键字搜索的公钥认证加密(PAEKS)概念及其安全模型。他们的主要动机是防止内部关键字猜测攻击(KGA)。他们还提出了一个在他们提出的模型中安全的具体PAEKS方案。在这项研究中，作者首先表明他们的安全模型有一个重要的缺点，因此不能处理多用户设置。因为这样的设置在公钥环境中是必需的，所以改进模型以捕获多个用户是至关重要的。这是他们在这项研究的第一部分所做的。然后，他们考虑了黄和李的PAEKS方案，并证明了该方案在内部(甚至外部)是不安全的。最后，他们提出了一个修改方案来解决这个问题，而没有任何额外的通信或计算成本。他们进一步证明了新方案在改进的模型下是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 带有关键字搜索的公钥认证加密:再探

papers.title: How to construct a verifiable multi-secret sharing scheme based on graded encoding schemes
papers.authors: Massoud Hadian Dehkordi, Hossein Oraei
papers.abstract: In a verifiable multi-secret sharing scheme, a dealer distributes multiple secrets between a group of participants and also additional information is given that allows each participant to check whether his share is valid. In this study, the authors present a novel verifiable multi-secret sharing (VMSS) scheme with general access structure using monotone span programs, which its security is based on graded encoding schemes. More precisely, they reduce the hardness of graded decision-Diffie–Hellman problem to the computational security of the authors’ scheme in the standard model. To the best of the authors’ knowledge, this is the first study to present a VMSS scheme based on graded encoding schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在一个可验证的多秘密共享方案中，一个分发者在一组参与者之间分发多个秘密，并且给出附加信息，允许每个参与者检查他的份额是否有效。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个新的可验证多秘密共享(VMSS)方案，该方案具有一般的访问结构，使用单调跨度程序，其安全性基于分级编码方案。更准确地说，他们将分级决策-Diffie–Hellman问题的难度降低到标准模型中作者方案的计算安全性。据作者所知，这是第一个提出基于分级编码方案的VMSS方案的研究。
papers.title_zh: 如何基于分级编码方案构造可验证的多秘密共享方案

papers.title: Leveraging deep neural networks for anomaly-based web application firewall
papers.authors: Ali Moradi Vartouni, Mohammad Teshnehlab, Saeed Sedighian Kashi
papers.abstract: Web applications are the most common platforms for the exchange of information and services on the Internet. With the launch of web 2.0, information has flourished through social networking and business online. Therefore, websites are often attacked directly. As a result, the industry has paid more attention to the security of web applications in addition to security under computer networks. Intelligent systems based on machine learning have demonstrated excellent result on tasks such as anomaly detection in web requests. However, current methods based on traditional models cannot extract high-level features from huge data. In this study, the authors proposed methods based on deep-neural-network and parallel-feature-fusion that features engineering as an integral part of them and plays the most important role in their performance. The proposed methods use stacked autoencoder and deep belief network as feature learning methods, in which only normal data is used in the classification of training phase, then, one-class SVM, isolation forest, and elliptic envelope are applied as classifiers. The authors compared the proposed model with different strategies on CSIC 2010 and ECML/PKDD 2007 datasets. Results show that deep model and feature fusion model demonstrated as hierarchical feature learning which had better performance in terms of accuracy and generalisation in a reasonable time.
papers.abstract_zh: Web应用程序是互联网上最常见的信息和服务交换平台。随着web 2.0的推出，信息通过社交网络和在线商务蓬勃发展。所以网站经常被直接攻击。因此，除了计算机网络下的安全性之外，业界更加关注web应用的安全性。基于机器学习的智能系统已经在诸如web请求中的异常检测等任务上表现出优异的结果。然而，目前基于传统模型的方法无法从海量数据中提取高层特征。在这项研究中，作者提出了基于深度神经网络和并行特征融合的方法，这些方法将工程作为其中不可分割的一部分，并在它们的性能中起着最重要的作用。所提出的方法使用堆叠自动编码器和深度信念网络作为特征学习方法，其中在训练阶段仅使用正态数据，然后使用一类SVM、隔离森林和椭圆包络作为分类器。作者在CSIC 2010和ECML/PKDD 2007数据集上将提出的模型与不同策略进行了比较。结果表明，深度模型和特征融合模型表现为分层特征学习，在合理的时间内具有更好的准确性和泛化性能。
papers.title_zh: 利用深度神经网络实现基于异常的web应用防火墙

papers.title: Non-quantum cryptanalysis of the noisy version of Aaronson-Christiano's quantum money scheme
papers.authors: Marta Conde Pena, Raúl Durán Díaz, Jean-Charles Faugère, Luis Hernández Encinas, Ludovic Perret
papers.abstract: At STOC 2012, Aaronson and Christiano proposed a noisy and a noiseless version of the first public-key quantum money scheme endowed with a security proof. This paper addresses the so-called noisy hidden subspaces problem, on which the noisy version of their scheme is based. The first contribution of this work is a non-quantum cryptanalysis of the above-mentioned noisy quantum money scheme extended to prime fields F , with | F | ≠ 2 , that runs in randomised polynomial time. This finding is supported with experimental results showing that, in practice, the algorithm presented is efficient and succeeds with overwhelming probability. The second contribution is a non-quantum randomised polynomial-time cryptanalysis of the noisy quantum money scheme over F 2 succeeding with a certain probability for values of the noise lying within a certain range. This result disproves a conjecture made by Aaronson and Christiano about the non-existence of an algorithm that solves the noisy hidden subspaces problem over F 2 and succeeds with such probability.
papers.abstract_zh: 在STOC 2012上，Aaronson和Christiano提出了第一个具有安全证明的公钥量子货币方案的嘈杂和安静版本。本文提出了所谓的噪声隐藏子空间问题，噪声版本的方案就是基于这个问题。这项工作的第一个贡献是对上述噪声量子货币方案的非量子密码分析，该方案扩展到素数域F，其中| F | ≠ 2，在随机多项式时间内运行。这一发现得到实验结果的支持，实验结果表明，在实践中，所提出的算法是有效的，并且以压倒性的概率成功。第二个贡献是对F 2上有噪声的量子货币方案的非量子随机多项式时间密码分析，对于噪声值在某个范围内的某个概率成功。这个结果否定了Aaronson和Christiano提出的一个猜想，即不存在一个算法来解决F 2上的噪声隐藏子空间问题，并且以这样的概率成功。
papers.title_zh: Aaronson-Christiano量子货币方案噪声版本的非量子密码分析

papers.title: Dynamic API call sequence visualisation for malware classification
papers.authors: Mingdong Tang, Quan Qian
papers.abstract: Due to the development of automated malware generation and obfuscation, traditional malware detection methods based on signature matching have limited effectiveness. Thus, a novel approach using visualisation and deep learning technology can play an important role in malware detection and classification. In this study, the authors extract sequences of API calls using dynamic analysis and then use colour mapping rules to create feature images representing malware behaviour. Finally, they train a convolutional neural network to classify different feature images with 9 malware families, and 1000 variants in each family. Experimental results show the effectiveness of the authors' method. The classification TPR, precision, recall and F1 are all >99%, while the FPR is <;0.1%.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于恶意软件自动生成和混淆技术的发展，传统的基于特征匹配的恶意软件检测方法效果有限。因此，使用可视化和深度学习技术的新方法可以在恶意软件检测和分类中发挥重要作用。在这项研究中，作者使用动态分析提取API调用序列，然后使用颜色映射规则创建代表恶意软件行为的特征图像。最后，他们训练一个卷积神经网络，用9个恶意软件家族和每个家族中的1000个变体对不同的特征图像进行分类。实验结果表明了作者方法的有效性。分类TPR、精度、召回率和F1都> 99%，而FPR < 99%；0.1%.
papers.title_zh: 用于恶意软件分类的动态API调用序列可视化

papers.title: Dinamite: internal differential match-in-the-end attack on eight-round PAEQ
papers.authors: Dhiman Saha, Sourya Kakarla, Dipanwita Roy Chowdhury
papers.abstract: The authors explore a cryptanalysis strategy which seems to be particularly applicable to parallelisable ciphers where the key forms a part of the internal state. The proposed technique combines internal differentials with guess and determine analysis to come up with what is referred to as the match-in-the-end attack. The notion of difference here deviates from the classical differential where the difference is controllable via the plaintext/ciphertext. Here, they exploit the Hamming distance between parallel branches to devise the differential trail. They apply the strategy on full eight (out of 20) rounds of parallelisable authenticated cipher [parallelisable AE based on quadrupled AES (PAEQ)] to devise key recovery attacks with practical time complexities. They first show an initial attack on paeq-64/80/128 and then devise improvements which give us the best key-recovery attacks with time complexities of 2 33 , 2 48 , and 2 64 , respectively. While the best reported attacks on eight-round paeq-64/80/128 have a data complexity of 2 89 blocks, the result improves their time complexities by factors of 2 , 2 18 , and 2 34 , while preserving the data complexity. Finally, they present a nonce-based differential attack which works on paeq-128-t with 2 64 time complexity but uses just two single block known plaintexts making it the most practical attack on any round-reduced PAEQ variant reported so far.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者探索了一种密码分析策略，这种策略似乎特别适用于密钥构成内部状态一部分的可并行化密码。所提出的技术将内部差异与猜测和确定分析结合起来，提出了所谓的最终匹配攻击。这里的差的概念不同于经典的差，在经典的差中，差是通过明文/密文可控的。在这里，他们利用平行分支之间的汉明距离来设计差分轨迹。他们将该策略应用于完整的八轮(共20轮)可并行认证密码[基于四重AES (PAEQ)的可并行AE]，以设计具有实际时间复杂性的密钥恢复攻击。他们首先展示了对paeq-64/80/128的初始攻击，然后设计了改进方案，给出了最佳的密钥恢复攻击，时间复杂度分别为2 33、2 48和2 64。虽然对八轮paeq-64/80/128的最佳报告攻击具有2 89块的数据复杂度，但是结果将它们的时间复杂度提高了2、2 18和2 34倍，同时保持了数据复杂度。最后，他们提出了一种基于随机数的差分攻击，该攻击在paeq-128-t上工作，具有2 ^ 64的时间复杂度，但仅使用两个单块已知明文，这使得它成为迄今为止对任何轮约paeq变体最实用的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 迪纳米特:内部差分比赛在最后攻击八轮PAEQ

papers.title: Encrypted secure polar coding scheme for general two-way wiretap channel
papers.authors: Yizhi Zhao, Shiwei Xu, Hongmei Chi
papers.abstract: The authors consider the problems of key exchange for one-time pad along with the problem of rate sacrifice for secure polar coding over the two-way wiretap channel under the strong security criterion. Based on existing techniques, they present a new hash chaining structure to solve the good bits sacrificing problem for achieving the strong security and constructed encryption embedded secure polar coding scheme for two-way wiretap channel. To implement a one-time pad without any key pre-sharing, they design a secure and reliable transmission for both key and ciphertext coupling with the cooperative jamming strategy, which can also increase the secrecy rate for communication. As proved, extended upper bounds for both achievable secrecy rate pair and effective secrecy rate pair can be achieved under the strong security and reliability criterions.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者考虑了在强安全准则下，双向窃听信道上一次一密的密钥交换问题和安全极化编码的码率牺牲问题。在现有技术的基础上，他们提出了一种新的哈希链结构，解决了为实现强安全性而牺牲好比特的问题，并构造了用于双向窃听信道的嵌入加密的安全极性编码方案。为了实现不需要任何密钥预共享的一次一密，他们设计了一种安全可靠的密钥和密文传输方案，并结合协同干扰策略，提高了通信的保密率。证明了在强安全性和可靠性准则下，可达保密率对和有效保密率对的上界都是可以达到的。
papers.title_zh: 通用双向窃听信道的加密安全极性编码方案

papers.title: Security of generalised Reed-Solomon code-based cryptosystems
papers.authors: Marco Baldi, Franco Chiaraluce, Joachim Rosenthal, Paolo Santini, Davide Schipani
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors elaborate on a recently proposed variant of the public-key McEliece and Niederreiter cryptosystems using generalised Reed-Solomon (GRS) codes as private codes. The use of these codes brings known advantages in terms of public key size, but particular care is needed in the choice of parameters not to endanger the system security. In fact, the considered system exploits a strong disguising technique of the private code within the public code. However, it has recently been pointed out that some new attacks exist which may threaten some instances of such a system, therefore the choice of parameters needs to consider some further constraints compared to the original version. After outlining these constraints, the authors propose a new modification of the system achieving greater flexibility in the parameter choice. Moreover, the new system exhibits a lower complexity than the original GRS code-based system. Its very competitive features such as key size and encryption rate are highlighted with respect to classic systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者详细阐述了最近提出的一种使用广义里德-索罗门(GRS)码作为私有码的公钥密码系统的变种。这些代码的使用在公共密钥大小方面带来了众所周知的优点，但是在选择参数时需要特别小心，以免危及系统安全。事实上，所考虑的系统利用了在公共代码中隐藏私有代码的强大伪装技术。然而，最近已经指出，存在一些新的攻击，其可能威胁这种系统的一些实例，因此参数的选择需要考虑与原始版本相比的一些进一步的约束。在概述了这些限制后，作者提出了一种新的系统改进方案，在参数选择上实现了更大的灵活性。此外，新系统展现出比原始的基于GRS码的系统更低的复杂度。相对于经典系统，其极具竞争力的特性(如密钥大小和加密速率)更为突出。
papers.title_zh: 广义Reed-Solomon码基密码系统的安全性

papers.title: Improved guess-and-determine attack on TRIVIUM
papers.authors: Lin Jiao, Yonglin Hao, Yongqiang Li
papers.abstract: TRIVIUM is a stream cipher of the finalists by eSTREAM project and has been accepted as ISO standard. Although the design has a simple structure, no attack on its full cipher has been found yet. In this study, based on Maximov and Biryukov's attack, the authors present an improved guess-and-determine attack on TRIVIUM. Analysis details are provided corresponding to TRIVIUM specifications for better comprehension, and errors that may lead to higher attack complexity in the original attack are pointed and corrected. They further bring in some techniques like backward-clock equation collection, quadratic equations, linear transformation to improve the attack. In addition, they integrate with time-memory-data tradeoffs from the framework, based on the analysis of the coefficient matrices form of derived linear equation systems on the internal state. In this way, better use of the imposed quadratic conditions can be made, which leads to reduced attack complexity by filtering out the impossible keystreams before solving the equation systems. Their attack offers more parameter selections, and gives several borderline results compared with the key exhaustive search. The new attack behaves better in the original case. It also verifies the necessity of data requirement imposed on TRIVIUM, which is questioned in TRIVIUM specifications.
papers.abstract_zh: TRIVIUM是eSTREAM项目决赛选手的流密码，已被接受为ISO标准。虽然该设计结构简单，但还没有发现对其全密码的攻击。在这项研究中，基于Maximov和Biryukov的攻击，作者提出了一个改进的猜测和确定攻击TRIVIUM。为了更好地理解，提供了与繁琐规范相对应的分析细节，并指出和纠正了原始攻击中可能导致更高攻击复杂性的错误。他们进一步引入了一些技术，如逆向时钟方程收集，二次方程，线性变换来改善攻击。此外，基于对内部状态上导出的线性方程组的系数矩阵形式的分析，它们与来自框架的时间-存储器-数据权衡相集成。这样，可以更好地利用强加的二次条件，这通过在求解方程组之前过滤掉不可能的密钥流而降低了攻击复杂度。他们的攻击提供了更多的参数选择，并且与关键字穷举搜索相比，给出了几个边界结果。新的攻击在原始情况下表现更好。它还验证了TRIVIUM规范中质疑的TRIVIUM数据要求的必要性。
papers.title_zh: 改进对TRIVIUM的猜测和确定攻击

papers.title: ESR analysis over ST-MRC multi-input multi-output Nakagami fading channels
papers.authors: Jin-Yuan Wang, Sheng-Hong Lin, Wei Cai, Jianxin Dai
papers.abstract: Different from conventional key-based cryptography schemes, physical-layer security (PLS) techniques have drawn much attention recently to realise unconditional security from the information theory perspective. As an important performance metric in PLS, the ergodic secrecy rate (ESR) for a multi-input multi-output wireless communication network over a Nakagami fading channel is analysed. The network is consisted of a multi-antenna transmitter (Alice), a multi-antenna legitimate receiver (Bob), and a multi-antenna eavesdropper (Eve). By using the selective transmission (ST) at Alice and the maximum ratio combining (MRC) at Bob and Eve, an exact expression of the ESR is derived. However, due to the infinite summation, it is very hard to evaluate the ESR performance. To reduce computational complexity and obtain more insights, a lower bound of the ESR is then obtained, which is in a closed form. As special cases, the lower bounds of the ESR for the signal-antenna scenario and Rayleigh fading channel are also obtained, respectively. Numerical results show that the derived expressions of the ESR and its lower bound are very accurate to evaluate system performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 与传统的基于密钥的加密方案不同，从信息论的角度来看，物理层安全(PLS)技术能够实现无条件的安全，因此近年来受到了广泛的关注。作为PLS中的一个重要性能指标，分析了Nakagami衰落信道下多输入多输出无线通信网络的遍历保密率。该网络由一个多天线发射机(Alice)、一个多天线合法接收机(Bob)和一个多天线窃听者(Eve)组成。通过使用Alice的选择性传输(ST)和Bob和Eve的最大比合并(MRC ),导出了ESR的精确表达式。然而，由于总和为无穷大，很难评估ESR性能。为了降低计算复杂度并获得更多的见解，然后获得ESR的下限，其为封闭形式。作为特例，还分别得到了单天线和瑞利衰落信道下的等效串联电阻的下界。数值结果表明，推导出的等效串联电阻表达式及其下界非常准确地反映了系统的性能。
papers.title_zh: ST-MRC多输入多输出Nakagami衰落信道的ESR分析

papers.title: Identity-based encryption resilient to continuous key leakage
papers.authors: Yanwei Zhou, Bo Yang, Yi Mu, Tao Wang, Xin Wang
papers.abstract: Leakage of private information has become a threat to the security of computing systems. It has become a common security requirement that a cryptography scheme should withstand various leakage attacks, even the continuous leakage attacks. However, in the current constructions on the (continuous) leakage-resilient identity-based encryption (CLR-IBE) scheme, the leakage parameter is a fixed value. Aiming to solve these problems, in this study, the authors show how to construct the CLR-IBE scheme, and the adaptive chosen-ciphertext attacks security of proposed construction can be proved in the standard model. To further improve the practicability of CLR-IBE scheme, they design an improved IBE scheme with continuous leakage amplified property, and the leakage parameter has an arbitrary length.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私信息的泄露已经成为对计算系统安全的威胁。一个密码方案应该能够抵抗各种各样的泄漏攻击，甚至是连续的泄漏攻击，这已经成为一个普遍的安全需求。然而，在当前对(连续)泄漏弹性的基于身份的加密(CLR-IBE)方案的构造中，泄漏参数是一个固定值。针对这些问题，本文给出了CLR-IBE方案的构造方法，并在标准模型下证明了该构造方法的适应性选择密文攻击安全性。为了进一步提高CLR-IBE方案的实用性，他们设计了一种改进的具有连续泄漏放大特性的IBE方案，泄漏参数具有任意长度。
papers.title_zh: 抗连续密钥泄漏的基于身份的加密

papers.title: Causal analysis of attacks against honeypots based on properties of countries
papers.authors: Matej Zuzcak, Petr Bujok
papers.abstract: This study studies the influence of country attributes on the number of secure shell attacks originating from it detected by the author's honeynet. Four statistical models are described, based on three sources of data from various countries. The studied attributes of the countries can be broadly divided into demographic, technological, and economic, with each source providing a slightly different set of attributes. Statistical methods such as partial least-squares path modelling are used, clustering countries by their assessed similarity. The population size has the greatest effect on the number of attacks, as expected, though it has to be noted that developing countries did not provide relevant data to the sources used and thus were not included. The following influential attributes were technical such as the access to information and communication technologies (ICT), and the use of ICT, with the economic influence being notable only in rather small countries. The Netherlands was an interesting anomaly, being clustered alongside large countries, even though its country attributes were very much like those of its neighbours.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究研究了国家属性对作者的蜜网检测到的源自该国的安全外壳攻击数量的影响。基于来自不同国家的三个数据来源，描述了四个统计模型。所研究的国家属性可以大致分为人口统计、技术和经济，每个来源提供的属性略有不同。使用了偏最小二乘路径模型等统计方法，根据评估的相似性对国家进行分组。正如预期的那样，人口规模对攻击次数的影响最大，尽管必须指出，发展中国家没有向所使用的来源提供相关数据，因此没有包括在内。以下有影响的属性是技术性的，如获得信息和通信技术(信通技术)和使用信通技术，而经济影响仅在相当小的国家才显著。荷兰是一个有趣的异常现象，它与大国聚集在一起，尽管其国家属性与其邻国非常相似。
papers.title_zh: 基于国家属性的蜜罐攻击原因分析

papers.title: S-boxes representation and efficiency of algebraic attack
papers.authors: Hossein Arabnezhad-Khanoki, Babak Sadeghiyan, Josef Pieprzyk
papers.abstract: Algebraic analysis of block ciphers aims at finding the secret key by solving a collection of polynomial equations that describe the internal structure of a cipher for chosen observations of plaintext/ciphertext pairs. Although algebraic attacks are addressed for cryptanalysis of block and stream ciphers, there is a lack of understanding of the impact of algebraic representation of the cipher on efficiency of solving the resulting collection of equations. The study investigates some different S-box representations and their effect on complexity of algebraic attacks. In particular, the authors observe that a S-box representation defined in the work as forward–backward (FWBW) leads to a collection of equations that can be solved efficiently. They show that the SR(10,2,1,4) cipher can be broken with algebraic cryptanalysis using standard algebra software Singular and FGb. This is the best result achieved so far. The effect of description of S-boxes for some light-weight block ciphers is investigated. A by-product of this result is that some improvements have been achieved on the algebraic cryptanalysis of LBlock, PRESENT and MIBS light-weight block ciphers. The authors’ study and experiments confirm a counter-intuitive conclusion that algebraic attacks work best for the FWBW S-box representation. This contradicts a common belief that algebraic attacks are more efficient with quadratic S-box representation.
papers.abstract_zh: 分组密码的代数分析旨在通过求解一组多项式方程来找到密钥，这些多项式方程描述了对于选择的明文/密文对的观察的密码的内部结构。尽管代数攻击针对分组和流密码的密码分析，但是缺乏对密码的代数表示对求解所得方程组的效率的影响的理解。该研究调查了一些不同的S盒表示及其对代数攻击复杂性的影响。特别是，作者观察到在工作中定义为前向-后向(FWBW)的S盒表示导致可以有效求解的方程集合。他们表明SR(10，2，1，4)密码可以通过使用标准代数软件Singular和FGb的代数密码分析来破解。这是迄今为止取得的最好成绩。研究了S盒描述对一些轻量级分组密码的影响。这个结果的一个副产品是在LBlock、PRESENT和MIBS轻量级分组密码的代数密码分析方面取得了一些改进。作者的研究和实验证实了一个反直觉的结论，即代数攻击对FWBW S盒表示最有效。这与二次S盒表示的代数攻击更有效的普遍观点相矛盾。
papers.title_zh: s盒表示与代数攻击的效率

papers.title: Multi-designated verifiers signature schemes with threshold verifiability: generic pattern and a concrete scheme in the standard model
papers.authors: Parvin Rastegari, Mohammad Dakhilalian, Mehdi Berenjkoub, Willy Susilo
papers.abstract: In a designated verifier signature (DVS) scheme, the validity of the signature can only be checked by a designated entity chosen by the signer. Furthermore, the designated entity cannot convince a third party that the signature is generated by the signer. A multi-designated verifiers signature (MDVS) scheme is an extension of a DVS which includes multiple designated verifiers. To the best of the authors’ knowledge, there are two existing patterns for an MDVS scheme. In the first pattern, every verifier of the set of designated verifiers can check the validity of the signature independently. In the second pattern, the cooperation of all designated verifiers is required for checking the validity of the signature. In this study, the authors propose a generic new pattern for an MDVS scheme in which a threshold number of the set of designated verifiers can check the validity of the signature. They also present a concrete MDVS scheme with threshold verifiability in the standard model. Moreover, they compare their scheme with other existing MDVS schemes. Finally, they briefly explain scenarios in which the proposed pattern can be applicable.
papers.abstract_zh: 在指定验证者签名(DVS)方案中，签名的有效性只能由签名者选择的指定实体来验证。此外，指定实体不能使第三方相信签名是由签名人生成的。多指定验证者签名(MDVS)方案是包括多个指定验证者的DVS的扩展。就作者所知，MDVS计划有两种现有模式。在第一种模式中，指定验证者集合中的每个验证者可以独立地检查签名的有效性。在第二种模式中，需要所有指定验证者的合作来检查签名的有效性。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个MDVS方案的通用新模式，其中指定验证者集合的阈值数目可以检查签名的有效性。他们还提出了一个在标准模型中具有门限可验证性的具体MDVS方案。此外，他们将他们的方案与其他现有的MDVS方案进行了比较。最后，他们简要地解释了所提出的模式可以适用的场景。
papers.title_zh: 具有门限可验证性的多指定验证者签名方案:标准模型中的一般模式和具体方案

papers.title: New zero-sum distinguishers on full 24-round Keccak-f using the division property
papers.authors: Hailun Yan, Xuejia Lai, Lei Wang, Yu Yu, Yiran Xing
papers.abstract:
The authors analyse the security of Keccak (the winner in SHA-3 competition) by focusing on the zero-sum distinguishers of its underlying permutation (named Keccak-
 f
). The authors' analyses are developed by using the division property, a generalised integral property that was initially used in the integral cryptanalysis of symmetric-key algorithms.
