Following the work pioneered by Todo at CRYPTO 2015, they first formalise and prove a more delicate propagation rule of the division property under the assumption that the S-box's specification is known to attackers. Then, they apply this rule to the inverse S-box in Keccak-
 f
 with a further study on properties of its algebraic degree. They find that the rate of decline in the division property is gentler than that of a randomly chosen S-box. Meanwhile, they get the same results for the S-box in Ascon permutation. Thanks to this vulnerable property, they can improve the higher-order differential characteristics against the inverse of Keccak-
 f
 in terms of the required number of chosen plaintexts. As an application, they give new zero-sum distinguishers on full 24-round Keccak-
 f
 of size 2
 1573
. To the authors' knowledge, this is currently the best zero-sum distinguishers of full-round Keccak-
 f
 permutation. Incidentally, they give the corresponding results for 12-round Ascon permutation.
papers.abstract_zh:
作者分析了Keccak(SHA-3竞赛的获胜者)的安全性，重点研究了其底层置换(名为Keccak-
f
).作者的分析是通过使用除法性质来发展的，除法性质是一种广义的整数性质，最初用于对称密钥算法的整数密码分析。继Todo在CRYPTO 2015上开创的工作之后，他们首先在假设攻击者已知S盒规范的情况下，形式化并证明了除法属性的更微妙的传播规则。然后，他们将此规则应用于Keccak-中的逆S盒
f
并进一步研究了其代数次数的性质。他们发现，除法性质的下降速度比随机选择的S盒要慢。同时，对于Ascon置换中的S盒，他们得到了相同的结果。由于这种易受攻击的特性，它们可以提高高阶微分特性以对抗Keccak-的逆运算
f
就所选明文的所需数量而言。作为一个应用，他们给出了新的24轮Keccak上的零和区分符
f
大小为2的
1573
。据作者所知，这是目前最好的全圆周率的零和区分器
f
排列。顺便提一下，他们给出了12轮Ascon置换的相应结果。
papers.title_zh: 基于除法性质的24轮Keccak-f上新的零和鉴别器

papers.title: New method to describe the differential distribution table for large S-boxes in MILP and its application
papers.authors: Lingchen Li, Wenling Wu, Lei Zhang, Yafei Zheng
papers.abstract: Based on the method of the H-representation of the convex hull, the linear inequalities of all possible differential patterns of 4-bit S-boxes in the mix integer linear programming (MILP) model can be generated easily by the SAGE software. Whereas this method cannot be apply to 8-bit S-boxes. In this study, the authors propose a new method to obtain the inequalities for large S-boxes with the coefficients belonging to integer. The relationship between the coefficients of the inequalities and the corresponding excluded impossible differential patterns is obtained. As a result, the number of inequalities can be lower than 4000 for the AES S-box. Then, the new method for finding the best probability of the differential characteristics of 4–15 rounds SM4 in the single-key setting is presented. Especially, the authors found that the 15-round SM4 exists four differential characteristics with 12 active S-boxes. The exact lower bound of the number of differentially active S-boxes of the 16-round SM4 is 15. The authors also found eight differential characteristics of the 19-round SM4 with the probability 2 − 124 .
papers.abstract_zh: 基于凸包的H-表示方法，混合整数线性规划(MILP)模型中4位S盒的所有可能差分模式的线性不等式可以通过SAGE软件方便地生成。而这种方法不能应用于8位S盒。在本研究中，作者提出了一种新的方法来获得系数属于整数的大S盒的不等式。得到了不等式的系数与相应的排除不可能微分模式之间的关系。因此，对于AES S-box，不等式的数量可以低于4000。然后，提出了在单键设置下寻找4-15发SM4的微分特性的最佳概率的新方法。特别地，作者发现15轮SM4存在4个微分特征，有12个活跃的S盒。16轮SM4的差分活动S盒的数量的确切下限是15。作者还发现了概率为2124的19发SM4的八个微分特征。
papers.title_zh: 描述MILP大型S盒差分分布表的新方法及其应用

papers.title: Inline high-bandwidth network analysis using a robust stream clustering algorithm
papers.authors: Morteza Noferesti, Rasool Jalili
papers.abstract: High-bandwidth network analysis is challenging, resource consuming, and inaccurate due to the high volume, velocity, and variety characteristics of the network traffic. The infinite stream of incoming traffic forms a dynamic environment with unexpected changes, which requires analysing approaches to satisfy the high-bandwidth network processing challenges such as incremental learning, inline processing, and outlier handling. This study proposes an inline high-bandwidth network stream clustering algorithm designed to incrementally mine large amounts of continuously transmitting network traffic when some outliers can be dropped before determining the network traffic behaviour. Maintaining extended-meta-events as abstracting data structures over a sliding window, enriches the algorithm to address the high-bandwidth network processing challenges. Evaluating the algorithm indicates its robustness, efficiency, and accuracy in analysing high-bandwidth networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于网络流量的高容量、高速度和多样性特征，高带宽网络分析极具挑战性、消耗资源且不准确。无限的传入流量流形成了一个具有意外变化的动态环境，这需要分析方法来满足高带宽网络处理挑战，如增量学习、内联处理和异常值处理。本研究提出了一种在线高带宽网络流聚类算法，用于在确定网络流量行为之前，当一些异常值可以被丢弃时，增量挖掘大量连续传输的网络流量。维护扩展元事件作为滑动窗口上的抽象数据结构，丰富了解决高带宽网络处理挑战的算法。评估该算法表明其在分析高带宽网络中的鲁棒性、效率和准确性。
papers.title_zh: 使用鲁棒流聚类算法的在线高带宽网络分析

papers.title: Escrowed decryption protocols for lawful interception of encrypted data
papers.authors: David Nuñez, Isaac Agudo, Javier López
papers.abstract: Escrowed decryption schemes (EDSs) are public-key encryption schemes with an escrowed decryption functionality that allows authorities to decrypt encrypted messages under investigation, following a protocol that involves a set of trusted entities called `custodians'; only if custodians collaborate, the requesting authority is capable of decrypting encrypted data. This type of cryptosystem represents an interesting trade-off to privacy versus surveillance dichotomy. In this study, the authors propose two EDSs where they use proxy re-encryption to build the escrowed decryption capability, so that custodians re-encrypt ciphertexts, in a distributed way, upon request from an escrow authority, and the re-encrypted ciphertexts can be opened only by the escrow authority. Their first scheme, called EDS, follows an all-or-nothing approach, which means that escrow decryption only works when all custodians collaborate. Their second scheme, called threshold EDS, supports a threshold number of custodians for the escrow decryption operation. They propose definitions of semantic security with respect to the authorities, custodians and external entities, and prove the security of their schemes, under standard pairing-based hardness assumptions. Finally, they present a theoretical and experimental analysis of the performance of both schemes, which show that they are applicable to real-world scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 托管解密方案(EDSs)是一种公钥加密方案，具有托管解密功能，允许当局按照涉及一组被称为“保管人”的可信实体的协议，对被调查的加密消息进行解密；只有在保管人合作的情况下，请求机构才能够解密加密数据。这种类型的密码系统代表了隐私与监控二分法的一种有趣的折衷。在这项研究中，作者提出了两个EDSs，其中他们使用代理再加密来建立托管解密能力，以便托管人在托管机构请求时以分布式方式对密文进行再加密，并且再加密的密文只能由托管机构打开。他们的第一个方案称为EDS，遵循一种要么全有要么全无的方法，这意味着托管解密只有在所有托管人合作时才有效。他们的第二个方案，称为阈值EDS，支持托管解密操作的托管人的阈值数量。他们提出了关于权威机构、保管人和外部实体的语义安全定义，并在标准的基于配对的硬度假设下证明了他们方案的安全性。最后，对这两种方案的性能进行了理论和实验分析，结果表明它们适用于真实场景。
papers.title_zh: 合法截取加密数据的托管解密协议

papers.title: Sigma protocol for faster proof of simultaneous homomorphism relations
papers.authors: Bagher Bagherpour, Ali Zaghian, Mahdi Sajadieh
papers.abstract: The Σ -protocols for homomorphism relations are one of the cryptographic protocols which are used to prove knowledge of homomorphism relations. The Schnorr protocol is one of the most famous Σ -protocols used for proving knowledge of discrete logarithm (DL) relation in which the verifier essentially performs one double-exponentiation (i.e. a group computation of the form axby ). A direct application of the Schnorr protocol for proving simultaneous knowledge of n DLs with a common base leads to a Σ -protocol in which the verifier performs n double-exponentiations. In this study, the authors propose another Σ -protocol for homomorphism relations. The proposed Σ -protocol has fast verification when is used to prove the simultaneous homomorphism relations with a common homomorphism. Also, when the DL instantiation (DL-instantiation) of the proposed Σ -protocol is used to prove simultaneous knowledge of n DLs with a common base, it leads to a Σ -protocol in which the verifier performs n+1 single-exponentiations.
papers.abstract_zh: 同态关系的σ协议是用来证明同态关系知识的密码协议之一。Schnorr协议是用于证明离散对数(DL)关系知识的最著名的σ协议之一，其中验证者本质上执行一次双幂运算(即axby形式的分组计算)。Schnorr协议的一个直接应用是证明n个具有公共基的dl的同时知识，这导致了验证者执行n次双指数运算的σ协议。在这项研究中，作者提出了另一个同态关系的σ-协议。所提出的σ-协议在证明具有公共同态的同时同态关系时具有快速验证性。此外，当所提出的σ-协议的DL实例化(DL-instantiation)被用于证明n个DL具有公共基的同时知识时，它导致验证者执行n+1次单指数运算的σ-协议。
papers.title_zh: 快速证明同时同态关系的适马协议

papers.title: Research on highly non-linear plateaued functions
papers.authors: Tianfeng Sun, Bin Hu, Yang Yang
papers.abstract: Here, the authors correct the proof in the reference when explaining that the produced plateaued functions have no non-zero linear structures. Moreover, a new class of plateaued functions with the best algebraic degree is given.
papers.abstract_zh: 这里，作者在解释所产生的平台函数没有非零线性结构时，纠正了文献中的证明。此外，还给出了一类新的具有最佳代数次数的平台函数。
papers.title_zh: 高度非线性平台函数的研究

papers.title: Image-based CAPTCHAs based on neural style transfer
papers.authors: Zhouhang Cheng, Haichang Gao, Zhongyu Liu, Huaxi Wu, Yang Zi, Ge Pei
papers.abstract: Over the last few years, completely automated public turing test to tell computers and humans apart (CAPTCHA) has been used as an effective method to prevent websites from malicious attacks, however, CAPTCHA designers failed to reach a balance between good usability and high security. In this study, the authors apply neural style transfer to enhance the security for CAPTCHA design. Two image-based CAPTCHAs, Grid-CAPTCHA and Font-CAPTCHA, based on neural style transfer are proposed. Grid-CAPTCHA offers nine stylized images to users and requires users to select all corresponding images according to a short description, and Font-CAPTCHA asks users to click Chinese characters presented in the image in sequence according to the description. To evaluate the effectiveness of this techniques on enhancing CAPTCHA security, they conducted a comprehensive field study and compared them to similar mechanisms. The comparison results demonstrated that the neural style transfer decreased the success rate of automated attacks. Human beings have achieved a successful solving rate of 75.04 and 84.49% on the Grid-CAPTCHA and Font-CAPTCHA schemes, respectively, indicating good usability. The results prove deep learning can have a positive effect on enhancing CAPTCHA security and provides a promising direction for future CAPTCHA study.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年中，完全自动化的区分计算机和人类的公共图灵测试(CAPTCHA)被用作防止网站遭受恶意攻击的有效方法，然而，CAPTCHA设计者未能在良好的可用性和高安全性之间达成平衡。在这项研究中，作者应用神经类型转移来增强验证码设计的安全性。提出了两种基于图像的验证码，网格验证码和字体验证码。Grid-CAPTCHA向用户提供九种风格化的图像，并要求用户根据简短的描述选择所有相应的图像，Font-CAPTCHA要求用户根据描述依次点击图像中呈现的汉字。为了评估这种技术在增强CAPTCHA安全性方面的有效性，他们进行了全面的现场研究，并将它们与类似的机制进行了比较。对比结果表明，神经类型迁移降低了自动攻击的成功率。人类在Grid-CAPTCHA和Font-CAPTCHA方案上分别获得了75.04%和84.49%的成功求解率，表明了良好的可用性。实验结果证明，深度学习对提高验证码的安全性有积极的作用，为未来的验证码研究提供了一个有希望的方向。
papers.title_zh: 基于神经风格转移的图像验证码

papers.title: Fair and private rewarding in a coalitional game of cybersecurity information sharing
papers.authors: Iman Vakilinia, Shamik Sengupta
papers.abstract:
Cybersecurity information sharing is a key factor of cyber threat intelligence, allowing organisations to detect and prevent malicious behaviours proactively. However, stimulating organisations to participate and deterring free-riding in such sharing is a big challenge. To this end, the sharing system should be equipped with a rewarding and participation-fees allocation mechanisms to encourage sharing behaviour. The problem of cybersecurity information sharing as a non-cooperative game has been studied extensively. In contrast, in this study, the authors model such a problem as a coalitional game. They investigate a rewarding and participation-fees calculation based on profit sharing in coalitional game theory. In particular, they formulate a coalitional game between organisations and analyse the well-known Shapley value
 and Nucleolus
 solution concepts in the cybersecurity information sharing system. Moreover, as the participation-fees may leak sensitive information about the organisations' cyber-infrastructure, they study the application of differential privacy in the coalitional game theory to protect the organisation's fees while approximating the fairness.
papers.abstract_zh:
网络安全信息共享是网络威胁情报的一个关键因素，使组织能够主动检测和防止恶意行为。然而，激励组织参与并阻止这种分享中的搭便车行为是一个巨大的挑战。为此，共享系统应配备奖励和参与费分配机制，以鼓励共享行为。作为非合作博弈的网络安全信息共享问题已经被广泛研究。相反，在这项研究中，作者将这样的问题建模为联盟博弈。他们研究了基于联盟博弈论中利润分享的奖励和参与费计算。特别是，他们制定了一个组织之间的联盟游戏，并分析了众所周知的沙普利值
和核仁
网络安全信息共享系统的解决方案概念。此外，由于参与费可能会泄露有关组织网络基础设施的敏感信息，他们研究了在联盟博弈论中差分隐私的应用，以保护组织的费用，同时接近公平。
papers.title_zh: 网络安全信息共享联盟博弈中的公平和私人回报

papers.title: Dynamical model for individual defence against cyber epidemic attacks
papers.authors: Dingyu Yan, Feng Liu, Yaqin Zhang, Kun Jia
papers.abstract: When facing the on-going cyber epidemic threats, individuals usually set up cyber defences to protect their own devices. In general, the individual-level cyber defence is considered to mitigate the cyber threat to some extent. However, few previous studies focus on the interaction between individual-level defence and cyber epidemic attack from the perspective of dynamics. In this study, the authors propose a two-way dynamical framework by coupling the individual defence model with the cyber epidemic model to study the interaction between the network security situation and individual-level defence decision. A new individual-based heterogeneous model for cyber epidemic attacks is established to emphasise the individual heterogeneity in defence strategy. In the meanwhile, a Markov decision process is used to characterise the defence decision in the individual defence decision model. The theoretical and numerical results illustrate that the individual-level defence can dampen the cyber epidemic attack, but the current network security situation, in turn, influences the individual defence decision. Moreover, they obtain a glimpse of the network security situation and the individual defence with respect to different cyber epidemic scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 当面临持续的网络流行病威胁时，个人通常会建立网络防御来保护自己的设备。一般来说，个人层面的网络防御被认为在一定程度上缓解了网络威胁。然而，以往的研究很少从动力学的角度关注个体层面的防御与网络流行病攻击之间的相互作用。在本研究中，作者通过将个体防御模型与网络流行病模型相耦合，提出了一个双向动力学框架来研究网络安全形势与个体防御决策之间的相互作用。建立了一个新的基于个体的异质网络流行病攻击模型，以强调防御策略的个体异质性。同时，马尔可夫决策过程被用来描述个体防御决策模型中的防御决策。理论和数值结果表明，个体层次的防御可以抑制网络流行性攻击，但当前的网络安全状况反过来影响个体的防御决策。此外，他们还可以了解网络安全状况，以及针对不同网络流行情况的个人防御措施。
papers.title_zh: 网络流行病攻击的个体防御动态模型

papers.title: Advanced encryption standard based on key dependent S-Box cube
papers.authors: Athmane Seghier, Jianxin Li, Dazhi Sun
papers.abstract: The advanced encryption standard (AES) is the most encryption algorithm used around the world. This fact made it coveted by several cryptanalysis attacks. Some of them succeed to reveal certain weakness, due to its static parameters known by the public mass. The substitution box (S-Box) is among the most sensitive parameters of this standard, which plays a crucial role in the protection against these attacks. In this study, a new version of AES is introduced, which uses a set of AES-like S-Boxes instead of the original one. These S-Boxes, generated from different irreducible polynomials, are dynamically chosen, depending on the encryption key. This introduction is conducted by the design and the implementation of a new block cipher version of AES, based on a key dependent S-Box cube. Where a cube of six interchangeable S-Boxes key-dependently generated is constructed. This cube determines the active S-Box for a given round, through its random rotations guided by the round key. Furthermore, the improvement of the cryptographic robustness, provided by this method is demonstrated. This is accomplished through a comparison with the original AES, in terms of statistical and cryptographic randomness properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级加密标准(AES)是全世界使用最多的加密算法。这个事实使得它被几次密码分析攻击所觊觎。其中一些成功地揭示了某些弱点，因为它的静态参数为公众所知。替换盒(S-Box)是该标准中最敏感的参数之一，在防止这些攻击中起着至关重要的作用。在这项研究中，介绍了一个新版本的AES，它使用了一组类似AES的S盒，而不是原来的S盒。这些由不同的不可约多项式生成的S盒是根据加密密钥动态选择的。该介绍是通过设计和实现基于密钥相关的S-Box立方体的AES的新分组密码版本来进行的。其中构建了由六个可互换的S盒组成的立方体，这些S盒是根据密钥生成的。该立方体通过由轮密钥引导的随机旋转来确定给定轮次的活动S-Box。此外，证明了由该方法提供的密码鲁棒性的改进。这是通过在统计和密码随机性方面与原始AES进行比较来实现的。
papers.title_zh: 基于密钥相关S-Box立方体的高级加密标准

papers.title: Guess and determine cryptanalysis with variable sampling and its applications
papers.authors: Samir Hodzic, Enes Pasalic, Yongzhuang Wei
papers.abstract: Non-linear filtering generators, as a well-known family of stream ciphers, employ a filtering function F : GF ( 2 ) n → GF ( 2 ) m to process the secret state bits and thus outputs binary keystream blocks of length m. In this study, the authors extend the framework of a generic cryptanalytic method applicable to non-linear filtering generators called generalised filter state guessing attacks (GFSGA), introduced as a generalisation of the filter state guessing attack method, by applying a variable sampling of the keystream bits in order to retrieve as much information about the secret state bits as possible. Two different modes that use a variable sampling of keystream blocks are presented and it is shown that in many cases these modes may outperform the standard GFSGA mode. They also demonstrate the possibility of employing GFSGA-like attacks to other design strategies such as non-linear feedback shift register-based ciphers (Grain family for instance). It is also indicated that the tap positions of Grain-128 are not chosen optimally with respect to this generic cryptanalytic method and provide a better selection of taps that gives higher resistance to GFSGA-like attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 非线性过滤生成器，作为一个众所周知的流密码家族，使用过滤函数F : GF ( 2 ) n → GF ( 2 ) m来处理秘密状态位，从而输出长度为m的二进制密钥流分组。在本研究中，作者扩展了适用于非线性过滤生成器的一般密码分析方法的框架，该方法被称为广义过滤状态猜测攻击(GFSGA ),作为过滤状态猜测攻击方法的推广而引入。 通过应用密钥流比特的可变采样，以便尽可能多地检索关于秘密状态比特的信息。 提出了使用密钥流分组的可变采样的两种不同模式，并且表明在许多情况下这些模式可能优于标准GFSGA模式。他们还展示了将类似GFSGA的攻击应用于其他设计策略的可能性，例如基于非线性反馈移位寄存器的密码(例如Grain家族)。还指出，相对于这种一般的密码分析方法，没有最优地选择Grain-128的抽头位置，并且提供了对GFSGA类攻击具有更高抵抗力的更好的抽头选择。
papers.title_zh: 可变抽样猜测和判定密码分析及其应用

papers.title: Transforming malicious code to ROP gadgets for antivirus evasion
papers.authors: Christoforos Ntantogian, Georgios Poulios, Georgios Karopoulos, Christos Xenakis
papers.abstract: This study advances research in offensive technology by proposing return oriented programming (ROP) as a means to achieve code obfuscation. The key inspiration is that ROP's unique structure poses various challenges to malware analysis compared to traditional shellcode inspection and detection. The proposed ROP-based attack vector provides two unique features: (i) the ability to automatically analyse and generate equivalent ROP chains for a given code, and (ii) the ability to reuse legitimate code found in an executable in the form of ROP gadgets. To this end, a software tool named ROPInjector was developed which, given any piece of shellcode and any legitimate executable file, it transforms the shellcode to its ROP equivalent re-using the available code in the executable and finally patches the ROP chain infecting the executable. After trying various combinations of evasion techniques, the results show that ROPInjector can evade nearly and completely all antivirus software employed in the online VirusTotal service, making ROP an effective ingredient for code obfuscation. This attack vector poses a serious threat which malicious actors can take advantage to perform cyber-attack campaigns.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项研究通过提出面向返回的编程(ROP)作为实现代码混淆的手段，推进了攻击性技术的研究。与传统的外壳代码检查和检测相比，ROP的独特结构给恶意软件分析带来了各种挑战。所提出的基于ROP的攻击向量提供了两个独特的特征:(I)自动分析和生成给定代码的等效ROP链的能力，以及(ii)以ROP小工具的形式重用在可执行文件中找到的合法代码的能力。为此，开发了一个名为ROPInjector的软件工具，给定任何一段外壳代码和任何合法的可执行文件，它将外壳代码转换为其ROP等价物，重新使用可执行文件中的可用代码，并最终修补感染可执行文件的ROP链。在尝试了各种规避技术的组合后，结果表明ROPInjector可以规避在线VirusTotal服务中使用的几乎所有反病毒软件，使ROP成为代码混淆的有效成分。这种攻击媒介造成了严重的威胁，恶意行为者可以利用它来执行网络攻击活动。
papers.title_zh: 将恶意代码转换为ROP小工具以规避防病毒

papers.title: Witness indistinguishability and witness hiding against quantum attacks
papers.authors: Huiqin Xie, Li Yang
papers.abstract:
The development of quantum computers has urged the cryptographic community to prepare cryptographic primitives for the eventual arrival of the post-quantum world. To this end, the authors study the witness indistinguishability (WI) and witness hiding (WH) of proof systems against quantum adversaries. They give formal definitions of quantum WI (QWI) and quantum WH (QWH), present proof systems satisfying these definitions, and specify a condition under which QWI implies QWH. Regarding the non-interactive proof systems, they prove that, even if a common reference string is used to generate polynomially many non-interactive proofs, the QWI is still preserved, while quantum zero-knowledge has no such beneficial property. To show the strength of QWI, they present two applications of them. First, they prove that the construction proposed by Feige et al.
 that transforms any non-interactive bounded zero-knowledge proof system to a general one is also feasible against quantum adversaries. Second, they construct a quantum-secure signature scheme in the CRS model, which is existentially unforgeable against quantum adversaries and remains secure even if a common random string is used to sign polynomially many messages.
papers.abstract_zh:
量子计算机的发展促使密码学界为后量子世界的最终到来准备密码原语。为此，作者研究了对抗量子敌手的证明系统的证人不可区分性和证人隐藏性。他们给出了量子WI (QWI)和量子WH (QWH)的形式定义，给出了满足这些定义的证明系统，并指定了QWI隐含QWH的条件。关于非交互证明系统，他们证明了，即使一个公共的参考串被用来生成多项式多个非交互证明，QWI仍然保持，而量子零知识没有这种有益的性质。为了显示QWI的实力，他们提出了其中的两个应用。首先，他们证明了格非等人提出的结构。
将任何非交互的有界零知识证明系统转化为一个通用的系统，在对抗量子对手时也是可行的。其次，他们在CRS模型中构造了一个量子安全的签名方案，该方案对量子敌手是存在不可伪造的，并且即使使用一个普通的随机字符串来签署多项式数目的消息也是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 抗量子攻击的证人不可区分性和证人隐藏

papers.title: Distinguisher and non-randomness of Grain-v1 for 112, 114 and 116 initialisation rounds with multiple-bit difference in IVs
papers.authors: Deepak Kumar Dalai, Subhamoy Maitra, Santu Pal, Dibyendu Roy
papers.abstract:
In this study, the authors construct two different distinguishers on Grain-v1 with 112 and 114 initialisation rounds. Their first distinguisher can distinguish Grain-v1 with 112 initialisation rounds from a uniform random source for 99% of the randomly chosen keys from full key space. The second one can distinguish Grain-v1 from a random source for 73% of the randomly chosen keys for one-fourth of the total key space (2
 78
 keys out of 2
 80
 keys). Our results improve upon the earlier distinguishers. The technique used for the distinguishers is conditional differential cryptanalysis. The existing works in this direction considered only one bit difference in the initialisation vector. However, for the first time, they could handle complicated conditions for the 2-bit difference to obtain better cryptanalytic results. Extending their technique by allowing the 1-bit difference in the pair of keys (i.e. related keys) and the 4-bit difference in IVs, they could observe the non-randomness till 116 initialisation rounds with a success in 62% cases.

papers.authors: SrinivasaRao SubramanyaRao, Zhi Hu, Chang-An Zhao
papers.abstract: Here, the authors provide a derivation of an improvement to Kanayama's elliptic curve scalar multiplication algorithm using division polynomials. In addition, they also provide experimental results and show that the improvement is useful when the elliptic curve under consideration is defined over large prime fields.
papers.abstract_zh: 这里，作者提供了使用除法多项式对Kanayama的椭圆曲线标量乘法算法的改进的推导。此外，他们还提供了实验结果，并表明当所考虑的椭圆曲线定义在大的素数域上时，这种改进是有用的。

papers.title: Fully homomorphic encryption based on the ring learning with rounding problem
papers.authors: Fucai Luo, Fuqun Wang, Kunpeng Wang, Kefei Chen
papers.abstract: Almost all existing well-known fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) schemes, which are based on either the learning with errors (LWE) or the ring LWE problem, require expensive Gaussian noise sampling. In this study, the authors propose an FHE scheme based on the ring learning with rounding (RLWR) problem. The learning with rounding (LWR) problem was proposed as a deterministic variant of LWE, while the RLWR is a variant of LWR. Sampling an LWR instance does not require Gaussian noise sampling process, and neither does an RLWR instance. Thus, our FHE scheme can be instantiated without the need for Gaussian noise sampling. To implement homomorphic operations, we devise a specific relinearisation method. Furthermore, we also prove that our RLWR-based FHE scheme is IND-CPA secure under RLWR assumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 几乎所有现有的众所周知的全同态加密(FHE)方案都需要昂贵的高斯噪声采样，这些方案要么基于带误差学习(LWE)，要么基于环LWE问题。在本研究中，作者提出了一个基于带舍入的环学习(RLWR)问题的FHE方案。舍入学习(LWR)问题是作为LWE的确定性变体提出的，而RLWR是LWR的变体。采样LWR实例不需要高斯噪声采样过程，RLWR实例也不需要。因此，我们的FHE方案可以被实例化，而不需要高斯噪声采样。为了实现同态运算，我们设计了一种特殊的重新线性化方法。此外，我们还证明了基于RLWR的FHE方案在RLWR假设下是IND-CPA安全的。
papers.title_zh: 基于带舍入问题的环学习的全同态加密

papers.title: Enhanced secure data backup scheme using multi-factor authentication
papers.authors: Huidan Hu, Changlu Lin, Chin-Chen Chang, Lanxiang Chen
papers.abstract:
Remote data backup technology facilitates data storage for users. However, an attacker may intercept some sensitive data on transfer. To solve this problem, sensitive data should be encrypted before uploading to the remote storage. Thus, protecting the secret encryption key is very important. Liu et al.
 have designed a scheme to protect the secret key using the secret-sharing method and multi-factor authentication. Unfortunately, the authors find some security weaknesses of Liu et al.
's scheme. Liu et al.
's scheme cannot resist offline password guessing attack, the server impersonation attack, the user impersonation attack and an attacker updating password/biometrics attack. They present an enhanced secure data backup scheme using multi-factor authentication to overcome all above-mentioned security threats. The user first divided a secret used to encrypt sensitive data into three shares using Shamir's secret sharing. Moreover, then the user uses the own password and biometrics to hide the true shares, and stores the pseudo three shares in the smart card, the laptop and the server, separately. Furthermore, the proposed scheme is illustrated in detail, and they give a security comparison of their scheme with Liu et al.
's scheme and computational costs.
papers.abstract_zh:
远程数据备份技术方便了用户的数据存储。但是，攻击者可能会在传输过程中截获一些敏感数据。要解决这个问题，敏感数据在上传到远程存储之前应该加密。因此，保护秘密加密密钥非常重要。刘等。
设计了一个使用秘密共享方法和多因素认证来保护密钥的方案。不幸的是，作者发现了刘等人的一些安全弱点。

papers.title: Hybrid intelligent phishing website prediction using deep neural networks with genetic algorithm-based feature selection and weighting
papers.authors: Waleed Ali, Adel Ali Ahmed
papers.abstract: In recent years, the web phishing attack has become one of the most serious web security problems, in which the phishers can steal significant financial information about the internet users to carry out financial thefts. Several blacklist-based conventional phishing website detection methods are used to predict the phishing websites. However, numerous phishing websites are not predicted precisely by these blacklist-based conventional methods since many new phishing websites are constantly developed and launched on the Web over time. In this study, hybrid intelligent phishing website prediction using deep neural networks (DNNs) with evolutionary algorithm-based feature selection and weighting methods are suggested to enhance the phishing website prediction. In the proposed hybrid intelligent phishing website prediction approaches, the most influential features and the optimal weights of website features are heuristically identified with the genetic algorithm (GA) to help in increasing the accuracy of phishing website prediction. Accordingly, the website features selected and weighted by the GA are utilised to train DNNs to accurately predict the phishing websites. The experimental results demonstrated that the proposed hybrid intelligent phishing website prediction approaches achieved significantly higher classification accuracy, sensitivity, specificity, and geometric mean in phishing website prediction compared to those proposed in other studies.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，网络钓鱼攻击已经成为最严重的网络安全问题之一，网络钓鱼者可以窃取互联网用户的重要金融信息来实施金融盗窃。几种基于黑名单的传统钓鱼网站检测方法用于预测钓鱼网站。然而，由于随着时间的推移，许多新的网络钓鱼网站不断被开发并在Web上推出，因此这些基于黑名单的传统方法无法精确预测大量的网络钓鱼网站。在本研究中，建议使用深度神经网络(DNNs)与基于进化算法的特征选择和加权方法的混合智能钓鱼网站预测来增强钓鱼网站预测。在所提出的混合智能钓鱼网站预测方法中，利用遗传算法(GA)启发式地识别最有影响力的特征和网站特征的最优权重，以帮助提高钓鱼网站预测的准确性。因此，由GA选择和加权的网站特征被用来训练dnn以准确预测网络钓鱼网站。实验结果表明，与其他研究中提出的方法相比，提出的混合智能钓鱼网站预测方法在钓鱼网站预测中实现了显著更高的分类准确度、灵敏度、特异性和几何均值。
papers.title_zh: 基于遗传算法特征选择和加权的深度神经网络混合智能钓鱼网站预测

papers.title: Leakage-resilient lattice-based partially blind signatures
papers.authors: Dimitrios Papachristoudis, Dimitrios Hristu-Varsakelis, Foteini Baldimtsi, George Stephanides
papers.abstract: Blind signature schemes (BSS) play a pivotal role in privacy-oriented cryptography. However, with BSS, the signed message remains unintelligible to the signer, giving them no guarantee that the blinded message he signed actually contained valid information. Partially BSS (PBSS) were introduced to address precisely this problem. In this study, the authors present the first leakage-resilient, lattice-based PBSS in the literature. The proposed construction is provably secure in the random oracle model and offers quasi-linear complexity w.r.t. key/signature sizes and signing speed. In addition, it offers statistical partial blindness and its unforgeability is based on the computational hardness of worst-case ideal lattice problems for approximation factors in O ~ ( n 4 ) in dimension n. The proposed scheme benefits from the subexponential hardness of ideal lattice problems and remains secure even if a ( 1 − o ( 1 ) ) fraction of the signer's secret key leaks to an adversary via arbitrary side-channels. Several extensions of the security model, such as honest-user unforgeability and selective failure blindness, are also considered and concrete parameters for instantiation are proposed.
papers.abstract_zh: 盲签名方案在面向隐私的密码学中起着关键的作用。然而，使用BSS，签名的消息对签名者来说仍然是不可理解的，不能保证他签名的隐蔽消息实际上包含有效信息。引入部分BSS (PBSS)正是为了解决这个问题。在这项研究中，作者提出了文献中第一个泄漏弹性，基于晶格的PBSS。所提出的构造在随机预言模型中是可证明安全的，并且提供了关于密钥/签名大小和签名速度的准线性复杂度。此外，它还提供了统计上的部分盲性，并且它的不可伪造性是基于最坏情况下的理想格问题在n维O ~ n ^ 4中近似因子的计算困难性。所提出的方案受益于理想格问题的次指数困难性，即使签名者的秘密密钥的(1o(1))部分通过任意的侧信道泄漏给敌手，它仍然是安全的。还考虑了安全模型的几个扩展，如诚实用户不可伪造性和选择性失效盲目性，并提出了实例化的具体参数。
papers.title_zh: 泄漏弹性的基于格的部分盲签名

papers.title: Revisiting BGG+14 ABE with weakness analysis
papers.authors: Yupu Hu, Shanshan Zhang, Jiangshan Chen, Baocang Wang
papers.abstract: Attribute-based encryption (ABE) supports fine-grained sharing of encrypted data so that it can be used in a plenty of application scenarios, and many constructions of ABE scheme have been presented. The first arithmetic circuit ABE system was proposed by Boneh, Gentry, Gorbunov et al. (BGG+14) in Eurocrypt 2014. It is one of the major candidates for ABE, whose security is based on the learning with errors assumption. In this work, the authors analyse three different versions of BGG+14 ABE with weak attributes, weak variants, and weak modulus. First, they discuss weak attributes of BGG+14 ABE. A weak attribute is generated with corresponding decryption key, such that whenever a ciphertext is labelled with this weak attribute, 1 bit of the plaintext can be revealed. Second, they discuss the security of three variants of BGG+14 ABE with simplified pre-sampled matrices, and show that all of them are not secure under collusion attack. Third, they consider the composite modulus rather than prime modulus in BGG+14 ABE scheme. They show that, if a small factor of the modulus is known, the set of users able to decrypt is clearly expanded. These analyses give different perspectives on the security of BGG+14 ABE under different conditions.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的加密(ABE)支持加密数据的细粒度共享，因此可以在很多应用场景中使用，并且已经提出了许多ABE方案的构造。第一个算术电路ABE系统是由Boneh，Gentry，Gorbunov等人(BGG+14)在Eurocrypt 2014中提出的。这是安倍的主要候选人之一，其安全是基于有错误的学习假设。在这项工作中，作者分析了三个不同版本的BGG+14 ABE弱属性，弱变体和弱模数。首先，他们讨论了BGG+14安倍的弱点。用相应的解密密钥生成一个弱属性，这样，无论何时用该弱属性标记密文，都可以泄露1位明文。其次，他们用简化的预采样矩阵讨论了BGG+14 ABE的三种变体的安全性，并证明了它们在共谋攻击下都是不安全的。第三，他们在BGG+14 ABE方案中考虑了复合模而不是质数模。他们表明，如果模数的一个小因子是已知的，能够解密的用户的集合显然是扩大的。这些分析对BGG+14安倍在不同条件下的安全性给出了不同的视角。
papers.title_zh: 用弱点分析重新审视BGG+14安倍

papers.title: Charge balancing symmetric pre-resolve adiabatic logic against power analysis attacks
papers.authors: Prathiba Ashok, Kanchana Bhaaskaran Vettuvanam Somasundaram
papers.abstract: A novel, energy efficient and power analysis robust logic style called the charge balancing symmetric pre-resolve adiabatic logic (CBSPAL) is proposed to overcome the susceptibility of cryptosystems against side channel power analysis attacks. It employs differential cascode logic tree structure with a pre-resolving feature, which realises improved energy efficiency by minimising non-adiabatic loss and leakage current. The energy efficiency of the proposed logic against static complementary metal oxide semiconductor (CMOS) and other existing secure adiabatic logic styles is proved. Energy deviation for the different input transitions of the individual logic gates, namely, buffer/NOT, AND/NAND and XOR/XNOR is found to be very minimal and it validates the immunity of the proposed logic against power analysis attacks. SPICE simulation of 4-bit add-round structure implementation using CBSPAL shows an energy saving of 89.5% compared to static CMOS implementation at a frequency of 125 MHz. Security of the proposed logic against the side channel power analysis attack is demonstrated by performing the correlation power analysis attacks as applicable for the SPICE simulations. Exhaustive SPICE simulations have been performed using the 32 nm CMOS predictive technology model libraries.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了克服密码系统对旁路功耗分析攻击的敏感性，提出了一种新的高效节能的功耗分析逻辑——电荷平衡对称预解析绝热逻辑。它采用具有预解析功能的差分共源共栅逻辑树结构，通过最小化非绝热损耗和泄漏电流来提高能效。证明了所提出的逻辑相对于静态互补金属氧化物半导体(CMOS)和其他现有安全绝热逻辑类型的能量效率。发现各个逻辑门(即，缓冲/非、与非和异或/XNOR)的不同输入转换的能量偏差非常小，并且它验证了所提出的逻辑对功耗分析攻击的免疫性。使用CBSPAL的4位加轮结构实现的SPICE仿真显示，在125 MHz的频率下，与静态CMOS实现相比，节能89.5%。通过执行适用于SPICE仿真的相关功率分析攻击，证明了所提出的逻辑对旁道功率分析攻击的安全性。使用32纳米CMOS预测技术模型库进行了详尽的SPICE模拟。
papers.title_zh: 抵抗功耗分析攻击的电荷平衡对称预解析绝热逻辑

papers.title: Dynamic asymmetric group key agreement protocol with traitor traceability
papers.authors: Jikai Teng, Hongyang Ma
papers.abstract: In asymmetric group key agreement (ASGKA) protocols, a group of users establish a common encryption key which is publicly accessible and compute pairwise different decryption keys. It is left as an open problem to design an ASGKA protocol with traitor traceability in Eurocrypt 2009. A one-round dynamic authenticated ASGKA protocol with public traitor traceability is proposed in this study. It provides a black-box tracing algorithm. Ind-CPA security with key compromise impersonation resilience (KCIR) and forward secrecy of ASGKA protocols is formally defined. The proposed protocol is proved to be Ind-CPA secure with KCIR and forward secrecy under D k-HDHE assumption. It is also proved that the proposed protocol resists collusion attack. In Setup algorithm and Join algorithm, one communication round is required. In Leave algorithm, no message is required to be transmitted. The proposed protocol adopts O ( log ⁡ N ) -way asymmetric multilinear map to make the size of public key and the size of ciphertext both achieve O ( log ⁡ N ) , where N is the number of potential group members. This is the first ASGKA protocol with public traitor traceability which is more efficient than trivial construction of ASGKA protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 在非对称组密钥协商(ASGKA)协议中，一组用户建立可公开访问的公共加密密钥，并计算成对不同的解密密钥。在Eurocrypt 2009中设计一个具有叛逆者可追踪性的ASGKA协议是一个公开的问题。本文提出了一个具有公开叛逆者可追踪性的单轮动态认证ASGKA协议。它提供了一个黑盒跟踪算法。形式化定义了具有密钥泄露伪装弹性(KCIR)和ASGKA协议前向保密性的Ind-CPA安全性。在D . k-HDHE假设下，证明了该协议在KCIR下是Ind-CPA安全的，并具有前向安全性。还证明了该协议能够抵抗共谋攻击。在设置算法和加入算法中，需要一轮通信。在Leave算法中，不需要传输任何消息。该协议采用o(对数⁡ N)路非对称多线性映射，使得公钥长度和密文长度都达到o(对数⁡ N)，其中n是潜在群成员的数量。这是第一个具有公开叛逆者可追踪性的ASGKA协议，比简单的ASGKA协议构造更有效。
papers.title_zh: 叛逆者可追踪的动态非对称组密钥协商协议

papers.title: Secret key establishment technique using channel state information driven phase randomisation in multiple-input multiple-output orthogonal frequency division multiplexing
papers.authors: Hasan Taha, Emad Alsusa
papers.abstract: In wireless communication systems, the conventional secret key exchange is based on the public key cryptography, which requires complex computations to retain the secrecy level of these key bits. The proposed physical layer-based algorithms have shown promising performance to extract secret keys from the privately shared randomness relying on the reciprocal channel state between both communicated nodes. In this study, the authors propose a physical layer key exchange method which transmits the key bits by encoding them within some phase randomisation (PR) sequences that are privately indexed to a specific channel criterion. The PR sequences only randomise the data phases and thus no efficiency reduction will be incurred. In fact, by choosing a pool of randomisation sequences with certain statistical properties, they could also be used to condition the signal to meet physical layer transmission requirements such as bandwidth, envelope and so on. They quantify the potential of the proposed method by demonstrating it within the context of a multiple-input multiple-output orthogonal frequency division multiplexing system. The results reveal that, relative to existing techniques, the proposed method offers superior key error rate performance at lower computational complexity with better secrecy level.
papers.abstract_zh: 在无线通信系统中，传统的密钥交换是基于公钥密码学的，这需要复杂的计算来保持这些密钥位的保密级别。所提出的基于物理层的算法已经显示出从私有共享的随机性中提取密钥的有希望的性能，这依赖于两个通信节点之间的倒易信道状态。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种物理层密钥交换方法，该方法通过将密钥比特编码在一些相位随机化(PR)序列中来传输它们，这些序列被秘密地索引到特定的信道标准。PR序列仅随机化数据相位，因此不会导致效率降低。事实上，通过选择具有某些统计特性的随机序列池，它们还可以用于调节信号，以满足物理层传输要求，如带宽、包络等。他们通过在多输入多输出正交频分复用系统的环境中进行演示来量化所提出的方法的潜力。结果表明，相对于现有技术，所提出的方法在较低的计算复杂度和较好的保密级别下提供了优越的密钥错误率性能。
papers.title_zh: 多输入多输出正交频分复用中使用信道状态信息驱动的相位随机化的密钥建立技术

papers.title: Back-propagation neural network on Markov chains from system call sequences: a new approach for detecting Android malware with system call sequences
papers.authors: Xi Xiao, Zhenlong Wang, Qing Li, Shu-Tao Xia, Yong Jiang
papers.abstract:
Android has become the most prevalent mobile system, but in the meanwhile malware on this platform is widespread. System call sequences are studied to detect malware. However, malware detection with these approaches relies on common system-call-subsequences. It is not so efficient because it is difficult to decide the appropriate length of the common subsequences. To address this issue, the authors propose a new approach, back-propagation neural network on Markov chains from system call sequences (BMSCS). It treats one system call sequence as a homogeneous stationary Markov chain and applies back-propagation neural network (BPNN) to detect malware by comparing transition probabilities in the chain. Since transition probabilities from one system call to another in malware are significantly different from those in benign applications, BMSCS can efficiently detect malware by capturing the anomaly in state transitions with the help of BPNN. The authors evaluate the performance of BMSCS by experiments with real application samples. The experiment results show that the F 
-score of BMSCS achieves up to 0.982773, which is higher than the other methods in the literature.
papers.abstract_zh:
Android已经成为最流行的移动系统，但同时这个平台上的恶意软件也很普遍。研究系统调用序列来检测恶意软件。然而，这些方法的恶意软件检测依赖于公共的系统调用子序列。它不是很有效，因为很难决定公共子序列的适当长度。为了解决这个问题，作者提出了一种新的方法，基于系统调用序列的马尔可夫链的反向传播神经网络。它将一个系统调用序列视为齐次平稳马尔可夫链，并应用反向传播神经网络(BPNN)通过比较链中的转移概率来检测恶意软件。由于恶意软件中从一个系统调用到另一个系统调用的转移概率与良性应用程序中的转移概率显著不同，BMSCS可以通过在BPNN的帮助下捕获状态转移中的异常来有效地检测恶意软件。作者通过实际应用样本的实验来评估BMSCS的性能。实验结果表明，F
BMSCS的得分高达0.982773，高于文献中的其他方法。
papers.title_zh: 基于系统调用序列马尔可夫链的反向传播神经网络:一种利用系统调用序列检测Android恶意软件的新方法

papers.title: Public-key infrastructure validation and revocation mechanism suitable for delay/disruption tolerant networks
papers.authors: Muhammad Nasir Mumtaz Bhutta, Haitham S. Cruickshank, Zhili Sun
papers.abstract: Public-key infrastructure (PKI) is based on public-key certificates and is the most widely used mechanism for trust and key management. However, standard PKI validation and revocation mechanisms are considered major reasons for its unsuitability for delay/disruption tolerant networking (DTN). DTN requires mechanism to authenticate messages at each node before forwarding it in the network. So, certificate revocation lists (CRLs) being distributed in DTN network will need to be authenticated and validated for issuer certificate authority (CA) at each node. In this study, the authors propose new validation and revocation mechanism which is compliant with DTN semantics and protocols. This study also proposes a new design for CRL in compliance with standard PKI X.509 standard to make the proposed mechanism easy to implement for DTN. The new designed CRL is of reduced size as it contains fewer entries as compared with standard X.509 CRL and also arranges the revocation list in the form of hash table (map) to increase the searching efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 公钥基础设施(PKI)基于公钥证书，是最广泛使用的信任和密钥管理机制。然而，标准的公钥基础设施验证和撤销机制被认为是其不适合延迟/中断容忍网络的主要原因(DTN)。DTN要求在网络中转发消息之前在每个节点验证消息的机制。因此，在DTN网络中分发的证书撤销列表(CRL)需要在每个节点上由发行者证书授权机构(CA)进行认证和验证。在本研究中，作者提出了新的符合DTN语义和协议的验证和撤销机制。该研究还提出了一种符合标准PKI X.509标准的CRL的新设计，使得所提出的机制易于在DTN实现。新设计的CRL具有减小的尺寸，因为与标准X.509 CRL相比，它包含更少的条目，并且还以散列表(map)的形式排列撤销列表以提高搜索效率。
papers.title_zh: 适用于延迟/中断容忍网络的公钥基础设施验证和撤销机制

papers.title: Signature-policy attribute-based key-insulated signature
papers.authors: Y. Sreenivasa Rao
papers.abstract: Attribute-based signature (ABS) schemes play a vital role to accomplish authentication and signer privacy simultaneously. In recent years, cryptographic primitives are deployed on insecure devices such as mobile devices; thereby, secret key exposure seems inevitable. To alleviate the impact of key exposure in ABS scenarios, the authors apply the method of key insulation to ABS and construct the first signature-policy attribute-based key-insulated signature (ABKIS) scheme. The proposed construction supports expressive monotone Boolean functions as signing predicates and preserves signer privacy. Their ABKIS scheme is key-insulated and strong key-insulated secure under computational Diffie–Hellman exponent assumption. To the best of their knowledge, the proposed ABKIS is the first ABS scheme in signature-policy flavour dealing with key exposure problems employing key-insulation mechanism.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的签名方案在同时实现认证和签名者隐私方面起着至关重要的作用。近年来，密码原语部署在移动设备等不安全设备上；因此，密钥泄露似乎是不可避免的。为了减轻ABS方案中密钥泄露的影响，作者将密钥隔离方法应用于ABS，构造了第一个基于签名策略属性的密钥隔离签名方案。所提出的构造支持表达性单调布尔函数作为签名谓词，并保护签名者隐私。他们的ABKIS方案在计算Diffie-Hellman指数假设下是密钥隔离和强密钥隔离安全的。据他们所知，提出的ABKIS是第一个签名策略风格的ABS方案，采用密钥隔离机制处理密钥暴露问题。
papers.title_zh: 基于签名策略属性的密钥隔离签名

papers.title: Sparse subset sum problem from Gentry-Halevi's fully homomorphic encryption
papers.authors: Moon Sung Lee
papers.abstract: In Gentry's fully homomorphic encryption scheme, a sparse subset sum problem (SSSP) is used and a big set is included in the public key. In the implementation of a variant, to reduce the size of the public key, Gentry and Halevi used a specific form of a SSSP constructed from geometric progressions. In this study, the authors solve Gentry and Halevi's sparse subset sum challenges for the first time. Owing to the aggressive choice of parameters, the process is fairly easy and can be done by simply modifying their lattice-based attack. Their experiment shows that even a large challenge can be solved within two days. As a second contribution, considering other attacks such as a hybrid attack combining a meet in the middle attack with a lattice-based attack, they provide a new condition for hard instances of the SSSP from geometric progressions.
papers.abstract_zh: 在Gentry的全同态加密方案中，使用了稀疏子集和问题(SSSP ),并且在公钥中包括一个大集合。在一个变体的实现中，为了减少公钥的大小，Gentry和Halevi使用了一种由几何级数构造的SSSP的特定形式。在这项研究中，作者首次解决了Gentry和Halevi的稀疏子集和挑战。由于参数的积极选择，该过程相当容易，并且可以通过简单地修改他们的基于格的攻击来完成。他们的实验表明，即使是很大的挑战也能在两天内解决。作为第二个贡献，考虑到其他攻击，例如将中间相遇攻击与基于格的攻击相结合的混合攻击，他们为来自几何级数的SSSP的硬实例提供了新的条件。
papers.title_zh: Gentry-Halevi全同态加密中的稀疏子集和问题

papers.title: Versatile virtual honeynet management framework
papers.authors: Wenjun Fan, David Fernández, Zhihui Du
papers.abstract: Honeypots are designed to investigate malicious behaviour. Each type of homogeneous honeypot system has its own characteristics in respect of specific security functionality, and also suffers functional drawbacks that restrict its application scenario. In practical scenarios, therefore, security researchers always need to apply heterogeneous honeypots to cope with different attacks. However, there is a lack of general tools or platforms that can support versatile honeynet deployment in order to investigate the malicious behavior. In this study, the authors propose a versatile virtual honeynet management tool to address this problem. It is a flexible tool that offers security researchers the versatility to deploy various types of honeypots. It can also generate and manage the virtual honeynet through a dynamic configuration approach adapting to the mutable network environment. The experimental results demonstrate that this tool is effective to perform automated honeynet deployment toward a variety of heterogeneous honeypots.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐旨在调查恶意行为。每种同构蜜罐系统在特定的安全功能方面都有其自身的特点，同时也存在功能上的缺陷，限制了其应用场景。因此，在实际场景中，安全研究人员总是需要应用异构蜜罐来应对不同的攻击。然而，目前缺乏通用的工具或平台来支持通用的蜜网部署，以调查恶意行为。在本研究中，作者提出了一个通用的虚拟蜜网管理工具来解决这个问题。它是一个灵活的工具，为安全研究人员提供了部署各种类型的蜜罐的多功能性。它还可以通过一种适应多变网络环境的动态配置方法来生成和管理虚拟蜜网。实验结果表明，该工具对于各种异构蜜罐的自动蜜网部署是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 通用虚拟蜜网管理框架

papers.title: Improved conditional differential attacks on Grain v1
papers.authors: Zhen Ma, Tian Tian, Wen-Feng Qi
papers.abstract: Conditional differential cryptanalysis on NFSR-based cryptosystems was first proposed by Knellwolf et al. in Asiacrypt 2010 and has been successfully used to attack reduced variants of Grain v1. In this paper, we greatly improve conditional differential attacks on Grain v1 in the following four aspects. First, a new differential engine is derived to correctly track the differential trails of Grain v1. Second, we propose a new difference-searching strategy which serves to find suitable differences for the conditional differential attack on a given reduced variant of Grain v1. Third, a highly IV-saving condition-imposing strategy is presented. Last, we propose a further bias-increasing strategy. In particular, the improvements on the difference-searching strategy and the condition-imposing strategy are crucial to mount conditional differential attacks on the variants of Grain v1 with more than 106 rounds. It is shown that the improved conditional differential attacks could retrieve 31 distinct secret key expressions for 107-round Grain v1 and could retrieve 15 distinct secret key expressions for 110-round Grain v1. Both the attacks succeed with constant probabilities. Thus far, our results are the best known for the reduced variants of Grain v1 as far as the number of rounds attacked is concerned.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于NFSR密码系统的条件差分密码分析首先由Knellwolf等人在Asiacrypt 2010中提出，并已成功用于攻击Grain v1的简化变体。本文从以下四个方面对基于粒度v1的条件差分攻击进行了改进。首先，推导出一种新的差分引擎来正确地跟踪晶粒v1的差分轨迹。第二，我们提出了一种新的差异搜索策略，用于在给定的粒度v1的缩减变体上为条件差异攻击找到合适的差异。第三，提出了一种高度节省IV的条件施加策略。最后，我们提出了进一步的偏置增加策略。特别地，对差异搜索策略和条件施加策略的改进对于对粒度v1的变体发起超过106轮的条件差分攻击是至关重要的。结果表明，改进的条件差分攻击可以为107轮v1检索31个不同的密钥表达式，为110轮v1检索15个不同的密钥表达式。两次攻击都以恒定的概率成功。到目前为止，就攻击的回合数而言，我们的结果是最著名的晶粒v1的简化变体。
papers.title_zh: 改进的对Grain v1的条件差分攻击

papers.title: Design of new scan orders for perceptual encryption of H.264/AVC videos
papers.authors: Xiangling Ding, Yingzhuo Deng, Gaobo Yang, Yun Song, Dajiang He, Xingming Sun
papers.abstract: In this study, a perceptual encryption algorithm is proposed for H.264/AVC video to enhance the scrambling effect and encryption space. Six new scan orders are designed for H.264/AVC encoder by analysing the energy distribution of discrete cosine transform coefficients. They are proven to have similar performance as the conventional zigzag scan order and its symmetrical scan order. These six new scan orders are combined with two existing scan orders to design a scan-order based perceptual encryption algorithm. Specifically, video encryption is achieved more specifically by randomly selecting one scan order from the eight scan orders with a security key, and the sign bit flipping of DC coefficients is also incorporated to further increase the encryption space. Experimental results show that the proposed approach has the advantages of both low bitrate increase and low computational cost. Furthermore, it is more flexible and has stronger security than the existing scan-order based video encryption schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出一种适用于H.264/AVC视频的感知加密算法，以增强置乱效果和加密空间。通过分析离散余弦变换系数的能量分布，为H.264/AVC编码器设计了六种新的扫描顺序。它们被证明具有与传统的锯齿形扫描顺序及其对称扫描顺序相似的性能。这六个新的扫描顺序与两个现有的扫描顺序相结合，以设计基于扫描顺序的感知加密算法。具体地，视频加密更具体地通过用安全密钥从八个扫描顺序中随机选择一个扫描顺序来实现，并且还结合了DC系数的符号位翻转以进一步增加加密空间。实验结果表明，该方法具有低码率增加和低计算开销的优点。此外，它比现有的基于扫描顺序的视频加密方案更灵活，安全性更强。
papers.title_zh: H.264/AVC视频感知加密中新扫描顺序的设计

papers.title: High-performance and high-speed implementation of polynomial basis Itoh-Tsujii inversion algorithm over GF(2 m )
papers.authors: Bahram Rashidi, Reza Rezaeian Farashahi, Sayed Masoud Sayedi
papers.abstract: In this study high-performance and high-speed field-programmable gate array (FPGA) implementations of polynomial basis Itoh–Tsujii inversion algorithm (ITA) over GF(2 m ) constructed by irreducible trinomials and pentanomials are presented. The proposed structures are designed by one field multiplier and k -times squarer blocks or exponentiation by 2 k , where k is a small positive integer. The k -times squarer blocks have an efficient tree structure with low critical path delay, and the multiplier is based on a proposed high-speed digit-serial architecture with minimum hardware resources. Furthermore, to reduce the computation time of ITA, the critical path of the circuit is broken to finer path using several registers. The computation times of the structure on Virtex-4 FPGA family are 0.262, 0.192 and 0.271 µs for GF(2163), GF(2193) and GF(2233), respectively. The comparison results with other implementations of the polynomial basis Itoh–Tsujii inversion algorithm verify the improvement in the proposed architecture in terms of speed and performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，高性能和高速现场可编程门阵列(FPGA)实现的多项式基Itoh–Tsujii逆算法(ITA)GF(2米)上的不可约三项式和五项式构成。所提出的结构由一个场乘法器和k倍平方器模块或2 k的幂运算来设计，其中k是小正整数。k倍平方器模块具有低关键路径延迟的高效树结构，乘法器基于提议的高速数字串行架构，具有最少的硬件资源。此外，为了减少ITA的计算时间，使用几个寄存器将电路的关键路径分解为更精细的路径。该结构在Virtex-4 FPGA家族上的计算时间对于GF(2163)、GF(2193)和GF(2233)分别为0.262、0.192和0.271 s。与多项式基Itoh–Tsujii反演算法的其他实现的比较结果验证了所提出的架构在速度和性能方面的改进。
papers.title_zh: GF(2 m)上多项式基Itoh-Tsujii反演算法的高性能高速实现

papers.title: Highly nonlinear plateaued functions
papers.authors: Thomas W. Cusick
papers.abstract: The authors describe a method for producing Boolean functions of degree d ≥ 3 in n = 2dk − 1 (k = 1,  2,  …) variables, such that the functions are plateaued and balanced, have high nonlinearity and have no linear structures. The nonlinearity is 2 n−1 − 2(n−1)/2, which is the same as the largest possible nonlinearity for a quadratic function in n (odd) variables (the so-called ‘quadratic bound’). Their theorem uses some new ideas to generalise a theorem, which gave the case d = 3, in a 2009 paper by Fengrong Zhang et al. They discuss the cryptographic properties and applications for the functions.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者描述了一种在n = 2dk-1(k = 1，2，…)变量中产生d ≥ 3次布尔函数的方法，使得这些函数是平稳的和平衡的，具有高度非线性，并且没有线性结构。非线性度为2n 1 2(n 1)/2，与n(奇数)变量二次函数的最大可能非线性度相同(所谓的“二次界”)。他们的定理使用了一些新的想法来推广张等人在2009年的一篇论文中给出的定理d = 3。他们讨论了这些函数的密码学性质和应用。
papers.title_zh: 高度非线性平台函数

papers.title: Lightweight and integrity-protecting oriented data aggregation scheme for wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: Xiaomin Zhao, Jiabin Zhu, Xueli Liang, Shuangshuang Jiang, Qingzhang Chen
papers.abstract: In recent years, some research used classical and heavyweight encryption technology to realise data privacy and integrity protection in data aggregation of wireless sensor networks. The challenge is the balance between resource constraints and the complexity of the deployment. In this study, the authors proposed a lightweight and integrity-protecting oriented data aggregation scheme for wireless sensor networks (LIPDA) which has lightweight, secure and easy operability to preserve data privacy and integrity during data aggregation in wireless sensor network. First, a distance-based formation scheme of network topology is presented to balance the energy consumption of cluster heads. Then, a structure of complex number, which composes from the private factor of the nodes and the original data, is composed. The complex number is encrypted by additive homomorphic encryption method, which can realise the data aggregation without any decryption. Also, the reliability of data is ensured by using integrity verification method based on the complex operation. The theoretical analysis and simulation results show that the proposed scheme LIPDA can meet the requirement of privacy protection. Moreover, compared with related work, LIPDA has lower calculation, less traffic, higher accuracy and verifiable completeness.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，一些研究使用经典和重量级加密技术来实现无线传感器网络数据聚合中的数据隐私和完整性保护。挑战在于资源限制和部署复杂性之间的平衡。在本研究中，作者提出了一种面向轻量级和完整性保护的无线传感器网络数据汇聚方案(LIPDA ),该方案具有轻量级、安全性和易操作性，能够在无线传感器网络数据汇聚过程中保护数据的隐私性和完整性。首先，提出一种基于距离的网络拓扑形成方案，以平衡簇头的能量消耗。然后，由节点的私有因子和原始数据组成一个复数结构。复数采用加性同态加密方法加密，无需任何解密即可实现数据聚合。同时，基于复杂运算的完整性验证方法保证了数据的可靠性。理论分析和仿真结果表明，该方案能够满足隐私保护的要求。此外，与相关工作相比，LIPDA具有更低的计算量、更少的通信量、更高的准确性和可验证的完备性。
papers.title_zh: 面向轻量级和完整性保护的无线传感器网络数据汇聚方案

papers.title: Searching all truncated impossible differentials in SPN
papers.authors: Ting Cui, Chenhui Jin, Bin Zhang, Zhuo Chen, Guoshuang Zhang

This study concentrates on finding all truncated impossible differentials in substitution-permutation networks (SPNs) ciphers. papers.title_zh: 搜索SPN中所有截断的不可能微分

papers.title: Improved meet-in-the-middle attacks on Crypton and mCrypton
papers.authors: Rongjia Li, Chenhui Jin
papers.abstract: This study presents several meet-in-the-middle attacks on reduced-round Crypton and mCrypton block ciphers. Using the generalised δ-set, the authors construct 5-round distinguishers on Crypton and mCrypton. Based on these distinguishers, the authors propose meet-in-the-middle attacks on 8-round Crypton and mCrypton-96/128. The attack on Crypton needs 2121 chosen plaintexts, 2132 encryptions and 2130 128-bit blocks; the attacks on mCrypton need 261 chosen plaintexts, 280 encryptions and 278 64-bit blocks. Furthermore, the attack can be extended to 9 rounds for mCrypton-128 with complexities of 261 chosen plaintexts, 2112 encryptions and 282 64-bit blocks.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了几种针对缩减轮Crypton和mCrypton分组密码的中间相遇攻击。利用广义δ集，作者在Crypton和mCrypton上构造了5轮鉴别器。基于这些区分符，作者提出了对8轮Crypton和mCrypton-96/128的中间相遇攻击。对Crypton的攻击需要2121个选择明文、2132个加密和2130个128位块；对mCrypton的攻击需要261个选择的明文、280个加密和278个64位块。此外，对mCrypton-128的攻击可以扩展到9轮，具有261个选择的明文、2112个加密和282个64位块的复杂性。
papers.title_zh: 改进了对Crypton和mCrypton的中间相遇攻击

papers.title: Hybrid mechanism towards network packet early acceptance and rejection for unified threat management
papers.authors: Zouheir Trabelsi, Safaa Zeidan, Mohammad M. Masud
papers.abstract: Recent network architectures utilise many types of security appliances to combat blended attacks. However, managing multiple separate security appliances can be overwhelming, inefficient and expensive. Thus, multiple security features are needed to be integrated into unified security architecture resulting in an unified threat management system (UTM). In most current UTM systems, whenever a security feature is needed, the corresponding module is just ‘attached or added on’. This approach of adding on may reduce the UTM performance dramatically, especially when security features such as IDS/IPS are enabled. In this study, a hybrid mechanism is proposed to solve UTM redundant packet classification problem. The mechanism is based on the use of splay tree filters and pattern-matching algorithms to enhance packet filtering and deep packet inspection (DPI) performance. The proposed mechanism uses network traffic statistics to dynamically optimise the order of the splay tree filters, allowing early acceptance and rejection of network packets. In addition, DPI signature rules are reordered according to their matching frequencies, allowing early packets acceptance. The authors demonstrate the merit of their mechanism through simulations performed on firewall and snort as independent packet manipulation systems compared with the proposed hybrid mechanism that uses unified communication between them.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的网络架构利用多种类型的安全设备来对抗混合攻击。然而，管理多个独立的安全设备可能会令人不堪重负、效率低下且成本高昂。因此，需要将多种安全功能集成到统一的安全架构中，从而形成统一的威胁管理系统(UTM)。在大多数当前的UTM系统中，每当需要安全特征时，相应的模块只是被“附加或添加”。这种添加方法可能会显著降低UTM性能，尤其是在启用了IDS/IPS等安全功能的情况下。本文提出了一种混合机制来解决UTM冗余包分类问题。该机制基于使用展曲树过滤器和模式匹配算法来增强包过滤和深度包检测(DPI)性能。所提出的机制使用网络流量统计来动态地优化八叉树过滤器的顺序，允许早期接受和拒绝网络分组。此外，DPI签名规则根据它们的匹配频率重新排序，允许早期数据包接受。作者通过在防火墙和snort这两个独立的数据包处理系统上进行的仿真，展示了他们的机制与所提出的在它们之间使用统一通信的混合机制相比的优点。
papers.title_zh: 面向统一威胁管理的网络数据包早期接受和拒绝的混合机制

papers.title: Analysing recursive preprocessing of BKZ lattice reduction algorithm
papers.authors: Md. Mokammel Haque, Josef Pieprzyk
papers.abstract: Lattice problems are considered as the key elements in many areas of computer science as well as in cryptography; the most important of which is the shortest vector problem and its approximate variants. Algorithms for this problem are known as lattice reduction algorithms. Currently, the most practical lattice reduction algorithm for such problems is the block Korkine–Zolotarev (BKZ) algorithm and its variants. The authors optimise both the pruning and the preprocessing parameters of the recursive (aborted, extreme pruned) preprocessing of the BKZ lattice reduction algorithm and improve the results from Asiacrypt'11 by Chen and Nguyen. The authors derive approximate closed-form complexity formulas (based on the sandpile model assumption model by Hanrot et al.) for the enumeration time which allow a simple estimation of complexity without running the simulation algorithm (by Chen and Nguyen) and asymptotically suggests a modified extreme pruning bounding profiles with different parameters. Hence, the authors’ contributions are in optimising and improving the analysis of the complexity upper bound estimates presented by Chen and Nguyen, based on the same recursive-BKZ preprocessing model.
papers.abstract_zh: 格问题被认为是计算机科学的许多领域以及密码学中的关键要素；其中最重要的是最短向量问题及其近似变体。这个问题的算法被称为格归约算法。目前，对于这类问题最实用的格约简算法是BKZ算法及其变体。作者优化了格约简算法的递归(中止的、极端修剪的)预处理的修剪和预处理参数，并且改进了来自Chen和Nguyen的Asiacrypt'11的结果。作者推导了计数时间的近似封闭形式的复杂性公式(基于Hanrot等人的沙堆模型假设模型),其允许在不运行模拟算法(Chen和Nguyen)的情况下对复杂性进行简单估计，并且渐近地建议了具有不同参数的修改的极端修剪边界轮廓。因此，作者的贡献在于优化和改进了Chen和Nguyen基于相同的递归预处理模型提出的复杂度上限估计的分析。
papers.title_zh: BKZ格约简算法的递归预处理分析

papers.title: Analysis of permutation choices for enhanced generalised Feistel structure with SP-type round function
papers.authors: Lei Zhang, Wenling Wu
papers.abstract: Since the proposition of improved generalised Feistel structure (GFS), many researches and applications have been published. In this study, the authors further enhance the improved GFS with SP-type round function by extending the sub-block-wise permutation to word-wise permutation which can have better diffusion and security effect. Then, they study the security effect of different permutation choices for this kind of enhanced GFS cipher with SP-type round function. By proving several propositions about the equivalent situation, they can eliminate isomorphic permutations so as to narrow down the candidate space notably and propose a method to compute the number of effective permutation candidates. Finally, they take three typical scenes as example, and for each experimental scene, they compute the number of effective permutation candidates and exhaustively evaluate their security results. They also give an optimum permutation as example for each scene.
papers.abstract_zh: 自改进的广义Feistel结构(GFS)提出以来，许多研究和应用已经发表。在本研究中，作者通过将子块排列扩展为字排列，进一步增强了改进的具有SP型轮函数的GFS，使其具有更好的扩散和安全效果。然后，他们研究了不同排列选择对这种具有SP型轮函数的增强型GFS密码的安全性影响。通过证明等价情形的几个命题，它们可以消除同构排列，从而显著缩小候选空间，并提出一种计算有效排列候选数的方法。最后，他们以三个典型场景为例，针对每个实验场景，计算有效置换候选的数目，并详尽地评估其安全性结果。他们还给出了每个场景的最佳排列作为例子。
papers.title_zh: SP型圆函数增强广义Feistel结构的排列选择分析

papers.title: Balanced anonymity and traceability for outsourcing small-scale data linear aggregation in the smart grid
papers.authors: Huaqun Wang, Debiao He, Shibing Zhang
papers.abstract: Along with the development of information technology, the traditional electrical grid is moving to smart grid technology. By using the smart grid, the users and utility providers can more efficiently manage and generate power. Along with the advantages, the smart grid is also faced with new security concerns. In the smart grid, the user's citizen identity information should be preserved and the offensive user should be traced. For some low-capacity devices, it is indispensable to perform complicated computation by using outsourcing computation. The authors provide the outsourcing computation through public cloud. Anonymity and traceability are two important security properties in the smart grid. They are the unity of opposites. On the basis of the security requirements, they propose the balanced anonymity and traceability for outsourcing small-scale data linear aggregation (BAT-LA) in the smart grid. The formal definition, system model and security model are presented. Then, a concrete BAT-LA protocol is designed by using the elliptic curve cryptography and proxy re-encryption. Through security analysis and performance analysis, the designed BAT-LA protocol is provably secure and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着信息技术的发展，传统电网正在向智能电网技术发展。通过使用智能电网，用户和公用事业提供商可以更有效地管理和发电。伴随着优势，智能电网也面临着新的安全问题。在智能电网中，应保留用户的公民身份信息，并追踪冒犯用户。对于一些低容量设备，使用外包计算来执行复杂的计算是不可或缺的。作者通过公共云提供外包计算。匿名性和可追溯性是智能电网中两个重要的安全属性。它们是对立统一的。在安全需求的基础上，他们提出了智能电网外包小规模数据线性聚合(BAT-LA)的均衡匿名性和可追踪性。给出了形式化定义、系统模型和安全模型。然后，利用椭圆曲线密码和代理重加密技术设计了一个具体的BAT-LA协议。通过安全性分析和性能分析，证明了所设计的BAT-LA协议的安全性和高效性。
papers.title_zh: 智能电网外包小规模数据线性聚合的均衡匿名性和可追溯性

papers.title: Conditional differential attacks on Grain-128a stream cipher
papers.authors: Zhen Ma, Tian Tian, Wen-Feng Qi
papers.abstract: The well-known stream cipher Grain-128a is the new version of Grain-128. While Grain-128 is vulnerable against several introduced attacks, Grain-128a is claimed to be secure against all known attacks and observations on Grain-128. So far the only published single-key attack on Grain-128a is the conditional differential cryptanalysis proposed by Michael Lehmann et al. at CANS 2012. In their analysis, a distinguishing attack on 189-round Grain-128a in a weak-key setting was proposed. In this study, the authors present two new conditional differential attacks on Grain-128a, i.e. attack A and attack B. In attack A, the authors successfully retrieve 18 secret key expressions for 169-round Grain-128a. To the best of our knowledge, attack A is the first attack to retrieve secret key expressions for reduced Grain-128a. In attack B, the authors extend the distinguishing attack against Grain-128a up to 195 rounds in a weak-key setting. Thus far, attack B is the best known attack for reduced Grain-128a as far as the number of rounds attacked is concerned. Hopefully, the authors’ reflections on the design of Grain-128a provide insights on such compact stream ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 著名的流密码Grain-128a是Grain-128的新版本。虽然Grain-128易受几种引入的攻击，但是Grain-128a被声称是安全的，可以抵御对Grain-128的所有已知攻击和观察。到目前为止，唯一公布的对Grain-128a的单密钥攻击是迈克尔·莱曼等人在CANS 2012上提出的条件差分密码分析。在他们的分析中，提出了在弱密钥设置下对189轮Grain-128a的区别攻击。在本研究中，作者提出了两种新的对Grain-128a的条件差分攻击，即攻击A和攻击b。在攻击A中，作者成功地恢复了169轮Grain-128a的18个密钥表达式。据我们所知，攻击A是第一次检索缩减粒度-128a的密钥表达式的攻击。在攻击B中，作者在弱密钥设置中将对Grain-128a的区别攻击扩展到195轮。到目前为止，就攻击的回合数而言，攻击B是最著名的针对减粒-128a的攻击。希望作者对Grain-128a设计的思考能对这种紧凑的流密码有所启发。
papers.title_zh: 对Grain-128a流密码的条件差分攻击

papers.title: Practical attacks on the round-reduced PRINCE
papers.authors: Pawel Morawiecki
papers.abstract: The PRINCE cipher is the result of a cooperation between the Technical University of Denmark, NXP Semiconductors and the Ruhr University Bochum. The cipher was designed to reach an extremely low-latency encryption and instant response time. PRINCE has already gained a lot of attention from the academic community, however, most of the attacks are theoretical, usually with very high time or data complexity. This work helps to fill the gap in more practically oriented attacks, with more realistic scenarios and complexities. New attacks are presented, up to seven rounds, relying on integral and higher-order differential cryptanalysis.
papers.abstract_zh: PRINCE密码是丹麦技术大学、恩智浦半导体和波鸿鲁尔大学合作的成果。该密码旨在实现极低延迟的加密和即时响应时间。PRINCE已经获得了学术界的大量关注，然而，大多数攻击都是理论上的，通常具有非常高的时间或数据复杂性。这项工作有助于填补更实际的攻击，更现实的场景和复杂性的差距。提出了新的攻击，多达七轮，依赖于积分和高阶差分密码分析。
papers.title_zh: 对圆缺王子的实际攻击

papers.title: Detecting multiple H.264/AVC compressions with the same quantisation parameters
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Zhang, Jianjun Hou, Yu Zhang, Jingyu Ye, Yunqing Shi
papers.abstract: Multiple-compression detection is of particular importance in video forensics, as it reveals possible manipulations to the content. However, methods for detecting multiple compressions with same quantisation parameters (QPs) are rarely reported. To deal with this issue, a novel method is presented in this study to detect multiple H.264/advanced video coding compressions with the same QPs. First, a new set, named ratio difference set (RDS), is proposed, which is calculated by identifying the quantised DCT coefficients whose values will be changed after re-compression. Then, a discriminative and fixed statistical feature set extracted from RDS of each video is obtained to serve as input for classification. With the aid of support vector machines, the extracted feature set is used to classify the videos that have undergone H.264 compressions twice or more from those compressed just once. Experimental results show that high classification accuracy and robustness against copy-move attack and frame-deletion attack can be achieved with the authors’ proposed method.
papers.abstract_zh: 多重压缩检测在视频取证中特别重要，因为它揭示了对内容的可能操纵。然而，用于检测具有相同量化参数(QPs)的多次压缩的方法很少被报道。为了解决这个问题，本研究提出了一种新的方法来检测具有相同QPs的多个h . 264/高级视频编码压缩。首先，提出了一个新的集合，称为比率差集(RDS ),它是通过识别量化的DCT系数来计算的，这些系数的值在重新压缩后会发生变化。然后，获得从每个视频的RDS中提取的有区别的和固定的统计特征集，作为分类的输入。在支持向量机的帮助下，提取的特征集用于将经历了两次或更多次H.264压缩的视频与仅压缩了一次的视频进行分类。实验结果表明，该方法具有较高的分类精度和抵抗复制-移动攻击和帧删除攻击的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 检测具有相同量化参数的多个H.264/AVC压缩

papers.title: BDD-based cryptanalysis of stream cipher: a practical approach
papers.authors: Harish Kumar Sahu, Indivar Gupta, N. Rajesh Pillai, Rajendra Kumar Sharma
papers.abstract: Binary decision diagram (BDD) is a state-of-the-art data structure for representing and manipulating Boolean functions. In 2002, Krause proposed theoretical framework for BDD-based cryptanalysis of stream ciphers. Since then not much work have been reported in this area. In this study, the authors propose a practical approach for cryptanalysis of stream cipher using reduced ordered BDD (ROBDD). They propose various methods for ANDing operation on ROBDDs, required during process of cryptanalysis. Out of these proposed methods, ‘recursive symmetric ANDing’ gives optimal order of ANDing. They use their approach to demonstrate cryptanalysis of E 0 stream cipher. They also discuss some implementation results. The attack can recover 39 unknown key bits in 5 s on regular personal computer. BuDDy-2.4 library is used for performing operations on BDDs.
papers.abstract_zh: 二元决策图(BDD)是一种用于表示和操作布尔函数的最新数据结构。2002年，Krause提出了基于BDD的流密码分析的理论框架。自那时以来，在这一领域没有多少工作被报道。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个实用的方法来分析流密码使用精简有序BDD (ROBDD)。他们提出了在密码分析过程中对ROBDDs进行and运算的各种方法。在这些提出的方法中，“递归对称与”给出了与的最佳顺序。他们用他们的方法演示了E 0流密码的密码分析。他们还讨论了一些实现结果。攻击者可以在普通个人计算机上在5 s内恢复39个未知密钥位。BuDDy-2.4库用于在BDD上执行操作。
papers.title_zh: 基于BDD的流密码分析:一种实用方法

papers.title: Directed proxy signature with fast revocation proven secure in the standard model
papers.authors: Liaojun Pang, Yufei Hu, Xia Zhou, Yumin Wang, Huixian Li
papers.abstract: As a kind of special proxy signature, directed proxy signature can be used to sign messages, such that only the designated verifier can easily verify the validity of the signature while others cannot. At the same time, if necessary, the proxy signer or designated verifier can prove the validity of the signature to any third party. However, the revocation of delegated rights has never been considered in the existing directed proxy signature schemes. In fact, in these directed proxy signature schemes, even if the period of delegation has expired, the proxy signer still can generate the valid proxy signature, and the original signer can do nothing to prevent it. Therefore, the authors give a solution to the delegation revocation problem and propose a directed proxy signature scheme with fast revocation in this study. The security and the invisibility of the authors’ scheme are proven based on the gap Diffie–Hellman assumption and under the decisional Diffie–Hellman problem in the standard model, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为一种特殊的代理签名，有向代理签名可以用来对消息进行签名，这样只有指定的验证者可以很容易地验证签名的有效性，而其他人则不能。同时，如果需要，代理签名人或指定的验证人可以向任何第三方证明签名的有效性。然而，在现有的有向代理签名方案中，并没有考虑代理权限的撤销。事实上，在这些有向代理签名方案中，即使授权期限已过，代理签名人仍然可以生成有效的代理签名，原始签名人无法阻止。因此，作者给出了一个解决委托撤销问题的方法，并提出了一个快速撤销的有向代理签名方案。在标准模型下，基于gap Diffie-Hellman假设和判定性Diffie-Hellman问题，分别证明了作者方案的安全性和不可见性。
papers.title_zh: 标准模型下可快速撤销的有向代理签名被证明是安全的

papers.title: Efficient methods to generate cryptographically significant binary diffusion layers
papers.authors: Sedat Akleylek, Vincent Rijmen, Muharrem Tolga Sakalli, Emir Öztürk
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors propose new methods using a divide-and-conquer strategy to generate n × n binary matrices (for composite n) with a high/maximum branch number and the same Hamming weight in each row and column. They introduce new types of binary matrices: namely, ( BHwC ) t, m and ( BCwC ) q, m types, which are a combination of Hadamard and circulant matrices, and the recursive use of circulant matrices, respectively. With the help of these hybrid structures, the search space to generate a binary matrix with a high/maximum branch number is drastically reduced. By using the proposed methods, they focus on generating 12 × 12, 16 × 16 and 32 × 32 binary matrices with a maximum or maximum achievable branch number and the lowest implementation costs (to the best of their knowledge) to be used in block ciphers. Then, they discuss the implementation properties of binary matrices generated and present experimental results for binary matrices in these sizes. Finally, they apply the proposed methods to larger sizes, i.e. 48 × 48, 64 × 64 and 80 × 80 binary matrices having some applications in secure multi-party computation and fully homomorphic encryption.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者提出了使用分治策略生成n × n二元矩阵(对于复合n)的新方法，该矩阵具有高/最大分支数，并且每行和每列具有相同的汉明重量。他们引入了新的二元矩阵类型:即(BHwC ) t，m和(BCwC ) q，m类型，它们分别是Hadamard矩阵和循环矩阵的组合，以及循环矩阵的递归使用。在这些混合结构的帮助下，生成具有高/最大分支数的二进制矩阵的搜索空间大大减少。通过使用所提出的方法，他们专注于生成12 × 12、16 × 16和32 × 32二进制矩阵，这些矩阵具有最大或最大可实现分支数和最低实现成本(据他们所知),以用于分组密码。然后，他们讨论了生成的二进制矩阵的实现属性，并给出了这些大小的二进制矩阵的实验结果。最后，他们将所提出的方法应用于更大的尺寸，即48 × 48、64 × 64和80 × 80的二进制矩阵，这些矩阵在安全多方计算和全同态加密中有一些应用。
papers.title_zh: 生成密码有效二进制扩散层的有效方法

papers.title: Robust profiled attacks: should the adversary trust the dataset?
papers.authors: Liran Lerman, Zdenek Martinasek, Olivier Markowitch
papers.abstract: Side-channel attacks provide tools to analyse the degree of resilience of a cryptographic device against adversaries measuring leakages (e.g. power traces) on the target device executing cryptographic algorithms. In 2002, Chari et al. introduced template attacks (TA) as the strongest parametric profiled attacks in an information theoretic sense. Few years later, Schindler et al. proposed stochastic attacks (representing other parametric profiled attacks) as improved attacks (with respect to TA) when the adversary has information on the data-dependent part of the leakage. Less than ten years later, the machine learning field provided non-parametric profiled attacks especially useful in high dimensionality contexts. In this study, the authors provide new contexts in which profiled attacks based on machine learning outperform conventional parametric profiled attacks: when the set of leakages contains errors or distortions. More precisely, the authors found that (i) profiled attacks based on machine learning remain effective in a wide range of scenarios, and (ii) TA are more sensitive to distortions and errors in the profiling and attacking sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 侧信道攻击提供工具来分析加密设备对在执行加密算法的目标设备上测量泄漏(例如，电源迹线)的对手的弹性程度。2002年，Chari等人提出模板攻击(TA)作为信息论意义上最强的参数化攻击。几年后，Schindler等人提出了随机攻击(代表其他参数化攻击)作为改进的攻击(相对于TA ),此时对手拥有关于泄漏的数据相关部分的信息。不到十年后，机器学习领域提供了在高维度上下文中特别有用的非参数剖析攻击。在这项研究中，作者提供了新的背景，其中基于机器学习的概要攻击优于传统的参数概要攻击:当泄漏集包含错误或失真时。更准确地说，作者发现(I)基于机器学习的剖析攻击在广泛的场景中仍然有效，以及(ii) TA对剖析和攻击集中的扭曲和错误更敏感。
papers.title_zh: 健壮的剖析攻击:对手应该信任数据集吗？

papers.title: Note on scalar multiplication using division polynomials
papers.authors: Binglong Chen, Chuangqiang Hu, Chang-An Zhao
papers.abstract: Scalar multiplication is the most important and expensive operation in elliptic curve cryptosystems. In this study, the authors improve the efficiency of the elliptic net algorithm to compute scalar multiplication by using the equivalence of elliptic nets. The proposed method saves four multiplications by a constant in each iteration loop. Experimental results also indicate that the proposed algorithm will be more efficient than the previously known results on this line while it is still slower than the state-of-the-art algorithm to compute scalar multiplication.
papers.abstract_zh: 标量乘法是椭圆曲线密码系统中最重要也是最昂贵的运算。在本研究中，作者利用椭圆网的等价性来提高椭圆网算法计算标量乘的效率。所提出的方法在每次迭代循环中节省了四次常数乘法。实验结果还表明，所提出的算法将比先前已知的在这条线上的结果更有效，尽管它在计算标量乘法时仍然比最先进的算法慢。
papers.title_zh: 关于除法多项式标量乘法的注记

papers.title: Construction of resilient S-boxes with higher-dimensional vectorial outputs and strictly almost optimal non-linearity
papers.authors: WeiGuo Zhang, Luyang Li, Enes Pasalic
papers.abstract: Resilient substitution boxes (S-boxes) with high non-linearity are important cryptographic primitives in the design of certain encryption algorithms. There are several trade-offs between the most important cryptographic parameters and their simultaneous optimisation is regarded as a difficult task. In this study, the authors provide a construction technique to obtain resilient S-boxes with so-called strictly almost optimal non-linearity for a larger number of output bits m than previously known. This is the first time that the non-linearity bound 2 n−1 − 2 n/2 of resilient (n,m) S-boxes, where n and m denote the number of the input and output bits, respectively, has been exceeded for m>⌊n/4⌋. Thus, resilient S-boxes with extremely high non-linearity and a larger output space compared with other design methods have been obtained.
papers.abstract_zh: 在某些加密算法的设计中，具有高度非线性的弹性替换盒(S盒)是重要的密码原语。在最重要的密码参数之间有几个折衷，同时优化它们被认为是一项困难的任务。在这项研究中，作者提供了一种构造技术来获得具有所谓的严格几乎最优非线性的弹性S盒，用于比先前已知的更多数量的输出比特m。这是m>⌊n/4⌋.首次超过弹性(n，m) S盒的非线性界限2n 1 2n/2，其中n和m分别表示输入和输出位数因此，与其他设计方法相比，获得了具有极高非线性和更大输出空间的弹性S盒。
papers.title_zh: 具有高维向量输出和严格几乎最优非线性的弹性S盒的构造

papers.title: Private reputation retrieval in public - a privacy-aware announcement scheme for VANETs
papers.authors: Liqun Chen, Qin Li, Keith M. Martin, Siaw-Lynn Ng
papers.abstract: An announcement scheme is a system that facilitates vehicles to broadcast road-related information in vehicular ad hoc networks (VANETs) in order to improve road safety and efficiency. Here, the authors propose a new cryptographic primitive for public updating of reputation score based on the Boneh–Boyen–Shacham short group signature scheme. This allows private reputation score retrieval without a secure channel. Using this, the authors devise a privacy-aware announcement scheme using reputation systems which is reliable, auditable, and robust.
papers.abstract_zh: 公告方案是一种便于车辆在车辆自组织网络(VANETs)中广播道路相关信息以提高道路安全和效率的系统。在这里，作者基于Boneh-Boyen-Shacham短群签名方案提出了一种新的用于公开更新信誉分数的密码原语。这允许在没有安全通道的情况下进行私有信誉分数检索。利用这一点，作者设计了一个使用信誉系统的隐私感知公告方案，该方案是可靠的、可审计的和健壮的。
papers.title_zh: 公开环境下的私有信誉检索——一种面向VANETs的隐私感知公告方案

papers.title: Cheating prevention visual cryptography scheme using Latin square
papers.authors: YaWei Ren, Feng Liu, Teng Guo, Rongquan Feng, Dongdai Lin
papers.title_zh: 利用拉丁方的防作弊视觉密码方案

papers.title: Comment on 'Efficient and secure dynamic ID-based remote user authentication scheme for distributed systems using smart cards'
papers.authors: Goutham Reddy Alavalapati, Eun-Jun Yoon, Kee-Young Yoo
papers.abstract: This comment paper refers to an article published by Leu and Hsieh in IET Information Security in the year 2014. Leu and Hsieh proposed a remote user authentication protocol for distributed systems using smartcard. Their protocol affords user anonymity and no verification tables at either end, which can decrease the storage space along with the computations. Their protocol can resist security attacks and is efficient compared with few relevant protocols in terms of computational cost. However, this comment paper brings questions about the correctness of the design of Leu and Hsieh's protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文参考了Leu和Hsieh于2014年在《IET信息安全》上发表的一篇文章。Leu和Hsieh提出了一个使用智能卡的分布式系统的远程用户认证协议。他们的协议提供了用户匿名性，并且在任何一端都没有验证表，这可以减少存储空间和计算量。他们的协议可以抵抗安全攻击，并且在计算成本方面与少数相关协议相比是有效的。然而，这篇评论文章对Leu和Hsieh协议设计的正确性提出了质疑。
papers.title_zh: 对“使用智能卡的分布式系统的高效安全的基于动态ID的远程用户认证方案”的评论

papers.title: Multi-receiver authentication scheme with hierarchical structure
papers.authors: Xianfang Wang, Fang-Wei Fu
papers.abstract: Multi-receiver authentication plays an important role in network security. Many researchers have studied the constructions and the properties of the multi-receiver authentication scheme. However, most of these schemes treat the capability of all the receivers equally. In practice, receivers may have different other than equal powers in many cases. The authors consider the new scenario in the multi-receiver authentication. The authors propose a multi-receiver authentication scheme with hierarchical structure among the receivers. The authors construct an unconditionally secure multi-receiver authentication code by using the Birkhoff interpolation. The authentication scheme is also able to send multiple messages.
papers.abstract_zh: 多接收者认证在网络安全中起着重要的作用。许多研究者研究了多接收者认证方案的构造和性质。然而，大多数这些方案平等地对待所有接收机的能力。实际上，在许多情况下，接收机可能具有不同于相等的功率。作者考虑了多接收者认证中的新场景。作者提出了一种接收者之间具有层次结构的多接收者认证方案。作者利用Birkhoff插值构造了一个无条件安全的多接收者认证码。认证方案也能够发送多条消息。
papers.title_zh: 具有层次结构的多接收者认证方案

papers.title: All-subkeys-recovery attacks on a variation of Feistel-2 block ciphers
papers.authors: Dong Yang, Wen-Feng Qi, Tian Tian
papers.abstract: The Feistel-2 cipher is a type of Feistel ciphers proposed by Isobe and Shibutani at Asiacrypt 2013. Its round functions consist of a public F-function and a subkey XORed before the F-function. Recently, a variation of the Feistel-2 cipher, in which the subkey is XORed after the F-function, has been widely used in proposals such as SIMON and Simeck. The authors denote this type of Feistel ciphers as Feistel-2. In this study, they study the security of Feistel-2* ciphers. First, they propose the differential function reduction technique. Then, they present all-subkeys-recovery attacks against Feistel-2* ciphers based on this technique. Let z be the key size to block size ratio of block ciphers. It is shown that their attacks can break up 6, 8 and 10 rounds of the Feistel-2* cipher for z = 1, 3/2 and 2, respectively. Thanks to the meet-in-the-middle approach, their attacks only need a few chosen plaintexts. Moreover, with higher-data complexity, all attacks can be improved by one round. This implies that a secure Feistel-2* cipher should at least iterate 8, 10 and 12 rounds for z = 1, 3/2 and 2, respectively.
