papers.abstract_zh: Feistel-2密码是由Isobe和Shibutani在Asiacrypt 2013上提出的一种Feistel密码。它的循环函数由一个公共F函数和一个在F函数前异或的子密钥组成。最近，Feistel-2密码的一个变体，其中子密钥在F函数之后被异或，已经被广泛地用于诸如SIMON和Simeck的提议中。作者将这种类型的Feistel密码称为Feistel-2。在这项研究中，他们研究了Feistel-2*密码的安全性。首先，他们提出了微分函数约化技术。然后，基于这种技术，他们提出了对Feistel-2*密码的全子密钥恢复攻击。设z是分组密码的密钥大小与块大小的比率。结果表明，对于z = 1、3/2和2，它们的攻击分别可以破解6、8和10轮Feistel-2*密码。由于中间相遇的方法，他们的攻击只需要几个选择的明文。此外，在更高的数据复杂度下，所有攻击都可以提高一轮。这意味着对于z = 1、3/2和2，安全的Feistel-2*密码应该分别至少迭代8、10和12轮。
papers.title_zh: 对Feistel-2分组密码变体的全子密钥恢复攻击

papers.title: Dynamic authenticated data structures with access control for outsourcing data stream
papers.authors: Yi Sun, Xingyuan Chen, Xuehui Du, Jian Xu
papers.abstract: Today, many resource-constrained terminal devices prefer to outsource data stream to an intermediary for managing and storing. However, within this growing trend, the trusted problem of outsourcing data stream is universally concerned. It is extremely critical to prove that the data stream provided by the third party is trust. Therefore, in order to efficiently and effectively verify the trusted of the outsourcing data stream with adequate control, this study presents a kind of dynamic authenticated data structure with access control on outsourced data stream. Based on this data structure, the authors are able to establish a novel authentication scheme, which can support data stream to add and update in real time and verification with fine-grained access control. In addition, the security and efficiency of the proposed scheme are analysed in this study. Through comparing and analysing with the existing schemes, the proposed scheme has higher security and efficiency in terms of data stream addition and update.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，许多资源受限的终端设备更喜欢将数据流外包给中介来管理和存储。然而，在这种趋势下，外包数据流的可信问题受到普遍关注。证明第三方提供的数据流是可信的极其关键。因此，为了有效地验证外包数据流的可信性，本研究提出了一种对外包数据流进行访问控制的动态认证数据结构。基于这种数据结构，作者可以建立一种新的认证方案，支持数据流的实时添加和更新以及细粒度的访问控制验证。此外，本文还对该方案的安全性和效率进行了分析。通过与现有方案的比较和分析，该方案在数据流添加和更新方面具有更高的安全性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 具有访问控制的外包数据流动态认证数据结构

papers.title: SignORKE: improving pairing-based one-round key exchange without random oracles
papers.authors: Zheng Yang, Junyu Lai, Wanping Liu, Chao Liu, Song Luo
papers.abstract: The study presents a new efficient way to construct the one-round key exchange (ORKE) without random oracles based on standard hard complexity assumptions. The authors propose a (PKI-based) ORKE protocol which is more computational efficient than existing pairing-based ORKE protocols without random oracles in the post-specified peer setting. The core idea of this construction is to integrate the consistency check of the ephemeral public key and the verification of the signature into the session key generation. This enables us to roughly save two pairing operations. The authors just call this kind of scheme that is deeply composed by signature and one-round key exchange as SignORKE. The authors’ protocol is shown to be secure in a variant of the Canetti–Krawczyk security model which covers the majority of state-of-the-art active attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 该研究基于标准的硬复杂性假设，提出了一种新的无需随机预言的有效构造单轮密钥交换的方法。作者提出了一个(基于PKI的)ORKE协议，它比现有的基于配对的ORKE协议在后指定对等设置中更有效，没有随机预言。这种构造的核心思想是将临时公钥的一致性检查和签名验证集成到会话密钥生成中。这使我们能够粗略地节省两次配对操作。作者将这种由签名和一轮密钥交换深度合成的方案称为SignORKE。作者的协议在卡内蒂-科劳兹克安全模型的变体中被证明是安全的，该模型覆盖了大多数最新的主动攻击。
papers.title_zh: SignORKE:改进无随机预言的基于配对的单轮密钥交换

papers.title: A secure data backup scheme using multi-factor authentication
papers.authors: Yi-Ning Liu, Qi Zhong, Liang Chang, Zhe Xia, Debiao He, Chi Cheng
papers.abstract: Sensitive data stored in laptops or other mobile devices can easily be lost, stolen, misplaced or corrupted, the remote backup storage technique is used to address these issues; however, the backup server could not be fully trusted, the data should be encrypted in advance. Although the key is more easily protected due to the smaller size compared with the backup data, it is still impossible for ordinary human to remember. A user-centred design data backup scheme is proposed using multi-factor authentication. The user firstly selects a symmetrical key and divides it into three shares, then destroys the key. The key can easily be reconstructed by combining the shares stored in the user's smart card and the laptop. Even if the smart card or laptop is lost, the key can still be recovered with the password and biometrics. The proposed scheme not only achieves the required security goals but also is more robust and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 存储在笔记本电脑或其他移动设备中的敏感数据很容易丢失、被盗、错放或损坏，远程备份存储技术用于解决这些问题；但是，备份服务器不能完全信任，数据应该事先加密。尽管密钥由于与备份数据相比更小而更容易保护，但是对于普通人来说仍然不可能记住。提出了一种采用多因素认证的以用户为中心的设计数据备份方案。用户首先选择一个对称密钥并将其分成三份，然后销毁该密钥。通过合并存储在用户智能卡和笔记本电脑中的共享内容，可以很容易地重建密钥。即使智能卡或笔记本电脑丢失，仍然可以通过密码和生物特征恢复密钥。该方案不仅达到了要求的安全目标，而且更具鲁棒性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 一种使用多因素认证的安全数据备份方案

papers.title: Certificate-based signature scheme in the standard model
papers.authors: Caixue Zhou, Zongmin Cui
papers.abstract: Certificate-based cryptosystem can eliminate the private key escrow problem inherent in the identity-based cryptosystem and can simplify the costly certificate management in the traditional public key cryptosystem. In 2016, Lu et al. raised an open problem of whether the certificate-based signature (CBS) scheme can be proved secure against the malicious-but-passive certifier attack. In this study, the authors try to solve this problem. They give an enhanced security model of the CBS scheme which can resist the malicious-but-passive certifier attack. Then they propose a concrete CBS scheme in the standard model by using bilinear pairings. They prove the scheme to be secure in the enhanced security model under the Squ-CDH assumption. In this way, the authors give an affirmative answer to the above open problem. Finally, the authors evaluate the efficiency of the scheme which shows it to be practical. In addition, they find that malicious-but-passive certifier security cannot coexist with super adversary security in a CBS scheme in the standard model.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于证书的密码系统可以消除基于身份的密码系统固有的私钥托管问题，并且可以简化传统公钥密码系统中昂贵的证书管理。2016年，Lu等人提出了一个公开的问题，即基于证书的签名(CBS)方案是否能抵抗恶意被动认证者攻击。在本研究中，作者试图解决这一问题。他们给出了CBS方案的一个增强的安全模型，可以抵抗恶意的被动认证者攻击。然后他们利用双线性对在标准模型中提出了一个具体的CBS方案。在Squ-CDH假设下，他们证明了该方案在增强的安全模型下是安全的。这样，作者对上述公开问题给出了肯定的回答。最后，作者对该方案的有效性进行了评估，证明了该方案的实用性。此外，他们发现在标准模型的CBS方案中，恶意但被动的认证者安全性不能与超级对手安全性共存。
papers.title_zh: 标准模型下基于证书的签名方案

papers.title: Constructions of involutions with optimal minimum degree
papers.authors: Fengrong Zhang, Shixiong Xia, Yupu Hu, Min Xie
papers.abstract: The minimum degree (resp. algebraic degree) of a Boolean permutation is the minimum (resp. maximum) algebraic degree of all the non-zero linear combinations of its coordinate functions. In this study, the authors concentrate on the design of Boolean permutations with optimal minimum degree. First, they present a novel method for optimising the minimum degrees of known Boolean permutations. Second, they show that the Boolean permutations, which are obtained by optimising Boolean permutations without optimal algebraic degree, have optimal minimum degree. At last, it is shown that their method generates an infinite class of involutions with optimal minimum degree.
papers.abstract_zh: 最小程度(分别为。代数次数)是布尔置换的最小值。最大)其坐标函数的所有非零线性组合的代数次数。在本研究中，作者致力于设计具有最佳最小度的布尔置换。首先，他们提出了一种优化已知布尔置换最小度的新方法。其次，他们证明了通过优化没有最优代数次数的布尔置换而得到的布尔置换具有最优最小次数。最后，证明了他们的方法生成了一类具有最优最小度的对合。
papers.title_zh: 具有最佳最小度数的对合的构造

papers.title: Results on significant anomalies of state values after key scheduling algorithm in RC4
papers.authors: Santanu Sarkar
papers.abstract: It is already known that the internal permutation of the stream cipher RC4 generally deviates from a random permutation. These deviations are termed as biases, theoretical justification of which is being reported since early 2000. However, there are several biases (anomalies), which are not proven till date. In this study, the authors provide the theoretical proofs of all significant anomalies of RC4 in the 16-byte key setting. In the process, they also provide the theoretical justification of the zig-zag type distribution of the 31st output byte of RC4 (first discovered and presented by AlFardan et al. in USENIX 2013).
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，流密码RC4的内部置换通常偏离随机置换。这些偏差被称为偏差，自2000年初以来，一直在报道偏差的理论依据。然而，有几个偏差(异常)，这是没有得到证实的日期。在这项研究中，作者提供了16字节密钥设置中RC4所有显著异常的理论证明。在此过程中，他们还为RC4的第31个输出字节的之字形分布提供了理论依据(由AlFardan等人于2013年在USENIX首次发现并提出)。
papers.title_zh: RC4关键调度算法后状态值显著异常的结果

papers.title: Revisiting impossible differentials of MARS-like structures
papers.authors: Lei Cheng, Chao Li
papers.abstract: The MARS-like structure is a generalised Feistel structure. In 2015, Xue and Lai proved that there always exist (3n − 1)-round impossible differentials of MARS-like structures with n subblocks, as long as the round function is bijective. In this study, the length of the impossible differentials is extended by 1 round supposing that the MARS-like structure adopts the bijective round function of SP-type, i.e. the round function is decomposed into a substitution layer followed by a linear diffusion layer. It is surprised that such result is irrelevant to both the specifics of the S-boxes in the substitution layer and the specifics of the linear transformations in the diffusion layer.
papers.abstract_zh: 类火星结构是一种广义的Feistel结构。在2015年，薛和赖证明了具有n个子块的类MARS结构总是存在(3n-1)轮不可能微分，只要轮函数是双射的。在本研究中，假设类火星结构采用SP型的双射圆函数，即圆函数被分解为一个替代层和一个线性扩散层，则不可能微分的长度被延长了一个圆。令人惊讶的是，这样的结果与替换层中S盒的细节和扩散层中线性变换的细节都无关。
papers.title_zh: 重新审视类火星结构的不可能差异

papers.title: New integral attacks on SIMON
papers.authors: Kai Fu, Ling Sun, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: SIMON is a family of lightweight block ciphers publicly released by National Security Agency (NSA). Up to now, there have been many cryptanalytic results on it by means of impossible differential, integral, zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis and so forth. In this study, the authors analyse the characteristic of the Boolean functions of SIMON32 and find that the presentation of zero-sum property is influenced by the degree of the corresponding Boolean function. As a result, the zero-sum integral distinguisher for 14-round SIMON32 is identified which is same to the one given by Wang et.al. Inspired by this finding, they also experimentally find the zero-sum integral distinguisher for 16-round SIMON48. Then, the integral attacks on 22-round SIMON32, 22-round SIMON48/72 and 23-round SIMON48/96 are given. They improve the previous integral attack on SIMON32 from 21-round to 22-round, and the first integral attack on SIMON48 is proposed.
papers.abstract_zh: SIMON是美国国家安全局(NSA)公开发布的轻量级分组密码家族。到目前为止，通过不可能微分、积分、零相关线性密码分析等方法，已经有了许多关于它的密码分析结果。在本研究中，作者分析了SIMON32的布尔函数的特性，发现其零和性的表现受到相应布尔函数的次数的影响。得到了14轮SIMON32的零和积分鉴别器，与王等人给出的结果相同。受此启发，他们还实验性地发现了16轮SIMON48的零和积分鉴别器。然后给出了对22轮SIMON32、22轮SIMON48/72和23轮SIMON48/96的积分攻击。他们将以前对SIMON32的积分攻击从21轮改进为22轮，并提出了对SIMON48的首次积分攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对西蒙的新的整体攻击

papers.title: Computational SS and conversion protocols in both active and passive settings
papers.authors: Ryo Kikuchi, Dai Ikarashi, Koji Chida, Koki Hamada, Wakaha Ogata
papers.abstract: Secret sharing (SS) has been extensively studied as both a means of secure data storage and a fundamental building block for multiparty computation (MPC). For these purposes, code-efficiency and MPC-suitability are required for SS but they are incomparable. Recently, a computational SS and a conversion protocol were proposed. The computational SS is code-efficient and the conversion protocol converts shares of the computational (code-efficient) SS into those of an MPC-suitable SS, and it can be applied to reduce the amount of data storage while maintaining extendibility to MPC. However, this protocol is one-way: one cannot convert the share of MPC output value. In addition, it is only passively secure. The authors propose three protocols and a new computational SS. The first protocol is the inverse of the existing protocol, that is, it converts an MPC-suitable SS to the existing SS. The other two protocols are actively secure conversion protocols that convert shares between the new SS and an MPC-suitable SS. The new computational SS is code-efficient when the number of parties is small, so these two protocols are for converting between the code-efficient SS and an MPC-suitable SS. These two conversion protocols are actively secure in the honest majority.
papers.abstract_zh: 秘密共享(SS)作为一种安全的数据存储方式和多方计算(MPC)的基础构件已经得到了广泛的研究。为了这些目的，SS需要码效率和MPC适应性，但是它们是不可比较的。最近，提出了计算SS和转换协议。计算型SS是代码高效的，并且转换协议将计算型(代码高效的)SS的份额转换成MPC适用的SS的份额，并且它可以用于减少数据存储量，同时保持MPC的可扩展性。然而，这个协议是单向的:不能转换MPC输出值的份额。此外，它只是被动安全的。作者提出了三个协议和一个新的计算SS。第一种协议是现有协议的逆协议，也就是说，它将适合MPC的SS转换成现有的SS。另外两个协议是主动安全转换协议，在新的SS和适合MPC的SS之间转换份额。当参与方的数量较少时，新的计算SS是码有效的，因此这两个协议用于在码有效的SS和适合MPC的SS之间进行转换。这两个转换协议在大多数诚实的人看来是积极安全的。
papers.title_zh: 主动和被动设置中的计算SS和转换协议

papers.title: Migrating from RBAC to temporal RBAC
papers.authors: Barsha Mitra, Shamik Sural, Jaideep Vaidya, Vijayalakshmi Atluri
papers.abstract: The last two decades have witnessed an emergence of role-based access control (RBAC) as the de facto standard for access control. However, for organisations already having a deployed RBAC system, in many cases it may become necessary to associate a temporal dimension with the existing access control policies due to changing organisational requirements. In such cases, migration from RBAC to a temporal extension of RBAC becomes essential. Temporal RBAC (TRBAC) is one such RBAC extension. The process of creating a set of roles for implementing a TRBAC system is known as temporal role mining. Existing temporal role mining approaches typically assume that TRBAC is being deployed from scratch and do not consider it as a migration from an existing RBAC policy. In this study, the authors propose two temporal role mining approaches that enable migration from RBAC to TRBAC. These approaches make use of conventional (non-temporal) role mining algorithms. Apart from aiding the migration process, deriving the roles in this manner allows the flexibility of minimising any desired role mining metric. They experimentally evaluate the performance of both of the proposed approaches and show that they are both efficient and effective.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的二十年里，基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)已经成为访问控制的事实标准。但是，对于已经部署了RBAC系统的组织，在许多情况下，由于不断变化的组织要求，可能需要将时间维度与现有的访问控制策略相关联。在这种情况下，从RBAC迁移到RBAC的时间延伸变得至关重要。时态RBAC就是这样一种RBAC扩展。为实现TRBAC系统而创建一组角色的过程被称为时态角色挖掘。现有的时态角色挖掘方法通常假设TRBAC是从零开始部署的，并且不认为它是从现有RBAC策略的移植。在这项研究中，作者提出了两种时态角色挖掘方法，使从RBAC迁移到TRBAC。这些方法利用传统的(非时间的)角色挖掘算法。除了帮助迁移过程之外，以这种方式导出角色允许最小化任何期望的角色挖掘度量的灵活性。他们通过实验评估了这两种方法的性能，结果表明这两种方法都是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 从RBAC迁移到RBAC

papers.title: Low-latency digit-serial dual basis multiplier for lightweight cryptosystems
papers.authors: Che Wun Chiou, Chiou-Yng Lee, Jim-Min Lin, Yun-Chi Yeh, Jeng-Shyang Pan
papers.abstract: Various cryptosystems, such as elliptic curve and pairing-based cryptosystems, in resource-constrained security applications rely on finite field multiplication. For applications such as these, a digit-serial multiplier has the potential features to achieve a trade-off between space and time complexities. The authors propose an efficient decomposition of the multiplication into four independent sub-multiplication units to facilitate parallel processing, which is additionally facilitated by the systolic structures of the sub-multiplication units. The proposed architecture uses a four-bit scheme to construct a novel processing element, instead of using only one bit as is currently used in similar multipliers. The results of the synthesis show that the proposed digit-serial dual basis multiplier eliminates up to 96% of the critical path delay.
papers.abstract_zh: 在资源受限的安全应用中，各种密码系统，如椭圆曲线和基于配对的密码系统，都依赖于有限域乘法。对于诸如此类的应用，数字串行乘法器具有在空间和时间复杂度之间实现折衷的潜在特性。作者提出将乘法有效地分解成四个独立的子乘法单元，以便于并行处理，子乘法单元的收缩结构也有助于并行处理。所提出的架构使用四位方案来构造新颖的处理元件，而不是像当前在类似乘法器中使用的那样仅使用一位。综合结果表明，所提出的数字串行双基乘法器消除了高达96%的关键路径延迟。
papers.title_zh: 用于轻量级密码系统的低延迟数字串行双基乘法器

papers.title: Fast and automatic security test on cryptographic ICs against fault injection attacks based on design for security test
papers.authors: Cuiping Shao, Huiyun Li, Jianbin Zhou
papers.abstract: Fault injection attacks have constituted a serious threat against cryptographic integrated circuits (ICs). However, the security test nowadays is just sample test with workload statistics and experiences as the qualitative criterion, and results in costly, time-consuming and error-prone test procedures. This study presents a design for security test (DFST) method for cryptographic ICs against fault injection attacks. The DFST involves identifying the sensitive registers for various crypto modules, inserting the scan chains and generating the specific test patterns for security test. Then the security test is conducted on the manufactured cryptographic ICs with the industrial automatic test equipment. With this DFST method, a fast and automatic security test can be applied onto volume production of cryptographic ICs. Experimental results on an RSA implementation demonstrate the validity of this method.
papers.abstract_zh: 故障注入攻击对密码集成电路构成了严重威胁。然而，目前的安全测试只是以工作量统计和经验作为定性标准的样本测试，导致测试过程昂贵、耗时且易出错。该研究提出了一种针对故障注入攻击的密码集成电路安全测试设计(DFST)方法。DFST包括识别各种加密模块的敏感寄存器、插入扫描链以及生成用于安全性测试的特定测试模式。然后用工业自动测试设备对制造的密码集成电路进行安全性测试。利用这种DFST方法，可以将快速和自动的安全性测试应用到密码ic的批量生产中。RSA实现的实验结果验证了该方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于安全测试设计的密码集成电路抗故障注入攻击的快速自动安全测试

papers.title: Defending shilling attacks in recommender systems using soft co-clustering
papers.authors: Li Yang, Wei Huang, Xinxin Niu
papers.abstract: Shilling attacks have been a significant vulnerability to collaborative filtering based recommender systems recently. There are various studies focusing on detecting shilling attack users and developing robust recommendation algorithms against shilling attacks. Although many studies have been devoted in this area, few of them use soft co-clustering and consider both labelled and unlabelled user profiles. In this work, the authors explore the benefits of combining soft co-clustering algorithm with user propensity similarity method and present a soft co-clustering with propensity similarity model or CCPS for short, to detect shilling attacks. Then they perform experiments using MovieLens dataset and Jester dataset to analyse it with respect to shilling attack detection to demonstrate the effectiveness of CCPS model in detecting traditional and hybrid shilling attacks and enhance the robustness of recommender systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，先令攻击已经成为基于协同过滤的推荐系统的一个重要漏洞。有各种研究集中于检测先令攻击用户和开发针对先令攻击的健壮推荐算法。虽然许多研究致力于这一领域，但很少有研究使用软协同聚类，并考虑标记和未标记的用户模型。在这篇文章中，作者探索了将软协同聚类算法与用户倾向相似性方法相结合的好处，并提出了一种带有倾向相似性模型或简称为CCPS的软协同聚类来检测先令攻击。然后，他们使用MovieLens数据集和Jester数据集进行实验，对其进行先令攻击检测分析，以证明CCPS模型在检测传统和混合先令攻击方面的有效性，并增强推荐系统的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 利用软协同聚类防御推荐系统中的先令攻击

papers.title: Provably secure verifiable multi-stage secret sharing scheme based on monotone span program
papers.authors: Samaneh Mashhadi, Massoud Hadian Dehkordi, Niloofar Kiamari
papers.abstract: In multi-secret sharing (MSS) scheme, a dealer distributes multiple secrets among a set of participants, each of them according to an access structure. In this study, the authors propose a novel linear MSS with computational verifiability that provide many functions for practical applications in comparison with the previous works focusing on MSS schemes in the general scenario. This scheme has the same advantages as previous schemes; moreover, it is verifiable and multi-use secret sharing. Furthermore, in this scheme the secret reconstruction is according to the dealer's preassigned order. Also, they prove the security of the authors’ scheme in the standard model.
papers.abstract_zh: 在多秘密共享(MSS)方案中，一个分发者根据一个访问结构在一组参与者之间分配多个秘密。在本研究中，作者提出了一种新的具有计算可验证性的线性MSS，与以前专注于一般情况下MSS方案的工作相比，它为实际应用提供了许多功能。该方案具有与先前方案相同的优点；而且是可验证的多用户秘密共享。此外，在该方案中，秘密重构是根据分发者预先指定的顺序进行的。此外，他们证明了作者的方案在标准模型下的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 基于单调跨度程序的可证安全可验证多阶段秘密共享方案

papers.title: Attribute-based encryption implies identity-based encryption
papers.authors: Javier Herranz
papers.abstract: In this study, the author formally proves that designing attribute-based encryption schemes cannot be easier than designing identity-based encryption schemes. In more detail, they show how an attribute-based encryption scheme which admits, at least, and policies can be combined with a collision-resistant hash function to obtain an identity-based encryption scheme. Even if this result may seem natural, not surprising at all, it has not been explicitly written anywhere, as far as they know. Furthermore, it may be an unknown result for some people: Odelu et al. in 2016 and 2017 have proposed both an attribute-based encryption scheme in the discrete logarithm setting, without bilinear pairings, and an attribute-based encryption scheme in the RSA setting, both admitting and policies. If these schemes were secure, then by using the implication proved in this study, one would obtain secure identity-based encryption schemes in both the RSA and the discrete logarithm settings, without bilinear pairings, which would be a breakthrough in the area. Unfortunately, the author presents here complete attacks of the two schemes proposed by Odelu et al.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者正式证明了设计基于属性的加密方案不可能比设计基于身份的加密方案更容易。更详细地说，他们展示了如何将至少允许和策略的基于属性的加密方案与抗冲突散列函数相结合，以获得基于身份的加密方案。即使这个结果看起来很自然，一点也不奇怪，但据他们所知，它还没有被明确地写在任何地方。此外，对于一些人来说，这可能是一个未知的结果:Odelu等人在2016年和2017年提出了离散对数设置中的基于属性的加密方案，没有双线性对，以及RSA设置中的基于属性的加密方案，包括承认和策略。如果这些方案是安全的，那么通过使用本研究中证明的含义，人们将在RSA和离散对数设置中获得安全的基于身份的加密方案，而无需双线性对，这将是该领域的一个突破。不幸的是，作者在这里给出了对Odelu等人提出的两个方案的完整攻击。
papers.title_zh: 基于属性的加密意味着基于身份的加密

papers.title: Memory attestation of wireless sensor nodes through trusted remote agents
papers.authors: Po-Hung Yang, Sung-Ming Yen
papers.abstract: Wireless sensor networks (WSNs) have been deployed in various commercial, scientific, and military applications for surveillance and critical data collection. A serious threat to sensor nodes is malicious code injection attack that results in fake data delivery or private data disclosure. Memory attestation used for verifying the integrity of a device's firmware is a promising solution for detecting an infected sensor node; particularly, low-cost software-based schemes are suitable for protecting resource-constrained sensor nodes. However, a software-based attestation usually requires some additional mechanisms for providing reliable integrity evidence when the sensor nodes communicate with the verifier through a multihop setting. Alternative hardware-based attestation (e.g. trusted platform module) ensures a reliable integrity measurement that, however, is impractical for certain WSN applications primarily because of the high computational overhead and high hardware cost. The authors propose a lightweight hardware-based memory attestation scheme against the malicious code injection attack, and the proposed scheme employs a lightweight tamper-resistant hardware security module, which is free from any complicated cryptographic computation and is particularly suitable for low-cost sensor nodes. In addition, experimental results demonstrating the effectiveness of the proposed scheme are presented.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络(WSNs)已经被部署在各种商业、科学和军事应用中，用于监视和关键数据收集。恶意代码注入攻击是传感器节点面临的一个严重威胁，它会导致虚假数据传输或隐私数据泄露。用于验证设备固件完整性的存储器证明是检测受感染传感器节点的有前途的解决方案；特别地，低成本的基于软件的方案适合于保护资源受限的传感器节点。然而，当传感器节点通过多跳设置与验证者通信时，基于软件的证明通常需要一些额外的机制来提供可靠的完整性证据。替代的基于硬件的证明(例如可信平台模块)确保了可靠的完整性测量，然而，这对于某些WSN应用来说是不切实际的，主要是因为高计算开销和高硬件成本。针对恶意代码注入攻击，提出了一种基于硬件的轻量级内存证明方案，该方案采用轻量级防篡改硬件安全模块，不需要任何复杂的密码计算，特别适用于低成本的传感器节点。此外，实验结果证明了该方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 通过可信远程代理的无线传感器节点内存证明

papers.title: MNOS: a mimic network operating system for software defined networks
papers.authors: Hongchao Hu, Zhenpeng Wang, Guozhen Cheng, Jiangxing Wu
papers.abstract: Software defined networking (SDN) enables the network more flexible, open and programmable. However, as the network control and intelligence lay on the centralised controller, its security becomes even more important, and a minor change may have a direct crucial impact on the entire network. Numerous research results have shown that the SDN controller not only faces traditional security threats, but also has to tackle the challenges introduced by its unique centralised architecture. In this study, the authors present a novel SDN controller framework called mimic network operating system (MNOS). The main ideas behind MNOS are cyberspace mimic defence (CMD), which is proposed by academician Wu's team recently. By introducing the CMD into the design of SDN controllers, they come out with an N -variant controller framework with dynamic, heterogeneous and redundant characteristics. MNOS has a design-in security mechanism, its main features are: (i) effectively protects the controller from the attacks as hijacking and data modification without relying on prior knowledge of vulnerabilities; (ii) constantly monitors the behaviours of variants to detect unknown attacks; (iii) greatly improves the reliability of controllers. Theoretical analysis and experimental results show that MNOS can achieve considerable security gains and effectively improve security performance of SDN controller.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件定义网络(SDN)使网络更加灵活、开放和可编程。然而，由于网络控制和智能取决于中央控制器，其安全性变得更加重要，微小的变化可能会对整个网络产生直接的重大影响。大量研究结果表明，SDN控制器不仅面临传统的安全威胁，还必须应对其独特的集中式架构带来的挑战。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种新的SDN控制器框架，称为模拟网络操作系统(MNOS)。背后的主要思想是网络空间模仿防御(CMD)，这是吴院士的团队最近提出的。通过将CMD引入SDN控制器的设计，他们得出了具有动态、异构和冗余特性的N变量控制器框架。MNOS有一个内置的安全机制，其主要特点是:(1)有效地保护控制器免受劫持和数据修改等攻击，而不依赖于漏洞的先验知识；(ii)持续监控变体的行为以检测未知攻击；(三)大大提高了控制器的可靠性。理论分析和实验结果表明，MNOS可以获得可观的安全增益，有效提高SDN控制器的安全性能。
papers.title_zh: MNOS:用于软件定义网络的模拟网络操作系统

papers.title: Implementation flaws in the masking scheme of DPA Contest v4
papers.authors: Nikita Veshchikov, Sylvain Guilley
papers.abstract: This study presents an implementation flaw in Differential Power Analysis Contest (DPA) Contest v4. This version of DPA Contest uses Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) protected against side-channel attacks using rotating s-box masking (RSM) countermeasure. The authors identify a flaw in the masking scheme that was used in this contest. More specifically, the problem lies in an unfortunate choice of values for masks. An unbalance in the masking scheme leads to a first order leakage. This vulnerability could be used in order to mount a first order side-channel attack against AES-RSM. The attack was implemented and tested on DPA Contest v4 reference traces. The authors also provide a way to avoid the newly discovered problem and suggest new values for masks.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了差分功耗分析竞赛(DPA)v4中的一个实现缺陷。此版本的DPA竞赛使用高级加密标准(AES ),通过旋转s盒屏蔽(RSM)对策来防范侧信道攻击。作者发现了这场竞赛中使用的掩蔽方案中的一个缺陷。更具体地说，问题在于对掩码值的不幸选择。掩蔽方案中的不平衡导致一阶泄漏。该漏洞可被用来对AES-RSM发起一阶旁道攻击。在DPA竞赛v4参考跟踪上实施并测试了该攻击。作者还提供了一种方法来避免新发现的问题，并建议口罩的新价值。
papers.title_zh: DPA竞赛v4的掩蔽方案中的实现缺陷

papers.title: Internal state recovery of Grain v1 employing guess-and-determine attack
papers.authors: Zhen Ma, Tian Tian, Wen-Feng Qi
papers.abstract: The well-known stream cipher Grain v1 is one of the finalists of European eSTREAM project. In this study, a novel guess-and-determine attack on Grain v1 is introduced. The attack primarily employs a new conditional BSW sampling technique and the main creative idea is that the conditions are set not only on state bits but also on the updates of the registers for the BSW sampling technique. It is shown that using this technique we can further reduce the sampling resistance of Grain v1 to 2 − 29 which is the best result so far. The attack leads to an efficient internal state recovery of Grain v1 with only 2 52 online time employing a memory of 2 79 , requiring 2 37 keystreams each of length 2 44 and 2 79 preprocessing time. It is shown that these figures are obviously better compared with the previous results. This is also the first attempt to control the updates of the registers of Grain v1 in the guess-and-determine attack and hopefully this provides new insights for cryptanalysis on such compact stream ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 著名的流密码Grain v1是欧洲eSTREAM项目的入围作品之一。在这项研究中，一种新的猜测和确定攻击颗粒v1介绍。这种攻击主要采用了一种新的条件BSW采样技术，其主要创新思想是，不仅在状态位上设置条件，而且在BSW采样技术的寄存器更新上设置条件。结果表明，利用这种技术，我们可以将晶粒v1的采样电阻进一步降低至229，这是迄今为止的最佳结果。该攻击导致粒度v1的有效内部状态恢复，仅用2 ^ 52在线时间，使用2 ^ 79的存储器，需要2 ^ 37个密钥流，每个长度为2 ^ 44和2 ^ 79预处理时间。结果表明，这些数字明显优于以前的结果。这也是在猜测和确定攻击中控制粒度v1的寄存器更新的第一次尝试，并且希望这为这种紧凑流密码的密码分析提供新的见解。
papers.title_zh: 使用猜测和确定攻击的晶粒v1的内部状态恢复

papers.title: Enhanced secure time synchronisation protocol for IEEE802.15.4e-based industrial Internet of Things
papers.authors: Wei Yang, Yadong Wan, Qin Wang
papers.abstract: Time synchronisation is a fundamental requirement for the IEEE802.15.4e-based industrial Internet of Things, allowing it to reach low-power and high-reliability wireless network through time synchronisation. If malicious adversaries launch time synchronisation attacks to IEEE802.15.4e-based networks, the entire network communication will be paralysed. In this study, the authors introduce two types of time synchronisation attacks: (i) absolute slot number (ASN) and (ii) timeslot template attack. In ASN attack, the new nodes may receive an incorrect ASN value, which prevents synchronisation with the typical network, while in the timeslot template attack, the malicious node can make the legitimate nodes calculate the error clock offset. The authors propose an enhanced secure time synchronisation protocol to defend against these attacks, which include Sec_ASN and TOF algorithm. The Sec_ASN and threshold filter (TOF) algorithms are used to defend against ASN attack and timeslot template attacks, respectively. Finally, the authors run a thorough set of simulations to assess the effectiveness of the proposed attacks as well as the proposed countermeasure. The results show that the attacks can significantly destroy the time synchronisation protocol, but can be successfully defended using the proposed mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 时间同步是基于IEEE802.15.4e的工业物联网的基本要求，通过时间同步可以实现低功耗、高可靠性的无线网络。如果恶意对手对基于IEEE802.15.4e的网络发起时间同步攻击，整个网络通信将会瘫痪。在这项研究中，作者介绍了两种类型的时间同步攻击:(I)绝对时隙号(ASN)和(ii)时隙模板攻击。在ASN攻击中，新节点可能接收到不正确的ASN值，这阻止了与典型网络的同步，而在时隙模板攻击中，恶意节点可以使合法节点计算错误的时钟偏移。作者提出了一种增强的安全时间同步协议来抵御这些攻击，该协议包括Sec_ASN和TOF算法。Sec_ASN和阈值过滤(TOF)算法分别用于防御ASN攻击和时隙模板攻击。最后，作者运行了一组完整的模拟来评估提议的攻击以及提议的对策的有效性。结果表明，这些攻击可以显著地破坏时间同步协议，但是使用所提出的机制可以成功地防御这些攻击。
papers.title_zh: 基于IEEE802.15.4e的工业物联网增强型安全时间同步协议

papers.title: Impossible differential attacks on the SKINNY family of block ciphers
papers.authors: Dong Yang, Wen-Feng Qi, Hua-Jin Chen
papers.abstract: SKINNY is a family of lightweight block ciphers proposed at CRYPTO 2016, which follows the TWEAKEY framework and takes a tweakey input. It is shown that SKINNY family not only has good hardware/software performances, but also provides strong security guarantees against differential/linear cryptanalysis. In this study, the authors study the security of SKINNY against the impossible differential attack. First, they get some properties of the subkeys of SKINNY by analysing its key schedule. Then, combining with the early-abort technique and the greedy strategy, they present impossible differential attacks on SKINNY based on an 11-round impossible differential. Let SKINNY-n-k be the SKINNY cipher with n-bit block size and k-bit tweakey size. On the basis of their method, 17-round SKINNY-64-64 (resp. SKINNY-128-128) can be broken in 2 61.8 (resp. 2 120.8 ) 17-round encryptions, 19-round SKINNY-64-128 (resp. SKINNY-128-256) can be broken in 2 119.8 (resp. 2 241.8 ) 19-round encryptions and 21-round SKINNY-64-192 (resp. SKINNY-128-384) can be broken in 2 180.5 (resp. 2 353.6 ) 21-round encryptions. To the best of their knowledge, these results are currently the best results with respect to the attacked rounds.
papers.abstract_zh: SKINNY是CRYPTO 2016上提出的一个轻量级分组密码家族，它遵循tweakey框架并接受TWEAKEY输入。结果表明，SKINNY家族不仅具有良好的软硬件性能，而且对差分/线性密码分析提供了强有力的安全保障。在这项研究中，作者研究了SKINNY对不可能的差分攻击的安全性。首先，他们通过分析SKINNY的密钥表得到了SKINNY的子密钥的一些性质。然后，结合早期中止技术和贪婪策略，他们提出了基于11轮不可能差分的不可能差分攻击。设SKINNY-n-k是具有n位块大小和k位密钥大小的SKINNY密码。在他们方法的基础上，17轮瘦子-64-64(分别为。瘦子-128-128)可以在2个61.8(分别。2 120.8 ) 17轮加密，19轮瘦-64-128(分别为。瘦子-128-256)能破2 119.8(分别。2 241.8 ) 19轮加密和21轮瘦-64-192(分别为。瘦瘦的-128-384)能破2 180.5(分别。2 353.6 ) 21轮加密。就他们所知，这些结果是目前关于攻击回合的最佳结果。
papers.title_zh: 对瘦分组密码的不可能差分攻击

papers.title: Security assessment of the Spanish contactless identity card
papers.authors: Ricardo Julio Rodríguez, Juan Carlos García-Escartín
papers.abstract: The theft of personal information to fake the identity of a person is a common threat normally performed by individual criminals, terrorists, or crime rings to commit fraud or other felonies. Recently, the Spanish identity card, which provides enough information to hire online products such as mortgages or loans, was updated to incorporate a near-field communication chip as electronic passports do. This contactless interface brings a new attack vector for criminals, who might take advantage of the radio-frequency identification communication to virtually steal personal information. In this study, the authors consider as case study the recently deployed contactless Spanish identity card assessing its security against identity theft. In particular, they evaluated the security of one of the contactless access protocol as implemented in the contactless Spanish identity card, and found that no defences against online brute-force attacks were incorporated. They then suggest two countermeasures to protect against these attacks. Furthermore, they also analysed the pseudo-random number generator within the card, which passed all the performed tests with good results.
papers.abstract_zh: 窃取个人信息以伪造个人身份是一种常见的威胁，通常由个别罪犯、恐怖分子或犯罪团伙实施欺诈或其他重罪。最近，西班牙身份证提供了足够的信息来雇用在线产品，如抵押贷款或贷款，被更新为像电子护照一样包含近场通信芯片。这种非接触式接口为犯罪分子带来了新的攻击媒介，他们可能会利用射频识别通信来窃取个人信息。在这项研究中，作者认为，作为案例研究，最近部署的非接触式西班牙身份证评估其对身份盗窃的安全性。特别是，他们评估了非接触式西班牙身份证中实现的非接触式访问协议的安全性，发现没有针对在线暴力攻击的防御措施。然后，他们提出了两种防范这些攻击的对策。此外，他们还分析了卡内的伪随机数发生器，该发生器通过了所有测试，结果良好。
papers.title_zh: 西班牙非接触式身份证的安全性评估

papers.title: Logarithmic size ring signatures without random oracles
papers.authors: Clémentine Gritti, Willy Susilo, Thomas Plantard
papers.abstract: Ring signatures enable a user to anonymously sign a message on behalf of group of users. In this study, the authors propose the first ring signature scheme whose size is O(log2 N), where N is the number of users in the ring. They achieve this result by improving Chandran et al.’s ring signature scheme presented at the International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming 2007. Their scheme uses a common reference string and non-interactive zero-knowledge proofs. The security of their scheme is proven without requiring random oracles.
papers.abstract_zh: 环签名使用户能够代表一组用户匿名签署消息。在本研究中，作者提出了第一个规模为O(log2 N)的环签名方案，其中N是环中的用户数。他们通过改进Chandran等人在2007年自动机、语言和编程国际研讨会上提出的环签名方案实现了这个结果。他们的方案使用一个公共的参考字符串和非交互式的零知识证明。他们的方案的安全性在不需要随机预言的情况下被证明。
papers.title_zh: 没有随机预言的对数环签名

papers.title: Unified security model of authenticated key exchange with specific adversarial capabilities
papers.authors: Weiqiang Wen, Libin Wang, Jiaxin Pan
papers.abstract: The most widely accepted models in the security proofs of authenticated key exchange protocols are the Canetti–Krawczyk (CK) and extended CK models that admit different adversarial queries with ambiguities and incomparable strength. It is desirable to incorporate specific and powerful adversarial queries into a single unified security model and establish a more practical oriented security notion. Concerning the security of one-round implicitly authenticated Diffie–Hellman (DH) key exchange protocols, the authors present a unified security model that has many advantages over the previous ones. In the model, a system environment is set up, all of adversarial queries are practically interpreted and definitely characterised through physical environment, and some rigorous rules of secret leakage are also specified. To demonstrate usability of their model, a new protocol based on the OAKE protocol is proposed, which satisfies the presented strong security notion and attains high efficiency. The protocol is proven secure in random oracle model under gap DH assumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 在认证密钥交换协议的安全证明中，最广泛接受的模型是卡内蒂-科劳兹克(CK)和扩展的CK模型，它们允许不同的具有歧义和无与伦比的强度的对抗查询。希望将特定的和强大的对抗性查询合并到单个统一的安全模型中，并建立更实用的面向安全的概念。关于单轮隐式认证Diffie-Hellman(DH)密钥交换协议的安全性，作者提出了一个统一的安全模型，该模型比以前的模型有许多优点。在该模型中，建立了一个系统环境，所有的对抗性查询都通过物理环境进行了实际的解释和明确的描述，并规定了一些严格的秘密泄露规则。为了证明模型的可用性，提出了一个基于OAKE协议的新协议，该协议满足强安全概念并具有较高的效率。在gap DH假设下，该协议在随机预言模型中被证明是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 具有特定对抗能力的认证密钥交换的统一安全模型

papers.title: Random table and hash coding-based binary code obfuscation against stack trace analysis
papers.authors: Xin Xie, Bin Lu, Daofu Gong, Xiangyang Luo, Fenlin Liu
papers.abstract: Code obfuscation is intended to thwart reverse engineering by making programmes hard to understand. Call chains collected by stack tracing can be used to understand the behaviour of programmes. To hinder reverse analysis of stack tracing, a binary code obfuscation method based on random obfuscated table and hash coding is proposed. Random obfuscated table is used to map call addresses while call and ret instructions are executing. Hash coding and random value can be used to encode and decode the data of stack frames in the run-time programmes. Experiment and analysis show that the obfuscation can effectively impede stack trace analysis and increase the cost of reverse analysis for programmes.
papers.abstract_zh: 代码混淆旨在通过使程序难以理解来阻止逆向工程。通过堆栈跟踪收集的调用链可以用来理解程序的行为。为了阻止对栈跟踪的逆向分析，提出了一种基于随机混淆表和哈希编码的二进制代码混淆方法。当call和ret指令执行时，随机混淆表用于映射调用地址。在运行时程序中，可以使用散列编码和随机值对堆栈帧的数据进行编码和解码。实验和分析表明，混淆可以有效地阻碍栈跟踪分析，增加程序逆向分析的代价。
papers.title_zh: 基于随机表和哈希编码的二进制代码混淆抗栈跟踪分析

papers.title: Deterministic cloned tag detection protocol for anonymous radio-frequency identification systems
papers.authors: Yimin Guo, Shundong Li, Jiawei Dou, Sufang Zhou
papers.abstract: Tag cloning attack is a serious threat to the radio-frequency identification (RFID) applications. Cloned tags detection is an effective security mechanism to prevent the attacks. To improve the accuracy and efficiency of detection for cloned tags, this study presents a deterministic cloned tags detection (DCTD) protocol for anonymous RFID systems to detect cloned tags, using a tree-based anti-collision algorithm to find irreconcilable collisions. This protocol, which uses the pseudonym of tags in the detecting process, can quickly detect all the cloned tags with a deterministic time without revealing the sensitive information. Experiments show that DCTD protocol, with less detection time and higher accuracy, outperforms the known detection protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 标签克隆攻击是对射频识别应用的严重威胁。克隆标签检测是防止攻击的有效安全机制。为了提高克隆标签检测的准确性和效率，提出了一种用于匿名RFID系统的确定性克隆标签检测(DCTD)协议来检测克隆标签，使用基于树的防冲突算法来发现不可调和的冲突。该协议在检测过程中使用标签的假名，可以在确定的时间内快速检测出所有克隆的标签，而不会泄露敏感信息。实验表明，DCTD协议比已知的检测协议具有更少的检测时间和更高的准确率。
papers.title_zh: 用于匿名射频识别系统的确定性克隆标签检测协议

papers.title: Efficient ways of prime number generation for ring signatures
papers.authors: José Luis Salazar, José Luis Tornos, Joan Josep Piles
papers.abstract: The authors describe two different algorithms to perform efficiently the ring signature keys generation. Given an integer size, l, their algorithms find efficiently (memory and time, respectively) two distinct l/2-bit primes (e 1, e 2) such that e = 2e 1 e 2 + 1 will be a prime integer. With a naive algorithm one only needs to store O(l) bits (more specifically, only one l/2-integer), and need, in average, O(l 4) basic l-bit operations. With the second algorithm, one not only improves this computational complexity O(l 7/2), but also needs to use, in average, O(l 3/2) bits. The authors consider these algorithms useful for implementing ring signatures in mobile devices where there exist strong time and space constraints.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者描述了两种不同的算法来有效地执行环签名密钥生成。给定一个整数大小l，他们的算法有效地(分别在内存和时间上)找到两个不同的l/2位素数(e 1，e 2)，使得e = 2e 1 e 2 + 1将是一个素数。对于简单算法，只需要存储O(l)位(更具体地说，只需要一个l/2整数)，并且平均需要O(l-4)个基本l位运算。对于第二种算法，不仅提高了计算复杂度O(l ^ 7/2 ),而且平均需要使用O(l ^ 3/2)比特。作者认为这些算法对于在存在强时间和空间约束的移动设备中实现环签名是有用的。
papers.title_zh: 环签名素数生成的有效方法

papers.title: Information fusion-based method for distributed domain name system cache poisoning attack detection and identification
papers.authors: Hao Wu, Xianglei Dang, Lidong Wang, Longtao He
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors consider the detection and identification problems of distributed domain name system (DNS) cache poisoning attack. In the considered distributed attack, multiple cache servers are invaded simultaneously and the attack intensity for each cache server is slight. It is difficult to detect and identify the distributed attack by the existing local information-based detection methods, as the abnormal features for each cache server are indistinctive under distributed attack. To handle this problem, they propose an information fusion-based detection and identification methods. They find that the entropies of the query Internet protocol (IP) addresses for all cache servers are approximately stationary and statistically independent under normal cases. When distributed attack happens, they show the fact that the correlation of the entropies among all cache servers could increase dramatically. On the basis of this feature, they make use of principal component analysis to design the detection and identification methods. Specifically, attack is true when the maximum eigenvalue of the normalised entropies matrix exceeds a threshold, and the attacked servers are identified by the main loading vector. At last, they take a large-scale DNS in China and a simulation as two examples to show the effectiveness of their methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者考虑分布式域名系统(DNS)缓存中毒攻击的检测和识别问题。在所考虑的分布式攻击中，多个缓存服务器同时被入侵，并且对每个缓存服务器的攻击强度很小。现有的基于局部信息的检测方法很难检测和识别分布式攻击，因为分布式攻击下每个缓存服务器的异常特征是不明显的。为了解决这个问题，他们提出了一种基于信息融合的检测和识别方法。他们发现，在正常情况下，所有缓存服务器的查询互联网协议(IP)地址的熵近似是固定的，并且在统计上是独立的。当分布式攻击发生时，它们表明所有缓存服务器之间熵的相关性会急剧增加。基于这一特点，他们利用主成分分析来设计检测和识别方法。具体来说，当归一化熵矩阵的最大特征值超过阈值时，攻击为真，并且被攻击的服务器由主负载向量识别。最后，以国内一个大规模的DNS和一个仿真为例，说明了方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于信息融合的分布式域名系统缓存中毒攻击检测和识别方法

papers.title: Robustness of text-based completely automated public turing test to tell computers and humans apart
papers.authors: Haichang Gao, Xuqin Wang, Fang Cao, Zhengya Zhang, Lei Lei, Jiao Qi, Xiyang Liu
papers.abstract: Text-based completely automated public turing tests to tell computers and humans apart (CAPTCHAs) have been widely deployed across the Internet to defend against undesirable or malicious bot programmes. In this study, the authors provide a systematic analysis of text-based CAPTCHAs and innovatively improve their earlier attack on hollow CAPTCHAs to expand applicability to attack all the text CAPTCHAs. With this improved attack, they have successfully broken the CAPTCHA schemes adopted by 19 out of the top 20 web sites in Alexa including two versions of the famous ReCAPTCHA. With success rates ranging from 12 to 88.8% (note that the success rate for Yandex CAPTCHA is 0%), they demonstrate the effectiveness of their attack method. It is not only applicable to hollow CAPTCHAs, but also to non-hollow ones. As their attack casts serious doubt on the viability of current designs, they offer lessons and guidelines for designing better text-based CAPTCHAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于文本的完全自动化的区分计算机和人类的公共图灵测试(CAPTCHAs)已经在互联网上广泛部署，以抵御不受欢迎的或恶意的机器人程序。在本研究中，作者提供了基于文本的验证码的系统分析，并创新性地改进了他们早期对空心验证码的攻击，以扩展攻击所有文本验证码的适用性。通过这种改进的攻击，他们成功破解了Alexa前20名网站中19个网站采用的验证码方案，包括两个著名的ReCAPTCHA版本。成功率从12%到88.8%(注意Yandex CAPTCHA的成功率是0%)，他们证明了他们攻击方法的有效性。它不仅适用于空心验证码，也适用于非空心验证码。由于他们的攻击对当前设计的可行性提出了严重质疑，他们为设计更好的基于文本的验证码提供了经验和指导。
papers.title_zh: 基于文本的完全自动化公共图灵测试区分计算机和人类的鲁棒性

papers.title: Building a new secure variant of Rainbow signature scheme
papers.authors: Yang Tan, Shaohua Tang, Jie Chen, Yong Yu, Xiangxue Li
papers.abstract: Rainbow is an effective multivariate digital signature scheme proposed by Ding and Schmidt. However, a lot of attacks against it have been proposed. To resist all these attacks, designer should be very careful with its choice of parameters. In this study, the authors will propose a new approach to build a secure variant of Rainbow. According to our security analysis, it could resist all the existing attacks against Rainbow and save some memory in the meantime.
papers.abstract_zh: Rainbow是丁和施密特提出的一种有效的多元数字签名方案。然而，已经提出了许多针对它的攻击。为了抵御所有这些攻击，设计者应该非常小心地选择参数。在这项研究中，作者将提出一种新的方法来建立一个安全的彩虹变种。根据我们的安全分析，它可以抵御现有的对Rainbow的所有攻击，同时节省一些内存。
papers.title_zh: 构建彩虹签名方案的一个新的安全变体

papers.title: Implementing a privacy-enhanced attribute-based credential system for online social networks with co-ownership management
papers.authors: Esther Palomar, Lorena González-Manzano, Almudena Alcaide, Álvaro Galán
papers.abstract: Online social network (OSN) users are exhibiting an increased privacy-protective behaviour especially since multimedia sharing has emerged as a popular activity over most OSN sites. Popular OSN applications could reveal much of the users’ personal information or let it easily derived, hence favouring different types of misbehaviour. In this article the authors deal with these privacy concerns by applying fine-grained access control and co-ownership management over the shared data. This proposal defines access policy as any linear boolean formula that is collectively determined by all users being exposed in that data collection namely the co-owners. All co-owners are empowered to take part in the process of data sharing by expressing (secretly) their privacy preferences and, as a result, jointly agreeing on the access policy. Access policies are built upon the concept of secret sharing systems. A number of predicates such as gender, affiliation or postal code can define a particular privacy setting. User attributes are then used as predicate values. In addition, by the deployment of privacy-enhanced attribute-based credential technologies, users satisfying the access policy will gain access without disclosing their real identities. The authors have implemented this system as a Facebook application demonstrating its viability, and procuring reasonable performance costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络(OSN)用户表现出越来越多的隐私保护行为，特别是因为多媒体共享已经成为大多数OSN网站上的一项流行活动。流行的OSN应用程序可能会泄露用户的许多个人信息，或者让这些信息很容易被获取，因此助长了不同类型的不当行为。在本文中，作者通过对共享数据应用细粒度的访问控制和共同所有权管理来处理这些隐私问题。该提议将访问策略定义为由该数据集合中暴露的所有用户(即共同所有者)共同确定的任何线性布尔公式。所有共有人都有权通过(秘密地)表达他们的隐私偏好来参与数据共享过程，并因此共同商定访问策略。访问策略建立在秘密共享系统的概念之上。诸如性别、隶属关系或邮政编码等多个谓词可以定义特定的隐私设置。然后，用户属性被用作谓词值。此外，通过部署隐私增强的基于属性的凭证技术，满足访问策略的用户将在不暴露其真实身份的情况下获得访问权。作者已经将该系统实现为一个脸书应用程序，证明了它的可行性，并获得了合理的性能成本。
papers.title_zh: 为具有共同所有权管理的在线社交网络实现隐私增强的基于属性的凭证系统

papers.title: Short and provably secure designated verifier proxy signature scheme
papers.authors: Xiaoming Hu, WenAn Tan, Huajie Xu, Jian Wang
papers.abstract: A designated verifier proxy signature (DVPS), where only a designated verifier can verify the validity of a proxy signed message, is suitable for being applied in many scenarios. Many DVPS schemes have been proposed, but most of these schemes only provide informal proofs of security or incomplete formal proofs of security with limited power attackers (a weak security model), which make these schemes vulnerable to some attacks. To the best of their knowledge, none of the existing DVPS schemes provides a complete notion of security for DVPS. In this study, the authors first classify DVPS into weak DVPS (WDVPS) and strong DVPS (SDVPS). They then give a systematic analysis of the security requirements for WDVPS (SDVPS) and they present complete notions of security for WDVPS and SDVPS. They also propose WDVPS and SDVPS schemes, which are both provably secure, that is, satisfying their new notions of security in the random oracle model. Compared with other DVPS schemes (including WDVPS and SDVPS schemes), their schemes have more complete security and they are more efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 指定验证者代理签名(DVPS)适用于许多场合，其中只有指定的验证者可以验证代理签名消息的有效性。人们已经提出了许多DVPS方案，但这些方案大多只提供有限权力攻击者的非形式化安全证明或不完全形式化安全证明(弱安全模型)，这使得这些方案容易受到某些攻击。据他们所知，现有的DVPS计划没有一个为DVPS提供完整的安全概念。在这项研究中，作者首先将DVPS分为弱DVPS和强DVPS。然后，他们对wdvp(sdvp)的安全要求进行了系统分析，并提出了wdvp和sdvp的完整安全概念。他们还提出了WDVPS和SDVPS方案，这两个方案都是可证明安全的，也就是说，满足他们在随机预言模型中的安全新概念。与其他DVPS方案(包括WDVPS和SDVPS方案)相比，他们的方案具有更完备的安全性和更高的效率。
papers.title_zh: 简短且可证明安全的指定验证者代理签名方案

papers.title: Improved certificate-based signature scheme without random oracles
papers.authors: Yang Lu, Jiguo Li
papers.abstract: Certificate-based cryptography is a useful primitive that combines traditional public key cryptography (PKC) and identity-based cryptography (IBC). It not only solves the key escrow problem inherent in IBC, but also simplifies the certificate problem in traditional PKC. So far, several certificate-based signature (CBS) schemes have been proposed in the literature. However, none of them consider the malicious certificate authority (CA) attack. Cryptanalysis shows that two previous CBS schemes without random oracles fail in achieving unforgeability under such attack. To overcome the security weakness in these schemes, the authors propose an improved CBS scheme that can withstand malicious CA attacks. They prove it to be existentially unforgeable against chosen message attacks under the computational Diffie–Hellman assumption in the standard model. Compared with the previous standard-model CBS schemes, the proposed scheme has obvious advantages in both the computation and communication efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于证书的加密是一种有用的原语，它结合了传统的公钥加密(PKC)和基于身份的加密(IBC)。它不仅解决了IBC固有的密钥托管问题，而且简化了传统PKC中的证书问题。迄今为止，文献中已经提出了几个基于证书的签名(CBS)方案。然而，它们都没有考虑恶意的认证机构(CA)攻击。密码分析表明，以前的两个没有随机预言的CBS方案在这种攻击下不能实现不可伪造性。为了克服这些方案的安全弱点，作者提出了一种改进的CBS方案，可以抵抗恶意的CA攻击。在标准模型的计算Diffie–Hellman假设下，他们证明了它对选择消息攻击是存在不可伪造的。与以前的标准模型CBS方案相比，该方案在计算和通信效率上都具有明显的优势。
papers.title_zh: 改进的无随机预言的基于证书的签名方案

papers.title: Pseudorandom bit generator based on non-stationary logistic maps
papers.authors: Lingfeng Liu, Suoxia Miao, Hanping Hu, Ya Shuang Deng
papers.abstract: Pseudorandom binary sequences play a significant role in many fields, such as error control coding, spread spectrum communications, and cryptography. In recent years, chaotic system is regarded as an important pseudorandom source in the design of pseudorandom bit generators (PRBGs). Among them, most are based on one or more fixed chaotic systems, and the generated binary sequences come to be stationary. However, these kinds of chaotic PRBGs can be attacked by reconstructing the phase space or using some statistical analysis methods. In this study, a scheme for chaotic PRBG based on non-stationary logistic map is proposed. The authors design a dynamic algorithm to change the driven parameter sequence (not random) into a random-like sequence. The variable parameters disrupt the phase space of the system, which can resist the phase space reconstruction attacks effectively. They prove that the non-stationary logistic map is still chaotic under Wiggins' chaos definition. The numerical analysis shows that the generated binary sequences have good cryptographic properties and can pass the well-known statistical tests. The authors' chaotic PRBG based on non-stationary logistic map is a novel scheme in the design of PRBG, and is more secure than the PRBGs based on fixed chaotic systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪随机二进制序列在许多领域中起着重要的作用，例如差错控制编码、扩频通信和密码学。近年来，在伪随机比特发生器的设计中，混沌系统被认为是一种重要的伪随机源。其中，大多数是基于一个或多个固定的混沌系统，产生的二进制序列是平稳的。然而，这类混沌PRBGs可以通过重构相空间或使用一些统计分析方法来攻击。本文提出了一种基于非平稳logistic映射的混沌PRBG方案。作者设计了一种动态算法，将驱动参数序列(非随机的)转换为类随机序列。可变参数扰乱了系统的相空间，可以有效抵抗相空间重构攻击。他们证明了非平稳logistic映射在Wiggins的混沌定义下仍然是混沌的。数值分析表明，所生成的二进制序列具有良好的密码学性质，并能通过众所周知的统计检验。作者提出的基于非平稳logistic映射的混沌PRBG是PRBG设计中的一种新方案，比基于固定混沌系统的PRBG更安全。
papers.title_zh: 基于非平稳logistic映射的伪随机比特发生器

papers.title: Improved zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis of reduced-round Camellia under weak keys
papers.authors: Zhiqiang Liu, Bing Sun, Qingju Wang, Kerem Varici, Dawu Gu
papers.abstract: Camellia is one of the widely used block ciphers, which has been included in the NESSIE block cipher portfolio and selected as a standard by ISO/IEC. In this study, the authors observe that there exist some interesting properties of the FL/FL −1 functions in Camellia. With this observation they derive some weak keys for the cipher, based on which they present the first known 8-round zero-correlation linear distinguisher of Camellia with FL/FL −1 layers. This result shows that the FL/FL −1 layers inserted in Camellia cannot resist zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis effectively for some weak keys since the currently best zero-correlation linear distinguisher for Camellia without FL/FL −1 layers also covers eight rounds. Moreover, by using the novel distinguisher, they launch key recovery attacks on 13-round Camellia-192 and 14-round Camellia-256. To their knowledge, these results are the best for Camellia-192 and Camellia-256 with FL/FL −1 and whitening layers.
papers.abstract_zh: Camellia是广泛使用的分组密码之一，已被纳入NESSIE分组密码组合，并被ISO/IEC选为标准。在本研究中，作者观察到山茶属植物中FL/FL-1函数存在一些有趣的性质。根据这一观察，他们得到了密码的一些弱密钥，在此基础上，他们提出了第一个已知的具有FL/FL-1层的山茶花的8轮零相关线性鉴别器。这一结果表明，插入到Camellia中的FL/FL-1层不能有效地抵抗一些弱密钥的零相关线性密码分析，因为目前没有FL/FL-1层的Camellia的最佳零相关线性鉴别器也覆盖八轮。此外，通过使用新的区分器，他们对13轮Camellia-192和14轮Camellia-256发起密钥恢复攻击。据他们所知，这些结果对于具有FL/FL-1和增白层的Camellia-192和Camellia-256是最好的。
papers.title_zh: 弱密钥下简化轮Camellia的改进零相关线性密码分析

papers.title: Linear complexity of generalised cyclotomic quaternary sequences of length 2p  m+1 q  n+1
papers.authors: Dandan Li, Zuling Chang, Qiaoyan Wen, Jie Zhang
papers.abstract: Sequences with high linear complexity play a fundamental part in cryptography. In this study, the authors construct general forms of Whiteman's generalised cyclotomic quaternary sequences with period 2p m+1 q n+1 of order two over 𝔽4 and give the linear complexity of the proposed sequences. The conclusions reveal that such sequences have good balance property and high linear complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: 具有高线性复杂度的序列在密码学中起着重要的作用。在本研究中，作者构造了𝔽4上周期为2p m+1 q n+1的二阶Whiteman广义分圆四元序列的一般形式，并给出了所提出序列的线性复杂度。结论表明，这类序列具有良好的平衡性和较高的线性复杂度。
papers.title_zh: 长度为2p ^ m+1q ^ n+1的广义分圆四元序列的线性复杂度

papers.title: Empirical analysis of Tor Hidden Services
papers.authors: Gareth Owen, Nick Savage
papers.abstract: Tor hidden services allow someone to host a website or other transmission control protocol (TCP) service whilst remaining anonymous to visitors. The collection of all Tor hidden services is often referred to as the ‘darknet’. In this study, the authors describe results from what they believe to be the largest study of Tor hidden services to date. By operating a large number of Tor servers for a period of 6 months, the authors were able to capture data from the Tor distributed hash table to collect the list of hidden services, classify their content and count the number of requests. Approximately 80,000 hidden services were observed in total of which around 45,000 are present at any one point in time. Abuse and Botnet C&C servers were the most frequently requested hidden services although there was a diverse range of services on offer.
papers.abstract_zh: Tor隐藏服务允许某人托管一个网站或其他传输控制协议(TCP)服务，同时对访问者保持匿名。所有Tor隐藏服务的集合通常被称为“暗网”。在这项研究中，作者描述了他们认为迄今为止最大规模的Tor隐藏服务研究的结果。通过在6个月的时间内运行大量Tor服务器，作者能够从Tor分布式哈希表中捕获数据，以收集隐藏服务的列表，对其内容进行分类，并统计请求的数量。总共观察到大约80，000个隐藏服务，其中大约45，000个在任一时间点都存在。滥用和僵尸网络C&C服务器是最常要求的隐藏服务，虽然有各种各样的服务提供。
papers.title_zh: Tor隐性服务的实证分析

papers.title: Authenticating multi-dimensional query results in outsourced database
papers.authors: Xiaoming Wang, Yanchun Lin, Yu Fang
papers.abstract:
In the outsourced database model, the third-party server provides query services to users on behalf of the data owner. However, the service provider may be unreliable or susceptible to attacks. The service provider can also produce inauthentic or incomplete query results. An authentication scheme for multi-dimensional data is proposed in the present study to investigate this problem. The authors introduce a new concept of tower head node based on the k
-dimensional skip list and use it to construct a new authenticated data structure. This structure supports both multi-dimensional range query and dynamic maintenance. They also show how to verify the authenticity and completeness of query results on multi-dimensional datasets in the outsourced database model. Moreover, this structure can be fully outsourced, thus the service provider can perform the entire maintenance, which is crucial for users with limited computational resources. The proof of security and the evaluation of experiment demonstrate that the scheme is secure and outperforms previous schemes in terms of the construction cost, proof size, query time, verification time and update cost.
papers.abstract_zh:
在外包数据库模型中，第三方服务器代表数据所有者向用户提供查询服务。然而，服务提供商可能不可靠或易受攻击。服务提供商也可能产生不真实或不完整的查询结果。针对这一问题，本文提出了一种针对多维数据的认证方案。作者在k
-维跳表，并使用它来构建一个新的认证数据结构。这种结构既支持多维范围查询，也支持动态维护。它们还展示了如何在外包数据库模型中验证多维数据集上的查询结果的真实性和完整性。此外，这种结构可以完全外包，因此服务提供商可以执行整个维护，这对于计算资源有限的用户来说至关重要。安全性证明和实验评估表明，该方案是安全的，并且在构造成本、证明大小、查询时间、验证时间和更新成本方面优于现有方案。
papers.title_zh: 认证外包数据库中的多维查询结果

papers.title: Border gateway protocol graph: detecting and visualising internet routing anomalies
papers.authors: Stavros Papadopoulos, Konstantinos Moustakas, Anastasios Drosou, Dimitrios Tzovaras
papers.abstract: Border gateway protocol (BGP) is the main protocol used on the Internet today, for the exchange of routing information between different networks. The lack of authentication mechanisms in BGP, render it vulnerable to prefix hijacking attacks, which raise serious security concerns regarding both service availability and data privacy. To address these issues, this study presents BGPGraph, a scheme for detecting and visualising Internet routing anomalies. In particular, BGPGraph introduces a novel BGP anomaly metric that quantifies the degree of anomaly on the BGP activity, and enables the analyst to obtain an overview of the BGP status. The analyst, is afterwards able to focus on significant time windows for further analysis, by using a hierarchical graph visualisation scheme. Furthermore, BGPGraph uses a novel method for the quantification of information visualisation that allows for the evaluation, and optimal selection of parameters, in case of the corresponding visual analytics algorithms. As a result, by utilising the proposed approach, four new BGP anomalies were able to be identified. Experimental demonstration in known BGP events, illustrates the significant analytics potential of the proposed approach in terms of identifying prefix hijacks and performing root cause analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 边界网关协议(BGP)是当今互联网上使用的主要协议，用于在不同网络之间交换路由信息。BGP缺乏认证机制，这使得它容易受到前缀劫持攻击，这引起了关于服务可用性和数据隐私的严重安全问题。为了解决这些问题，本研究提出了BGPGraph，一种用于检测和可视化互联网路由异常的方案。特别是，BGPGraph引入了一种新的BGP异常度量，它量化了BGP活动的异常程度，并使分析师能够获得BGP状态的概览。通过使用分层图形可视化方案，分析人员随后能够专注于重要的时间窗口以进行进一步分析。此外，BGPGraph使用了一种新的信息可视化量化方法，在相应的视觉分析算法的情况下，允许评估和参数的最佳选择。结果，通过利用所提出的方法，能够识别四个新的BGP异常。已知BGP事件中的实验演示说明了所提出的方法在识别前缀劫持和执行根本原因分析方面的重要分析潜力。
papers.title_zh: 边界网关协议图:检测和可视化互联网路由异常

papers.title: Supervised approach for detecting average over popular items attack in collaborative recommender systems
papers.authors: Quanqiang Zhou
papers.abstract: Recent research has shown the significant vulnerabilities of collaborative recommender systems in the face of profile injection attacks, in which malicious users insert fake profiles into the rating database in order to bias the system's output. To reduce this risk, a number of approaches have been proposed to detect such attacks. Although the existing detection approaches can detect the standard type of these attacks effectively, they perform badly when detecting the recently proposed obfuscated type of these attacks, for example, average over popular items (AoP) attack. With this problem in mind, in this study the author propose a supervised approach to detect such attack. First, he uses the theory of term frequency inverse document frequency (TFIDF) to extract the features of AoP attack. Second, he uses the training set to train support vector machine (SVM) to generate a SVM-based classifier. Finally, he uses the generated classifier to detect the AoP attack. The experimental results on MovieLens dataset show that the proposed approach can detect AoP attack with high recall and precision.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究显示了协同推荐系统在面对简档注入攻击时的显著脆弱性，在简档注入攻击中，恶意用户将伪造的简档插入到评级数据库中，以使系统的输出有偏见。为了降低这种风险，已经提出了许多方法来检测这种攻击。虽然现有的检测方法可以有效地检测这些攻击的标准类型，但是当检测最近提出的这些攻击的混淆类型时，例如平均流行项目(AoP)攻击，它们的性能很差。考虑到这个问题，在本研究中，作者提出了一种有监督的方法来检测这种攻击。首先，利用词频逆文档频率理论提取AoP攻击的特征。其次，他使用训练集来训练支持向量机(SVM)以生成基于SVM的分类器。最后，他使用生成的分类器来检测AoP攻击。在MovieLens数据集上的实验结果表明，该方法能够以较高的查全率和查准率检测AoP攻击。
papers.title_zh: 协同推荐系统中检测平均热门项目攻击的监督方法

papers.title: Predicting the number of different dimensional cubes: theoretically evaluate the secure bound of cryptographic primitives against the balance testers
papers.authors: Yonglin Hao
papers.abstract: The cube tester is a powerful tool to detect non-randomness of cryptographic primitives. The balance tester is a kind of powerful cube tester that has been applied to various cryptographic primitives. However, most existing results of the balance tester are acquired experimentally using small cubes of dimension no more than 50. To understand the mechanic of the balance tester, it is necessary to predict the number of higher-dimensional cubes. In this paper, we firstly draw links between the number of cubes and the resistance against the balance tester. Secondly, we theoretically prove that there are lower and upper bounds for the number of each dimensional cubes using a probabilistic model. Based on our analysis, we propose our main algorithms that can draw the lower and upper bounds for the number of different dimensional cubes utilising some easily acquired statistics. We apply our main algorithms to some famous stream ciphers namely Trivium, Grain-128, Grain-128a and Grain-v1. The results are in high accordance with our theories and expectations. Our work provides a better understanding of the balance tester. We expect that our main algorithms will equip the cryptologists with useful information when evaluating the secure margin of newly designed ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 立方体测试器是检测密码原语非随机性的强大工具。平衡测试器是一种功能强大的立方体测试器，已经被应用于各种密码原语。然而，平衡测试仪的大多数现有结果是使用不超过50的小立方体通过实验获得的。为了理解天平测试仪的机械原理，有必要预测高维立方体的数量。在本文中，我们首先在立方体的数量和平衡测试仪的阻力之间建立联系。其次，我们使用一个概率模型从理论上证明了每个维度立方体的数量有上下限。基于我们的分析，我们提出了我们的主要算法，可以利用一些容易获得的统计数据来绘制不同维度立方体的数量的下限和上限。我们将主要算法应用于一些著名的流密码，即Trivium、Grain-128、Grain-128a和Grain-v1。结果与我们的理论和预期高度一致。我们的工作提供了对平衡测试仪的更好理解。我们期望我们的主要算法将在评估新设计的密码的安全裕度时为密码学家提供有用的信息。
papers.title_zh: 预测不同维度立方体的数量:从理论上评估密码原语相对于平衡测试器的安全界限

papers.title: Key recovery on several matrix public-key encryption schemes
papers.authors: Houzhen Wang, Huanguo Zhang, Shaohua Tang
papers.abstract:
Eight years ago, Pei et al. described a matrix public-key encryption scheme based on the matrix factorisation over a finite field. Recently, Gu and Zheng also proposed a similar scheme based on the non-abelian factorisation assumption. The security of these schemes is essentially based on a two-side matrices exponentiation (TSME) problem. In this study, the authors show that the TSME problem is susceptible to a very efficient linearisation equations attack. Regardless of the public key parameters, the authors can easily find an equivalent key only in polynomial time O(2n
 5
(log n +1)) from the public key alone, and thus it is very practical and can be implemented within less than 1/20 of a second on the recommended system parameters of the schemes.
papers.abstract_zh:
八年前，Pei等人描述了一种基于有限域上矩阵分解的矩阵公钥加密方案。最近，顾和郑也提出了一个基于非阿贝尔分解假设的类似方案。这些方案的安全性本质上是基于双边矩阵求幂(TSME)问题。在这项研究中，作者表明，TSME问题容易受到非常有效的线性化方程攻击。不管公钥参数是什么，作者只需在多项式时间O(2n)内就能很容易地找到一个等价密钥
5
(log n +1))，因此它是非常实用的，并且可以在小于1/20秒内根据所推荐的方案的系统参数来实现。
papers.title_zh: 几种矩阵公钥加密方案的密钥恢复

papers.title: Covert communications through mobile voice channels
papers.authors: Seyed Amir Reza Kazemi, Roohollah Rezaei, Mohammad Ali Akhaee, Fereidoon Behnia
papers.abstract: The rapid development and growth of cellular mobile networks in recent years has made voice channels widely available almost everywhere. On the other hand, voice dedicated channels possess properties that make them ideal options for high priority real-time secure communications. Beside these realities, information embedding has gained remarkable attention in recent years due to its potential application in multimedia security. In this regard, this study aims to propose an efficient scheme for data hiding to show the feasibility of exploiting these channels for covert communications. To this end, the authors propose new suboptimal but practical schemes based on additive and multiplicative spread spectrum methods. The analytical evaluations of the proposed techniques along with simulation results show proper efficiency of these schemes. Moreover, it is shown that the proposed scheme based on the M-ary bi-orthogonal general maximum likelihood and M-ary bi-orthogonal generalised embedding of multiplicative watermarks techniques outperform the other proposed schemes in this study. Experimental evaluation confirms that the proposed data hiding scheme benefits from an acceptable level of imperceptibility. Finally, the authors propose a security block which considerably increases the robustness of proposed structures against histogram-based steganalysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，蜂窝移动网络的快速发展和增长使得语音信道几乎在任何地方都可以广泛使用。另一方面，语音专用信道所具有的特性使其成为高优先级实时安全通信的理想选择。除了这些现实之外，信息嵌入由于其在多媒体安全方面的潜在应用而在最近几年获得了显著的关注。在这方面，本研究旨在提出一种有效的数据隐藏方案，以显示利用这些信道进行隐蔽通信的可行性。为此，作者提出了基于加法和乘法扩频方法的新的次优但实用的方案。对所提出技术的分析评估以及仿真结果显示了这些方案的适当效率。此外，基于M元双正交广义最大似然和M元双正交广义嵌入乘性水印技术的方案优于本研究中提出的其他方案。实验评估证实，所提出的数据隐藏方案受益于可接受的不可感知性水平。最后，作者提出了一种安全块，该安全块大大增加了所提出的结构对基于直方图的隐写分析的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 通过移动语音信道进行秘密通信

papers.title: Dynamic cube attack on Grain-v1
papers.authors: Majid Rahimi, Mostafa Barmshory, Mohammad Hadi Mansouri, Mohammad Reza Aref
papers.abstract: This study presents a dynamic cube attack on the algorithm Grain-v1 which has resisted all the key-recovery attacks in the single key model. The dynamic cube attack finds the secret key by using distinguishers obtained from structural weaknesses of a cipher. The main idea of the attack lies in simplifying the cipher's output function. After making it simpler, the attack is able to exploit a distinguishing attack to recover the secret key. In this study, the authors first find the appropriate simplifications for Grain-v1. Then, they apply their attack to the algorithm by using a new framework and a new smart choice technique for the classification of initial value bits. Finally, the authors simulate the attack to find the suitable attack parameters having 73% success rate. Their attack runs in a practical time and recovers all the key bits when the number of initialisation rounds in Grain-v1 is reduced to 100 of 160. The attack is faster than exhaustive search by a factor of 238.
papers.abstract_zh: 该研究提出了一种对算法Grain-v1的动态立方体攻击，该算法抵抗了单密钥模型中的所有密钥恢复攻击。动态立方体攻击通过使用从密码的结构弱点获得的区分符来找到密钥。攻击的主要思想在于简化密码的输出函数。在使它变得更简单之后，攻击者能够利用一种独特的攻击来恢复密钥。在这项研究中，作者首先找到了Grain-v1的适当简化。然后，他们通过使用新的框架和新的用于初始值位分类的智能选择技术，将他们的攻击应用于算法。最后，作者对攻击进行了模拟，找到了成功率为73%的攻击参数。他们的攻击在实际时间内运行，并在Grain-v1中的初始化回合数减少到160的100时恢复所有密钥位。该攻击比穷举搜索快238倍。
papers.title_zh: 对Grain-v1的动态立方体攻击

papers.title: Leakage-resilient message authentication code scheme based on hidden identity weak hash proof system
papers.authors: Bin Wang
papers.abstract: Hazay et al. initiated the formal study of leakage-resilient message authentication code (MAC) and presented a MAC scheme that is both leakage resilient and unforgeable against chosen message and no verification query attack (uf-cm-nvq). As the communication overhead of their construction is linear with the parameters that control the leakage bound, their scheme sacrifices efficiency in exchange for leakage resilience. In this study, the authors study the problem of designing leakage-resilient MACs in the public-key setting with acceptable communication efficiency. In particular, a notion called ‘hidden identity weak hash proof system’(HID-wHPS) is introduced. Then a generic MAC construction is presented under the abstraction framework of HID-wHPS. Security properties guaranteed by HID-wHPS enable us to prove the author's construction to be both leakage resilient and uf-cm-nvq in a modular way. Finally, performance analysis shows that their MAC construction yields improved tagging-key size, tag size as well as computation overhead under the given leakage bound.
papers.abstract_zh: Hazay等人发起了对泄漏弹性消息认证码(MAC)的形式化研究，并提出了一种对选择消息和无验证查询攻击具有泄漏弹性和不可伪造性的MAC方案(uf-cm-nvq)。由于其构造的通信开销与控制泄漏界限的参数成线性关系，因此其方案牺牲效率来换取泄漏弹性。在本研究中，作者研究了在公钥体制下设计具有可接受通信效率的抗泄漏MAC的问题。特别地，引入了“隐藏身份弱哈希证明系统”(HID-wHPS)的概念。然后在HID-wHPS的抽象框架下给出了一个通用的MAC构造。HID-wHPS保证的安全属性使我们能够以模块化的方式证明作者的构造具有泄漏弹性和uf-cm-nvq。最后，性能分析表明，在给定的泄漏界限下，它们的MAC构造产生了改进的标记密钥大小、标记大小以及计算开销。
papers.title_zh: 基于隐藏身份弱哈希证明系统的抗泄漏消息认证码方案

papers.title: Effective certificate revocation scheme based on weighted voting game approach
papers.authors: Sungwook Kim
papers.abstract: Mobile ad hoc networks (MANETs) are wireless networks that have a wide range of applications because of their dynamic topologies and ease of deployment. Owing to the independent and dynamic nature of mobile nodes, the topology of a MANET often changes and is prone to various attacks. Therefore, substantial research in the area of security is required. Certificate revocation is an effective mechanism for providing network security services. However, the existing schemes are not well suited to MANETs because of their considerable overhead or low accuracy with respect to certificate revocation. In this study, the authors investigate a distributed certificate revocation protocol. On the basis of the game-theoretic model, they design a new voting-based security scheme. Their game-based security paradigm can provide the ability to practically respond to the current system conditions and is suitable for real MANET operations. Simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness and the efficiency of their scheme with respect to certificate revocation. Finally, they discuss the results of an evaluation provide an outlook on the future work in this field.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动自组织网络(MANETs)是一种无线网络，由于其动态拓扑和易于部署而具有广泛的应用。由于移动节点的独立性和动态性，MANET的拓扑结构经常变化，容易受到各种攻击。因此，需要在安全领域进行大量研究。证书撤销是提供网络安全服务的有效机制。然而，现有的方案并不非常适合MANETs，因为它们的开销相当大，或者相对于证书撤销的准确性较低。在这项研究中，作者研究了一个分布式证书撤销协议。在博弈论模型的基础上，他们设计了一个新的基于投票的安全方案。它们基于游戏的安全范例可以提供实际响应当前系统条件的能力，并且适合于真实的MANET操作。仿真结果表明了该方案在证书撤销方面的有效性和高效性。最后，他们讨论了评价的结果，并对该领域的未来工作进行了展望。
papers.title_zh: 基于加权投票博弈的有效证书撤销方案

papers.title: Privacy failure in the public-key distance-bounding protocols
papers.authors: Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: Public-key distance bounding protocols are well suited to defeat relay attacks in proximity access control systems when the author assume no prior shared key. At AsiaCCS 2014, Gambs, Onete, and Robert designed such a protocol with privacy protection for the prover. That is, the protocol hides the identity of the prover to active adversaries and the prover remains anonymous. In this study the author contradicts the result on this protocol by proving that an active adversary can easily identify one prover out of two possible ones. At WISEC 2013, Hermans, Peeters, and Onete proposed another protocol which is proven to protect the privacy of the prover. In this study the author complete their results and show that the protocol does not protect it in a strong sense. That is, if the adversary can corrupt the provers, then privacy is not guaranteed any more.
papers.abstract_zh: 当作者假设没有在先共享密钥时，公开密钥距离限制协议非常适合于挫败邻近访问控制系统中的中继攻击。在AsiaCCS 2014上，Gambs、Onete和Robert为证明者设计了这样一个带有隐私保护的协议。也就是说，该协议对主动的对手隐藏了证明者的身份，并且证明者保持匿名。在这项研究中，作者通过证明一个活跃的对手可以很容易地从两个可能的证明者中识别出一个来反驳这个协议的结果。在WISEC 2013上，Hermans、Peeters和Onete提出了另一个被证明可以保护证明者隐私的协议。在这项研究中，作者完成了他们的结果，并表明该协议不保护它在一个强意义上。也就是说，如果对手可以破坏证明者，那么隐私将不再得到保证。
papers.title_zh: 公钥距离限制协议中的隐私失效

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of McEliece cryptosystem variants based on quasi-cyclic low-density parity check codes
papers.authors: Masoumeh Koochak Shooshtari, Mahmoud Ahmadian-Attari, Thomas Johansson, Mohammad Reza Aref
papers.abstract: One of the approaches to modify the McEliece cryptosystem to overcome its large key size is replacing binary Goppa codes with a new structured code. However, this modification makes such cryptosystems encounter some new attacks. There are a few modified McEliece cryptosystem variants which are known to be secure. One of them is the cryptosystem introduced by Baldi et al. which uses quasi-cyclic low-density parity check (QC-LDPC) codes. This cryptosystem is still unbroken as no efficient attack has been reported against it since 2008. In this study, an attack has been applied to this cryptosystem which is feasible when the code length is a multiple of a power of 2. Also an important weakness of this kind of cryptosystem has been pointed out, namely utilising a too low-weight intentional error vector. The authors have established a new security level for this cryptosystem which is applicable to other McEliece-like cryptosystems using QC-LDPC codes. This security level for instance is 29.18 times lower than previous ones in the case of n = 4 x 4096 when only one ciphertext is available. The gain of the attack in this study can be increased if more than one ciphertext is available.
papers.abstract_zh: 修改McEliece密码系统以克服其大密钥长度的方法之一是用新的结构化代码替换二进制Goppa代码。然而，这种修改使得这样的密码系统遇到一些新的攻击。有几个已知安全的修改的McEliece密码系统变体。其中之一是Baldi等人提出的密码系统，它使用准循环低密度奇偶校验(QC-LDPC)码。这种密码系统仍未被破解，因为自2008年以来没有针对它的有效攻击的报道。在本研究中，对该密码系统进行了攻击，当码长是2的幂的倍数时，该攻击是可行的。还指出了这种密码系统的一个重要弱点，即利用了太低权重的故意误差向量。作者为该密码系统建立了一个新的安全级别，该安全级别也适用于其它使用QC-LDPC码的类麦克埃利斯密码系统。例如，当只有一个密文可用时，在n = 4×4096的情况下，这个安全级别比先前的安全级别低29.18倍。如果有一个以上的密文可用，本研究中的攻击增益可以增加。
papers.title_zh: 基于准循环低密度奇偶校验码的McEliece密码系统变体的密码分析

papers.title: Design and formal verification of a cloud compliant secure logging mechanism
papers.authors: Mehmet Tahir Sandikkaya, Tolga Ovatman, Ali Emre Harmanci
papers.abstract: Security concerns are still retarding cloud adoption. While the research community work on clearing these concerns, an optimistic fair cloud compliant logging scheme may ease the cloud to spread. This study proposes a secure logging mechanism. The mechanism employs an online bulletin board as a public write-only storage for the log records. The bulletin board also acts as a trusted third party during conflict resolution. The secure logging protocol describes how the log records are distributed to the stakeholders. The protocol's security is verified with model checking tools and no security threats could be found.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全问题仍然阻碍着云的采用。虽然研究社区致力于消除这些担忧，但一个乐观的fair cloud兼容日志记录方案可能会缓解云的传播。本研究提出了一种安全的日志机制。该机制采用在线公告板作为日志记录的公共只写存储。在冲突解决过程中，公告板还充当可信的第三方。安全日志协议描述了如何将日志记录分发给利益相关者。使用模型检测工具对协议的安全性进行了验证，没有发现安全威胁。
papers.title_zh: 云兼容安全日志机制的设计与形式化验证

papers.title: Multidimensional zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis of the block cipher KASUMI
papers.authors: Wentan Yi, Shaozhen Chen
papers.abstract:
The block cipher KASUMI is widely used for security in many synchronous wireless standards. It was proposed by ETSI SAGE for usage in 3GPP (3rd Generation Partnership Project) ciphering algorthms in 2001. There are a great deal of cryptanalytic results on KASUMI, however, its security evaluation against the recent zero-correlation linear attacks is still lacking so far. In this paper, we select some special input masks to refine the general 5-round zero-correlation linear approximations combining with some observations on the $FL$ functions and then propose the 6-round zero-correlation linear attack on KASUMI. Moreover, zero-correlation linear attacks on the last 7-round KASUMI are also introduced under some weak keys conditions. These weak keys take $2^{-14}$ of the whole key space. 
The new zero-correlation linear attack on the 6-round needs about $2^{85}$ encryptions with $2^{62.8}$ known plaintexts. For the attack under weak keys conditions on the last 7 round, the data complexity is about $2^{62.1}$ known plaintexts and the time complexity $2^{110.5}$ encryptions.
papers.abstract_zh:
分组密码KASUMI在许多同步无线标准中广泛用于安全性。它是由ETSI·塞奇在2001年提出用于3GPP(第三代合作伙伴计划)加密算法的。KASUMI已经有了大量的密码分析结果，但是目前还缺乏针对最近零相关线性攻击的安全性评估。在本文中，我们选择了一些特殊的输入掩码，结合对$FL$函数的一些观察，改进了一般的5轮零相关线性近似，然后提出了对KASUMI的6轮零相关线性攻击。此外，在一些弱密钥条件下，对最后7轮KASUMI的零相关线性攻击也被引入。这些弱键占据了整个键空间的$2^{-14}$。
新的零相关线性攻击的6轮需要关于$2^{85}$加密与$2^{62.8}$已知明文。对于后7轮弱密钥条件下的攻击，数据复杂度约为$2^{62.1}$已知明文，时间复杂度约为$2^{110.5}$加密。
papers.title_zh: 分组密码KASUMI的多维零相关线性密码分析

papers.title: Guest Editorial
papers.authors: Nele Mentens, Damien Sauveron, José M. Sierra, Shiuh-Jeng Wang, Isaac Woungang
