papers.title: Hash-One: a lightweight cryptographic hash function
papers.authors: Puliparambil Megha Mukundan, Sindhu Manayankath, Chungath Srinivasan, Madathil Sethumadhavan
papers.abstract: The increased demand for lightweight applications has triggered the need for appropriate security mechanisms in them. Lightweight cryptographic hash functions are among the major responses toward such a requirement. The authors thus have a handful of such hash functions such as QUARK, PHOTON, SPONGENT and GLUON introduced already. The cryptanalysis of these hash functions is crucial in analysing their strength and often calls for improvement in designs. Their performance, are also to be taken care of, in terms of both software and hardware implementations. Here, they propose a lightweight hash function with reduced complexity in terms of hardware implementation, capable of achieving standard security. It uses sponge construction with permutation function involving the update of two non-linear feedback shift registers. Thus, in terms of sponge capacity it provides at least 80 bit security against generic attacks which is acceptable currently.
papers.abstract_zh: 对轻量级应用程序不断增长的需求引发了对适当的安全机制的需求。轻量级加密散列函数是对这种需求的主要响应之一。因此，作者已经引入了一些这样的散列函数，如夸克、光子、海绵子和胶子。对这些散列函数的密码分析在分析它们的强度时是至关重要的，并且通常需要改进设计。在软件和硬件实现方面，它们的性能也需要考虑。在这里，他们提出了一种轻量级哈希函数，在硬件实现方面具有降低的复杂性，能够实现标准的安全性。它使用具有置换函数的海绵结构，涉及两个非线性反馈移位寄存器的更新。因此，就海绵容量而言，它提供了至少80位的安全性来抵御目前可接受的一般攻击。
papers.title_zh: Hash-One:一个轻量级加密哈希函数

papers.title: Compact and low-power ASIP design for lightweight PUF-based authentication protocols
papers.authors: Aydin Aysu, Ege Gulcan, Daisuke Moriyama, Patrick Schaumont
papers.abstract:
There is a disconnection between the theory and the practice of lightweight physical unclonable function (PUF)-based protocols. At a theoretical level, there exist several PUF-based authentication protocols with unique features and novel efficiency claims, but most of these solutions lack real-world implementations with simple performance figures. On the other hand, practical protocol implementations are ad-hoc
 designs fixed to a specific functionality and with limited area optimisations. This work aims to bring these approaches on PUF protocols closer. The authors' contribution is twofold. First, they provide a novel ASIP (application-specific instruction set processor) that can efficiently execute PUF-based authentication protocols. The key novelty of the proposed ASIP is optimisation for area without degrading the performance. Second, they demonstrate the capability of their ASIP by mapping three secure PUF-based authentication protocols and benchmark their execution time, memory footprint, communication overhead, and power/energy consumption. Their results demonstrate the advantage of ASIP over dedicated architectures and also as opposed to general-purpose programming on an MSP430. The results further demonstrate various efficiency metrics that can be used to compare PUF-based protocol implementations.
papers.abstract_zh:
基于轻量级物理不可克隆功能(PUF)的协议的理论和实践之间存在脱节。在理论层面上，存在几种基于PUF的认证协议，它们具有独特的功能和新颖的效率声明，但是这些解决方案中的大多数缺乏具有简单性能数字的真实世界实现。另一方面，实际的协议实现是特定的
针对特定功能和有限区域优化的设计。这项工作旨在使PUF议定书的这些方法更加接近。作者的贡献是双重的。首先，它们提供了一种新颖的ASIP(专用指令集处理器)，可以有效地执行基于PUF的认证协议。所提出的ASIP的关键新颖性是在不降低性能的情况下优化面积。其次，他们通过映射三个基于PUF的安全认证协议，并对其执行时间、内存占用、通信开销和功耗进行基准测试，展示了其ASIP的能力。他们的结果证明了ASIP相对于专用架构以及相对于MSP430上的通用编程的优势。结果进一步证明了可用于比较基于PUF的协议实现的各种效率度量。
papers.title_zh: 用于轻量级基于PUF的认证协议的紧凑和低功耗ASIP设计

papers.title: Template attack on SPA and FA resistant implementation of Montgomery ladder
papers.authors: Abhishek Chakraborty, Sarani Bhattacharya, Tanu Hari Dixit, Chester Rebeiro, Debdeep Mukhopadhyay
papers.abstract: Hardware implementations of the well-known Rivest–Shamir–Adleman (RSA) algorithm have been shown to be vulnerable to power and fault analysis (FA) attacks. To implement protected designs of RSA-Chinese remainder theorem in embedded devices, like smart cards or RFIDs, the one needs to find solutions which require less computations as well as incurs low storage overheads. One such efficient scheme was proposed by Joye et al. in CHES'02 and it was claimed to be secure against both simple power analysis (SPA) and FA attacks. In this study, the authors demonstrate a template attack (TA) against Joye's countermeasure and show that the scheme can be broken with a low number of power traces. In addition, the authors report the experimental results of the proposed attack against an implementation of Joye's scheme on a Xilinx Microblaze soft-core processor of SASEBO-W standard side-channel analysis board. The authors used least squares support vector machine (LS-SVM) based binary classifiers to analyse the collected power traces. The authors also describe the potential threat posed by cache timing attacks on Joye's ladder in presence of a concurrently running spy process and outline a probable countermeasure to the posed attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知的Rivest–sha mir–ad leman(RSA)算法的硬件实现已被证明易受电源和故障分析(FA)攻击。为了在嵌入式设备(如智能卡或RFIDs)中实现RSA-中国剩余定理的受保护设计，人们需要找到需要较少计算以及导致较低存储开销的解决方案。Joye等人在CHES’02中提出了一个这样的有效方案，并声称该方案可以抵抗简单功耗分析(SPA)和FA攻击。在这项研究中，作者演示了针对Joye的对策的模板攻击(TA ),并表明该方案可以用少量的电源跟踪来破解。此外，作者报告了针对Joye方案在SASEBO-W标准侧信道分析板的Xilinx Microblaze软核处理器上的实现所提出的攻击的实验结果。作者使用基于最小二乘支持向量机(LS-SVM)的二元分类器来分析采集的功率轨迹。作者还描述了在存在并行运行的间谍进程的情况下，缓存计时攻击对Joye's ladder造成的潜在威胁，并概述了对所造成的攻击的可能对策。
papers.title_zh: 蒙哥马利阶梯抗SPA和FA的模板攻击实现

papers.title: Cost-effective polynomial-based multicast-unicast key distribution framework for secure group communication in IPv6 multicast networks
papers.authors: Vinoth Chakkaravarthy Ganesan, Alli Periyakaruppan, Raja Lavanya
papers.abstract: Security and efficiency are the two contradictory objectives to be achieved in designing a secure key distribution protocol for a resource constraint wireless multicast IPv6 networks. In this study, the authors propose a polynomial-based multicast–unicast key distribution technique in which the group key should be securely distributed within the group with minimum overhead. The first dimension deals with the scalability problem, which is addressed by dividing the network into subgroups and each subgroup is managed by a subgroup manager. To achieve the efficiency, the transmission level is separated as unicast and multicast where unicast supports key generation and multicast uses polynomial P(x) for distributing group key without encryption. The second dimension aims at reducing communication, computation and storage costs of the proposed technique during join and leave. The third dimension focuses on the security aspects. To attain these three dimensions, the proposed technique has been implemented using a tree-based key management scheme and the performance is analysed with the existing schemes. From the observations, the performance of the proposed scheme is satisfactory in terms of communication, computation and storage costs as well as security.
papers.abstract_zh: 在为资源受限的无线组播IPv6网络设计安全的密钥分发协议时，安全性和效率是两个相互矛盾的目标。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种基于多项式的组播-单播密钥分发技术，其中组密钥应该以最小的开销在组内安全地分发。第一维处理可扩展性问题，通过将网络划分为子组来解决该问题，并且每个子组由子组管理器管理。为了实现效率，传输层被分为单播和多播，其中单播支持密钥生成，而多播使用多项式P(x)来分发组密钥而不加密。第二维旨在减少加入和离开期间所提出技术的通信、计算和存储成本。第三个方面侧重于安全方面。为了实现这三个方面，使用基于树的密钥管理方案实现了所提出的技术，并且使用现有方案分析了性能。从观察结果来看，所提出的方案在通信、计算和存储成本以及安全性方面的性能是令人满意的。
papers.title_zh: IPv6组播网络中安全组通信的低成本多项式组播-单播密钥分发框架

papers.title: Efficient serverless radio-frequency identification mutual authentication and secure tag search protocols with untrusted readers
papers.authors: Collins Mtita, Maryline Laurent, Jacques Delort
papers.abstract: Radio-frequency identification (RFID) technology's potential relies on advances made by researchers for addressing the technology's security and privacy vulnerabilities, and making data collection and storage in an RFID system safe. Privacy and security are key concerns, as paramount as efficiency and reliability, in raising the confidence of end users towards RFID technologies. This study proposes two complementary lightweight and efficient serverless security protocols in the presence of untrusted RFID readers. The first one is used for mass authentication of RFID tags and supports mutual authentication with key establishment. The second one is an RFID tag search protocol that helps interacting with one specific tag surrounded by a huge number of other tags. The originality of both protocols holds that no shared parameters are required between tags and readers for mutual authentication support, they refer to the same basic material, and they have low resource demands in storage, bandwidth, energy and computation for both RFID readers and tags. Finally, the authors’ protocols have been formally verified under the computational model using CryptoVerif tool.
papers.abstract_zh: 射频识别(RFID)技术的潜力依赖于研究人员在解决该技术的安全和隐私漏洞以及使RFID系统中的数据收集和存储安全方面取得的进展。在提高最终用户对RFID技术的信心方面，隐私和安全是关键问题，与效率和可靠性一样重要。这项研究提出了两个互补的轻量级和有效的无服务器安全协议在存在不可信的RFID阅读器。第一种用于RFID标签的大规模认证，并支持通过密钥建立的相互认证。第二个是RFID标签搜索协议，它有助于与被大量其他标签包围的特定标签进行交互。这两个协议的独创性在于，标签和阅读器之间不需要共享参数来进行相互认证支持，它们引用相同的基本材料，并且它们对RFID阅读器和标签的存储、带宽、能量和计算的资源需求低。最后，使用CryptoVerif工具在计算模型下对作者的协议进行了形式化验证。
papers.title_zh: 具有不可信阅读器的高效无服务器射频识别双向认证和安全标签搜索协议

papers.title: Lightweight authentication with key-agreement protocol for mobile network environment using smart cards
papers.authors: Goutham Reddy Alavalapati, Eun-Jun Yoon, Ashok Kumar Das, Kee-Young Yoo
papers.abstract:
In 2012, Mun et al.
 proposed an enhanced secure authentication with key-agreement protocol for roaming service in global mobility networks environment based on elliptic curve cryptography. They claimed that their protocol is efficient and resistant to prominent security attacks. The careful analysis of this study proves that Mun et al.
's protocol is susceptible to several attacks such as replay attack, man-in-middle attack, user impersonation attack, privileged insider attack, denial-of-service attack, no login phase and imperfect mutual authentication phase. In addition, this study proposes an enhanced lightweight authentication with key-agreement protocol for mobile networks based on elliptic curve cryptography using smart cards. The proposed protocol is lightweight and perfectly suitable for real-time applications as it accomplishes simple one-way hash function, message authentication code and exclusive-OR operation. Furthermore, it achieves all the eminent security properties and is resistant to various possible attacks. The security analysis and comparison section demonstrates that the proposed protocol is robust compared with Mun et al.
's protocol.

papers.title: Selective opening security of practical public-key encryption schemes
papers.authors: Felix Heuer, Tibor Jager, Sven Schäge, Eike Kiltz
papers.abstract: The authors show that two well-known and widely employed public-key encryption schemes – RSA optimal asymmetric encryption padding (RSA-OAEP) and Diffie–Hellman integrated encryption scheme (DHIES), instantiated with a one-time pad, – are secure under (the strong, simulation-based security notion of) selective opening security against chosen-ciphertext attacks in the random oracle model. Both schemes are obtained via known generic transformations that transform relatively weak primitives (with security in the sense of one-wayness) to indistinguishability (IND)-CCA secure encryption schemes. The authors also show a similar result for the well-known Fujisaki–Okamoto transformation that can generically turn a one-way secure public key encryption system and a one-time pad into a IND-CCA-secure public-key encryption system. The authors prove that selective opening security comes for free in these transformations. Both DHIES and RSA-OAEP are important building blocks in several standards for public key encryption and key exchange protocols. The Fujisaki–Okamoto transformation is very versatile and has successfully been utilised to build efficient lattice-based cryptosystems. The considered schemes are the first practical cryptosystems that meet the strong notion of simulation-based selective opening (SIM-SO-CCA) security.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者证明了两个众所周知且广泛使用的公钥加密方案——RSA最优非对称加密填充(RSA-OAEP)和Diffie-Hellman集成加密方案(DHIES ),用一次一密进行实例化——在随机预言模型中抵抗选择密文攻击的选择性开放安全性(强大的、基于模拟的安全概念)下是安全的。这两种方案都是通过已知的一般变换获得的，这些变换将相对弱的原语(在单向意义上具有安全性)变换为不可区分性(IND)-CCA安全加密方案。作者还展示了著名的藤崎琴音-冈本变换的类似结果，该变换一般可以将单向安全公钥加密系统和一次性密码本转变为IND-CCA-secure公钥加密系统。作者证明了选择性开放安全性在这些转换中是免费的。DHIES和RSA-OAEP都是公钥加密和密钥交换协议的几个标准中的重要构件。藤崎琴音-冈本变换是非常通用的，并已成功地用于建立有效的基于格的密码系统。所考虑的方案是满足基于模拟的选择性开放(SIM-SO-CCA)安全性的强概念的第一个实用密码系统。
papers.title_zh: 实用公钥加密方案的选择性开放安全性

papers.title: Adaptive proofs of knowledge in the random oracle model
papers.authors: David Bernhard, Marc Fischlin, Bogdan Warinschi
papers.abstract:
We formalise the notion of adaptive proofs of knowledge in the random oracle model, where the extractor has to recover witnesses for multiple, possibly adaptively chosen statements and proofs. We also discuss extensions to simulation soundness, as typically required for the “encrypt-then-prove” construction of strongly secure encryption from IND-CPA schemes. Utilizing our model we show three results: 
 
(1) 
 
Simulation-sound adaptive proofs exist. 
 
 
 
 
(2) 
 
The “encrypt-then-prove” construction with a simulation-sound adaptive proof yields CCA security. This appears to be a “folklore” result but which has never been proven in the random oracle model. As a corollary, we obtain a new class of CCA-secure encryption schemes. 
 
 
 
 
(3) 
 
We show that the Fiat-Shamir transformed Schnorr protocol is not adaptively secure and discuss the implications of this limitation.
papers.abstract_zh:
我们在随机预言模型中形式化了知识的自适应证明的概念，其中提取器必须为多个可能自适应选择的陈述和证明恢复见证。我们还讨论了模拟可靠性的扩展，这通常是IND-CPA方案中强安全加密的“加密-然后-证明”构造所需要的。利用我们的模型，我们显示了三个结果:

(1)

模拟声音自适应证据存在。




(2)

具有模拟声音自适应证明的“加密-然后-证明”结构产生了CCA安全性。这似乎是一个“民间传说”的结果，但从未在随机预言模型中得到证实。作为推论，我们得到了一类新的CCA安全加密方案。




(3)

我们证明了Fiat-Shamir变换的Schnorr协议不是自适应安全的，并讨论了这一限制的含义。
papers.title_zh: 随机预言模型中知识的适应性证明

papers.title: Bootstrapping BGV ciphertexts with a wider choice of p and q
papers.authors: Emmanuela Orsini, Joop van de Pol, Nigel P. Smart
papers.abstract: We describe a method to bootstrap a packed BGV ciphertext which does not depend (as much) on any special properties of the plaintext and ciphertext moduli. Prior “efficient” methods such as that of Gentry et al. (PKC 2012) required a ciphertext modulus \(q\) which was close to a power of the plaintext modulus \(p\). This enables our method to be applied in a larger number of situations. Also unlike previous methods our depth grows only as \(O(\log p + \log \log q)\) as opposed to the \(\log q\) of previous methods. Our basic bootstrapping technique makes use of a representation of the group \({\mathbb {Z}}_q^+\) over the finite field \({\mathbb {F}}_p\) (either based on polynomials or elliptic curves), followed by polynomial interpolation of the reduction mod \(p\) map over the coefficients of the algebraic group.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们描述了一种引导打包BGV密文的方法，它不依赖于明文和密文模的任何特殊性质。先前的“有效”方法，如Gentry等人(PKC 2012年)的方法，要求密文模数\(q\)接近于明文模数\(p\)的幂。这使得我们的方法能够应用于更多的情况。也不同于以前的方法，我们的深度只增长为\(O(\log p + \log \log q)\)，而不是以前的方法的\(\log q\)。我们的基本自举技术利用有限域\({ \ mathbb {z}}_q^+\ })上的群\({\mathbb {F}}_p\)(基于多项式或椭圆曲线)的表示，随后是代数群的系数上的约化模\(p\)映射的多项式插值。
papers.title_zh: 自举BGV密文具有更广泛的p和q选择

papers.title: Strongly-optimal structure preserving signatures from Type II pairings: synthesis and lower bounds
papers.authors: Gilles Barthe, Edvard Fagerholm, Dario Fiore, Andre Scedrov, Benedikt Schmidt, Mehdi Tibouchi
papers.abstract: Recent work on structure-preserving signatures studies optimality of these schemes in terms of the number of group elements needed in the verification key and the signature, and the number of pairing-product equations in the verification algorithm. While the size of keys and signatures is crucial for many applications, another important aspect to consider for performance is the time it takes to verify a given signature. By far, the most expensive operation during verification is the computation of pairings. However, the concrete number of pairings that one needs to compute is not captured by the number of pairing-product equations considered in earlier work.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近关于结构保持签名的工作研究了这些方案在验证密钥和签名中所需的组元素的数量以及验证算法中的配对乘积方程的数量方面的最优性。虽然密钥和签名的大小对于许多应用程序来说是至关重要的，但是要考虑性能的另一个重要方面是验证给定签名所需的时间。到目前为止，验证期间最昂贵的操作是配对计算。然而，我们需要计算的配对的具体数目并没有被早期工作中考虑的配对乘积方程的数目所捕获。
papers.title_zh: II型配对的强最优结构保持签名:综合和下界

papers.title: Low Noise LPN: Key dependent message secure public key encryption an sample amplification
papers.authors: Nico Döttling
papers.abstract: Cryptographic schemes based on the learning parity with noise (LPN) problem have several very desirable aspects: low computational overhead, simple implementation and conjectured post-quantum hardness. Choosing the LPN noise parameter sufficiently low allows for public key cryptography. In this study, the authors construct the first standard model public key encryption scheme with key dependent message security based solely on the low-noise LPN problem. Additionally, they establish a new connection between LPN with a bounded number of samples and LPN with an unbounded number of samples. In essence, they show that if LPN with a small error and a small number of samples is hard, then LPN with a slightly larger error and an unbounded number of samples is also hard. The key technical ingredient to establish both results is a variant of the LPN problem called the extended LPN problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于带噪声学习奇偶校验(LPN)问题的密码方案有几个非常理想的方面:低计算开销、简单实现和推测的后量子困难。选择足够低的LPN噪声参数允许公钥加密。在本研究中，作者构造了第一个标准模型公钥加密方案，该方案仅基于低噪声LPN问题，具有密钥相关的消息安全性。此外，它们在具有有限数量样本的LPN和具有无限数量样本的LPN之间建立了新的联系。本质上，他们表明，如果具有小误差和小样本数的LPN是困难的，那么具有稍大误差和无限样本数的LPN也是困难的。建立这两个结果的关键技术要素是LPN问题的一个变种，称为扩展LPN问题。
papers.title_zh: 低噪声LPN:密钥相关消息安全公钥加密样本放大

papers.title: Securing solar energy-harvesting road-side unit using an embedded cooperative-hybrid intrusion detection system
papers.authors: Qutaiba Ibrahim Ali
papers.abstract: This study deals with the design and implementation of an Embedded Cooperative-Hybrid Intrusion Detection System (ECHIDS) for a solar energy harvested Road Side Unit(RSU). In order to offer a high level of defense against the various attacks and to cope against the limited processing and energy resources of RSU, we suggest a cooperative IDS approach. In this approach, the RSUs do not depend only on their local view to make conclusions about the security status of their network, but also cooperate with their VANET server by exchanging security reports to create a more global and precise idea about the security situation of the whole network, the possible attacks and their origins. The other main contribution in this paper is the attempt to insert a Hybrid Intrusion Detection System functionality (combines all the three IDS techniques :signature based IDS, anomaly based IDS and behavioral based IDS) into the RSU itself. Each one of these IDSs has its own resistance strategy against certain classes of attacks which enhances RSUs’ immunity. The suggested IDS was prototyped using an experimental model based on the Ubicom IP2022 network processor development kit and different practical tests were performed to evaluate the effectiveness of the suggested solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究旨在设计和实现一个用于太阳能采集路边单元(RSU)的嵌入式合作-混合入侵检测系统(ECHIDS)。为了对各种攻击提供高水平的防御，并应对RSU有限的处理和能量资源，我们建议一种合作的IDS方法。在这种方法中，rsu不仅依靠其本地视图来对其网络的安全状态做出结论，而且还通过交换安全报告来与VANET服务器合作，以创建关于整个网络的安全状况、可能的攻击及其来源的更全面和精确的想法。本文的另一个主要贡献是尝试将混合入侵检测系统功能(结合了所有三种入侵检测技术:基于特征的入侵检测、基于异常的入侵检测和基于行为的入侵检测)插入到RSU中。这些入侵防御系统中的每一个都有自己的抵抗特定攻击类别的策略，这增强了rsu的免疫力。使用基于Ubicom IP2022网络处理器开发套件的实验模型对建议的IDS进行原型化，并且执行不同的实际测试来评估建议的解决方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 使用嵌入式合作-混合入侵检测系统保护太阳能采集路边单元

papers.title: Public key cryptosystems secure against memory leakage attacks
papers.authors: Shifeng Sun, Shuai Han, Dawu Gu, Shengli Liu
papers.abstract: The authors present a new general construction of public key encryption (PKE) based on the restricted subset membership (RSM) assumption, which can achieve the bounded-memory leakage resilient security and the auxiliary-input leakage resilient security simultaneously. The construction is BHHO-type, as Brakerski et al. work, but the message space is much larger and the proof is more concise benefiting from the RSM assumption. Instantiating the construction with the QR assumption, the authors get the first QR-based auxiliary-input secure PKE with a larger message space than {0,1}. Moreover, the authors generalise the Goldreich–Levin theorem to large rings. This theorem helps to improve the construction to achieve the same security level with fewer public parameters and shorter ciphertexts compared with Brakerski et al. work. For the bounded-memory leakage resilient security, the construction can achieve leakage rate of 1 − o(1) and avoid the dependence between the message length and the amount of leakage. Based on the general construction, the authors also can achieve both bounded-memory leakage resilient chosen ciphertext attack (CCA) security and the auxiliary-input leakage resilient CCA security via the well-known Naor–Yung paradigm.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种新的基于受限子集成员假设的公钥加密(PKE)的一般结构，该结构可以同时实现有限内存泄漏弹性安全性和辅助输入泄漏弹性安全性。正如Brakerski等人所做的那样，这种构造是BHHO型的，但是得益于RSM假设，消息空间要大得多，证明也更简洁。用QR假设实例化该构造，作者得到了第一个基于QR的辅助输入安全PKE，其消息空间大于{0，1}。此外，作者将gold Reich-Levin定理推广到大环。与Brakerski等人的工作相比，该定理有助于改进构造，以更少的公共参数和更短的密文实现相同的安全级别。对于有限内存泄漏弹性安全性，该构造可以达到1o(1)的泄漏率，并且避免了消息长度与泄漏量之间的依赖关系。基于一般的构造，作者还可以通过著名的Naor–Yung范式实现有限记忆泄漏弹性选择密文攻击(CCA)安全性和辅助输入泄漏弹性CCA安全性。
papers.title_zh: 防止内存泄漏攻击的公钥密码系统

papers.title: Method for detecting text information leakage in electromagnetic radiation from a computer display
papers.authors: Degang Sun, Jun Shi, Dong Wei, Meng Zhang, Wei-qing Huang
papers.abstract: Considering that the text information might be leaked through electromagnetic radiation from a computer display, a novel algorithm has been developed to detect the text information leakage. Motivated by the observation that the ‘text - space – text’ characteristic for electromagnetic radiation signal contains the text information, the authors proposed a method to describe this characteristic. In this method, sparse decomposition in wavelet was used and sub-band sparsity was defined. Variance mean ratio and correlation coefficients of sub-band sparsity were combined as the features of electromagnetic radiation signals. By using this method, the authors can accurately and efficiently detect the text information leakage in electromagnetic radiation from a computer display without reconstructing the displayed image.
papers.abstract_zh: 考虑到文本信息可能通过来自计算机显示器的电磁辐射泄漏，开发了一种新的算法来检测文本信息泄漏。受电磁辐射信号的“文本-空间-文本”特征包含文本信息这一观察结果的启发，作者提出了描述这一特征的方法。该方法利用小波稀疏分解，定义子带稀疏度。结合子带稀疏度的方差均值比和相关系数作为电磁辐射信号的特征。通过使用该方法，作者可以准确和有效地检测来自计算机显示器的电磁辐射中的文本信息泄漏，而无需重建显示的图像。
papers.title_zh: 检测来自计算机显示器的电磁辐射中的文本信息泄漏的方法

papers.title: Exception-oriented programming: retrofitting code-reuse attacks to construct kernel malware
papers.authors: Liang Deng, Qingkai Zeng
papers.abstract:
Commodity operating system kernels are vulnerable to a wide range of attacks due to the large code base and broad attack surface. Mitigation mechanisms such as code signing, W⊕X, and code integrity protection have raised the bar for kernel security. In turn, attack mechanisms have also become increasingly advanced. They have evolved from simple injection of malicious code into more sophisticated code-reuse attacks [e.g. return-oriented programming (ROP)]. In this study, the authors describe exception-oriented programming (EOP), a novel code-reuse method to construct kernel malware. Unlike previous ROP that can only reuse a limited part of existing code (gadgets), EOP is able to reuse any instruction
 in existing code and chain the instructions in any order to generate malicious programmes. As a result, EOP can provide the attackers with more powerful capabilities and less complexity for building kernel malware.
papers.abstract_zh:
由于大型代码库和广泛的攻击面，商用操作系统内核容易受到各种各样的攻击。代码签名、W⊕X和代码完整性保护等缓解机制提高了内核安全性的门槛。反过来，攻击机制也变得越来越先进。它们已经从简单的恶意代码注入发展成更复杂的代码重用攻击[例如，面向返回的编程(ROP)]。在这项研究中，作者描述了面向异常编程(EOP)，一种新的代码重用方法来构造内核恶意软件。不像以前的ROP只能重用现有代码的有限部分(小工具)，EOP能够重用任何指令
在现有的代码中，并以任何顺序链接指令，以生成恶意程序。因此，EOP可以为攻击者提供更强大的功能和更低的复杂性来构建内核恶意软件。
papers.title_zh: 面向异常的编程:改造代码重用攻击以构造内核恶意软件

papers.title: Improved impossible differential attack on reduced version of Camellia with FL/FL -1 functions
papers.authors: Ya Liu, Anren Yang, Zhiqiang Liu, Wei Li, Qingju Wang, Liang Song, Dawu Gu
papers.abstract: As an ISO/IEC international standard, Camellia has been used in various cryptographic applications. In this study, the authors present the best currently known attacks on Camellia-192/256 with key-dependent layers FL/FL −1 (without the whitening layers) by taking advantage of the intrinsic weakness of keyed functions, the redundancy of key schedule and the early abort technique. Specifically, the authors mount the first impossible differential attack on 13-round Camellia-192 with 2124.79 chosen plaintexts, 2186.09 13-round encryptions and 2129.79 bytes, while the analysis for the biggest number of rounds in previous results on Camellia-192 worked on 12 rounds. Furthermore, the authors successfully attack on 14-round Camellia-256 with 2122.14 chosen plaintexts, 2228.33 14-round encryptions and 2134.14 bytes. Compared with the previously best known attack on 14-round Camellia-256, the time and memory complexities are reduced by 29.87 times and 246.06 times, and the data complexity is comparable.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为ISO/IEC国际标准，Camellia已被用于各种密码应用中。在这项研究中，作者提出了目前已知的对Camellia-192/256进行攻击的最佳方法，即利用键控函数的固有弱点、密钥调度的冗余性和早期中止技术，利用密钥相关层FL/FL 1(无白化层)进行攻击。具体而言，作者对具有2124.79个选择明文、2186.09个13轮加密和2129.79个字节的13轮Camellia-192进行了第一次不可能的差分攻击，而对Camellia-192的先前结果中最大轮数的分析工作在12轮上。此外，作者用2122.14个选择明文、2228.33个14轮加密和2134.14个字节成功地攻击了14轮Camellia-256。与之前最知名的对14轮Camellia-256的攻击相比，时间和内存复杂度分别降低了29.87倍和246.06倍，数据复杂度不相上下。
papers.title_zh: 用FL/FL -1函数改进对简化版Camellia的不可能差分攻击

papers.title: Hyperchaotic system-based pseudorandom number generator
papers.authors: Yang Liu, Xiaojun Tong
papers.abstract: Pseudorandom sequences are very important in the field of cryptography. The characteristics such as non-linearity and random-like behaviours make chaotic systems suited to generate pseudorandom sequences. However, most of chaos-based pseudorandom number generators have a typical shortcoming. That is, the finite precision in all processors may cause the chaotic systems to degenerate into a periodic function or a fixed point. To overcome this shortcoming, a hyperchaos-based generator is proposed. First, a new hyperchaotic system with bigger Lyapunov exponent is constructed. Then the self-shrinking generator, which is superior to many other linear feedback shift register-based generators, is used to perturb the hyperchaotic sequences to decrease the period degeneration and improve the performance of the sequences. The proposed generator is named as hyperchaos with self-shrinking perturbance generator (H-SSP generator). The analysis results show that the H-SSP generator has better performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪随机序列在密码学领域非常重要。非线性和类随机行为等特性使得混沌系统适合于产生伪随机序列。然而，大多数基于混沌的伪随机数发生器都有一个典型的缺点。也就是说，所有处理器中的有限精度可能导致混沌系统退化为周期函数或不动点。为了克服这个缺点，提出了一种基于超混沌的发生器。首先，构造了一个新的具有更大李亚普诺夫指数的超混沌系统。然后利用优于其他线性反馈移位寄存器发生器的自收缩发生器来扰动超混沌序列，以减少周期退化，提高序列性能。该发生器被命名为具有自收缩扰动发生器的超混沌(H-SSP发生器)。分析结果表明，H-SSP发生器具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于超混沌系统的伪随机数发生器

papers.title: Security of weak secrets based cryptographic primitives via the Rényi entropy
papers.authors: Yanqing Yao, Zhoujun Li
papers.abstract: In ideality, cryptographic primitives take for granted that the secret sources are derived from uniform distribution. However, in reality, we may only obtain some ‘weak’ random sources guaranteed with high unpredictability (e.g. biometric data, physical sources, and secrets with partial leakage). Formally, the security of cryptographic primitives is measured by the expectation of some function, called ‘perfect’ expectation in the ideal model and ‘weak’ expectation in the real model. The authors propose some elementary inequalities which show that the ‘weak’ expectation is not much worse than the ‘perfect’ expectation. The authors present how to overcome weak expectations dependent on the Renyi entropy other than the min and collision entropies by Dodis and Yu [TCC 2013]. The authors achieve these results by capturing on two approaches: one is by observing a new relationship between the collision entropy and other Renyi entropy, the other is by developing the connection between different moments of a variable. Furthermore, pseudorandom generator, and pairwise independent hash function family, the authors extend key derivation functions based on the Renyi entropy. The results are applied to all unpredictability applications and ‘square-friendly’ indistinguishability applications including CPA-secure symmetric-key encryption schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在理想情况下，密码原语想当然地认为秘密源来自均匀分布。然而，在现实中，我们可能只获得一些具有高度不可预测性的“弱”随机源(例如，生物数据、物理源和部分泄漏的秘密)。在形式上，密码原语的安全性是由某个函数的期望来衡量的，在理想模型中称为“完美”期望，在真实模型中称为“弱”期望。作者提出了一些基本不等式，表明“弱”期望并不比“完美”期望差多少。作者介绍了如何克服依赖于Renyi熵的弱期望，而不是Dodis和Yu的最小熵和碰撞熵[TCC 2013]。作者通过两种方法获得了这些结果:一种是通过观察碰撞熵和其他Renyi熵之间的新关系，另一种是通过开发变量的不同矩之间的联系。此外，伪随机发生器和成对独立散列函数族，作者扩展了基于Renyi熵的密钥导出函数。这些结果适用于所有不可预测性应用和“平方友好”不可区分性应用，包括CPA安全对称密钥加密方案。
papers.title_zh: 基于Rényi熵的弱秘密密码原语的安全性

papers.title: Implementation of single-packet hybrid IP traceback for IPv4 and IPv6 networks
papers.authors: Kamaldeep, Manisha Malik, Maitreyee Dutta
papers.abstract: The Internet and other computing technologies have seen rapid growth in the recent years; the malicious users continue to look for vulnerabilities in the Internet infrastructure to perform various types of attacks. Distributed denial-of-service attack is an attack in which licit users are repudiated the access to available resources either temporarily or indefinitely. To establish liability for these attacks, there is a need to scout for real attack sources. Schemes that identify the source of packets on the Internet are called IP traceback schemes. Hybrid IP traceback schemes outdo discrete marking and logging approaches and trace the source of attack using a few packets. The findings of this research redound to current single-packet hybrid IP traceback schemes by employing the double hashing technique to resolve collisions in the hash table and thus reducing the logging time at routers by 15%. Besides, the proposed scheme ensures zero false positives by encoding the options field in IPv4 header. The research also introduces the first single-packet hybrid IP traceback implementation for IPv6 networks using hop-by-hop extension header. The simulation results correctly demonstrate the viability of the proposed scheme and unveil that IPv6 implementation requires 82.5% less storage in contrast to existing work.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网和其他计算技术近年来发展迅速；恶意用户继续寻找互联网基础设施中的漏洞来执行各种类型的攻击。分布式拒绝服务攻击是一种暂时或无限期拒绝合法用户访问可用资源的攻击。为了确定这些攻击的责任，需要寻找真正的攻击源。识别互联网上数据包来源的方案称为IP回溯方案。混合IP追踪方案优于离散标记和记录方法，并且使用几个数据包就能追踪攻击源。这项研究的发现有助于当前的单包混合IP追溯方案，它采用双重哈希技术来解决哈希表中的冲突，从而将路由器的日志记录时间减少15%。此外，所提出的方案通过对IPv4报头中的选项字段进行编码来确保零误报。该研究还介绍了第一个使用逐跳扩展报头的IPv6网络单包混合IP回溯实现。仿真结果正确地证明了所提出的方案的可行性，并且揭示了与现有工作相比，IPv6实现需要减少82.5%的存储。
papers.title_zh: IPv4和IPv6网络单包混合IP追踪的实现

papers.title: Virtualisation security risk assessment for enterprise cloud services based on stochastic game nets model
papers.authors: Junjie Lv, Juling Rong
papers.abstract: Resource virtualisation is a prominent characteristic of cloud services, and it determines the resource utilisation efficiency and service quality. However, the virtualisation security issues also have a significant impact on the safety of cloud services. The security of virtualisation in cloud services is so complicated that current security risk assessment methods generally have some limitations when applying in cloud services. In this work, a security risk assessment model has been proposed for cloud services as a solution of this problem using stochastic game nets. Based on graphical tools, the virtualisation security risk scenario of cloud services can be described clearly, and virtualisation security risk factors can be evaluated accurately. The analysis results proved this method had powerful ability to simulate complicated and dynamic security issues in cloud services. Furthermore, our achievements can be used to help the cloud provider or tenant of the cloud service system taking corresponding measures to mitigate the risk.
papers.abstract_zh: 资源虚拟化是云服务的一个显著特征，它决定了资源利用效率和服务质量。然而，虚拟化安全问题对云服务的安全性也有很大的影响。云服务虚拟化的安全性非常复杂，当前的安全风险评估方法在应用于云服务时普遍存在一定的局限性。本文提出了一种基于随机博弈网的云服务安全风险评估模型。基于图形化工具，可以清晰地描述云服务的虚拟化安全风险场景，准确地评估虚拟化安全风险因素。分析结果表明，该方法具有模拟云服务中复杂动态安全问题的强大能力。此外，我们的研究成果可以帮助云提供商或云服务系统的租户采取相应的措施来降低风险。
papers.title_zh: 基于随机博弈网模型的企业云服务虚拟化安全风险评估

papers.title: Privacy preserving big data mining: association rule hiding using fuzzy logic approach
papers.authors: Golnar Assadat Afzali, Shahriar Mohammadi
papers.abstract: Recently, privacy preserving data mining has been studied widely. Association rule mining can cause potential threat toward privacy of data. So, association rule hiding techniques are employed to avoid the risk of sensitive knowledge leakage. Many researches have been done on association rule hiding, but most of them focus on proposing algorithms with least side effect for static databases (with no new data entrance), while now the authors confront with streaming data which are continuous data. Furthermore, in the age of big data, it is necessary to optimise existing methods to be executable for large volume of data. In this study, data anonymisation is used to fit the proposed model for big data mining. Besides, special features of big data such as velocity make it necessary to consider each rule as a sensitive association rule with an appropriate membership degree. Furthermore, parallelisation techniques which are embedded in the proposed model, can help to speed up data mining process.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，隐私保护数据挖掘得到了广泛的研究。关联规则挖掘会对数据隐私造成潜在威胁。因此，关联规则隐藏技术被用来避免敏感知识泄露的风险。人们对关联规则隐藏进行了大量的研究，但大多数研究集中在为静态数据库(没有新的数据入口)提出副作用最小的算法，而现在作者面对的是连续数据的流数据。此外，在大数据时代，有必要优化现有方法，使其适用于大量数据。在这项研究中，数据匿名化用于拟合大数据挖掘的拟议模型。此外，大数据的特殊功能(如速度)使得有必要将每个规则视为具有适当隶属度的敏感关联规则。此外，该模型中嵌入的并行化技术有助于加速数据挖掘过程。
papers.title_zh: 隐私保护的大数据挖掘:基于模糊逻辑的关联规则隐藏

papers.title: Securing RSA against power analysis attacks through non-uniform exponent partitioning with randomisation
papers.authors: Hridoy Jyoti Mahanta, Ajoy Kumar Khan
papers.abstract: This study presents an approach to compute randomised modular exponentiation through non-uniform exponent partitioning. The exponent has been first partitioned into multiple parts and then shuffled by Fisher Yates method. Thereafter, every partition randomly computes modular exponentiation followed by a final modulo operation to generate the desired result. The shuffling has been introduced to randomise the execution order of individual modular exponentiation. This work is implemented in Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) and Chinese remainder theorem RSA as they are modular exponentiation based public key cryptosystems. The results have been analysed during decryption with different key sizes. The results indicate that the proposed work can generate non-uniform partitions of the exponent which could not be easily anticipated even in multiple iterations. Also, the shuffling method could completely randomise the execution order of modular exponentiation operations. With non-uniform exponent partitions and randomised modular exponentiation, the proposed work could challenge all the variances of power analysis attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了一种通过非均匀指数划分计算随机模幂的方法。首先将指数分成多个部分，然后用Fisher Yates方法进行混洗。此后，每个分区随机计算模幂运算，随后是最终的模运算，以生成所需的结果。引入混洗是为了使单个模幂运算的执行顺序随机化。这项工作是在Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA)和中国剩余定理RSA中实现的，因为它们是基于模幂运算的公钥密码系统。在用不同的密钥大小解密的过程中，对结果进行了分析。结果表明，所提出的工作可以生成即使在多次迭代中也不容易预测的指数的非均匀划分。此外，混洗方法可以完全随机化模幂运算的执行顺序。利用非均匀指数划分和随机模幂运算，所提出的工作可以挑战所有的功耗分析攻击的变化。
papers.title_zh: 通过随机化非均匀指数划分保护RSA免受功耗分析攻击

papers.title: A provably secure code-based concurrent signature scheme
papers.authors: Maryam Rajabzadeh Asaar, Mohammad Hassan Ameri, Mahmoud Salmasizadeh, Mohammad Reza Aref
papers.abstract: Concurrent signatures allow two entities to generate two signatures in such a way that both signatures are ambiguous till some information is revealed by one of the parties. This kind of signature is useful in auction protocols and in a wide range of scenarios in which involving participants are mutually distrustful. In this study, to have quantum-attack-resistant concurrent signatures as recommended by National Institute of Standards and Technology (NISTIR 8105), the first concurrent signature scheme based on coding theory is proposed. Then, its security is proved under Goppa Parameterized Bounded Decoding and the Goppa Code Distinguishing assumptions in the random oracle model. In addition, performance evaluation shows that the proposal is approximately as efficient as Dallot scheme. The authors should highlight that their proposal can be a post-quantum candidate for fair exchange of signatures without a trusted third party in an efficient way (without a high degree of interactions).
papers.abstract_zh: 并发签名允许两个实体以这样的方式生成两个签名，使得两个签名都是不明确的，直到其中一方透露了一些信息。这种签名在拍卖协议和各种参与者互不信任的场景中非常有用。在本研究中，为了实现美国国家标准与技术研究所(NISTIR 8105)推荐的抗量子攻击的并发签名，提出了第一个基于编码理论的并发签名方案。然后，在随机预言模型下，在Goppa参数化有界解码和Goppa码区分假设下证明了其安全性。此外，性能评估表明，该方案的效率与Dallot方案相当。作者应该强调，他们的提议可以是后量子候选，用于以有效的方式(没有高度的交互)公平交换签名，而不需要可信的第三方。
papers.title_zh: 一个可证明安全的基于代码的并发签名方案

papers.title: Database authentication watermarking scheme in encrypted domain
papers.authors: Shijun Xiang, Jiayong He
papers.abstract: Digital watermarking in encrypted domain is a potential technology for privacy protection (with encryption) and integrity authentication (with watermark) in cloud computing environments. Based on order-preserving encryption scheme (OPES), discrete cosine transformation (DCT), cryptography hash and watermarking technologies, this study proposes a new database authentication watermarking scheme in encrypted domain. Firstly, data in a database are encrypted with OPES for privacy protection. Then, the encrypted data are divided into groups for DCT operations. The watermark bits generated by hashing AC coefficients are embedded into DC coefficients for integrity authentication of the encrypted data. In receiver, whether the data have been tampered can be claimed by matching the hash value of AC coefficients and the extracted watermark information from DC coefficients. The watermark embedding process in encrypted domain is lossless to plaintext data by exploring order-preserving property of OPES. In the receiver, an illegal user can recover the original database by directly decrypting the watermarked ciphertext data. Experimental results have shown that the algorithm can efficiently detect different tampering operations while protecting data content security with OPES.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密域数字水印是云计算环境下隐私保护(加密)和完整性认证(水印)的潜在技术。基于保序加密方案(OPES)、离散余弦变换(DCT)、密码哈希和水印技术，提出了一种新的加密域数据库认证水印方案。首先，数据库中的数据用OPES加密以保护隐私。然后，加密数据被分组进行DCT操作。通过散列AC系数产生的水印比特被嵌入到DC系数中，用于加密数据的完整性认证。在接收端，通过匹配AC系数的哈希值和从DC系数中提取的水印信息，可以判断数据是否被篡改。通过探索OPES的保序特性，在加密域嵌入水印的过程对明文数据是无损的。在接收端，非法用户可以通过直接解密带水印的密文数据来恢复原始数据库。实验结果表明，该算法能够有效检测不同的篡改操作，同时利用OPES保护数据内容安全。
papers.title_zh: 加密域数据库认证水印方案

papers.title: Attribute-based broadcast encryption scheme for lightweight devices
papers.authors: Sébastien Canard, Duong Hieu Phan, Viet Cuong Trinh
papers.abstract: Lightweight devices, such as a smartcard associated with a top-box decoder in pay-TV or a SIM card coupled with a powerful (but not totally trusted) smartphone, play an important role in modern applications. The essential requirements for a cryptographic scheme to be truly implemented in lightweight devices are that it should have compact secret key size and support fast decryption. Attribute-based broadcast encryption (ABBE) combines the functionalities of both broadcast encryption and attribute-based encryption in an efficient way, ABBE is therefore a promising cryptographic scheme to be used in practical applications such as mobile pay-TV, satellite transmission, or Internet of Things. Designing an ABBE scheme which can be truly implemented in lightweight devices is still an open question. In this study, the authors solve it by proposing an efficient constant-size private key ciphertext-policy ABBE scheme for disjunctive normal form supporting fast decryption and achieving standard security levels of an ABBE scheme. They concretely show that the authors’ scheme can be truly implemented in a prototype for a smartphone-based cloud storage use case. In particular, they show how to alleviate some parts of their scheme so as to obtain a very practical system, and they give some concrete benchmarks.
papers.abstract_zh: 轻量级设备，如与付费电视机顶盒解码器相关的智能卡或与功能强大(但不完全可信)的智能手机相关的SIM卡，在现代应用中发挥着重要作用。真正在轻量级设备中实现加密方案的基本要求是它应该具有紧凑的密钥大小并支持快速解密。基于属性的广播加密(ABBE)有效地结合了广播加密和基于属性的加密的功能，因此是一种有前途的加密方案，可用于移动付费电视、卫星传输或物联网等实际应用中。设计一种能够真正在轻型设备中实现的阿贝方案仍然是一个公开的问题。在本研究中，作者通过提出一个有效的常数大小私钥密文策略ABBE方案来解决这个问题，该方案用于析取范式，支持快速解密并达到ABBE方案的标准安全级别。他们具体展示了作者的方案可以在基于智能手机的云存储用例的原型中真正实现。特别地，他们展示了如何减轻他们的方案的某些部分，以便获得一个非常实用的系统，并且他们给出了一些具体的基准。
papers.title_zh: 轻量级设备基于属性的广播加密方案

papers.title: Mining malicious behavioural patterns
papers.authors: Hassan Seifi, Saeed Parsa
papers.abstract: Most malware producers bypass signature-based detections through obfuscation techniques. Therefore, in order to provide proactive and real-time protection, the researchers have begun to develop strategies for behaviour-based detection. Despite of being a popular and promising non-deterministic solution to detect various forms of malware families, behavioural modelling techniques suffer from relatively high false positive rate in malware detection. To overcome this problem, the authors shall seek for identifying patterns, representing malicious intent in all instances of a malware family. In this study, they propose a new technique based on discriminative graph mining techniques to identify discriminative subgraphs. The subgraphs represent behavioural patterns in each malware family. Their evaluation results demonstrate an average of 91% accuracy in detection of malicious programme behaviours, with no false positive.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数恶意软件制作者通过混淆技术绕过基于签名的检测。因此，为了提供主动和实时的保护，研究人员已经开始开发基于行为的检测策略。尽管行为建模技术是检测各种形式的恶意软件家族的流行且有前途的非确定性解决方案，但是在恶意软件检测中行为建模技术遭受相对高的假阳性率。为了克服这个问题，作者将寻求识别模式，代表恶意软件家族的所有实例中的恶意意图。在这项研究中，他们提出了一种基于区别图挖掘技术的新技术来识别区别子图。子图代表每个恶意软件家族中的行为模式。他们的评估结果表明，恶意程序行为检测的平均准确率为91%，没有假阳性。
papers.title_zh: 挖掘恶意行为模式

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of a generic one-round key exchange protocol with strong security
papers.authors: Zheng Yang, Junyu Lai, Guoyuan Li
papers.abstract:
In Public-Key Cryptography (PKC) 2015, Bergsma et al.
 introduced an interesting one-round key exchange protocol (which will be referred to as BJS scheme) with strong security in particular for perfect forward secrecy (PFS). In this study, the authors unveil a PFS attack against the BJS scheme. This would simply invalidate its security proof. An improvement is proposed to fix the problem of the BJS scheme with minimum changes.
papers.abstract_zh:
在公钥密码学(PKC) 2015中，Bergsma等人。
介绍了一个有趣的单轮密钥交换协议(将被称为BJS方案)，该协议具有很强的安全性，特别是完美前向保密(PFS)。在这项研究中，作者揭示了对BJS方案的PFS攻击。这只会使其安全性证明无效。提出了一种改进方案，以最小的改动解决了BJS方案的问题。
papers.title_zh: 一种具有强安全性的通用单轮密钥交换协议的密码分析

papers.title: Group key exchange protocols withstanding ephemeral-key reveals
papers.authors: María Isabel González Vasco, Angel L. Pérez del Pozo, Adriana Suárez Corona
papers.abstract: When a group key exchange protocol is executed, the session key is typically extracted from two types of secrets: long-term keys (for authentication) and freshly generated (often random) values. The leakage of this latter so-called ephemeral keys has been extensively analysed in the 2-party case, yet very few works are concerned with it in the group setting. The authors provide a generic group key exchange construction that is strongly secure, meaning that the attacker is allowed to learn both long-term and ephemeral keys (but not both from the same participant, as this would trivially disclose the session key). Their design can be seen as a compiler, in the sense that it builds on a 2-party key exchange protocol which is strongly secure and transforms it into a strongly secure group key exchange protocol by adding only one extra round of communication. When applied to an existing 2-party protocol from Bergsma et al., the result is a 2-round group key exchange protocol which is strongly secure in the standard model, thus yielding the first construction with this property.
papers.abstract_zh: 当执行组密钥交换协议时，会话密钥通常从两种类型的秘密中提取:长期密钥(用于认证)和新生成的(通常是随机的)值。后一种所谓的短暂密钥的泄漏已经在两方情况下进行了广泛的分析，但是很少有作品在群组环境中关注它。作者提供了一种非常安全的通用组密钥交换结构，这意味着允许攻击者学习长期密钥和临时密钥(但不能从同一个参与者那里学习两者，因为这样会轻易泄露会话密钥)。他们的设计可以被看作是一个编译器，在这个意义上，它建立在一个非常安全的两方密钥交换协议上，并通过只增加一轮额外的通信将其转换为一个非常安全的组密钥交换协议。当应用于现有的来自Bergsma等人的两方协议时，结果是两轮组密钥交换协议，其在标准模型中是非常安全的，因此产生了具有该属性的第一个构造。
papers.title_zh: 抵抗短暂密钥泄露的群密钥交换协议

papers.title: Security evaluation on Simeck against zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Kai Zhang, Jie Guan, Bin Hu, Dongdai Lin
papers.abstract: Since proposed by the National Security Agency in June 2013, two lightweight block ciphers-SIMON and SPECK have attracted the attention of cryptographers from all over the world. At CHES 2015, Simeck, a new block cipher inspired from both SIMON and SPECK is proposed, which is more compact and efficient. However, the security evaluation on Simeck against zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis seems missing from the specification. The main focus of this study is to fill this gap and evaluate the security level of Simeck against zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis. According to the authors' study, 11-, 13- and 15-round zero-correlation linear distinguishers on Simeck32/48/64 are proposed, respectively, then zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis on 21-, 24-, 28-round Simeck32/48/64 are first proposed. As far as they know, for Simeck32, their result is the best result up to date.
papers.abstract_zh: 自2013年6月由美国国家安全局提出以来，两种轻量级分组密码——SIMON和SPECK吸引了世界各地密码学家的关注。在CHES 2015上，Simeck提出了一种受SIMON和SPECK启发的新的分组密码算法，该算法更加紧凑和高效。然而，规范中似乎缺少针对零相关线性密码分析的Simeck安全性评估。本研究的主要目的是填补这一空白，评估Simeck对零相关线性密码分析的安全性。根据作者的研究，分别提出了Simeck32/48/64上的11、13和15轮零相关线性鉴别器，然后首次提出了21、24和28轮Simeck32/48/64上的零相关线性密码分析。据他们所知，对于Simeck32来说，他们的成绩是迄今为止最好的成绩。
papers.title_zh: Simeck对零相关线性密码分析的安全性评估

papers.title: Outsourcing secret sharing scheme based on homomorphism encryption
papers.authors: En Zhang, Jie Peng, Ming Li
papers.abstract: Secret sharing is an important component of cryptography protocols and has a wide range of practical applications. However, the existing secret sharing schemes cannot apply to computationally weak devices and cannot efficiently guarantee fairness. In this study, a novel outsourcing secret sharing scheme is proposed. In the setting of outsourcing secret sharing, clients only need a small amount of decryption and verification operations, while the expensive reconstruction computation and verifiable computation can be outsourced to cloud service providers (CSP). The scheme does not require complex interactive argument or zero-knowledge proof. The malicious behaviour of clients and CSP can be detected in time. Moreover, the CSP cannot get any useful information about the secret, and it is fair for every client to obtain the secret. At the end of this study, the authors prove the security of the proposed scheme and compare it with other secret sharing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 秘密共享是密码学协议的重要组成部分，有着广泛的实际应用。然而，现有的秘密共享方案不能应用于计算能力弱的设备，并且不能有效地保证公平性。本文提出了一种新颖的外包秘密共享方案。在外包秘密共享的设置中，客户端只需要少量的解密和验证操作，而昂贵的重构计算和可验证计算可以外包给云服务提供商(CSP)。该方案不需要复杂的交互论证或零知识证明。可以及时检测到客户端和CSP的恶意行为。此外，CSP不能获得任何关于秘密的有用信息，并且每个客户端获得秘密是公平的。最后，作者证明了该方案的安全性，并与其他秘密共享方案进行了比较。
papers.title_zh: 基于同态加密的外包秘密共享方案

papers.title: Efficient approximate message authentication scheme
papers.authors: Shaoquan Jiang, Jue Li, Yongjian Liao
papers.abstract: An approximate message authentication scheme is a primitive that allows a sender Alice to send a source state to a receiver Bob such that the latter is assured of its authenticity, where the source state is considered as authentic if it only undergoes a minor change. Here, the authors propose an efficient scheme for this problem and prove its security under a rigorous model. Our scheme only needs a lightweight computation cost and hence is very efficient. As the authentication message is transmitted over a noisy channel, we also value the channel efficiency (i.e. the coding rate). For a fixed coding method, this is determined by the admissible decoding bit error probability p e . A larger p e admits a shorter codeword length and hence a larger coding rate. It turns out that the p e can be set to be a significantly large constant (determined by the legal distortion level for the source state). Compared with existing schemes, the advantage in p e is evident.
papers.abstract_zh: 近似消息认证方案是一种原语，它允许发送者Alice向接收者Bob发送源状态，使得后者确信其真实性，其中如果源状态仅经历微小的改变，则它被认为是可信的。在这里，作者提出了一个有效的方案，并在严格的模型下证明了它的安全性。我们的方案只需要一个轻量级的计算成本，因此非常有效。由于认证消息是在有噪声的信道上传输的，所以我们也重视信道效率(即编码率)。对于固定的编码方法，这由容许的解码比特误差概率p e决定。较大的p e允许较短的码字长度，因此允许较大的编码率。事实证明，p e可以设置为一个非常大的常数(由源状态的合法失真水平决定)。与现有方案相比，在体育方面的优势是明显的。
papers.title_zh: 高效的近似消息认证方案

papers.title: Malware classification based on API calls and behaviour analysis
papers.authors: Abdurrahman Pektas, Tankut Acarman
papers.abstract: This study presents the runtime behaviour-based classification procedure for Windows malware. Runtime behaviours are extracted with a particular focus on the determination of a malicious sequence of application programming interface (API) calls in addition to the file, network and registry activities. Mining and searching n-gram over API call sequences is introduced to discover episodes representing behaviour-based features of a malware. Voting Experts algorithm is used to extract malicious API patterns over API calls. The classification model is built by applying online machine learning algorithms and compared with the baseline classifiers. The model is trained and tested with a fairly large set of 17,400 malware samples belonging to 60 distinct families and 532 benign samples. The malware classification accuracy is reached at 98%.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了基于运行时行为的Windows恶意软件分类方法。提取运行时行为，除了文件、网络和注册表活动之外，还特别关注应用程序编程接口(API)调用恶意序列的确定。引入了在API调用序列上挖掘和搜索n-gram，以发现代表恶意软件的基于行为的特征的情节。投票专家算法用于提取API调用中的恶意API模式。通过应用在线机器学习算法建立分类模型，并与基线分类器进行比较。该模型用属于60个不同家族的17，400个恶意软件样本和532个良性样本的相当大的集合来训练和测试。恶意软件分类准确率达到98%。
papers.title_zh: 基于API调用和行为分析的恶意软件分类

papers.title: Analysis of the adoption of security headers in HTTP
papers.authors: William J. Buchanan, Scott Helme, Alan Woodward
papers.abstract: With the increase in the number of threats within web-based systems, a more integrated approach is required to ensure the enforcement of security policies from the server to the client. These policies aim to stop man-in-the-middle attacks, code injection, and so on. This study analyses some of the newest security options used within HTTP responses, and scans the Alexa Top 1 Million sites for their implementation within HTTP responses. These options scanned for include: content security policy, public key pinning extension for HTTP, HTTP strict transport security, and HTTP header field X-frame-options, in order to understand the impact that these options have on the most popular websites. The results show that, while the implementation of the parameters is increasing, it is still not implemented on many of the top sites. Along with this, the study shows the profile of adoption of Let's Encrypt digital certificates across the one million sites, along with a way of assessing the quality of the security headers.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着基于web的系统中威胁数量的增加，需要一种更加集成的方法来确保从服务器到客户端的安全策略的实施。这些策略旨在阻止中间人攻击、代码注入等等。这项研究分析了HTTP响应中使用的一些最新的安全选项，并扫描了Alexa排名前100万的网站，以了解它们在HTTP响应中的实现。扫描的这些选项包括:内容安全策略、HTTP的公钥锁定扩展、HTTP严格传输安全和HTTP头字段X-frame-options，以便了解这些选项对最受欢迎的网站的影响。结果表明，虽然参数的实现在增加，但在许多顶级网站上仍未实现。除此之外，该研究还展示了一百万个站点采用Let's Encrypt数字证书的概况，以及评估安全标题质量的方法。
papers.title_zh: HTTP协议中安全头的采用分析

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Morillo-Obrador polynomial delegation schemes
papers.authors: Shuaijianni Xu, Liang Feng Zhang
papers.abstract: Verifiable computation (VC) allows a client to outsource (delegate) the computation of a function f on an input x to a server and then verify the server's results with substantially less time than computing f(x) from scratch. The security of VC requires no efficient adversary can persuade the client to accept any wrong results. Morillo and Obrador (PST 2013) proposed three VC schemes for outsourcing the computation of polynomial functions and claimed that all schemes are secure under the decisional subgroup membership assumption. The authors show a simple attack against the security of their first scheme and then extend the attack to the other two schemes. Morillo and Obrador (PST 2013) also claimed that their third scheme keeps the client's input private under the square root assumption. The authors show that this is not true under the standard definition of input privacy. In particular, a curious server can extract the client's input x, if the x is not too large. The authors' results show that Morillo-Obrador schemes cannot be used in the polynomial delegation.
papers.abstract_zh: 可验证计算(VC)允许客户端将对输入x的函数f的计算外包(委托)给服务器，然后用比从头开始计算f(x)少得多的时间来验证服务器的结果。VC的安全性要求没有有效的对手可以说服客户接受任何错误的结果。Morillo和Obrador (PST 2013)提出了三个外包多项式函数计算的VC方案，并声称所有方案在决策子群成员假设下都是安全的。作者对他们的第一个方案的安全性进行了简单的攻击，然后将攻击扩展到另外两个方案。Morillo和Obrador (PST 2013)还声称，他们的第三个方案在平方根假设下保持了客户端输入的私密性。作者表明，根据输入隐私的标准定义，这是不正确的。特别是，一个好奇的服务器可以提取客户机的输入x，如果x不太大的话。作者的结果表明Morillo-Obrador方案不能用于多项式授权。
papers.title_zh: Morillo-Obrador多项式授权方案的密码分析

papers.title: Formal analysis of HMAC authorisation in the TPM2.0 specification
papers.authors: Jianxiong Shao, Yu Qin, Dengguo Feng
papers.abstract: The Trusted Platform Module (TPM) is a system component that provides a hardware-based approach to establish trust in a platform. The latest TPM2.0 specification was accepted as the ISO standard in 2015. It offers functionality for key management by storing keys into the TPM's protected storage. The access to the TPM-resident key object is protected by the session-based authorisation mechanism. This mechanism is keyed to the object's authorisation value known as authValue and the session-bound secret value known as sessionKey. The new authValue introduced into the TPM is protected by the sessionbased encryption mechanism, which is also keyed on the sessionKey. In the authors' study, they conduct a formal analysis of the TPM2.0 HMAC (hash message authentication code) authorisation mechanism used in the key management. They first use the stateful applied π calculus to formalise the session-based HMAC authorisation and encryption mechanisms in a model of TPM2.0 API commands. They propose a threat model to formalise the secrecy and authentication properties. Then they discuss several attacking scenarios in practice where the sessionKey could be disclosed. They also instantiate their threat model according to specific attacking scenarios. By using the SAPIC tool and the tamarin prover, they automatically give out the analysis results of their models.
papers.abstract_zh: 可信平台模块(TPM)是一个系统组件，它提供基于硬件的方法来建立平台中的信任。最新的TPM2.0规范在2015年被接受为ISO标准。它通过将密钥存储到TPM的受保护存储中来提供密钥管理功能。对TPM驻留密钥对象的访问受到基于会话的授权机制的保护。这种机制的关键是对象的授权值(称为authValue)和会话绑定的秘密值(称为sessionKey)。引入TPM的新authValue受基于会话的加密机制保护，该机制也以会话密钥为密钥。在作者的研究中，他们对密钥管理中使用的TPM2.0 HMAC(哈希消息认证码)授权机制进行了形式分析。他们首先使用有状态应用π演算在TPM2.0 API命令的模型中形式化基于会话的HMAC授权和加密机制。他们提出了一个威胁模型来形式化保密和认证属性。然后，他们讨论了实际中会话密钥可能被泄露的几种攻击场景。他们还根据特定的攻击场景实例化他们的威胁模型。通过使用SAPIC工具和tamarin prover，他们自动给出他们模型的分析结果。
papers.title_zh: TPM2.0规范中HMAC授权的形式化分析

papers.title: Efficient revocable and grantable attribute-based encryption from lattices with fine-grained access control
papers.authors: Shangping Wang, Xia Zhang, Yaling Zhang
papers.abstract: Attribute-based encryption (ABE) has been regarded as an attractive alternative to identity-based encryption. The feature of the ABE is that it has the ability of fine-grained access control. Access control is an effective way to ensure data security. Revocable and grantable ABE (RABE) is an extension of ABE. In this study, an efficient RABE scheme is proposed. Binary tree technique is used to deal with the issues of attribute revocation and granting. The security of the scheme is proved to be selectively secure in the standard model under the learning with errors assumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的加密(ABE)被认为是基于身份加密的一种有吸引力的替代方案。ABE的特点是具有细粒度的访问控制能力。访问控制是保证数据安全的有效方法。可撤销和可授予ABE (RABE)是ABE的扩展。在本研究中，我们提出了一个有效的RABE方案。二叉树技术用于处理属性撤销和授予问题。该方案的安全性在标准模型下被证明是选择性安全的。
papers.title_zh: 具有细粒度访问控制的格的高效可撤销和可授予的基于属性的加密

papers.title: Efficient identity-based blind message recovery signature scheme from pairings
papers.authors: Girraj Kumar Verma, B. B. Singh
papers.abstract: Blind signature (BS) schemes are a vital tool to design electronic cash (e-cash), online transaction, electronic voting (e-voting), digital right management (DRM) systems etc. The communication systems designed for such applications need small size and more confidential signature schemes. This article presents the first provably secure and efficient identity-based message recovery BS scheme from pairing. Since, in this scheme, the message is not transmitted with signature and recovered during verification phase, the total message–signature length is the lowest. Due to the blindness, the scheme provides authentication along with anonymity. The performance comparison shows that the authors' scheme consumes the lowest computation cost. Thus, it inspires the energy efficient (green) technology as well as is the most appealing BS scheme towards applications such as e-cash, e-voting, DRM systems etc. using low bandwidth and high security.
papers.abstract_zh: 盲签名方案是设计电子现金、在线交易、电子投票、数字版权管理等系统的重要工具。为这种应用设计的通信系统需要更小的尺寸和更机密的签名方案。本文提出了第一个可证明安全有效的基于身份的配对消息恢复BS方案。由于在该方案中，消息不与签名一起传输，也不在验证阶段恢复，所以消息-签名的总长度是最短的。由于盲性，该方案提供了认证和匿名。性能比较表明，作者的方案消耗了最低的计算成本。因此，它激发了节能(绿色)技术，也是对电子现金、电子投票、DRM系统等应用最有吸引力的BS方案。使用低带宽和高安全性。
papers.title_zh: 有效的基于身份的盲消息恢复签名方案

papers.title: CCN framework with privacy support
papers.authors: Xiaonan Wang, Zhengxiong Dou, Yi Mu
papers.abstract: Content-centric networking (CCN) used the name of an Interest to seek the target content, where the name was a plaintext and unprotected. Apart from the name, the content in one Data is also unprotected. If an unauthorised node intercepted an Interest, it could infer what kind of content is requested. If the node intercepted a response Data, it could illegally acquire the content. This study focused on the privacy issues of CCN and proposed a CCN framework with privacy support. In this framework, the concept of a privacy name was proposed and accordingly the forwarding information base (FIB) and pending Interest table (PIT) establishment algorithms based on privacy names were proposed. On the basis of the proposed FIB and PIT, the content communication algorithm based on privacy names was presented. In this algorithm, one authorised consumer could use a privacy name to seek, retrieve and share the ciphertext of the content, so the privacy was achieved. Finally, the privacy of this framework was analysed and the performance was evaluated to justify its advantages.
papers.abstract_zh: 以内容为中心的网络(CCN)使用兴趣的名称来寻找目标内容，其中名称是明文并且不受保护。除了名称，一个数据中的内容也不受保护。如果一个未经授权的节点截获了一个兴趣，它可以推断出请求的是什么类型的内容。如果节点截获了响应数据，它可能会非法获取内容。这项研究集中于CCN的隐私问题，并提出了一个支持隐私的CCN框架。在该框架中，提出了隐私名称的概念，并据此提出了基于隐私名称的转发信息库和待处理兴趣表建立算法。在FIB和PIT的基础上，提出了基于隐私名称的内容通信算法。在该算法中，一个授权用户可以使用一个隐私名称来寻找、检索和共享内容的密文，从而实现了隐私保护。最后，对该框架的隐私性进行了分析，并对其性能进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 具有隐私支持的CCN框架

papers.title: Practical attribute-based signature schemes for circuits from bilinear map
papers.authors: Yusuke Sakai, Nuttapong Attrapadung, Goichiro Hanaoka
papers.abstract: Attribute-based signatures allow us to sign anonymously, in such a way that the signature proves that the signer's attributes satisfy some predicate, but it hides any other information on the signer's attributes beyond that fact. As well as any cryptographic primitive, one of the important goals of the research on this primitive is to construct a scheme that is expressive (supports a wide class of predicates), is practically efficient, and is based on well-studied cryptographic assumptions. The authors construct attribute-based signature schemes that support any Boolean circuit of unbounded depth and number of gates, are practically efficient, from the symmetric bilinear Diffie–Hellman assumption. Toward this end, they combine the Groth–Sahai proof system, which serve as an efficient proof system for algebraic equations, and the Groth–Ostrovsky–Sahai proof system, which are still inefficient, but can prove any NP language via a Karp reduction to circuit satisfiability.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的签名允许我们匿名签名，通过这种方式，签名证明签名者的属性满足某个谓词，但它隐藏了签名者属性之外的任何其他信息。与任何密码原语一样，对该原语进行研究的一个重要目标是构建一个表达性强(支持多种谓词)、实用高效并且基于经过充分研究的密码假设的方案。作者从对称双线性Diffie–Hellman假设出发，构造了基于属性的签名方案，该方案支持任何深度和门数不限的布尔电路，实际上是有效的。为此，他们将Groth-Sahai证明系统与Groth-ostrov sky-Sahai证明系统结合起来，Groth-Sahai证明系统作为代数方程的有效证明系统，Groth-ostrov sky-Sahai证明系统仍然效率低下，但可以通过将Karp归约为电路可满足性来证明任何NP语言。
papers.title_zh: 基于双线性映射的实用电路属性签名方案

papers.title_zh: 可委派的功能签名

papers.title: Receiver- and sender-deniable functional encryption
papers.authors: Angelo De Caro, Vincenzo Iovino, Adam O'Neill
papers.abstract: Deniable encryption, first introduced by Canetti et al. 1997, allows equivocation of encrypted communication. In this work, the authors generalise its study to functional encryption (FE). The authors’ results are summarised as follows: They first put forward and motivate the concept of receiver-deniable FE, for which they consider two models. In the first model, as previously considered by O'Neill et al. 2011 in the case of identity-based encryption, a receiver gets assistance from the master authority to generate a fake secret key. In the second model, there are ‘normal’ and ‘deniable’ secret keys, and a receiver in possession of a deniable secret key can produce a fake but authentic-looking normal key on its own. In the first model, they show a compiler from any FE scheme for circuits to a FE scheme having receiver deniability. In addition, they show an efficient receiver-deniable FE scheme for Boolean formulae from bilinear maps. In the second (multi-distributional) model, they present a specific FE scheme for circuits having receiver deniability. To the authors’ knowledge, a scheme in the multi-distributional model was not previously known even for the special case of identity-based encryption. Finally, they construct the first sender (non-multi-distributional) deniable FE scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: Canetti等人于1997年首次提出的可否认加密允许加密通信的模糊性。在这篇文章中，作者将其研究推广到函数加密。作者的研究成果概括如下:他们首先提出并推动了可接受性假设的概念，并考虑了两种模型。在第一种模型中，如O'Neill等人2011年在基于身份的加密的情况下所考虑的，接收者从主权威机构获得帮助来生成假密钥。在第二种模型中，有“正常的”和“可否认的”秘密密钥，拥有可否认的秘密密钥的接收者可以自己产生假的但看起来真实的正常密钥。在第一个模型中，他们展示了从电路的任何FE方案到具有接收器可否认性的FE方案的编译器。此外，对于双线性映射的布尔公式，他们给出了一个有效的接收者可否认的有限元方案。在第二个(多分布)模型中，他们提出了一种针对具有接收器可否认性的电路的特定FE方案。据作者所知，即使对于基于身份的加密的特殊情况，多分布模型中的方案以前也是未知的。最后，他们构造了第一个发送者(非多分布)可否认的FE方案。
papers.title_zh: 接收者和发送者可否认的函数加密

papers.title: Degenerate curve attacks: extending invalid curve attacks to Edwards curves and other models
papers.authors: Samuel Neves, Mehdi Tibouchi
papers.abstract:
Invalid curve attacks are a well known attack class targeting elliptic curve arithmetic implementations. In such attacks, the adversary tricks the cryptographic device into carrying out scalar multiplications on a weaker curve instead of on the expected, secure curve. The original approach of Antipa et al.
, however, only affects elliptic curve implementations using addition and doubling formulas that are independent of at least one of the curve parameters. This property is satisfied for elliptic curves in Weierstrass form, but not newer, increasingly popular models such as (twisted) Edwards curves. It has, therefore, been suggested that invalid curve attacks would not be applicable against these alternate models. In this study, the authors demonstrate that this is not the case, and present the first attack of this nature against (twisted) Edwards curves, Jacobi quartics, Jacobi intersections, and more. They also extend the analysis to characteristic 2 models, namely binary Huff, Edwards, and Lambda coordinates. They also show that our result may be used constructively as a fault attack countermeasure inspired by Shamir's trick, particularly on curves over random base fields.
papers.abstract_zh:
无效曲线攻击是一种众所周知的攻击类别，目标是椭圆曲线算术实现。在这种攻击中，对手欺骗密码设备在较弱的曲线上而不是在预期的安全曲线上执行标量乘法。安提帕等人最初的方法。
但是，仅影响使用加法和加倍公式的椭圆曲线实现，这些公式独立于至少一个曲线参数。这一性质对于Weierstrass形式的椭圆曲线是令人满意的，但是对于更新的、日益流行的模型，例如(扭曲的)Edwards曲线，却不是如此。因此，有人建议无效曲线攻击不适用于这些替代模型。在这项研究中，作者证明情况并非如此，并提出了对(扭曲的)爱德华兹曲线、雅可比四次曲线、雅可比交点等的首次攻击。他们还将分析扩展到特征2模型，即二元Huff、Edwards和Lambda坐标。它们还表明，我们的结果可以建设性地用作受Shamir技巧启发的故障攻击对策，特别是在随机基域上的曲线上。
papers.title_zh: 退化曲线攻击:将无效曲线攻击扩展到Edwards曲线和其他模型

papers.title: Mimic defense: a designed-in cybersecurity defense framework
papers.authors: Hongchao Hu, Jiangxing Wu, Zhenpeng Wang, Guozhen Cheng
papers.abstract: In recent years, both academia and industry in cyber security have tried to develop innovative defense technologies, expecting that to change the rules of the game between attackers and defenders. The authors start by analysing the root causes of security problems in cyberspace: (i) vulnerabilities in cyber systems are universal; (ii) current cyber systems are static, predictable and monoculture which allows adversaries to plan and launch attacks effectively; (iii) existing techniques cannot detect and eliminates attacks employing unknown vulnerabilities. Based on their analysis, they develop a novel defense framework, mimic defense (MD), that employs ‘dynamic, heterogeneity, redundancy (DHR)’ mechanism to defense cyber attacks. The main ideas behind MD are: constructing diverse functional equivalent variants for the protected target; scheduling some variants to run in parallel dynamically; and adopting policy-based arbitration mechanism to decide whose results of current running variants are correct. Theoretical analysis and simulation results show that DHR can significantly increase the difficulties for attackers and enhance the security of cyber systems, and the security enhancement can be more than ten times. They also present a proof-of-principle prototype that employ MD, mimic router, to examine its effectiveness. Finally, they conclude its limitations.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，网络安全领域的学术界和工业界都试图开发创新的防御技术，期望改变攻击者和防御者之间的游戏规则。作者首先分析了网络空间安全问题的根源:(1)网络系统的脆弱性是普遍的；㈡目前的网络系统是静态的、可预测的和单一文化的，这使得对手能够有效地计划和发动攻击；(iii)现有技术不能检测和消除利用未知弱点的攻击。基于他们的分析，他们开发了一种新的防御框架，模仿防御(MD)，采用“动态，异构，冗余(DHR)”机制来防御网络攻击。MD背后的主要思想是:为保护目标构建多样的功能等价变体；调度一些变体动态并行运行；采用基于策略的仲裁机制来决定当前运行变量的结果谁是正确的。理论分析和仿真结果表明，DHR能显著增加攻击者的难度，增强网络系统的安全性，安全增强可达十倍以上。他们还展示了一个使用MD(模拟路由器)原理验证原型，以检验其有效性。最后，他们总结了它的局限性。
papers.title_zh: 模拟防御:一个内置的网络安全防御框架

papers.title: Information security collaboration formation in organisations
papers.authors: Nader Sohrabi Safa, Carsten Maple, Tim Watson, Steven Furnell
papers.abstract: The protection of organisational information assets requires the collaboration of all employees; information security collaboration (ISC) aggregates the efforts of employees in order to mitigate the effect of information security breaches and incidents. However, it is acknowledged that ISC formation and its development needs more investigation. This research endeavours to show how ISC forms and develops in the context of an organisation based on social bond factors. The social bond theory and theory of planned behaviour describe the effect of social bond factors on the attitude of employees and finally their behaviour regarding collaboration in the domain of information security. The results of the data analysis reveal that personal norms, involvement, and commitment to their organisation significantly influence the employees' attitude towards ISC intention. However, contrary to the authors expectation, attachment does not influence the attitude of employees towards ISC. In addition, attitudes towards ISC, perceived behavioural control, and personal norms significantly affect the intention of employees towards ISC. The findings also show that the employees' intention towards ISC and organisational support positively influence ISC, but that trust does not significantly affect ISC behaviour.
papers.abstract_zh: 组织信息资产的保护需要所有员工的合作；信息安全协作(ISC)集合了员工的努力，以减轻信息安全违规和事件的影响。然而，人们承认，ISC组及其发展需要更多的调查。这项研究致力于展示ISC是如何在基于社会纽带因素的组织环境中形成和发展的。社会纽带理论和计划行为理论描述了社会纽带因素对员工态度的影响，并最终描述了他们在信息安全领域的合作行为。数据分析的结果表明，个人规范、参与和对组织的承诺显著影响员工对ISC意图的态度。然而，与作者的预期相反，依恋并没有影响员工对ISC的态度。此外，对ISC的态度、感知行为控制和个人规范显著影响员工对ISC的意向。研究结果还表明，员工对ISC的意图和组织支持对ISC有积极影响，但这种信任不会显著影响ISC的行为。
papers.title_zh: 组织中信息安全协作的形成

papers.title: Sandwich construction for keyed sponges: independence between capacity and construction queries
papers.authors: Yusuke Naito
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors study the pseudo-random function (PRF) security of keyed sponges. ‘Capacity’ is a parameter of a keyed sponge that usually defines a dominant term in the PRF-security bound. The previous works have improved the capacity term in the PRF-security bound of the ‘prefix’ keyed sponge, where a secret key is prepended to an input message, and then the resultant value is inputted into the sponge function. A tight bound for the capacity term was given by Naito and Yasuda (FSE 2016): ( q Q + q 2 ) / 2 c for the capacity c, the number of construction queries q and the number of primitive queries Q. Thus, the following question naturally arises: Can they construct a keyed sponge with beyond the ( q 2 + q Q ) / 2 c -bound security? In this study, they consider the ‘sandwich’ keyed sponge, where a secret key is both prepended and appended to an input message, and then the resultant value is inputted into the sponge function. They prove that the capacity term becomes r Q / 2 c for the rate r, which is usually r ≪ q and r ≪ Q . That is, the dependence between the capacity and construction queries can be removed by the sandwich construction.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者研究了密钥海绵的伪随机函数(PRF)安全性。“容量”是键控海绵的参数，通常定义PRF安全界限中的主导项。先前的工作已经改进了“前缀”密钥海绵的PRF安全界限中的容量项，其中密钥被预先添加到输入消息，然后结果值被输入到海绵函数中。Naito和Yasuda (FSE 2016)给出了容量项的一个紧界:(q Q + q 2 ) / 2 c对于容量c，构造查询的数量Q和原始查询的数量Q。因此，下面的问题自然出现:他们能构造一个具有超出(q 2 + q Q ) / 2 c界限安全性的密钥海绵吗？在这项研究中，他们考虑了“三明治”密钥海绵，其中一个密钥被预先添加和附加到输入消息中，然后结果值被输入到海绵函数中。他们证明了对于速率r，容量项变成r Q / 2 c，该速率通常是r ≪ q和r ≪ Q。也就是说，容量和构造查询之间的依赖性可以通过三明治构造来消除。
papers.title_zh: 键控海绵的夹层结构:容量和结构查询之间的独立性

papers.title: Analysing HSTS and HPKP implementation in both browsers and servers
papers.authors: Sergio de los Santos, José Torres
papers.abstract: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) and HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) are two protocols aimed to enforce HTTPS connections and allow certificate pinning over HTTP. The combination of these recent protocols improves and strengthens HTTPS security in general, adding an additional layer of trust and verification. In addition, they help ensure that the connection is always ciphered and correctly authenticated. However, during the process of adoption and implementation of any protocol that is not yet completely settled, the possibility of introducing new weaknesses, opportunities or attack scenarios arises. Even when these protocols are implemented, bad practices prevent them from actually providing the additional security they are expected to provide. In this study, the authors review not just the quantity but the quality (according to several criteria) of the implementation in both servers and most popular browsers and report on some possible attack scenarios that the authors have discovered.
papers.abstract_zh: HTTP严格传输安全(HSTS)和HTTP公钥锁定(HPKP)是两种旨在强制HTTPS连接并允许通过HTTP锁定证书的协议。这些最新协议的结合总体上改善和加强了HTTPS的安全，增加了一层额外的信任和核查。此外，它们有助于确保连接始终经过加密和正确的身份验证。然而，在通过和实施任何尚未完全解决的协议的过程中，引入新的弱点、机会或攻击场景的可能性出现了。即使实现了这些协议，不良做法也阻止了它们实际提供预期的额外安全性。在这项研究中，作者不仅审查了服务器和最流行的浏览器中实现的数量，还审查了质量(根据几个标准),并报告了作者发现的一些可能的攻击场景。
papers.title_zh: 分析HSTS和HPKP在浏览器和服务器上的实现

papers.title: Trade-off between self-healing and energy consumption in mobile unattended WSNs
papers.authors: Emad S. Hassan, Amir Salah Elsafrawey, Moawad I. Dessouky
papers.abstract: This study investigates the performance analysis of mobile unattended wireless sensor networks (UWSNs) during the self-healing process under informed movement inside a cluster of healed and sick sensors. Introducing mobility within a cluster can increase the chance that a sick sensor has healthy neighbours and this will aid the sick sensor to be healed faster and better. However, sensor mobility is considered as one of the most energy consuming factors in UWSNs. This study proposes a new self-healing scheme based on a single flow controlled mobility within a cluster to make a trade-off between self-healing and energy consumption in mobile UWSNs. The obtained results show that using the proposed scheme, UWSNs can exploit controlled sensor mobility to enhance network capability in terms of self-healing and reduce the communication-related energy consumption. In addition, the proposed scheme with single flow controlled mobility does not disturb the number of neighbours per sensor and the network coverage.
papers.abstract_zh: 该研究调查了移动无人值守无线传感器网络(UWSNs)在自愈过程中的性能分析。在集群内引入移动性可以增加患病传感器具有健康邻居的机会，这将有助于患病传感器更快更好地痊愈。然而，传感器的移动性被认为是无线传感器网络中最消耗能量的因素之一。该研究提出了一种新的基于簇内单流控制移动性的自愈方案，在自愈和能耗之间进行权衡。实验结果表明，使用该方案，超宽带无线传感器网络可以利用受控的传感器移动性来增强网络的自愈能力，并降低通信相关的能量消耗。此外，所提出的具有单流控制移动性的方案不干扰每个传感器的邻居数量和网络覆盖。
papers.title_zh: 无人值守移动无线传感器网络中自愈和能耗的权衡

papers.title: Multi-objective auto-regressive whale optimisation for traffic-aware routing in urban VANET
papers.authors: Deepak Rewadkar, Dharmapal Dronacharya Doye
papers.abstract:
Vehicular ad-hoc
 network (VANET) is a growing networking concept that has been used increasingly in various applications including traffic alert broadcasting. The main purpose of VANET is to provide safety to the drivers by alerting them to the dangers that may happen. This study presents a traffic-aware routing protocol in VANET by the introduction of multi-objective auto-regressive whale optimisation (ARWO) algorithm. ARWO algorithm selects the best path from the multiple paths by considering the multiple objectives, such as end-to-end delay (EED), link life time, packet delay and distance, in the fitness function. Here, the traffic density and the expected average speed of the vehicle are predicted by the exponential weighted moving average approach. The performance of ARWO protocol is compared with four existing techniques, like stable CDS-based routing protocol, fractional glow worm swarm optimisation, glow worm swarm optimisation, and Whale Optimization Algorithm (WOA), using the metrics, EED, distance, traffic density, and throughput. The simulation results show that the proposed ARWO algorithm achieves EED of 2.941, a distance of 2.15, traffic density of 0.009 and throughput of 0.1, respectively, at maximum constraints, i.e. at a maximum number of vehicles and simulation time and thus proves its efficiency against the comparative protocols.
papers.abstract_zh:
车辆专用
网络(VANET)是一个不断发展的网络概念，已越来越多地用于各种应用，包括交通警报广播。VANET的主要目的是通过提醒司机可能发生的危险来为他们提供安全保障。本研究通过引入多目标自回归鲸鱼优化(ARWO)算法，提出了一种VANET流量感知路由协议。ARWO算法通过在适应度函数中考虑多个目标，例如端到端延迟(EED)、链路寿命、分组延迟和距离，从多条路径中选择最佳路径。这里，交通密度和车辆的期望平均速度通过指数加权移动平均方法来预测。使用度量、EED、距离、流量密度和吞吐量，将ARWO协议的性能与四种现有技术进行比较，如稳定的基于CDS的路由协议、分数萤火虫群优化、萤火虫群优化和鲸鱼优化算法(WOA)。仿真结果表明，所提出的ARWO算法在最大约束条件下，即在最大车辆数量和仿真时间下，分别实现了EED 2.941、距离2.15、交通密度0.009和吞吐量0.1，从而证明了其相对于比较协议的效率。
papers.title_zh: VANET市区交通感知路径的多目标自回归鲸鱼优化

papers.title: Protect white-box AES to resist table composition attacks
papers.authors: Kunpeng Bai, Chuankun Wu, Zhenfeng Zhang
papers.abstract:
White-box cryptography protects cryptographic software in a white-box attack context (WBAC), where the dynamic execution of the cryptographic software is under full control of an adversary. Protecting AES in the white-box setting attracted many scientists and engineers, and several solutions emerged. However, almost all these solutions have been badly broken by various efficient white-box attacks, which target compositions of key-embedding lookup tables. In 2014, Luo, Lai, and You proposed a new WBAC-oriented AES implementation, and claimed that their implementation is secure against both Billet et al.
's attack and De Mulder et al.
's attack. In this study, based on the existing table-composition-targeting cryptanalysis techniques, the authors show that the secret key of the Luo-Lai-You (LLY) implementation can be recovered with a time complexity of about 2
 44
. Furthermore, the authors propose a new white-box AES implementation based on table lookups, which is shown to be resistant against the existing table-composition-targeting white-box attacks. The authors, key-embedding tables are obfuscated with large affine mappings, which cannot be cancelled out by table compositions of the existing cryptanalysis techniques. Although their implementation requires twice as much memory as the LLY WBAES to store the tables, its speed is about 63 times of the latter.
papers.abstract_zh:
白盒密码术在白盒攻击环境(WBAC)中保护密码软件，其中密码软件的动态执行完全在对手的控制之下。在白盒环境中保护AES吸引了许多科学家和工程师，出现了几种解决方案。然而，几乎所有这些解决方案都被各种高效的白盒攻击严重破坏，这些攻击的目标是嵌入关键字的查找表的组合。在2014年，罗、赖和尤提出了一个新的面向的AES实现方案，并声称他们的实现对blank等人的攻击是安全的。
