44
。此外，作者提出了一种新的基于表查找的白盒AES实现，该实现可以抵抗现有的以表组合为目标的白盒攻击。作者的密钥嵌入表用大的仿射映射混淆，这不能被现有密码分析技术的表组成抵消。虽然它们的实现需要两倍于LLY WBAES的内存来存储表，但它的速度是后者的63倍。
papers.title_zh: 保护白盒AES抵御表合成攻击

papers.title: Improved zero-correlation and impossible differential cryptanalysis of reduced-round SIMECK block cipher
papers.authors: Sadegh Sadeghi, Nasour Bagheri
papers.abstract: SIMECK is a family of three lightweight block ciphers designed by Yang et al., following the framework used by Beaulieu et al. from the United States National Security Agency to design SIMON and SPECK. In this study, the authors employ an improved miss-in-the-middle approach to find zero correlation linear distinguishers and impossible differentials on SIMECK48 and SIMECK64. Based on this novel technique, they will be able to present zero-correlation linear approximations for 15-round SIMECK48 and 17-round SIMECK64 and these zero-correlation linear approximations improve the previous best result by two rounds for SIMECK48 and SIMECK64. Moreover, they attack 27-round SIMECK48 and 31-round SIMECK64 based on these zero-correlation linear distinguishers. In addition, due to the duality of zero-correlation and impossible differential, they search for the impossible differential characteristics for SIMECK48 and SIMECK64 so that they will be able to present 15-round SIMECK48 and 17-round SIMECK64 while the best previously known results were 13-round impossible differentials for SIMECK48 and 15-round impossible differentials for SIMECK64. Moreover, they propose impossible differential attacks on 22-round SIMECK48 and 24-round SIMECK64 based on these impossible differential characteristics. The results significantly improve the previous zero correlation attack and impossible differential characteristic results for these variants of SIMECK to the best of the authors’ knowledge.
papers.abstract_zh: SIMECK是由Yang等人设计的一个由三个轻量级分组密码组成的家族，它遵循了美国国家安全局的Beaulieu等人设计SIMON和SPECK所使用的框架。在这项研究中，作者采用了一种改进的中间缺失方法来寻找SIMECK48和SIMECK64上的零相关线性区分符和不可能的差异。基于这种新技术，他们将能够为15轮SIMECK48和17轮SIMECK64提供零相关线性近似，这些零相关线性近似将SIMECK48和SIMECK64的先前最佳结果提高了两轮。此外，他们基于这些零相关线性区分符攻击27轮SIMECK48和31轮SIMECK64。此外，由于零相关性和不可能微分的双重性，他们寻找SIMECK48和SIMECK64的不可能微分特征，以便能够呈现15轮SIMECK48和17轮SIMECK64，而以前已知的最好结果是SIMECK48的13轮不可能微分和SIMECK64的15轮不可能微分。而且，他们基于这些不可能的差分特征，提出了对22轮SIMECK48和24轮SIMECK64的不可能差分攻击。就作者所知，这些结果显著改善了先前对这些SIMECK变体的零相关攻击和不可能的差异特征结果。
papers.title_zh: 缩减轮SIMECK分组密码的改进零相关和不可能差分分析

papers.title: Framework for practical and receipt-free remote voting
papers.authors: Zhe Xia, Zheng Tong, Min Xiao, Chin-Chen Chang
papers.abstract: Remote voting allows the voters to cast their votes remotely at their convenience, and it is desirable in many circumstances. In the literature, a number of verifiable remote voting schemes have been introduced recently. However, some of these schemes are only suitable for the low coercion environment. Since without the receipt-freeness guarantee, voters can be coerced or bribed to vote the candidate favoured by adversaries. Some other schemes provide a very high level of security assurance, e.g. coercion resistance, but these schemes are normally very complex, and ordinary voters are required to perform complicated crypto calculations. In this study, the authors introduce a generic framework for practical and receipt-free remote voting. In their proposed scheme, voters do not need to have special knowledge or use any trusted device to cast their votes, and meanwhile, they cannot prove to the others how they have voted.
papers.abstract_zh: 远程投票允许投票人在方便的时候远程投票，这在许多情况下是可取的。在文献中，最近提出了许多可验证的远程投票方案。然而，其中一些方案仅适用于低胁迫环境。因为没有无收据保证，选民可能被胁迫或贿赂投票给对手支持的候选人。一些其他方案提供了非常高水平的安全保证，例如抗胁迫，但是这些方案通常非常复杂，并且普通投票者需要执行复杂的密码计算。在这项研究中，作者介绍了一个实用的无收据远程投票的通用框架。在他们提出的方案中，投票者不需要有特殊的知识或使用任何可信的设备来投票，同时，他们不能向其他人证明他们是如何投票的。
papers.title_zh: 实用且无收据的远程投票框架

papers.title: Least lion optimisation algorithm (LLOA) based secret key generation for privacy preserving association rule hiding
papers.authors: Menaga Devendran, Revathi Sathya
papers.abstract: Privacy preserving data mining (PPDM) is a well-known research area, which can analyse the database ensuring privacy such that it does not expose the confidential details. This study proposes a technique of secret key generation for privacy preserving using the least lion optimisation algorithm (LLOA). The proposed algorithm involves two stages: rule mining and secret key generation for the sanitisation. Initially, whale optimisation algorithm mines the association rules for the input database and validates the rules with the newly formulated fitness function. An algorithm, LLOA is developed by modifying the lion optimisation algorithm (LOA) with the inclusion of least mean square (LMS) which generates a secret key to provide privacy in mining. With the secret key, LLOA converts the original database into the sanitised database. Then, the algorithm optimally selects a secret key such that the sanitised database hides sensitive information by the utilisation of two factors, namely, privacy factor and utility factor, in its objective function. From the results, it can be shown that the LLOA technique attains the privacy of 84.36, 83.74, and 82.46%; and utility of 81.37, 83.96, and 81.37%, for chess, T10I4D100K, and retail datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私保护数据挖掘(PPDM)是一个众所周知的研究领域，它可以分析数据库，确保隐私，使其不暴露机密细节。本研究提出了一种使用最小狮子优化算法(LLOA)来保护隐私的密钥生成技术。所提出的算法包括两个阶段:规则挖掘和用于消毒的密钥生成。最初，whale优化算法挖掘输入数据库的关联规则，并用新制定的适应度函数验证这些规则。算法LLOA是通过修改lion优化算法(LOA)并加入最小均方(LMS)来开发的，最小均方生成密钥以提供挖掘中的隐私。使用这个秘密密钥，LLOA将原始数据库转换成经过消毒的数据库。然后，该算法最佳地选择一个秘密密钥，使得净化的数据库通过在其目标函数中利用两个因素，即隐私因素和效用因素来隐藏敏感信息。从结果可以看出，LLOA技术达到了84.36、83.74和82.46%的私密性；和81.37%、83.96%和81.37%的效用。
papers.title_zh: 基于最小狮子优化算法的隐私保护关联规则隐藏密钥生成

papers.title: Personalised anonymity for microdata release
papers.authors: Özgü Can
papers.abstract: Individual privacy protection in the released data sets has become an important issue in recent years. The release of microdata provides a significant information resource for researchers, whereas the release of person-specific data poses a threat to individual privacy. Unfortunately, microdata could be linked with publicly available information to exactly re-identify individuals’ identities. In order to relieve privacy concerns, data has to be protected with a privacy protection mechanism before its disclosure. The k-anonymity model is an important method in privacy protection to reduce the risk of re-identification in microdata release. This model necessitates the indistinguishably of each tuple from at least k − 1 other tuples in the released data. While k-anonymity preserves the truthfulness of the released data, the privacy level of anonymisation is same for each individual. However, different individuals have different privacy needs in the real world. Thereby, personalisation plays an important role in supporting the notion of individual privacy protection. This study proposes a personalised anonymity model that provides distinct privacy levels for each individual by offering them to control their anonymity on the released data. To satisfy the personal anonymity requirements with low information loss, the authors introduce a clustering based algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，在发布的数据集中保护个人隐私已经成为一个重要的问题。微数据的发布为研究人员提供了重要的信息资源，而个人特定数据的发布对个人隐私构成了威胁。不幸的是，微观数据可能与公开信息相联系，以准确地重新识别个人身份。为了消除对隐私的担忧，数据在公开之前必须用隐私保护机制来保护。k-匿名模型是隐私保护中的一种重要方法，可以降低微数据发布中的重复识别风险。该模型要求每个元组与发布数据中的至少k1个其他元组不可区分。虽然k-匿名保持了发布数据的真实性，但匿名的隐私级别对每个人都是一样的。然而，在现实世界中，不同的个人有不同的隐私需求。因此，个性化在支持个人隐私保护理念方面发挥着重要作用。这项研究提出了一个个性化的匿名模型，为每个人提供不同的隐私级别，允许他们控制自己在发布数据上的匿名。为了满足低信息损失的个人匿名要求，提出了一种基于聚类的算法。
papers.title_zh: 微数据发布的个性化匿名

papers.title: Generalisation of Hadamard matrix to generate involutory MDS matrices for lightweight cryptography
papers.authors: Meltem Kurt PehlIvanoõlu, Muharrem Tolga Sakalli, Sedat Akleylek, Nevcihan Duru, Vincent Rijmen
papers.abstract:
In this study, the authors generalise Hadamard matrix over F
 2(m)
 and propose a new form of Hadamard matrix, which they call generalised Hadamard (GHadamard) matrix. Then, they focus on generating lightweight (involutory) maximum distance separable (MDS) matrices. They also extend this idea to any k × k matrix form, where k is not necessarily a power of 2. The new matrix form, GHadamard matrix, is used to generate new 4 × 4 involutory MDS matrices over F
 2(4)
 and F
 2(8)
, and 8 × 8 involutory/non-involutory MDS matrices over F
 2(4)

 2(4)
.

papers.title_zh: Hadamard矩阵的推广生成轻量级密码的对合MDS矩阵

papers.title: Thermal maps based HT detection using spatial projection transformation
papers.authors: Yongkang Tang, Shaoqing Li, Fan Zhang, Liang Fang
papers.abstract: Hardware Trojan (HT) is increasingly becoming a serious problem in the information security field. Compared to other countermeasures, thermal maps based detection can mitigate process variation (PV) and have a higher accuracy. However, HT cannot be differentiated from the others directly from the original thermal maps. Therefore, in this study, the authors first propose a general HT detection framework based on difference temperature matrix, and introduce the PV mitigation mechanism. Then, they demonstrate how principal component analysis can implement spatial projection transformation and expose HT signal. Finally, they introduce their experimental setup and design, and then validate their countermeasure with Xilinx field programmable gate arrays which are configured with the pure AES circuit and the infected AES circuits. The power proportions (PPs) of HTs in the different infected AES circuits are various. The experimental results indicate that their proposed countermeasure can clearly detect HT with 0.14% small PP.
papers.abstract_zh: 硬件木马日益成为信息安全领域的一个严重问题。与其他对策相比，基于热图的检测可以减轻过程变化(PV)并具有更高的准确性。然而，HT不能直接从原始的热图中与其他的区别开来。因此，在本研究中，作者首先提出了一个基于温差矩阵的HT检测框架，并引入了PV缓解机制。然后，他们演示了主成分分析如何实现空间投影变换和暴露HT信号。最后，他们介绍了他们的实验装置和设计，然后用Xilinx现场可编程门阵列验证了他们的对策，这些门阵列是用纯AES电路和受感染AES电路配置的。不同受感染的AES电路中HTs的功率比例(PPs)是不同的。实验结果表明，他们提出的对策可以清楚地检测到具有0.14%小PP的HT。
papers.title_zh: 使用空间投影变换的基于热图的HT检测

papers.title: Detecting shilling profiles in collaborative recommender systems via multidimensional profile temporal features
papers.authors: Yaojun Hao, Fuzhi Zhang
papers.abstract: To defend recommender systems, various methods have been proposed to detect shilling profiles, which can be categorised as user- and item-based detection methods. Most of the user-based methods identify shilling profiles via statistical signatures of rating values and suffer from low precision when detecting different types of attacks. Most of the item-based methods use temporal information to detect the anomaly items, but they assume that the fake ratings were injected in short periods. So they are invalid for the long duration and decentralised injection attacks. To address these limitations, the authors extract the multidimensional profile temporal features and present a shilling detection method. First, from the user profile view, user rating behaviours are characterised by corrected conditional entropy and the dissimilarity with the rest-rating model. Second, from the item profile view, the user features are extracted according to item temporal popularity. Third, the features based on weighted deviation from dynamic mean are extracted according to the fact that the items mean changes with time. Finally, support vector machine is exploited to detect shilling profiles based on the proposed features. Experimental results on the Netflix dataset indicate that the performance of the proposed method is better than that of the benchmark methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了保护推荐系统，已经提出了各种方法来检测先令简档，这些方法可以分类为基于用户和基于项目的检测方法。大多数基于用户的方法通过评级值的统计签名来识别先令概况，并且在检测不同类型的攻击时遭受低精度。大多数基于项目的方法使用时间信息来检测异常项目，但它们假设虚假评级是在短时间内注入的。因此它们对于长持续时间和分散的注射攻击是无效的。针对这些局限性，作者提取多维轮廓时态特征，提出了一种先令检测方法。首先，从用户简档的角度来看，用户评级行为的特征在于修正的条件熵和与rest-rating模型的不同。第二，从项目简档视图中，根据项目时间流行度提取用户特征。第三，根据项目均值随时间变化的特点，提取基于动态均值加权离差的特征。最后，基于所提出的特征，使用支持向量机来检测先令部分。在网飞数据集上的实验结果表明，该方法的性能优于基准方法。
papers.title_zh: 通过多维简档时间特征检测协同推荐系统中的先令简档

papers.title: Deterministic lattice reduction on knapsacks with collision-free properties
papers.authors: Yuan Ping, Baocang Wang, Shengli Tian, Yuehua Yang, Genyuan Du
papers.abstract: The knapsack problem is an important problem in computer science and had been used to design public key cryptosystems. Low-density subset sum algorithms are powerful tools to reduce the security of trapdoor knapsacks to the shortest vector problem (SVP) over lattices. Several knapsack ciphers Chor–Rivest, Okamoto–Tanaka–Uchiyama, and Kate–Goldberg were proposed to defend low-density attacks by utilising low-weight knapsack problems. Some evidence was also found on the vulnerabilities of the above three knapsack ciphers to lattice attacks. However, previous lattice-based cryptanalytic results have been established via a probabilistic approach. The authors investigate some collision-free properties and derive from the properties a deterministic reduction from the knapsack problems in the Chor–Rivest, Okamoto–Tanaka–Uchiyama, and Kate–Goldberg knapsack ciphers to SVP without imposing any restriction and assumption. To the best of the authors' knowledge, the proposed reduction is the first deterministic reduction from public key cryptographic knapsacks to SVP.
papers.abstract_zh: 背包问题是计算机科学中的一个重要问题，并被用来设计公钥密码系统。低密度子集和算法是将陷门背包的安全性归结为格上最短向量问题(SVP)的有力工具。几个背包密码Chor-里维斯特、冈本-田中-内山和凯特-戈德堡被提出利用低重量背包问题来防御低密度攻击。还发现了上述三种背包密码对格攻击的脆弱性的一些证据。然而，先前基于格的密码分析结果是通过概率方法建立的。作者研究了一些无冲突性质，并从这些性质中导出了Chor-里维斯特、冈本-田中-内山和凯特-戈德堡背包密码对SVP背包问题的确定性归约，而没有强加任何限制和假设。据作者所知，所提出的归约是第一次从公钥密码背包到SVP的确定性归约。
papers.title_zh: 具有无碰撞性质的背包上的确定性格约简

papers.title: Parallel multiple pattern matching schemes based on cuckoo filter for deep packet inspection on graphics processing units
papers.authors: ThienLuan Ho, Seong-Je Cho, Seungrohk Oh
papers.abstract: A large amount of data now being transferred through networks has made deep packet inspection (DPI) an essential part of security activities. Several DPI systems are developed based on Bloom filters to defend against malicious worm attacks through the Internet. These approaches have achieved significant performance. However, they do not permit deletion of items from the set of target patterns. This study proposes two multiple pattern matching schemes for DPI to exploit high parallelism capacity of graphics processing units (GPUs). Firstly, a GPU-based Cuckoo filter scheme is proposed by adopting a new approximate set membership, called Cuckoo filter, for parallel multiple pattern matching. The Cuckoo filter has many advantages over the Bloom filter such as higher insert performance, higher lookup throughput, less memory consumption, less false positive rate, and delete operation support. Secondly, an implementation of the GPU-based Cuckoo filter, called GPUshared-based Cuckoo filter is proposed. This scheme can efficiently distribute input string and pre-processing data in the hierarchical memory of GPUs to optimise the performance of the GPU-based Cuckoo filter scheme. Experiments show that the proposed schemes offer better performance than the previous approaches based on the Bloom filter.
papers.abstract_zh: 现在通过网络传输的大量数据使得深度数据包检测(DPI)成为安全活动的重要组成部分。基于布隆过滤器开发了若干DPI系统来抵御通过因特网的恶意蠕虫攻击。这些方法已经取得了显著的效果。但是，它们不允许从目标模式集中删除项目。本研究提出两个多重模式匹配方案，以充分利用图形处理器(GPU)的高并行能力。首先，提出了一种基于GPU的布谷鸟滤波器方案，采用一种新的近似集合隶属度，称为布谷鸟滤波器，用于并行多模式匹配。布谷鸟过滤器与布鲁姆过滤器相比具有许多优点，例如更高的插入性能、更高的查找吞吐量、更少的内存消耗、更低的误报率和删除操作支持。其次，提出了一种基于GPU的布谷鸟滤波器的实现方法，称为基于GPU的布谷鸟滤波器。该方案可以有效地在GPU的分层存储器中分配输入字符串和预处理数据，以优化基于GPU的布谷鸟滤波器方案的性能。实验表明，与以前基于Bloom filter的方法相比，本文提出的方法具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于cuckoo滤波器的并行多模式匹配算法在图形处理器深度包检测中的应用

papers.title: Weak keys of the full MISTY1 block cipher for related-key amplified boomerang cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Jiqiang Lu, Wun-She Yap, Yongzhuang Wei
papers.abstract: The MISTY1 block cipher has a 64-bit block size, a 128-bit master key, and a total of 8 rounds. It is an ISO international standard, a Japanese CRYPTREC-recommended e-government cipher, and a European NESSIE selected cipher. In this study, the authors show another cryptographic weakness of the full MISTY1 cipher: they describe four classes of 2 90 weak keys of the full MISTY1 cipher for a related-key amplified boomerang attack that has a data complexity of 2 60.5 chosen plaintexts and a time complexity of 2 87.33 encryptions under each class of weak keys. The result shows that the MISTY1 cipher can be distinguishable from an ideal cipher in terms of related-key amplified boomerang cryptanalysis, and users should be very careful when using MISTY1 for a full security in relevant application situations.
papers.abstract_zh: MISTY1块密码的块大小为64位，主密钥为128位，总共有8轮。它是ISO国际标准、日本CRYPTREC推荐的电子政务密码和欧洲NESSIE精选密码。在这项研究中，作者展示了full MISTY1密码的另一个密码弱点:他们描述了full MISTY1密码的四类2 90个弱密钥，用于相关密钥放大的回飞式攻击，该攻击具有2 60.5个选择明文的数据复杂性和在每类弱密钥下2 87.33个加密的时间复杂性。结果表明，MISTY1密码在相关密钥放大回飞棒密码分析方面可以与理想密码相区分，用户在相关应用场合使用MISTY1时应非常小心，以获得充分的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 用于相关密钥放大回飞镖分析的全MISTY1分组密码的弱密钥

papers.title: User-friendly XOR-based visual secret sharing by random grid
papers.authors: Tzuo-Yau Fan, Her-Chang Chao
papers.abstract: This study proposes a user-friendly XOR-based visual secret sharing scheme using random grids. In some visual secret sharing schemes, problems such as pixel expansion or noisy and meaningless shares may be encountered. In the proposed scheme, different regions in the shared image will have different brightness levels depending on the cover image's pixel values so that the generated shares contain information regarding the cover image and are not just a meaningless noisy image. This can overcome the difficulty in recovering the secret image in cases wherein the shares were mixed up by mistake. Furthermore, the dimension of the share is the same as the secret image and there are no pixel expansion problems. The size of the recovered secret image is consistent with the size of the original secret image, and there are no changes in scaling. Lastly, although one of the generated share is a complementary cover image, the image quality of the recovered secret image is still favourable when the secret image is recovered. The experimental and analysis results demonstrate that the proposed scheme is more effective than other schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 该研究提出了一个使用随机网格的用户友好的基于异或的可视秘密共享方案。在一些视觉秘密共享方案中，可能会遇到像素膨胀或有噪声且无意义的共享等问题。在所提出的方案中，共享图像中的不同区域将根据覆盖图像的像素值具有不同的亮度水平，使得所生成的份额包含关于覆盖图像的信息，而不仅仅是无意义的噪声图像。这可以克服在份额被错误混合的情况下恢复秘密图像的困难。此外，份额的维数与秘密图像相同，并且不存在像素扩展问题。恢复的秘密图像的大小与原始秘密图像的大小一致，并且在缩放方面没有变化。最后，尽管生成的份额之一是互补的覆盖图像，但是当恢复秘密图像时，恢复的秘密图像的图像质量仍然是有利的。实验和分析结果表明，该方案比其他方案更有效。
papers.title_zh: 用户友好的基于异或的随机网格可视秘密共享

papers.title: Anomaly-based exploratory analysis and detection of exploits in android mediaserver
papers.authors: Guillermo Suarez-Tangil, Santanu Kumar Dash, Pedro García-Teodoro, José Camacho, Lorenzo Cavallaro
papers.abstract:
Smartphone platforms are becoming increasingly complex, which gives way to software vulnerabilities difficult to identify and that might allow malware developers to gain unauthorised privileges through technical exploitation. However, the authors maintain that these types of attacks indirectly renders a number of unexpected behaviours in the system that can be profiled. In this work, the authors present CoME
, an anomaly-based methodology aiming at detecting software exploitation in Android systems. CoME
 models the normal behaviour of a given software component or service and it is capable of identifying any unanticipated behaviour. To this end, they first monitor the normal operation of a given exploitable component through lightweight virtual introspection. Then, they use a multivariate analysis approach to estimate the normality model and detect anomalies. They evaluate their system against one of the most critical vulnerable and widely exploited services in Android, i.e. the mediaserver. Results show that the proposed approach can not only provide a meaningful explanatory of discriminant features for illegitimate activities, but can also be used to accurately detect malicious software exploitations at runtime.
papers.abstract_zh:
智能手机平台正变得越来越复杂，这使得软件漏洞难以识别，并可能允许恶意软件开发者通过技术开发获得未经授权的权限。然而，作者认为，这些类型的攻击会间接导致系统中出现许多可以分析的意外行为。在这部作品中，在场的作者来了
，一种基于异常的方法，旨在检测Android系统中的软件利用。来
模拟给定软件组件或服务的正常行为，它能够识别任何意外行为。为此，他们首先通过轻量级虚拟自省来监控给定可利用组件的正常操作。然后，他们使用多元分析方法来估计正态模型并检测异常。他们根据Android中最关键的易受攻击和被广泛利用的服务之一(即mediaserver)来评估他们的系统。结果表明，该方法不仅能为非法活动提供有意义的判别特征解释，而且能在运行时准确检测恶意软件利用。
papers.title_zh: 基于异常的android mediaserver漏洞探索性分析与检测

papers.title: Linear complexity of Legendre-polynomial quotients
papers.authors: Zhixiong Chen
papers.abstract: We continue to investigate binary sequence $(f_u)$ over $\{0,1\}$ defined by $(-1)^{f_u}=\left(\frac{(u^w-u^{wp})/p}{p}\right)$ for integers $u\ge 0$, where $\left(\frac{\cdot}{p}\right)$ is the Legendre symbol and we restrict $\left(\frac{0}{p}\right)=1$. In an earlier work, the linear complexity of $(f_u)$ was determined for $w=p-1$ under the assumption of $2^{p-1}\not\equiv 1 \pmod {p^2}$. In this work, we give possible values on the linear complexity of $(f_u)$ for all $1\le w<p-1$ under the same conditions. We also state that the case of larger $w(\geq p)$ can be reduced to that of $0\leq w\leq p-1$.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们继续研究二进制序列$(f_u)$ over $\{0，1\}$由$(-1)^{f_u}=\left(\frac{(u^w-u^{wp})/p}{p}\right)$为整数$u\ge 0$定义，其中$\left(\frac{\cdot}{p}\right)$是勒让德符号，我们限制$\left(\frac{0}{p}\right)=1$。在早期的工作中，在$2^{p-1}\not\equiv 1 \pmod {p^2}$.的假设下，确定了$w=p-1$的线性复杂度在本工作中，我们给出了在相同条件下所有$1\le w<p-1$的$(f_u)$的线性复杂度的可能值。我们还指出，较大的$w(\geq p)$的情况可以简化为$0\leq w\leq p-1$的情况。
papers.title_zh: 勒让德多项式商的线性复杂性

papers.title: Observations on the truncated differential of SP block ciphers and their applications to mCrypton and CRYPTON V1.0
papers.authors: Dong Yang, Wen-Feng Qi, Hua-Jin Chen
papers.abstract:
Truncated differential attack (TDA) proposed by Knudsen in Fast Software Encryption 1995 (FSE'95) has been widely used in the analysis of block ciphers. In this study, the authors specifically study the security of SP block ciphers against TDA. In FSE'15, Li et al.
 introduced a meet-in-the-middle technique to construct truncated differential for Feistel ciphers. They first apply Li's technique to SP block ciphers and get some further results. Second, they introduce the concept of generalised truncated difference to control the diffusion of active S-boxes in the truncated differential. On the basis of these, two 5-round truncated differential distinguishers for mCrypton and CRYPTON V1.0 have been constructed. Using these two 5-round distinguishers, they present the first 8-round DA on mCrypton-64 and improve the former best TDA on CRYPTON V1.0 by one round.
papers.abstract_zh:
Knudsen在《快速软件加密1995 》( FSE ' 95)中提出的截断差分攻击(TDA)已经广泛应用于分组密码的分析中。在本研究中，作者专门研究了SP分组密码对TDA的安全性。在15年，李等人。
介绍了一种中间相遇技术来构造Feistel密码的截断差分。他们首先将李的技巧应用于SP分组密码，得到了一些进一步的结果。其次，他们引入了广义截断差分的概念来控制截断差分中活动S盒的扩散。在此基础上，构造了两个适用于mCrypton和CRYPTON V1.0的5轮截断差分鉴别器。使用这两个5轮区分器，他们在mCrypton-64上提出了第一个8轮DA，并将CRYPTON V1.0上的前最佳TDA提高了一轮。
papers.title_zh: SP分组密码的截断差分及其在mCrypton和CRYPTON V1.0中的应用

papers.title: Method for measuring the privacy level of pre-published dataset
papers.authors: Dan Wang, Bing Guo, Yan Shen
papers.abstract: Several privacy protection technologies have been designed for protecting individuals' privacy information in data publishing. It is often easy to make additional information loss of a dataset without measuring the strength of privacy protection it required. To apply appropriate strength of privacy preservation, the authors put forward privacy score, a new metric for making a comprehensive evaluation of the privacy information contained in the pre-published dataset. Using this measure, publishers can apply the privacy techniques to the pre-published dataset in accordance with the privacy level it belongs to. The privacy score is determined by the amount as well as the quality of privacy information in which the pre-published dataset is contained. Furthermore, the authors present a data sensitivity model based on analytic hierarchy process for assigning a sensitivity score to each possible value of a sensitive attribute. The reasonability and effectiveness of the proposed approach are verified by using the Adult dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了在数据发布中保护个人隐私信息，已经设计了几种隐私保护技术。在没有衡量所需的隐私保护强度的情况下，很容易丢失数据集的额外信息。为了应用适当的隐私保护强度，作者提出了一种新的度量方法——隐私分数，用于对预先发布的数据集中包含的隐私信息进行综合评估。使用该措施，发布者可以根据其所属的隐私级别将隐私技术应用于预先发布的数据集。隐私分数由包含预先发布的数据集的隐私信息的数量和质量来确定。此外，作者提出了一个基于层次分析法的数据敏感性模型，用于为敏感属性的每个可能值分配一个敏感性得分。使用成人数据集验证了该方法的合理性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 测量预先发布的数据集的隐私级别的方法

papers.title: Smartphone passcode prediction
papers.authors: Tao Chen, Michael Farcasin, Eric Chan-Tin
papers.abstract: Many people now own smartphones and store all their documents such as pictures and financial statements on their phone. To protect this sensitive information, people generally use a passcode to prevent unauthorised access to their phone. Shoulder-surfing attacks are well known. However, contrary to common belief, they are not easy to carry out. Shoulder-surfing attacks to predict the passcode by humans are shown to not be accurate. The authors thus propose an automated algorithm to accurately predict the passcode entered by a victim on her smartphone by recording the video. Their proposed algorithm is able to predict over 92% of numbers entered in fewer than 75 s with training performed once.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多人现在拥有智能手机，并将他们所有的文件，如照片和财务报表存储在手机上。为了保护这些敏感信息，人们通常使用密码来防止未经授权访问他们的手机。肩部冲浪攻击是众所周知的。然而，与普遍的看法相反，它们并不容易实施。人类通过肩窥攻击来预测密码被证明是不准确的。因此，作者提出了一种自动算法，通过录制视频来准确预测受害者在智能手机上输入的密码。他们提出的算法能够在不到75秒的时间内预测超过92%的输入数字，只需执行一次训练。
papers.title_zh: 智能手机密码预测

papers.title: RTTV: a dynamic CFI measurement tool based on TPM
papers.authors: Penglin Yang, Limin Tao, Haitao Wang
papers.abstract: In programme dynamic analysis, control flow integrity (CFI) is an efficient way to investigate programme's behaviour. By detecting these CF instructions, researchers can obtain programme's runtime information and execution status accurately. This feature makes CFI a sharp and sensitive approach to detect programme abnormal conditions and malicious attacks such as stack overflow and return-oriented programming. Meanwhile, with the development of dynamic trusted computing technique, a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip can provide cryptographic service both in a system's booting period and runtime period. In this study, the authors combine CFI and dynamic trusted computing to present runtime trusted verifier (RTTV) as a dynamic CFI measurement tool based on TPM. Compared to traditional measurement methods, their work is more accurate and reliable, can totally enforce programme run as predefined CF. RTTV uses TPM as `root of trust', which also provides computing resource such as hash algorithm to reduce performance overhead. With the characteristic of sensitivity, simplicity and efficiency, RTTV can especially meet the security requirement of remote embedded systems such as satellites and other valuable equipments.
papers.abstract_zh: 在程序动态分析中，控制流完整性是研究程序行为的有效方法。通过检测这些CF指令，研究人员可以准确地获得程序的运行信息和执行状态。这一特性使CFI成为检测程序异常情况和恶意攻击(如堆栈溢出和面向返回的编程)的一种敏锐而敏感的方法。同时，随着动态可信计算技术的发展，可信平台模块(TPM)芯片可以在系统启动和运行期间提供密码服务。在本研究中，作者将CFI和动态可信计算相结合，提出了运行时可信验证器(RTTV)作为一种基于TPM的动态CFI度量工具。与传统的测量方法相比，它们的工作更加准确和可靠，完全可以强制程序按照预定义的CF运行。RTTV使用TPM作为“信任根”，它还提供哈希算法等计算资源来降低性能开销。RTTV具有灵敏、简单、高效的特点，特别适合于卫星等贵重设备的远程嵌入式系统的安全需求。
papers.title_zh: RTTV:基于TPM的动态CFI测量工具

papers.title: Sequential opening multi-jammers localisation in multi-hop wireless network
papers.authors: Tongxiang Wang, Tao Liang, Jianhua Fan, Xianglin Wei
papers.abstract: Multi-hop wireless network (MHWN) can be easily attacked by jammers for its shared nature and open access to the wireless medium. Jamming attack may pose a significant threat to MHWN by occupying wireless channel used by legitimate users. A number of anti-jamming countermeasures have been put forward to eliminate the impact of communication disruption caused by jamming attacks. As an important building block of anti-jamming strategies, jammer localisation attracts much attention in recent years and several algorithms have been presented. However, how to locate multiple co-existing jammers receives little attention, and the efficiency and accuracy of the existing methods are still unsatisfactory. In this study, the authors focus on the localisation of sequential opening multi-jammers and put forward the multi-jammers localisation algorithm based on time series analysis (MLTSA) algorithm. The main process of MLTSA consists of four steps: detection of jamming attack, collection of received jamming signal strength, anomaly detection and separation of nodes, the existence determination and localisation of jammers. Finally, a series of simulation experiments are conducted to evaluate the correctness and effectiveness of the proposed algorithm. Experimental results show that the localisation accuracies of MLTSA are better than those of several state-of-the-art solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 多跳无线网络(MHWN)由于其共享性和对无线介质的开放性，很容易受到干扰。干扰攻击通过占用合法用户使用的无线信道，可能对MHWN构成重大威胁。为了消除干扰攻击造成的通信中断的影响，提出了许多抗干扰对策。干扰机定位作为抗干扰策略的重要组成部分，近年来引起了广泛关注，并提出了多种算法。然而，如何定位多个共存的干扰机却很少受到关注，现有方法的效率和精度仍然不能令人满意。在本研究中，作者重点研究了顺序开启多干扰源定位问题，提出了基于时间序列分析的多干扰源定位算法。MLTSA的主要过程包括四个步骤:干扰攻击的检测、接收干扰信号强度的收集、异常检测和节点分离、干扰机的存在判定和定位。最后，通过一系列仿真实验验证了该算法的正确性和有效性。实验结果表明，MLTSA的定位精度优于几种最先进的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 多跳无线网络中顺序开启多干扰定位

papers.title: Server notaries: a complementary approach to the web PKI trust model
papers.authors: Emre Yüce, Ali Aydin Selçuk
papers.abstract: Secure socket layer/transport layer security (TLS) is the de facto protocol for providing secure communications over the Internet. It relies on the web PKI model for authentication and secure key exchange. Despite its relatively successful past, the number of web PKI incidents observed have increased recently. These incidents revealed the risks of forged certificates issued by certificate authorities without the consent of the domain owners. Several solutions have been proposed to solve this problem but no solution has yet received widespread adoption due to complexity and deployability issues. In this study, the authors propose an effective solution for this problem that allows a TLS server to detect a certificate substitution attack against its domain across the Internet. The proposed solution is practical and allows a smooth and gradual transition. They also give a triangulation algorithm enabling the server to find out the origin of the attack. They conducted simulation experiments using real-world BGP data and showed that their proposal can be effective for detecting and locating attacks using relatively few vantage points over the Internet.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全套接字层/传输层安全性(TLS)是在互联网上提供安全通信的事实上的协议。它依赖于web PKI模型进行身份验证和安全密钥交换。尽管其过去相对成功，但最近观察到的web PKI事件的数量有所增加。这些事件揭示了未经域名所有者同意由证书颁发机构颁发的伪造证书的风险。已经提出了几种解决方案来解决这个问题，但是由于复杂性和可部署性问题，还没有一种解决方案被广泛采用。在这项研究中，作者针对这个问题提出了一个有效的解决方案，允许TLS服务器检测互联网上针对其域的证书替换攻击。提议的解决方案是切实可行的，并允许平稳和渐进的过渡。他们还给出一个三角算法，使服务器能够找出攻击的来源。他们使用真实世界的BGP数据进行了模拟实验，并表明他们的建议可以有效地利用互联网上相对较少的有利位置来检测和定位攻击。
papers.title_zh: 服务器公证:web PKI信任模型的补充方法

papers.title: CryptoSAT: a tool for SAT-based cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Frédéric Lafitte
papers.abstract: The security of symmetric key primitives comes from their exposure to public scrutiny in the context of competitions such as Advanced Encryption Standard, Secure Hash Algorithm 3, or currently CAESAR. However, due to the increasing number of primitives subjected to these competitions, the quality of the scrutiny relies on the availability of automated tools. Although SAT solvers have already proved useful for the automated analysis of these primitives, there is a lack of practical software tools for this purpose. This study describes a framework that aims to make SAT-based analyses accessible to cryptographers. The framework is implemented in a free open-source tool called CryptoSAT which is available in the public domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 对称密钥基元的安全性来自于它们在诸如高级加密标准、安全散列算法3或当前的CAESAR等竞争环境中的公开审查。然而，由于越来越多的原语受到这些竞争，审查的质量依赖于自动化工具的可用性。虽然SAT解算器已经被证明对这些原语的自动分析是有用的，但是缺乏用于此目的的实用软件工具。这项研究描述了一个框架，旨在使基于SAT的分析可用于密码学家。该框架是在一个名为CryptoSAT的免费开源工具中实现的，该工具在公共领域可用。
papers.title_zh: CryptoSAT:基于SAT的密码分析工具

papers.title: Efficient batch identity-based fully homomorphic encryption scheme in the standard model
papers.authors: Mingxing Hu, Qing Ye, Yongli Tang
papers.abstract:
Identity-based fully homomorphic encryption (IBFHE) provided a fundamental solution to the problem of huge public key size that exposed in fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) schemes, thus it is significant to make FHE become more practical. In recent years, the construction of IBFHE schemes were mainly based on lattices due to their conjectured resistance against quantum cryptanalysis, however, which makes these cryptosystems further unpractical. The main reason is the trapdoor function on which the scheme was based is rather complex for practical and the ciphertext size is too large. In this study, the authors propose an efficient batch IBFHE scheme, which can be proven secure from the standard LWE assumption in the standard model. The first contribution of this work is that the authors construct an efficient batch version of MP12 preimage sampling algorithm, which can efficiently generate identity keys for multi-bit IBE schemes. Based on that, the authors construct an asymptotically-faster multi-bit IBE scheme as the second contribution. The third contribution is that the authors transform the multi-bit IBE scheme to batch IBFHE scheme which supports to encrypt any message in ℤ
 q
 n
. Compared with the similar schemes, the authors show their schemes are essentially improved.
papers.abstract_zh:
基于身份的全同态加密(IBFHE)从根本上解决了全同态加密(FHE)方案中暴露出的公钥长度过大的问题，从而对FHE的实用化具有重要意义。近年来，基于格的IBFHE方案的构造主要是基于格的，这是由于格具有抗量子密码分析的猜想，然而这使得这些密码系统更加不实用。主要原因是该方案所基于的陷门函数在实际应用中相当复杂，而且密文长度太大。在本研究中，作者提出了一个有效的批量IBFHE方案，在标准模型中，可以从标准LWE假设证明该方案是安全的。这项工作的第一个贡献是作者构造了一个有效的MP12原像采样算法的批处理版本，它可以有效地为多比特IBE方案生成身份密钥。在此基础上，作者构造了一个渐近快速的多比特IBE方案作为第二个贡献。第三个贡献是作者将多比特的IBE方案转化为支持在ℤ加密任何消息的批量IBF方案
q
n
。与同类方案相比，作者表明他们的方案有本质上的改进。
papers.title_zh: 标准模型下高效的批量基于身份的全同态加密方案

papers.title: Guess-and-determine attacks on PANAMA-like stream ciphers
papers.authors: Lin Jiao, Yongqiang Li, Yonglin Hao
papers.abstract:
Guess-and-determine attack is a cryptanalysis method that has been applied to various stream ciphers. In this study, the authors study the guess-and-determine attacks on two ISO standardised, Panama-like stream ciphers: MUGI and Enocoro. Utilising the word-oriented structure of the two ciphers, they are able to launch heuristic guess-and-determine attacks in a more efficient manner. Their first target MUGI is both an ISO standard and a Japanese-government-selected CRYPTREC standard. By splitting its basic 64-bit words into 16-bit quarter-words, they are able to conduct a guess-and-determine attack with complexity 2
 388
, much lower than its 1216-bit internal state size. Enocoro is a lightweight stream cipher family. It has two versions named according to key-length as Enocoro-80 and Enocoro-128v2. They provide the specific guessing paths and they are able to launch guess-and-determine attacks on Enocoro-80 and Enocoro-128v2 with complexities 2
 88
 and 2
 144
, respectively. In addition to specific attacking results, they also find some generic rules that may help to improve the efficiency of guess-and-determine attacks in the future.
papers.abstract_zh:
猜测-确定攻击是一种密码分析方法，已经应用于各种流密码。在这项研究中，作者研究了对两个ISO标准化的类似巴拿马的流密码的猜测和确定攻击:MUGI和伊诺科罗。利用两种密码的面向单词的结构，他们能够以更有效的方式发起启发式猜测和确定攻击。他们的第一个目标MUGI是ISO标准和日本政府选择的CRYPTREC标准。通过将其基本的64位字分成16位四分之一字，他们能够进行复杂度为2的猜测和确定攻击
388
，远低于其1216位内部状态大小。Enocoro是一个轻量级的流密码家族。它有两个版本，根据密钥长度命名为Enocoro-80和Enocoro-128v2。它们提供了特定的猜测路径，能够对Enocoro-80和Enocoro-128v2发起猜测并确定攻击，复杂性为2
88
和2
144
，分别为。除了具体的攻击结果，他们还发现了一些通用规则，这些规则可能有助于提高未来猜测和确定攻击的效率。
papers.title_zh: 对类巴拿马流密码的猜测和判定攻击

papers.title: Equivalent key attack against a public-key cryptosystem based on subset sum problem
papers.authors: Jiayang Liu, Jingguo Bi
papers.abstract: The decisional version and computational version of the subset sum problem are known to be NP-complete and NP-hard. At International Symposium on Information Theory and its Applications 2012, Yasuyuki Murakami, Shinsuke Hamasho and Masao Kasahara presented a knapsack scheme based on the decisional version of the odd order subset sum problem. They claimed that the public sequence is indistinguishable from uniformly distributed sequences. In this study, the authors present an equivalent key attack against this scheme. More precisely, they firstly observe that there are many groups of equivalent keys, which satisfy several necessary conditions. Subsequently, they show that one can recover a group of equivalent keys by using the orthogonal lattice technique. The feasibility of the attack is validated by the experimental data when the bit length of secret keys is not too large. Hence, the security of the proposed scheme is overestimated.
papers.abstract_zh: 子集和问题的决策版本和计算版本被认为是NP完全和NP困难的。在2012年信息论及其应用国际研讨会上，村上泰之、滨正信和笠原正雄提出了一个基于奇数阶子集和问题决策版本的背包方案。他们声称公共序列与均匀分布的序列是无法区分的。在本研究中，作者提出了一个针对该方案的等价密钥攻击。更准确地说，他们首先观察到有许多组等价密钥，它们满足几个必要条件。随后，他们表明可以通过使用正交格技术恢复一组等价密钥。在密钥长度不太大的情况下，实验数据验证了攻击的可行性。因此，该方案的安全性被高估了。
papers.title_zh: 基于子集和问题的公钥密码系统的等价密钥攻击

papers.title: Detection and differentiation of application layer DDoS attack from flash events using fuzzy-GA computation
papers.authors: Khundrakpam Johnson Singh, Khelchandra Thongam, Tanmay De
papers.abstract: Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attacks are serious threats in the data center application, mainly affecting the web server. Even though there are various techniques to detect and mitigate such attacks so far they fail to meet in the case of application layer attack and Flash Events (FE). In the paper, we aim at detecting application layer DDoS attacks and distinguish it from FE. We have considered a DDoS attack model and selected the parameters in the incoming packets that correspond in causing the attack. Based on the attack model we have analysed the statistical parameters of the incoming packets such as inter-arrival time, the probability of uniqueness of an IP address in given time frame and the unavailability of HTTP (Hyper Text Transfer Protocol) GET acknowledgment bit in the header field. These parameters are the input to the Fuzzy classification model. We have used Genetic Algorithm (GA) to provide an optimised value range for the input parameters. The optimised values are now applied to Fuzzy logic to identify whether the web accessing clients shows the behavior of attack, normal or FE. The experimental results show that Fuzzy-GA model provides an accuracy of 98.4% in detecting DDoS attack and 97.3% in detecting FE..
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击是数据中心应用中的严重威胁，主要影响web服务器。尽管有各种技术来检测和缓解这种攻击，但迄今为止，在应用层攻击和闪存事件(FE)的情况下，这些技术无法满足要求。本文旨在检测应用层DDoS攻击，并将其与FE区分开来。我们考虑了一个DDoS攻击模型，并选择了引起攻击的输入数据包中的相应参数。基于攻击模型，我们分析了传入数据包的统计参数，如到达间隔时间、给定时间范围内IP地址唯一性的概率以及报头字段中HTTP(超文本传输协议)GET确认位的不可用性。这些参数是模糊分类模型的输入。我们已经使用遗传算法(GA)来为输入参数提供优化的值范围。优化值现在应用于模糊逻辑，以识别web访问客户端是否显示攻击行为、正常行为或FE行为。实验结果表明，Fuzzy-GA模型对DDoS攻击的检测准确率为98.4%，对FE攻击的检测准确率为97.3%..
papers.title_zh: 利用模糊遗传算法从flash事件中检测和区分应用层DDoS攻击

papers.title: Improved integral attacks without full codebook
papers.authors: Zhihui Chu, Huaifeng Chen, Xiaoyun Wang, Lu Li, Xiaoyang Dong, Yaoling Ding, Yonglin Hao
papers.abstract: The integral attack, exploits the balanced property of the output in the distinguisher. Usually, adversaries append some rounds after the distinguisher, guess the corresponding key bits and check whether the target bits are balanced. Few works add rounds before the distinguisher to make the key recovery attack. In the first full-round attack on MISTY1, Todo adds one FL layer (key-dependent linear function) before the distinguisher. In this study, the authors extend his method and give a general method, which they can use to extend some rounds (non-linear) before the distinguisher to attack more rounds with data complexity smaller than the whole space and little extra time consumption. The basic idea is that for different subkeys guessed in the forward rounds, they set different constant values for the input of the distinguisher. Finally, the selected data space is not full. For substitution permutation network (SPN) (Feistel with SPN round function) structures with 4 bit S-box and bit permutation, they estimate the data complexity when adding one round before the distinguishers for all 4 bit S-boxes. Using the method, they improve the integral attacks on PRESENT, RECTANGLE, TWINE and LBlock, and their results could cover one more round.
papers.abstract_zh: 整数攻击利用了区分器中输出的平衡属性。通常，对手在区分符后附加一些回合，猜测相应的关键位，并检查目标位是否平衡。很少有作品在区分符前加轮来进行密钥恢复攻击。在对MISTY1的第一轮攻击中，Todo在distinguisher之前增加了一个FL层(依赖于密钥的线性函数)。在本研究中，作者扩展了他的方法，给出了一个通用的方法，可以用来扩展鉴别器之前的一些轮(非线性的),以攻击更多的轮，数据复杂度小于整个空间，额外的时间消耗很少。基本思想是，对于前向轮中猜测的不同子键，它们为区分器的输入设置不同的常数值。最后，选择的数据空间未满。对于具有4比特S盒和比特置换的替换置换网络(SPN)(具有SPN轮函数的Feistel)结构，他们估计当在所有4比特S盒的区分符之前添加一轮时的数据复杂度。利用这种方法，他们改进了对PRESENT、RECTANGLE、TWINE和LBlock的积分攻击，并且他们的结果可以覆盖多一轮。
papers.title_zh: 改进的无完整码本的整数攻击

papers.title: Physical feasibility of QKD based on probabilistic quantum circuits
papers.authors: Amor Gueddana, Vasudevan Lakshminarayanan
papers.abstract: The authors present a comparison between the basic BB84 Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) and its optimised version based on Quantum Dense Coding, in terms of theoretical modelling and feasibility of circuits implementations. These circuits are mainly composed of probabilistic quantum gates, single photon sources, beam splitters (BSs), polarising BS and single photon detectors. They assume that the photonic devices composing the circuits are not perfect. They assess the average success probabilities of the two protocols depending on the success probability of the photonic sources used and the distance between Alice and Bob. They demonstrate that typical real-world photonic devices permit the implementation of secure communication with 0.65 of success probability over 120 km, while it could reach more than 0.9 over 148 km if just deterministic sources are provided.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者从理论建模和电路实现的可行性方面，对基本的BB84量子密钥分配(QKD)及其基于量子密集编码的优化版本进行了比较。这些电路主要由概率量子门、单光子源、分束器、偏振分束器和单光子探测器组成。他们假设组成电路的光子器件并不完美。他们根据所使用的光子源的成功概率以及Alice和Bob之间的距离来评估两个协议的平均成功概率。他们证明，典型的真实世界光子器件允许在120公里范围内以0.65的成功概率实现安全通信，而如果仅提供确定性源，则在148公里范围内可以达到0.9以上。
papers.title_zh: 基于概率量子电路的QKD的物理可行性

papers.title: New algorithms for the unbalanced generalised birthday problem
papers.authors: Jian Zou, Le Dong, Wenling Wu
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors present some new algorithms for the unbalanced generalised birthday problem (UGBP), which was proposed by Nikolic and Sasaki in their attacks on the generalised birthday problem (GBP). The authors’ first idea is simple, which uses some precomputing to convert UGBP into GBP. After the precomputing, they just adopt Wagner's k-tree algorithm or the algorithms of Bernstein et al. to solve UGBP. Their second idea combines the technique for the unbalanced meet-in-the-middle problem with the improved time–memory trade-off algorithm for GBP to solve UGBP. Besides, they will utilise the inactive technique and the rearrangement technique to improve the time complexities of their algorithms. The inactive technique is used to neglect the effect of some costly functions, and the rearrangement technique is adopted to balance the time costs between different functions. When k is not a power of 2, the time complexity of their algorithms for UGBP can also be improved by using the multicollision technique.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者提出了非平衡广义生日问题的一些新算法，该算法是由尼科利茨和佐佐木在他们对广义生日问题的攻击中提出的。作者的第一个想法很简单，使用一些预计算将UGBP转换为GBP。预计算后，他们只是采用Wagner的k-tree算法或Bernstein等人的算法来求解UGBP。他们的第二个想法是将不平衡中间相遇问题的技术与改进的GBP时间-内存权衡算法相结合，以解决UGBP。此外，他们将利用非活动技术和重排技术来提高算法的时间复杂度。非活动技术用于忽略一些代价函数的影响，重排技术用于平衡不同函数之间的时间代价。当k不是2的幂时，他们算法的时间复杂度也可以通过使用多重冲突技术来改善。
papers.title_zh: 不平衡广义生日问题的新算法

papers.title: Supervised learning framework for covert channel detection in LTE-A
papers.authors: Guangliang Xu, Wei Yang, Liusheng Huang
papers.abstract: Covert channels transmit secret information by using the existing resources which were not designed for communication. As a major approach to information leakage, covert channels are rapidly gaining popularity with the exponentially growth of cloud and network resources. Long Term Evolution Advance (LTE-A) has dominated the mobile telecommunication networks, which brings an elevation of the risk of covert channels. In this study, the authors propose a supervised learning scheme based on support vector machine (SVM) for the covert channel detection in LTE-A. Based on the fact that the covert channel using the header fields of LTE-A protocol would change the regularity, goodness of fit or correlation of the data traffic, they present behaviour characteristics statistics index (CSI) in the LTE-A protocol to evaluate the changes. According to CSI, they extract the classification feature vectors from the data traffic stream, based on which an SVM classifier used for classifying the channel as covert or overt is trained for testing on the channel under investigation. Experiment results show that the authors' proposed detection scheme is high-efficiency in terms of detection accuracy, sensitivity and specificity, which has great potential to serve as a new idea for the detection of covert channel in LTE-A.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐蔽信道通过使用不是为通信而设计的现有资源来传输秘密信息。随着云和网络资源的指数级增长，隐蔽信道作为信息泄漏的一种主要方式正迅速流行起来。长期演进技术(LTE-A)已经主导了移动电信网络，这带来了隐蔽信道风险的增加。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种基于支持向量机(SVM)的监督学习方案，用于LTE-A中的隐蔽信道检测。基于使用LTE-A协议报头字段的隐蔽信道会改变数据流量的规律性、拟合优度或相关性这一事实，他们在LTE-A协议中提出了行为特征统计指数(CSI)来评估这些变化。根据CSI，他们从数据业务流中提取分类特征向量，基于该分类特征向量，训练用于将信道分类为隐蔽或公开的SVM分类器，用于在所研究的信道上进行测试。实验结果表明，作者提出的检测方案在检测精度、灵敏度和特异性方面具有较高的效率，为LTE-A中隐蔽信道的检测提供了一种新的思路
papers.title_zh: LTE-A中隐蔽信道检测的监督学习框架

papers.title: Vulnerability modelling of crypto-chips against scan-based attacks
papers.authors: Mohammad Taherifard, Ahmad Patooghy, Mahdi Fazeli
papers.abstract: In this study, a gate-level vulnerability model is proposed to detect the potential security holes of crypto-chips against scan-based attacks. The proposed model offers a relative measure so-called vulnerability factor (VF) for each net of a given crypto-chip. Nets with the highest VFs are considered as the most vulnerable nets of the crypto-chip. The VF of each gate output is calculated considering (i) VFs of the gate inputs, and (ii) the probability of having a signal transition at the gate output. In order to validate the proposed model, the authors implemented the iterative and pipelined AES, as well as the iterative DES encryption algorithms to find their most vulnerable nets. Then the most vulnerable nets of each design, have been masked by a simple mechanism to explore the accuracy of the proposed model. Results of scan-based attacks which are done by ModelSim simulations show that by masking only 32, 64 and 32 nets in iterative Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), pipelined AES and iterative Data Encryption Standard(DES) designs, respectively, all of the done attacks are failed. Achieved results of the proposed model in comparison with the signal activity and random approaches demonstrate the superiority of the proposed model.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，我们提出了一个门级脆弱性模型来检测密码芯片的潜在安全漏洞，以抵御基于扫描的攻击。所提出的模型为给定密码芯片的每个网络提供了一个相对度量，即所谓的脆弱性因子(VF)。具有最高VFs的网络被认为是密码芯片最脆弱的网络。计算每个门输出的VF时，考虑(I)门输入的VF，以及(ii)门输出发生信号转换的概率。为了验证所提出的模型，作者实现了迭代和流水线AES，以及迭代DES加密算法，以找到它们最脆弱的网络。然后，每个设计中最脆弱的网络都被一个简单的机制所掩盖，以探索所提出的模型的准确性。通过ModelSim仿真完成的基于扫描的攻击的结果表明，通过分别在迭代高级加密标准(AES)、流水线AES和迭代数据加密标准(DES)设计中仅屏蔽32、64和32个网，所有完成的攻击都失败了。通过与信号活动和随机方法的比较，证明了所提出模型的优越性。
papers.title_zh: 密码芯片抗扫描攻击的脆弱性建模

papers.title: Preprocessing optimisation: revisiting recursive-BKZ lattice reduction algorithm
papers.authors: Md. Mokammel Haque, Josef Pieprzyk
papers.abstract: Preprocessing is applied to certain lattice reduction algorithms such as block Korkine–Zolotarev (BKZ) variants to reduce the search time in the enumeration tree for a shortest vector. The most classical form of preprocessing the authors observe is with polynomial time Lenstra–Lenstra–Lovasz algorithm to work with a slow enumeration-based algorithm like BKZ. The trade-off between the preprocessing and the enumeration stages in the context of time complexity of the whole algorithm is not well studied and explored. The main goal of this study is to re-investigate the preprocessing approach presented by Chen and Nguyen and improve its performance through optimisation. They extend the numeral results published by Haque et al. in IET Inf. Secur. for larger block sizes and report a comparison.
papers.abstract_zh: 预处理被应用于某些格归约算法，例如块kor kine–Zolotarev(BKZ)变体，以减少在枚举树中搜索最短向量的时间。作者观察到的最经典的预处理形式是使用多项式时间伦斯特拉-伦斯特拉-洛瓦斯算法来处理像BKZ这样的基于枚举的慢速算法。在整个算法的时间复杂度的背景下，预处理和枚举阶段之间的折衷没有被很好地研究和探索。本研究的主要目的是重新研究Chen和Nguyen提出的预处理方法，并通过优化改进其性能。他们推广了Haque等人在IET Inf中发表的数字结果。安全。对于较大的块大小，报告比较结果。
papers.title_zh: 预处理优化:重温递归BKZ格约简算法

papers.title: OPEXA: analyser assistant for detecting over-privileged extensions
papers.authors: Mina Sadat Khazaei, Hossein Homaei, Hamid Reza Shahriari
papers.abstract: Web browsers are enticing attack vectors because they provide an interface to the Internet. Extensions add capabilities to the browsers, and therefore are attractive to attackers. These capabilities are obtained through extension privileges. Some of these privileges are necessary for extensions to perform their claimed functionalities. However, an extension may have some unrequired privileges. Over-privileged extensions may be misused to compromise systems. The authors propose an Over-Privileged EXtension Analyser (OPEXA), to assist security experts in detecting suspicious extensions. OPEXA predicts the intended privileges of extensions based on their descriptions, which are stated by developers in natural language. They utilise this method because real users decide whether to install extensions based on descriptions. They use a supervised machine learning method to train a multi-label classifier that predicts the desired privileges. The extension is assumed to be suspicious if there exists at least one privilege in the extension that is not considered necessary by OPEXA. They evaluate their method on two datasets that consist of real extensions developed in new and old architectures of Firefox. According to the results, they can detect all of over-privileged extensions in these datasets. Their approach can minimise security expert's workload by automating the extension checking process.
papers.abstract_zh: Web浏览器是诱人的攻击媒介，因为它们提供了互联网接口。扩展为浏览器增加了功能，因此对攻击者很有吸引力。这些功能是通过扩展权限获得的。这些特权中的一些是扩展执行其声称的功能所必需的。但是，扩展可能有一些不需要的特权。过度特权扩展可能被滥用来危害系统。作者提出了一个超特权扩展分析器(OPEXA)，以帮助安全专家检测可疑的扩展。OPEXA基于扩展的描述来预测扩展的预期特权，这些描述是由开发人员用自然语言陈述的。他们使用这种方法是因为真实用户根据描述决定是否安装扩展。他们使用有监督的机器学习方法来训练多标签分类器，预测所需的权限。如果扩展中至少存在一个OPEXA认为不必要的特权，则认为该扩展是可疑的。他们在两个数据集上评估他们的方法，这两个数据集由在Firefox新旧架构中开发的真实扩展组成。根据结果，他们可以检测这些数据集中所有的过度特权扩展。他们的方法可以通过自动化扩展检查过程来最小化安全专家的工作量。
papers.title_zh: OPEXA:用于检测过度特权扩展的分析器助手

papers.title: Sophisticated security verification on routing repaired balanced cell-based dual-rail logic against side channel analysis
papers.authors: Wei He, Shivam Bhasin, Andrés Otero, Tarik Graba, Eduardo de la Torre, Jean-Luc Danger
papers.abstract: Conventional dual-rail precharge logic suffers from difficult implementations of dual-rail structure for obtaining strict compensation between the counterpart rails. As a light-weight and high-speed dual-rail style, balanced cell-based dual-rail logic (BCDL) uses synchronised compound gates with global precharge signal to provide high resistance against differential power or electromagnetic analyses. BCDL can be realised from generic field programmable gate array (FPGA) design flows with constraints. However, routings still exist as concerns because of the deficient flexibility on routing control, which unfavourably results in bias between complementary nets in security-sensitive parts. In this article, based on a routing repair technique, novel verifications towards routing effect are presented. An 8 bit simplified advanced encryption processing (AES)-co-processor is executed that is constructed on block random access memory (RAM)-based BCDL in Xilinx Virtex-5 FPGAs. Since imbalanced routing are major defects in BCDL, the authors can rule out other influences and fairly quantify the security variants. A series of asymptotic correlation electromagnetic (EM) analyses are launched towards a group of circuits with consecutive routing schemes to be able to verify routing impact on side channel analyses. After repairing the non-identical routings, Mutual information analyses are executed to further validate the concrete security increase obtained from identical routing pairs in BCDL.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的双轨预充电逻辑受到难以实现双轨结构的困扰，难以在对应的轨道之间获得严格的补偿。作为一种重量轻、速度快的双轨形式，基于平衡单元的双轨逻辑(BCDL)使用带有全局预充电信号的同步复合门来提供对差分功率或电磁分析的高阻抗。BCDL可以通过带约束的通用现场可编程门阵列(FPGA)设计流程来实现。然而，由于路由控制缺乏灵活性，路由仍然存在问题，这不利地导致了安全敏感部件中互补网络之间的偏差。本文基于一种布线修复技术，提出了一种新的布线效应验证方法。执行8位简化高级加密处理(AES)协处理器，该协处理器构建在Xilinx Virtex-5 FPGA中基于块随机存取存储器(RAM)的BCDL上。由于不平衡路由是BCDL的主要缺陷，作者可以排除其他影响，并公平量化安全变量。对一组具有连续布线方案的电路进行一系列渐近相关电磁(EM)分析，以便能够验证布线对侧信道分析的影响。在修复不相同的路由之后，执行互信息分析，以进一步验证从BCDL中的相同路由对获得的具体安全性增加。
papers.title_zh: 基于平衡单元的双轨逻辑抗旁路分析的安全性验证

papers.title: Parallel key management scheme for mobile ad hoc network based on traffic mining
papers.authors: R. Pushpa Lakshmi, A. Vincent Antony Kumar
papers.abstract: One of the main challenges in the mobile ad hoc network is to ensure secure communication, because of its dynamic topology and lack of centralised control. In this study, the authors propose a parallel key management scheme which combines the cluster-based key management and the partially distributed key management approach. The network is partitioned into clusters, where the cluster head (CH) plays the role of certification authority. The initial public key of each member is assigned by CH based on its identity (ID). The keys are updated periodically based on the node's ID and its trust value. The secret key of the node is generated by n key serving nodes, elected based on the trust value. The communication between the nodes is carried out by using the session key generated mainly based on the frequent traffic pattern exists between the nodes. The frequent traffic pattern is identified by mining the past network traffic data by using the backtracking search algorithm. The proposed scheme provides a mechanism for key generation, distribution and revocation. This scheme satisfies all security requirements and ensures forward and backward secrecies. The performance of the proposed scheme is evaluated by simulation.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于其动态拓扑和缺乏集中控制，移动自组织网络中的主要挑战之一是确保安全通信。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个并行密钥管理方案，结合了基于集群的密钥管理和部分分布式密钥管理方法。网络被划分成簇，簇头(CH)扮演认证机构的角色。每个成员的初始公钥由ch根据其身份(ID)分配。密钥根据节点的ID和信任值定期更新。节点的秘密密钥由基于信任值选出的n个密钥服务节点生成。节点之间的通信通过使用主要基于节点之间存在的频繁业务模式而生成的会话密钥来执行。通过使用回溯搜索算法挖掘过去的网络流量数据来识别频繁流量模式。所提出的方案提供了密钥生成、分发和撤销的机制。该方案满足所有的安全要求，并保证前向和后向保密性。通过仿真对所提方案的性能进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 基于流量挖掘的移动自组网并行密钥管理方案

papers.title: Ensemble detection model for profile injection attacks in collaborative recommender systems based on BP neural network
papers.authors: Fuzhi Zhang, Quanqiang Zhou
papers.abstract: The existing supervised approaches suffer from low precision when detecting profile injection attacks. To solve this problem, the authors propose an ensemble detection model by introducing back propogation (BP) neural network and ensemble learning technique. Firstly, through combination of various attack types, they create base training sets which include various samples of attack profiles and have great diversities with each other. Secondly, they use the created base training sets to train BP neural networks to generate diverse base classifiers. Finally, they select parts of the base classifiers which have the highest precision on the validation dataset and integrate them using voting strategy. Uncorrelated misclassifications generated by each base classifier can be successfully corrected by the ensemble learning. The experimental results on two different scale of the real datasets MovieLens and Netflix show that the proposed model can effectively improve the precision under the condition of holding a high recall.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的监督方法在检测注入攻击时精度较低。针对这一问题，作者引入反向传播(BP)神经网络和集成学习技术，提出了一种集成检测模型。首先，通过组合各种攻击类型，他们创建了基本的训练集，这些训练集包括各种攻击模式的样本，并且彼此之间有很大的差异。其次，他们使用创建的基本训练集来训练BP神经网络，以生成不同的基本分类器。最后，他们选择在验证数据集上具有最高精度的部分基本分类器，并使用投票策略来集成它们。由每个基本分类器产生的不相关的误分类可以通过集成学习成功地校正。在真实数据集MovieLens和网飞上的实验结果表明，该模型能够在保持较高召回率的情况下有效提高查准率。
papers.title_zh: 基于BP神经网络的协同推荐系统中特征注入攻击的集成检测模型

papers.title: Efficient chosen-ciphertext secure public-key encryption scheme with high leakage-resilience
papers.authors: Baodong Qin, Shengli Liu, Kefei Chen
papers.abstract:
A leakage-resilient public-key encryption (PKE) scheme provides security even if an adversary obtains some information on the secret key. In recent years, much attention has been focused on designing provably secure PKE in the presence of key-leakage and almost all the constructions rely on an important building block namely hash proof system (HPS). However, in the setting of adaptive chosen-ciphertext attacks (CCA2), there are not many HPS-based leakage-resilient PKE schemes available. Moreover, most of them have an unsatisfactory leakage rate. In this study, the authors propose a new method of constructing leakage-resilient CCA2-secure PKE scheme from any tag-based strongly universal
 2
 HPS. The striking advantage of the authors scheme is the leakage rate, which is the best one among all known HPS-based indistinguishability key leakage CCA2-secure constructions. In particular, they present an instantiation under the n

 = 2), they actually obtain a decisional Diffie-Hellman (DDH)-based [resp. decisional linear (DLIN)-based] PKE scheme, where the leakage rate can be made to 1/4 (resp. 1/6). The authors DDH-based scheme achieves the best leakage rate among all known DDH-based (Cramer-Shoup-type) schemes. Their DLIN-based scheme is the first one that can achieve leakage of L
/6 bits without pairing, where L

papers.abstract_zh:
抗泄漏公钥加密(PKE)方案提供了安全性，即使对手获得了一些关于密钥的信息。近年来，在密钥泄露的情况下设计可证明安全的PKE引起了广泛的关注，几乎所有的构造都依赖于一个重要的构造块，即哈希证明系统(HPS)。然而，在自适应选择密文攻击(CCA2)的背景下，没有多少基于HPS的泄漏弹性PKE方案可用。此外，它们中的大多数具有不令人满意的泄漏率。在这项研究中，作者提出了一种新的方法来构造泄漏弹性的CCA 2-安全的PKE方案
