papers.title_zh: 具有高抗泄漏能力的高效选择密文安全公钥加密方案

papers.title: Proof of retrievability with public verifiability resilient against related-key attacks
papers.authors: Hui Cui, Yi Mu, Man Ho Au
papers.abstract: Modern technologies such as cloud computing, grid computing and software as a service all require data to be stored by the third parties. A specific problem encountered in this context is to convince a verifier that a user's data are kept intact at the storage servers. An important approach to achieve this goal is called proof of retrievability, by which a storage server can assure a verifier via a concise proof that a user's file is available. However, for most publicly verifiable systems, existing proof of retrievability solutions do not take physical attacks into consideration, where an adversary can observe the outcome of the computation with methods like fault injection techniques. In fact, the authors find that giving the adversary the ability to obtain the information about the relations between the private keys, those systems are not secure anymore. Motivated by the need of preventing this kind of attacks, they present the security model for related-key attacks in publicly verifiable proofs of retrievability, where the adversary can subsequently observe the outcome of the publicly verifiable proof of retrievability under the modified key. After pointing out a linear related-key attack on an existing proof of retrievability system with public verifiability, they present a secure and efficient proof of retrievability with public verifiability, against related-key attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算、网格计算和软件即服务等现代技术都要求数据由第三方存储。在这种情况下遇到的具体问题是使验证者相信用户的数据在存储服务器上保持完整。实现这一目标的一个重要方法称为可检索性证明，通过这种方法，存储服务器可以通过用户文件可用的简明证明向验证者保证。然而，对于大多数可公开验证的系统，现有的可检索性证明解决方案没有考虑物理攻击，在物理攻击中，对手可以通过像故障注入技术这样的方法来观察计算的结果。事实上，作者发现，给对手获取有关私钥之间关系的信息的能力，这些系统就不再安全了。出于防止这种攻击的需要，他们在可公开验证的可检索性证明中提出了相关密钥攻击的安全模型，其中对手可以随后观察在修改的密钥下可公开验证的可检索性证明的结果。在指出对现有的可公开验证的可检索性证明系统的线性相关密钥攻击后，他们提出了一个安全有效的可公开验证的可检索性证明。
papers.title_zh: 具有公共可验证性的可检索性证明，可抵抗相关密钥攻击

papers.title: Efficient abuse-free fair contract-signing protocol based on an ordinary crisp commitment scheme
papers.authors: Alawi A. Al-saggaf, Lahouari Ghouti
papers.abstract: A mathematical framework for conventional commitment schemes is proposed. Digital contract-signing protocols represent an important application of the proposed framework, where usually two mistrusted parties wish to exchange their commitments in a fair way. Building on a variant of the proposed framework, an efficient contract-signing protocol over the Internet is developed. The latter protocol is ‘optimistic, fairness and abuse-free’. Detailed security and performance analyses are provided. The performance analysis reveals an important computational aspect of the proposed protocol which requires only ‘four rounds’ to complete unlike existing protocols. Moreover, the communication and computational costs are relatively small. Given these theoretical and practical features, the proposed contract-signing protocol is not only of theoretical interest, but it also enjoys practical merits which make it very suitable for electronic transactions requiring online signature exchange.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了传统承诺机制的数学框架。数字合同签署协议代表了所提出的框架的一个重要应用，其中通常两个不信任方希望以公平的方式交换他们的承诺。基于所提出的框架的变体，开发了一种有效的因特网上的合同签署协议。后一种协议是“乐观的、公平的和无滥用的”。提供了详细的安全性和性能分析。性能分析揭示了所提出的协议的一个重要的计算方面，与现有协议不同，它只需要“四轮”就可以完成。而且通信和计算开销相对较小。鉴于这些理论和实践特征，所提出的合同签署协议不仅具有理论意义，而且具有实用价值，这使得它非常适合于需要在线签名交换的电子交易。
papers.title_zh: 基于普通crisp承诺方案的高效无滥用公平签约协议

papers.title: Transferable conditional e-cash with optimal anonymity in the standard model
papers.authors: Jiangxiao Zhang, Hua Guo, Zhoujun Li, Chang Xu
papers.abstract: Transferable conditional electronic-cash (e-cash) allows the recipient of a coin in a transaction to transfer it in a later payment transaction to the third person based on the outcome not known in advance. Anonymity is a very important property for a transferable conditional e-cash. However, none of the existed transferable conditional e-cash achieve the optimal anonymity because of its special structure, that is, introducing transferability in the conditional e-cash. In this study, they novelly present a transferable conditional e-cash scheme using a totally different structure, that is, adding condition into the transferable e-cash. Thanks to employing Groth–Sahai proofs systems and commuting signatures, the new transferable conditional e-cash satisfies optimal anonymity. Accordingly, they present an extended security model by introducing a publisher who is responsible for publishing two outcomes of a condition. Then, they prove the new scheme's security in the standard model. Compared with the existing transferable conditional e-cash, the efficiency of the new scheme is also improved since the size of the computation and communication is constant.
papers.abstract_zh: 可转移的有条件电子现金(e-cash)允许交易中的硬币接收者基于事先不知道的结果在稍后的支付交易中将硬币转移给第三人。匿名性是可转移有条件电子现金的一个非常重要的性质。然而，现有的可转移有条件电子现金由于其特殊的结构，即在有条件电子现金中引入了可转移性，没有一个实现了最优匿名性。在这项研究中，他们使用一种完全不同的结构，即在可转移的电子现金中加入条件，提出了一个可转移的有条件电子现金方案。由于采用Groth-Sahai证明系统和交换签名，新的可转移有条件电子现金满足最优匿名性。因此，他们通过引入负责发布一个条件的两个结果的发布者，提出了一个扩展的安全模型。然后，他们在标准模型下证明了新方案的安全性。与现有的可转移条件电子现金相比，由于计算和通信的规模不变，新方案的效率也得到了提高。
papers.title_zh: 标准模型下最优匿名的可转移条件电子现金

papers.title: PESCA: a peer-to-peer social network architecture with privacy-enabled social communication and data availability
papers.authors: Fatemeh Raji, Mohammad Davarpanah Jazi, Ali Miri
papers.abstract: The major challenge in current online social networks (OSNs) is privacy violation by OSN providers or unauthorised users. OSN providers collect unprecedented amounts of personal information for targeted advertising. Moreover, users are not able to share their social data with their friends with complete access control. Peer-to-peer (P2P) infrastructure is an interesting solution for a big-brother-free alternative to current OSN designs. However, the fundamental nature of P2P systems has dynamic peer turn-over which results in data unavailability. Additionally, users’ data must be available in the OSN when authorised data audiences want to access them. For these reasons, we propose a P2P-OSN architecture which is composed of a privacy enabled setup for users’ social communications and an adaptive replica placement strategy for ensuring availability for users’ shared data. The proposed framework correlates the availability of shared content in the P2P-OSN to the access control assigned to them. Our evaluations show the proposed P2P-OSN has considerable improvements in providing data privacy and availability compared with the existing approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前在线社交网络面临的主要挑战是OSN提供商或未授权用户侵犯隐私。OSN提供商收集空前数量的个人信息用于定向广告。此外，用户不能在完全访问控制的情况下与他们的朋友共享他们的社交数据。对等(P2P)基础设施是一个有趣的解决方案，可以替代当前的OSN设计。然而，P2P系统的基本特性是动态的节点翻转，这会导致数据不可用。此外，当授权的数据受众想要访问用户数据时，用户数据必须在OSN中可用。基于这些原因，我们提出了一个P2P-OSN体系结构，它由一个支持隐私的用户社交设置和一个自适应的副本放置策略组成，以确保用户共享数据的可用性。提出的框架将P2P-OSN中共享内容的可用性与分配给它们的访问控制相关联。我们的评估表明，与现有方法相比，提出的P2P-OSN在提供数据隐私和可用性方面有相当大的改进。
papers.title_zh: PESCA:一个对等的社交网络架构，具有支持隐私的社交通信和数据可用性

papers.title: Approaching secure industrial control systems
papers.authors: Rafal Leszczyna
papers.abstract: This study presents a systematic approach to secure industrial control systems based on establishing a business case followed by the development of a security programme. To support these two fundamental activities the authors propose a new method for security cost estimation and a security assessment scheme. In this study they explain the cost evaluation technique and illustrate with a case study concerning the assessment of the cost of information security assurance activities in a division of a Polish manufacturer of passenger and commercial tyres. They further present the steps of their security assessment scheme and demonstrate how they integrate with the overall approach for protecting industrial control systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了一种系统化的方法来确保工业控制系统的安全，其基础是建立一个商业案例，然后制定一个安全计划。为了支持这两个基本活动，作者提出了一种新的安全成本估计方法和一种安全评估方案。在本研究中，他们解释了成本评估技术，并通过一个案例研究说明了对波兰一家客车和商用轮胎制造商部门的信息安全保证活动成本的评估。他们进一步介绍了其安全评估方案的步骤，并展示了它们如何与保护工业控制系统的整体方法相集成。
papers.title_zh: 走近安全的工业控制系统

papers.title: 'A public key infrastructure model for privacy-enhancing general purpose eIDs'
papers.authors: Dionysis Kefallinos, Efstathios D. Sykas
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors propose a hybrid identity certificate – attribute certificate public key infrastructure (PKI) model with elements of anonymity, applicable to general purpose electronic identities, which aims to defend personal information privacy, hinder user tracking and preserve the free will of its users. The authors analyse the associated processes, the certificate contents and the roles of the parties involved. The authors’ motive for its formulation is the belief that research previously done in this field is either too restrictive, too proprietary, too difficult to implement, or a combination of the above. In addition, the PKIs that have been deployed in most countries, both public and private, do not in the authors view protect personal information privacy. Instead, the authors propose a model that adheres to standards, is easy to implement, requires as little as possible application development for integration into commercial PKI systems, is suitable for large-scale deployment and concedes little in the protection of personal information privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者提出了一种混合身份证书-属性证书公钥基础设施(PKI)模型，该模型具有匿名性元素，适用于通用电子身份，旨在保护个人信息隐私、阻止用户跟踪和维护用户的自由意愿。作者分析了相关的过程，证书的内容和参与各方的作用。作者的动机是相信以前在这一领域所做的研究要么限制太多，要么太专有，太难实施，要么以上两者兼而有之。此外，在作者看来，大多数国家(包括公共和私人)部署的PKI并不能保护个人信息隐私。相反，作者提出了一种模型，该模型符合标准，易于实现，需要尽可能少的应用程序开发以集成到商业PKI系统中，适合大规模部署，并且在保护个人信息隐私方面让步很少。
papers.title_zh: 一种用于增强隐私的通用eIDs的公钥基础设施模型

papers.title: Novel and practical scheme based on secret sharing for laptop data protection
papers.authors: Chin-Chen Chang, Yeh-Chieh Chou, Chin-Yu Sun
papers.abstract: With the benefits of portability and mobility, laptops have become more and more popular. People usually believe that their personal laptop is safe, and they store sensitive data in it. However, when a laptop is stolen, a malicious thief can obtain illegitimate benefits by extracting sensitive data from the laptop. For this reason, several security mechanisms for protecting sensitive data on laptops have been designed. Kao et al. (2012) designed a protocol (MELP) that allowed laptop users to use their mobile phones as the encryption key to protect their files. Although the mobile-based mechanism is secure, the authors still believe that it is limited by third-generation mobile devices and online data encryption/decryption. In this study, the authors present their design about a novel scheme based on secret-sharing technique. In the authors’ proposed scheme, users can easily encrypt/decrypt their laptop data offline, that is, without access to the Internet. Furthermore, the authors’ security analysis shows that their scheme satisfies all of the essential requirements for security and functionality. Also, the authors’ performance analysis indicates that their proposed scheme has better efficiency, which makes it suitable for use in protecting the data stored on laptops.
papers.abstract_zh: 凭借便携性和移动性的优势，笔记本电脑变得越来越受欢迎。人们通常认为他们的个人笔记本电脑是安全的，他们在里面存储敏感数据。然而，当笔记本电脑被盗时，恶意窃贼可以通过从笔记本电脑中提取敏感数据来获取不正当利益。出于这个原因，已经设计了几种用于保护膝上型电脑上的敏感数据的安全机制。Kao等人(2012年)设计了一个协议(MELP)，允许笔记本电脑用户使用他们的移动电话作为加密密钥来保护他们的文件。虽然基于移动的机制是安全的，但作者仍然认为它受到第三代移动设备和在线数据加密/解密的限制。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个基于秘密共享技术的新方案。在作者提出的方案中，用户可以轻松地离线加密/解密他们的笔记本电脑数据，即无需访问互联网。此外，作者的安全性分析表明，他们的方案满足安全性和功能性的所有基本要求。此外，作者的性能分析表明，他们提出的方案具有更好的效率，这使得它适用于保护笔记本电脑上存储的数据。
papers.title_zh: 一种新颖实用的基于秘密共享的笔记本数据保护方案

papers.title: Anonymous multi-receiver remote data retrieval for pay-TV in public clouds
papers.authors: Huaqun Wang
papers.abstract: Along with the rapid development of network-based cloud computing, security has become an important element. When a media corporation stores its programs in public clouds, it is important to authorise the consumers to enjoy the stored program by electronic payment. To protect the consumers’ privacy and save the bandwidth, the authors propose an anonymous multi-receiver remote data retrieval model for pay-TV in public clouds. In the security model, they consider the malicious public cloud server (PCS), malicious corporation and malicious consumer. The authors’ scheme can withstand the malicious PCS, malicious corporation and malicious consumer. At last, the authors give the computation efficiency analysis, communication efficiency analysis and flexibility analysis. Their analysis shows that their scheme is provably secure and efficient.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着基于网络的云计算的快速发展，安全已经成为一个重要的元素。当媒体公司将其节目存储在公共云中时，授权消费者通过电子支付来享受存储的节目是很重要的。为了保护用户隐私和节省带宽，提出了一种公共云中付费电视的匿名多接收者远程数据检索模型。在安全模型中，他们考虑了恶意公有云服务器(PCS)、恶意企业和恶意消费者。作者的方案可以抵抗恶意个人计算机、恶意公司和恶意消费者。最后给出了计算效率分析、通信效率分析和灵活性分析。他们的分析表明，他们的方案是可证明安全和有效的。
papers.title_zh: 公共云中付费电视的匿名多接收者远程数据检索

papers.title: Biometric security system over finite field for mobile applications
papers.authors: S. Maria Celestin Vigila, K. Muneeswaran, W. T. B. A. Antony
papers.abstract: Recently, number of mobile users and mobile banking applications are increased dramatically. The current mobile banking system unable to provide face-to-face transaction, that is, anyone can perform transaction by using proper secret code. This study proposes a new triangular based indexing method to authenticate the original account holder in mobile banking environment. A Delaunay triangulation indexing scheme has been designed for protecting biometric template and Voronoi vertex is calculated for verifying the authorised person. A novel algorithm has been developed for mutual authentication. To reduce key size, elliptic curve cryptography technique is adapted. Biometric key is generated for secure communication and also discusses the security aspects of the proposed method.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，手机用户和手机银行应用数量急剧增加。目前的手机银行系统无法提供面对面的交易，即任何人都可以使用正确的密码进行交易。本研究提出了一种新的基于三角形的索引方法来认证移动银行环境中的原始账户持有人。设计了Delaunay三角剖分索引方案来保护生物模板，并计算Voronoi顶点来验证授权人。已经开发了一种用于相互认证的新算法。为了减小密钥长度，采用了椭圆曲线密码技术。生物特征密钥被生成用于安全通信，并且还讨论了所提出的方法的安全性方面。
papers.title_zh: 面向移动应用的有限域生物安全系统

papers.title: Construction of perfect diffusion layers from linear feedback shift registers
papers.authors: Hong Xu, Yonghui Zheng, Xuejia Lai
papers.abstract: Maximum distance separable (MDS) matrices are widely used in the diffusion layers of block ciphers and hash functions. Inspired by Guo, Sajadieh and Wu et al.'s recursive construction of perfect diffusion layers from linear feedback shift registers (LFSRs), the authors further study how to construct perfect diffusion layers from LFSRs of Fibonacci and Galois architectures, and present a systematic analysis of 4 × 4 words diffusion layer constructed with those two structures. Compared with known results, the MDS matrices constructed by us have the advantage that their inverses are usually also MDS matrices, and can be efficiently implemented with the same computational complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: 最大距离可分(MDS)矩阵广泛应用于分组密码和哈希函数的扩散层。受郭、Sajadieh和吴等人用线性反馈移位寄存器递归构造完全扩散层的启发，作者进一步研究了如何用Fibonacci和Galois结构的线性反馈移位寄存器构造完全扩散层，并对用这两种结构构造的4 × 4字扩散层进行了系统分析。与已知结果相比，我们构造的MDS矩阵的优点是它们的逆通常也是MDS矩阵，并且可以在相同的计算复杂度下有效地实现。
papers.title_zh: 由线性反馈移位寄存器构造完美扩散层

papers.title: RIKE+ : using revocable identities to support key escrow in public key infrastructures with flexibility
papers.authors: Jingqiang Lin, Wen Tao Zhu, Qiongxiao Wang, Nan Zhang, Jiwu Jing, Neng Gao
papers.abstract: Public key infrastructures (PKIs) are proposed to provide various security services. Some security services such as confidentiality require key escrow in certain scenarios, whereas some others such as non-repudiation and authentication usually prohibit key escrow. Moreover, these two conflicting requirements can coexist for one PKI user. The popular solution in which each user has two different certificates and an escrow authority backs up all escrowed private keys faces the problems of efficiency and scalability. In this study, a novel key management infrastructure called RIKE+ is proposed to integrate the ‘inherent key escrow’ of identity-based encryption (IBE) into PKIs. In RIKE+ , (the hash value of) a user's PKI certificate also serves as a ‘revocable identity’ to derive the user's IBE public key, and the revocation of this IBE key pair is achieved by the certificate revocation of PKIs. Therefore the certificate binds the user with two key pairs, one of which is escrowed inherently and the other is not. Furthermore, RIKE+ employs chameleon hash to flexibly control the relationship between the certificate and the IBE key pair. In the case of certificate renewal and revocation, chameleon hash enables RIKE+ to manipulate the hash value of the new certificate, so the user's IBE key pair is not unconditionally changed unless it is necessary. RIKE+ is an effective certificate-based solution compatible with traditional PKIs and can be built on existing X.509 PKIs.
papers.abstract_zh: 公钥基础设施(PKI)被提出来提供各种安全服务。某些安全服务(如机密性)在某些情况下需要密钥托管，而其他一些安全服务(如不可否认性和身份验证)通常禁止密钥托管。此外，对于一个PKI用户来说，这两个相互冲突的需求可以共存。在流行的解决方案中，每个用户有两个不同的证书，托管机构备份所有托管的私钥，这种解决方案面临着效率和可扩展性的问题。在这项研究中，提出了一种新的密钥管理基础设施RIKE+,将基于身份的加密(IBE)的“固有密钥托管”集成到PKI中。在RIKE+中，用户的PKI证书(的散列值)也用作“可撤销身份”来导出用户的IBE公钥，并且通过PKI的证书撤销来实现该IBE密钥对的撤销。因此，证书用两个密钥对将用户绑定在一起，其中一个是固有托管的，另一个不是。此外，RIKE+使用变色龙散列来灵活地控制证书和IBE密钥对之间的关系。在证书更新和撤销的情况下，chameleon hash使RIKE+能够操纵新证书的哈希值，因此除非必要，否则用户的IBE密钥对不会被无条件更改。RIKE+是与传统PKI兼容的有效的基于证书的解决方案，可以构建在现有的X.509 PKIs上。
papers.title_zh: RIKE+:使用可撤销身份灵活地支持公钥基础设施中的密钥托管

papers.title: Adaptively secure broadcast encryption under standard assumptions with better efficiency
papers.authors: Kwangsu Lee, Dong Hoon Lee
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors present an efficient public-key broadcast encryption (PKBE) scheme with sub-linear size of public keys, private keys and ciphertexts and prove its adaptive security under standard assumptions. Compared with the currently best scheme of Garg et al. (CCS 2010) that provides adaptive security under standard assumptions and sub-linear size of various parameters, the ciphertext size of the author's scheme is 94% shorter and the encryption algorithm of their scheme is also 2.8 times faster than the scheme of Garg et al. To achieve their scheme, they adapt the dual system encryption technique of Waters. However, there is a challenging problem to use this technique for the construction of PKBE with sub-linear size of ciphertexts such as a tag compression problem. To overcome this problem, they first devise a novel tag update technique for broadcast encryption. Using this technique, they build an efficient PKBE scheme in symmetric bilinear groups, and prove its adaptive security under standard assumptions.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者提出了一个有效的公钥广播加密(PKBE)方案，其公钥、私钥和密文的长度都是次线性的，并在标准假设下证明了它的自适应安全性。与Garg等人(CCS 2010)在标准假设和各种参数的亚线性大小下提供自适应安全性的当前最佳方案相比，作者方案的密文长度缩短了94%,并且他们方案的加密算法也比Garg等人的方案快2.8倍。为了实现他们的方案，他们采用了Waters的双系统加密技术。然而，使用这种技术来构造具有亚线性大小的密文的PKBE存在一个挑战性的问题，例如标签压缩问题。为了克服这个问题，他们首先设计了一种新颖的广播加密标签更新技术。利用这种技术，他们在对称双线性群中构造了一个有效的PKBE方案，并在标准假设下证明了它的自适应安全性。
papers.title_zh: 在标准假设下具有更高效率的自适应安全广播加密

papers.title: Efficient revocable certificateless encryption against decryption key exposure
papers.authors: Yinxia Sun, Futai Zhang, Limin Shen, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: Certificateless public key cryptosystem (CLPKC) improves the identity based public key cryptosystem to be key-escrow free. Many research works on CLPKC have been presented so far. However, the revocation problem in CLPKC still lacks effective solutions. The current revocation approaches suffer from either low efficiency or security weakness. In this study, we propose the first ‘scalable revocable’ certificateless encryption (RCLE) scheme against ‘decryption key exposure’. The scheme is provably secure in the standard model. Moreover, we give a second interesting RCLE scheme whose decryption key is very short.
papers.abstract_zh: 无证书公钥密码系统(CLPKC)将基于身份的公钥密码系统改进为无密钥托管的。到目前为止，已有许多关于CLPKC的研究工作。然而，CLPKC中的撤销问题仍然缺乏有效的解决方案。当前的撤销方法要么效率低，要么安全性差。在这项研究中，我们提出了第一个“可扩展可撤销”的无证书加密(RCLE)方案。该方案在标准模型下是可证明安全的。此外，我们给出了第二个有趣的RCLE方案，它的解密密钥很短。
papers.title_zh: 抗解密密钥泄露的高效可撤销无证书加密

papers.title: Improved boomerang attacks on round-reduced SM3 and keyed permutation of BLAKE-256
papers.authors: Dongxia Bai, Hongbo Yu, Gaoli Wang, Xiaoyun Wang
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors study the security of hash functions SM3 and BLAKE-256 against boomerang attack. SM3 is designed by Wang et al. and published by Chinese Commercial Cryptography Administration Office for the use of electronic certification service system in China. BLAKE is one of the five finalists of the NIST SHA-3 competition submitted by Aumasson et al. For SM3, they present boomerang distinguishers for the compression function reduced to 34/35/36/37 steps out of 64 steps, with time complexities 231.4, 233.6, 273.4 and 2192, respectively. Then, they show some incompatible problems existed in the previous boomerang attacks on SM3. Meanwhile, they launch boomerang attacks on up to 7- and 8-round keyed permutation of BLAKE-256, which are the first valid 7-round and 8-round boomerangs for BLAKE-256. Especially, since the author's distinguishers on 34/35-steps compression function of SM3 and 7-round keyed permutation of BLAKE-256 are practical, they are able to obtain boomerang quartets of these attacks. As far as they know, these are the best results against round-reduced SM3 and BLAKE-256.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本研究中，作者研究了hash函数SM3和BLAKE-256抵抗回旋镖攻击的安全性。SM3是由王等设计，由中国商用密码管理局发布，供中国电子认证服务系统使用。BLAKE是Aumasson等人提交的NIST SHA-3竞赛的五名决赛选手之一。对于SM3，他们提出了压缩功能减少到64步中的34/35/36/37步的回飞镖区分器，时间复杂度分别为231.4、233.6、273.4和2192。然后，他们显示了一些不兼容的问题存在于以前的回旋镖攻击SM3。与此同时，他们对布雷克-256的7轮和8轮键控排列发射回飞棒攻击，这是布雷克-256的第一个有效的7轮和8轮回飞棒。特别地，由于作者对SM3的34/35步压缩函数和BLAKE-256的7轮密钥置换的区分器是实用的，它们能够获得这些攻击的回飞镖四元组。据他们所知，这些是对抗round-reduced SM3和BLAKE-256的最好成绩。
papers.title_zh: 改进了对轮降SM3和BLAKE-256键控排列的回旋镖攻击

papers.title: Self-similarity cryptanalysis of the block cipher ITUbee
papers.authors: Hadi Soleimany
papers.abstract: Recent developments in the resource constrained devices have led to a renewed interest in designing light-weight primitives with inventive and unconventional structures. Using round-dependent constants instead of a strong key schedule is one of the most widely used trick against the self-similarity cryptanalysis in recent cipher proposals. So far there has been little discussion about the effect of the round constants on the security of the ciphers. In this study, the authors identify several weaknesses in round-reduced versions of the block cipher ITUbee, which was presented recently at LightSec 2013. These weaknesses allow to build relations between the round constants. The author's technique leads to several cryptanalysis in the weak-key, related-key and single-key models and shows that the resistance of ITUbee against self-similarity cryptanalysis is not independent of the values of round constants. They show that the round-reduced cipher under a fraction of the keys is distinguishable from an ideal random permutation. Then they utilise a similar technique to show there exists a deterministic related-key differential distinguisher for up to eight rounds of the cipher. This observation leads to the decrease of the security of 8-round ITUbee in the single-key model by one bit.
papers.abstract_zh: 资源受限设备的最新发展已经引起了对设计具有创新和非常规结构的轻质基元的新兴趣。在最近的密码提案中，使用轮相关常数代替强密钥调度是最广泛使用的对抗自相似密码分析的技巧之一。到目前为止，很少有人讨论循环常数对密码安全性的影响。在这项研究中，作者发现了最近在LightSec 2013上展示的分组密码ITUbee的round-reduced版本的几个弱点。这些弱点允许在舍入常数之间建立关系。作者的技术导致了在弱密钥、相关密钥和单密钥模型中的若干密码分析，并表明ITUbee对自相似密码分析的抵抗性不依赖于轮常数的值。他们证明了在一部分密钥下的循环简化密码与理想的随机置换是不同的。然后，他们利用类似的技术来证明，对于多达八轮的密码，存在一个确定性的相关密钥差分鉴别器。这种观察导致单密钥模型中8轮ITUbee的安全性降低了一位。
papers.title_zh: 分组密码ITUbee的自相似性分析

papers.title: Practical verifiably encrypted signature based on Waters signatures
papers.authors: Zuhua Shao, Yipeng Gao
papers.abstract: Waters proposed the first efficient signature scheme that is known to be existentially unforgeable based on the standard computational Diffie-Hellman assumption without random oracles. Lu et al. then proposed the first verifiably encrypted signature (VES) scheme based on Waters signatures. However, the security proofs of Lu et al. and some other VES schemes are built on the certified-key model, in which the key pair of the adjudicator is chosen by the simulator rather than the signature forger. It demands that the adjudicator must be honest enough never to forge signatures. In the real world, it is hard for users to choose such trusted third party. In this study, the authors first show that Lu et al.’s VES is not secure in the chosen-key model by presenting a rogue key attack. Then they present the first VES scheme based on Waters signatures secure in the chosen-key model, where two inside adversaries, malicious adjudicator and malicious verifier, have more powers than ever.
papers.abstract_zh: Waters提出了第一个有效的签名方案，该方案基于标准的计算Diffie-Hellman假设，在没有随机预言的情况下是存在不可伪造的。然后，Lu等人提出了第一个基于Waters签名的可验证加密签名方案。然而，Lu等人的安全证明和其他一些VES方案都是建立在认证密钥模型上的，其中判决者的密钥对是由模拟器而不是签名伪造者选择的。它要求裁决者必须足够诚实，绝不伪造签名。在现实世界中，用户很难选择这样可信的第三方。在本研究中，作者首先通过提出欺诈密钥攻击证明了Lu等人的VES在选择密钥模型下是不安全的。然后，他们提出了第一个基于Waters签名的VES方案，该方案在选择密钥模型下是安全的，其中两个内部对手，恶意裁决者和恶意验证者，拥有比以前更多的权力。
papers.title_zh: 基于Waters签名的实用可验证加密签名

papers.title: Anonymous multi-receiver ID-based signcryption scheme
papers.authors: Liaojun Pang, Lu Gao, Huixian Li, Yumin Wang
papers.abstract: In earlier multi-receiver signcryption schemes, in order to help the authorised receivers to find the corresponding information for decryption from the ciphertext, the list of identities of all authorised receivers should be included in the ciphertext as a necessary element. However, this method has directly led to the privacy leakage problem of receivers. Later, several anonymous multi-receiver signcryption schemes use the Lagrange interpolation method to mix and hide the real identities of all receivers, so that the ciphertext does not expose identities of the receivers any longer. Therefore the Lagrange interpolation method is considered to be a perfect solution to the receiver anonymity problem, and multiple anonymous multi-receiver signcryption schemes have been proposed based on it. However, recently, this method has been proven to be insecure because it cannot assure the anonymity of receivers either. In fact, in any of the existing anonymous schemes based on the Lagrange interpolation method, it is easy for one authorised receiver to judge whether anyone is an authorised receiver or not, which badly violates the receiver anonymity. Motivated by these concerns, the authors propose a new multi-receiver signcryption scheme to solve this problem. Analyses show that the proposed scheme meets confidentiality, unforgeablity and the sender and receivers’ anonymity.
papers.abstract_zh: 在早期的多接收者签密方案中，为了帮助授权接收者从密文中找到相应的解密信息，所有授权接收者的身份列表应该作为必要元素包含在密文中。然而，这种方法直接导致了接收者的隐私泄露问题。后来，一些匿名多接收者签密方案使用拉格朗日插值方法来混合和隐藏所有接收者的真实身份，使得密文不再暴露接收者的身份。因此拉格朗日插值方法被认为是解决接收者匿名性问题的完美方法，并在此基础上提出了多个匿名多接收者签密方案。然而，最近，这种方法被证明是不安全的，因为它也不能保证接收者的匿名性。事实上，在任何现有的基于拉格朗日插值方法的匿名方案中，一个授权接收者很容易判断任何人是否是授权接收者，这严重违反了接收者匿名性。基于这些考虑，作者提出了一个新的多接收者签密方案来解决这个问题。分析表明，该方案满足机密性、不可伪造性以及发送者和接收者的匿名性。
papers.title_zh: 匿名多接收者基于身份的签密方案

papers.title: Hijacking the Vuze BitTorrent network: all your hop are belong to us
papers.authors: Eric Chan-Tin, Victor Heorhiadi, Nicholas Hopper, Yongdae Kim
papers.abstract: Vuze is a popular file-sharing client. When looking for content, Vuze selects from its list of neighbours, a set of 20 nodes to be contacted; the selection is performed such that the neighbours closest to the content in terms of Vuze ID are contacted first. To improve efficiency of its searches, Vuze implements a network coordinate system: from the set of 20 to-be-contacted nodes, queries are sent to the closest nodes in terms of network distance, which is calculated by the difference in network coordinates. However, network coordinate systems are inherently insecure and a malicious peer can lie about its coordinate to appear closest to every peer in the network. This allows the malicious peer to bias next-hop choices for victim peers such that queries will be sent to the attacker, thus hijacking every search query. In our experiments, almost 20% of the search queries are hijacked; the cost of performing this attack is minimal – less than $112/month.
papers.abstract_zh: Vuze是一个流行的文件共享客户端。当寻找内容时，Vuze从其邻居列表中选择一组20个要联系的节点；执行选择，使得首先联系在Vuze ID方面最接近内容的邻居。为了提高搜索效率，Vuze实现了一个网络坐标系统:从20个要联系的节点集合中，查询被发送到网络距离最近的节点，网络距离是通过网络坐标的差异计算的。然而，网络坐标系统本质上是不安全的，恶意对等体可以谎报其坐标，以显得最接近网络中的每个对等体。这使得恶意对等端可以偏向受害对等端的下一跳选择，从而将查询发送给攻击者，从而劫持每个搜索查询。在我们的实验中，几乎20%的搜索查询被劫持；执行这种攻击的成本很低，每月不到112美元。
papers.title_zh: 劫持Vuze BitTorrent网络:你的所有跳跃都属于我们

papers.title: Differential fault analysis on LED using Super-Sbox
papers.authors: Guangyao Zhao, Ruilin Li, Lei Cheng, Chao Li, Bing Sun
papers.abstract: Light encryption device (LED) is a 64 bit lightweight block cipher proposed by Guo et al. at CHES 2011, and its key size is primarily defined as 64 and 128 bits. This study studies differential fault analysis (DFA) of LED using the technique of Super-Sbox analysis. Under various fault models, the fault pattern propagation rule of the Super-Sbox can be obtained, based on which the efficiency of fault attack on LED can be greatly improved. For LED-64, under the nibble-based fault model, a random nibble fault at the 30th round can reduce the size of key search space to 27–220 (average 214.02). Even if a random nibble fault is injected into the 29th round, the size of the key search space can also be reduced to about 217.43–217.72 (average 217.65) using early-abort technique. Although under the byte-based fault model, a random byte fault at the 30th round can reduce the size of the key space to 27–216 (average 211.92). If the adversary has the capability of injecting two random nibble faults at some specified rounds, then the above fault attack on LED-64 can be similarly extended to LED-128, and the size of the exhaustive search space for the 128 bit key can be reduced to 215–227.94 (average 221.96). These results demonstrate that Super-Sbox is a powerful technique that can be used to obtain significant improvements in the key filtration, and thus improve the efficiency of DFA on some special ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 轻型加密设备(LED)是郭等人在CHES 2011上提出的一种64位轻量级分组密码，其密钥大小主要定义为64位和128位。本研究利用Super-Sbox分析技术研究LED的差动故障分析。在各种故障模型下，可以得到Super-Sbox的故障模式传播规律，在此基础上可以大大提高对LED的故障攻击效率。对于LED-64，在基于半字节的故障模型下，第30轮的随机半字节故障可以将密钥搜索空间的大小减少到27–220(平均214.02)。即使随机半字节故障被注入到第29轮，使用早期中止技术，密钥搜索空间的大小也可以减少到大约217.43–217.72(平均217.65)。虽然在基于字节的故障模型下，第30轮的随机字节故障可以将密钥空间的大小减少到27–216(平均211.92)。如果对手有能力在某些特定回合注入两个随机半字节故障，那么对LED-64的上述故障攻击可以类似地扩展到LED-128，并且128位密钥的穷举搜索空间的大小可以减少到215–227.94(平均221.96)。这些结果表明，Super-Sbox是一种强有力的技术，可以用来获得密钥过滤方面的显著改进，从而提高某些特殊密码的DFA效率。
papers.title_zh: 基于Super-Sbox的LED差动故障分析

papers.title: Impossible differential cryptanalysis of MARS-like structures
papers.authors: Weijia Xue, Xuejia Lai
papers.abstract: The MARS-like structure is a generalised Feistel structure. Unified impossible differential (UID) method is an effective method to discover impossible differential characteristics for block cipher structures. In this study, for a specific kind of MARS-like structure, the authors use UID to show that when n, the number of subblocks, is even, there always exist 3n − 1 rounds impossible differentials. Moreover, the authors prove that when n is odd, the MARS-like structure has impossible differentials for any number of rounds, which is a clear but interesting result.
papers.abstract_zh: 类火星结构是一种广义的Feistel结构。统一不可能差分(UID)方法是发现分组密码结构不可能差分特征的有效方法。在这项研究中，对于一种特殊的MARS-like结构，作者使用UID来证明当n(子块的数目)是偶数时，总是存在3n-1轮不可能的微分。此外，作者证明了当n是奇数时，类火星结构对于任何轮数都不可能有微分，这是一个清晰但有趣的结果。
papers.title_zh: 类MARS结构的不可能差分密码分析

papers.title: Cooperative hybrid self-healing scheme for secure and data reliability in unattended wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: Amir Salah Elsafrawey, Emad S. Hassan, Moawad I. Dessouky
papers.abstract: Unattended wireless sensor networks (UWSNs) are operated in hostile environments without constant supervision by a trusted sink; so it faces the risk of compromising by adversaries (ADVs). In this study, proposed is a cooperative hybrid self-healing randomised distributed (CHSHRD) scheme, a new mechanism to enhance the confidentiality of the data collected by UWSNs. The proposed scheme employs both proactive and reactive peers to ensure both backward secrecy and data reliability. It helps the unattended sensors to self-heal and restore their backward secrecy by asking for help from the best qualified neighbours to generate a new secret key to regain their secrecy. The sick sensors also use the best qualified neighbours to distribute the data parts among them to protect the data from eavesdropping and this will enhance the data reliability. In this study, they also present a powerful, realistic and agile ADV model and show how CHSHRD scheme can result in sensor regaining secrecy and achieving high data reliability, despite the adversary efforts to the contrary. The evaluation of the proposed scheme relies on both theoretical probabilistic results and simulation results that compare the proposed scheme to other protection schemes. The results show that this hybrid scheme provides better protection than other schemes that use either proactive or reactive peers.
papers.abstract_zh: 无人值守无线传感器网络(UWSNs)运行在恶劣的环境中，没有可信信宿的持续监控；因此，它面临着被对手妥协的风险。在本研究中，提出了一种协作混合自愈随机分布(CHSHRD)方案，这是一种新的增强UWSNs收集的数据的机密性的机制。所提出的方案采用主动和被动对等体来确保后向保密性和数据可靠性。它通过向最合格的邻居寻求帮助来生成新的密钥以恢复其保密性，从而帮助无人值守的传感器自我修复并恢复其向后保密性。病态传感器还使用最合格的邻居在它们之间分配数据部分，以保护数据不被窃听，这将增强数据可靠性。在这项研究中，他们还提出了一个强大、现实和灵活的ADV模型，并展示了CHSHRD方案如何使传感器恢复保密性并实现高数据可靠性，尽管对手做出了相反的努力。对所提出的方案的评估依赖于理论概率结果和将所提出的方案与其他保护方案进行比较的模拟结果。结果表明，这种混合方案比使用主动或被动对等体的其他方案提供了更好的保护。
papers.title_zh: 无人值守无线传感器网络安全和数据可靠性的协作混合自愈方案

papers.title: Dynamic and verifiable multi-secret sharing scheme based on Hermite interpolation and bilinear maps
papers.authors: Mohammad Hesam Tadayon, Hadi Khanmohammadi, Mohammad Sayad Haghighi
papers.abstract: (t, n) threshold secret sharing is a cryptographic mechanism to divide and disseminate information among n participants in a way that at least t(t ≤ n) of them should be present for the original data to be retrieved. This has practical applications in the protection of secure information against loss, destruction and theft. In this study, the authors propose a new multi-secret sharing scheme which is based on Hermite interpolation polynomials. Using the properties of discrete logarithm over elliptic curves and bilinear maps, they have created a verifiable scheme in which there is no need for a secure channel and every participant chooses their own share. This feature does not let the dealer cheat. The proposed method is dynamic to the changes in the number and value of the secrets as well as the threshold. In addition, it has the multi-use property which reduces the cost of secret distribution in multiple rounds of operation. The public values used in the proposed scheme are less than those of schemes providing similar features and the computations are also less complex. At the end of this study, they have compared the author's scheme with the similar ones against a comprehensive set of key features used in secret sharing.
papers.abstract_zh: (t，n)门限秘密共享是一种在n个参与者之间划分和传播信息的加密机制，其方式是至少有t(t ≤ n)个参与者存在才能检索原始数据。这在保护安全信息免受丢失、破坏和盗窃方面具有实际应用。在这项研究中，作者提出了一个新的基于Hermite插值多项式的多重秘密共享方案。利用椭圆曲线上的离散对数和双线性映射的性质，他们创建了一个可验证的方案，其中不需要安全信道，每个参与者选择自己的份额。这个特征不会让庄家作弊。所提出的方法对秘密的数量和价值以及阈值的变化是动态的。此外，它还具有多用户特性，减少了多轮操作中秘密分发的成本。与提供相似特征的方案相比，所提出的方案中使用的公共值更少，并且计算也更简单。在这项研究的最后，他们将作者的方案与类似的方案进行了比较，比较了秘密共享中使用的一组全面的关键特征。
papers.title_zh: 基于Hermite插值和双线性映射的动态可验证多秘密共享方案

papers.title: Aspectising honeytokens to contain the insider threat
papers.authors: Keshnee Padayachee
papers.abstract: The aim of this study is to provide a generic implementation strategy for honeytokens deployed within a database management system that leverages the aspect-oriented paradigm to contain the insider threat. This approach is tested by developing a proof-of-concept prototype in an aspect-oriented language, namely AspectJ. This study also reflects on design and implementation challenges involved in the deployment of honeytokens to contain the insider threat. Consequently, aspect-orientation is proposed as a means to resolve some of these challenges.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究的目的是为部署在数据库管理系统中的honeytokens提供一个通用的实现策略，该策略利用面向方面的范例来遏制内部威胁。通过用面向方面的语言(即AspectJ)开发一个概念验证原型来测试这种方法。这项研究还反映了部署honeytokens以遏制内部威胁所涉及的设计和实现挑战。因此，面向方面被提出来作为解决这些挑战的一种手段。
papers.title_zh: 利用蜜罐遏制内部威胁

papers.title: Distributed key generation protocol with hierarchical threshold access structure
papers.authors: Nasrollah Pakniat, Mahnaz Noroozi, Ziba Eslami
papers.abstract: A distributed key generation (DKG) protocol is a central component in distributed cryptosystems. It allows a group of participants to jointly generate a pair of keys (private key and public key) without assuming any trusted participant. The public key is output in clear but only authorised subgroups of participants are able to reconstruct or use the private key. Existing literature on DKG protocols assumes equal authority for participants. In this study, the authors consider the problem of DKG in groups with hierarchical structure where the authorised subsets can be defined by a hierarchical threshold access structure. They first propose a verifiable hierarchical threshold secret sharing protocol. On the basis of this construction, they then propose a new DKG protocol with hierarchical threshold access structure for discrete-logarithm-based cryptosystems. It is shown that the proposed protocols satisfy all the security requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式密钥生成(DKG)协议是分布式密码系统的核心组件。它允许一组参与者共同生成一对密钥(私钥和公钥)，而不需要假设任何可信的参与者。公钥以明文形式输出，但是只有授权的参与者子组能够重建或使用私钥。关于DKG议定书的现有文献对参与者具有同等的权威。在这项研究中，作者考虑了层次结构组中的DKG问题，其中授权子集可以由层次阈值访问结构定义。他们首先提出了一个可验证的分级门限秘密共享协议。在这种构造的基础上，他们提出了一种新的基于离散对数密码系统的具有分级门限访问结构的DKG协议。证明了所提出的协议满足所有的安全要求。
papers.title_zh: 具有分级门限访问结构的分布式密钥生成协议

papers.title: Robust collaborative recommendation algorithm based on kernel function and Welsch reweighted M-estimator
papers.authors: Fuzhi Zhang, Shuangxia Sun, Huawei Yi
papers.abstract: The existing collaborative recommendation algorithms based on matrix factorisation (MF) have poor robustness against shilling attacks. To address this problem, in this study the authors propose a robust collaborative recommendation algorithm based on kernel function and Welsch reweighted M-estimator. They first propose a median-based method to calculate user and item biases, which can reduce the influence of shilling attacks on user and item biases because median is insensitive to outliers. Then, they present a method of similarity computation based on kernel function, which can obtain the information of similar users by non-linear inner product operation. Finally, they combine the user and item biases based on median and the similarity based on kernel function with MF model, and introduce the Welsch reweighted M-estimator to realise the robust estimation of user feature matrix and item feature matrix. The experimental results on the MovieLens dataset show that the proposed algorithm outperforms the existing algorithms in terms of both recommendation accuracy and robustness, and the improvement of its robustness is not at the expense of recommendation accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的基于矩阵分解的协同推荐算法对先令攻击的鲁棒性较差。针对这一问题，本文提出了一种基于核函数和Welsch加权M估计的鲁棒协同推荐算法。他们首先提出了一种基于中位数的方法来计算用户和项目偏差，这种方法可以减少先令攻击对用户和项目偏差的影响，因为中位数对离群值不敏感。然后，提出了一种基于核函数的相似度计算方法，通过非线性内积运算获得相似用户的信息。最后，他们将基于中值的用户偏差和项目偏差以及基于核函数的相似性与MF模型相结合，并引入Welsch加权M-估计量来实现对用户特征矩阵和项目特征矩阵的稳健估计。在MovieLens数据集上的实验结果表明，该算法在推荐精度和鲁棒性方面均优于现有算法，并且鲁棒性的提高并不以牺牲推荐精度为代价。
papers.title_zh: 基于核函数和Welsch加权M-估计的鲁棒协同推荐算法

papers.title: Related-key rectangle cryptanalysis of Rijndael-160 and Rijndael-192
papers.authors: Qingju Wang, Zhiqiang Liu, Deniz Toz, Kerem Varici, Dawu Gu
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors present the first related-key rectangle cryptanalysis of Rijndael-160/160 and Rijndael-192/192. The author's attack on Rijndael-160/160 covers eight rounds. The attack complexities are 2126.5 chosen plaintexts, 2129.28 8-round Rijndael-160/160 encryptions and 2132.82 bytes. Their attack on Rijndael-192/192 covers ten rounds. It requires 2179 chosen plaintexts, 2181.09 10-round Rijndael-192/192 encryptions and 2185.59 bytes memory. These are the currently best cryptanalytic results on Rijndael-160/160 and Rijndael-192/192 in terms of the number of attacked rounds. Furthermore, their results show that the slow diffusion in the key schedule of Rijndael makes it a target for this type of analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者提出了第一个相关密钥矩形密码分析Rijndael-160/160和Rijndael-192/192。作者对Rijndael-160/160的攻击涵盖了八个回合。攻击复杂度为2126.5选择明文，2129.28 8轮Rijndael-160/160加密和2132.82字节。他们对Rijndael-192/192的攻击覆盖了十个回合。它需要2179个选择的明文，2181.09个10轮Rijndael-192/192加密和2185.59字节的内存。这些是目前在Rijndael-160/160和Rijndael-192/192上就攻击回合数而言的最佳密码分析结果。此外，他们的结果表明，Rijndael关键时间表中的缓慢扩散使其成为此类分析的目标。
papers.title_zh: Rijndael-160和Rijndael-192的相关密钥矩形密码分析

papers.title: Known-key distinguishers on 15-round 4-branch type-2 generalised Feistel networks with single substitution-permutation functions and near-collision attacks on its hashing modes
papers.authors: Le Dong, Yanling Wang, Wenling Wu, Jian Zou
papers.abstract: Generalised Feistel network (GFN) is a popular design for block ciphers and hash functions. The round function of the network often chooses a substitution–permutation (SP) transformation (consists of a subkey XOR, an S-boxes layer and a linear layer). In 2011, Bogdanov and Shibutani provided another choice to build round functions, namely the double SP-functions, which has two SP-layers in series. They showed that a 4-branch type-2 GFN with double SP-functions was stronger than the one with single SP-function in terms of the number of active S-boxes in a differential or linear cryptanalysis, but some subsequent results showed that the double SP-function is the weaker one in some known-key scenarios and hashing modes. In this study, the authors present a new result of the 4-branch type-2 GFN, whose round function is a single SP-function. They show some 15-round truncated differential distinguishers for this network with four usual parameters by utilising some rebound attack techniques. Based on these distinguishers, they construct some 15-round near-collision attacks on the Matyas–Meyer–Oseas and Miyaguchi–Preneel compression function modes in which the 4-branch type-2 GFN with the single SP-function is used.
papers.abstract_zh: 广义Feistel网络(GFN)是分组密码和散列函数的流行设计。网络的循环函数通常选择置换(SP)变换(由子密钥XOR、S盒层和线性层组成)。2011年，Bogdanov和Shibutani提供了另一种选择来构造圆函数，即双SP函数，它具有串联的两个SP层。他们表明，在差分或线性密码分析中，具有双SP函数的4分支2型GFN在有效S盒的数量方面比具有单SP函数的更强，但是一些随后的结果表明，在一些已知密钥场景和散列模式中，双SP函数是较弱的一个。在本研究中，作者给出了4分支2型GFN的一个新结果，它的圆函数是单个SP函数。他们通过利用一些反弹攻击技术，展示了该网络的具有四个常用参数的一些15轮截断差分鉴别器。基于这些区分符，他们对maty as–Meyer–ose as和Miyaguchi–Preneel压缩函数模式构造了一些15轮的近碰撞攻击，其中使用了具有单个SP函数的4分支type-2 GFN。
papers.title_zh: 15轮4分支2型广义Feistel网络上的已知密钥鉴别器及其哈希模式的近碰撞攻击

papers.title: Some new results on equivalency of collusion-secure properties for Reed-Solomon codes
papers.authors: Myong-Son Sin, Ryul Kim
papers.abstract: A. Silverberg (IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory 49, 2003) proposed a question on the equivalence of identifiable parent property and traceability property for Reed-Solomon code family. Earlier studies on Silverberg's problem motivate us to think of the stronger version of the question on equivalence of separation and traceability properties. Both, however, still remain open. In this article, we integrate all the previous works on this problem with an algebraic way, and present some new results. It is notable that the concept of subspace subcode of Reed-Solomon code, which was introduced in error-correcting code theory, provides an interesting prospect for our topic.
papers.abstract_zh: A.西尔弗伯格(IEEE Trans。告知。Theory 49，2003)提出了Reed-Solomon码族的可识别父属性和可追踪属性等价的问题。对Silverberg问题的早期研究促使我们思考分离和可追踪性等价问题的更强版本。然而，两者仍然开放。在这篇文章中，我们用代数的方法整合了前人在这个问题上的所有工作，并给出了一些新的结果。值得注意的是，纠错码理论中引入的Reed-Solomon码的子空间子码的概念为我们的课题提供了一个有趣的前景。
papers.title_zh: Reed-Solomon码共谋安全性质等价性的一些新结果

papers.title: Privacy of a randomised skip lists-based protocol
papers.authors: Zhuohua Liu, Chuankun Wu
papers.abstract: Privacy and efficiency are two important but seemingly contradictory objectives in radio-frequency identification (RFID) systems. On one hand, RFID aims to identify objects easily and quickly, on the other hand, users want to maintain the necessary privacy without being tracked down for where they are and what they are doing. Common RFID privacy-preserving authentication protocols can be classified into tree-based schemes and group-based schemes, and all these schemes do not meet the dual goals of efficiency and security at the same time. In 2013, Sakai et al. proposed a randomised skip lists-based authentication protocol (RSLA), and claimed that the RSLA can resist compromise attacks. In this study, the authors analyse the compromise attacks on RSLA and show that there is no obvious advantage with respect to the privacy of the RSLA compared with balanced tree-based schemes. Moreover, it is reasonable to claim that protocols based on skip lists are also vulnerable to compromise attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私和效率是射频识别(RFID)系统中两个重要但看似矛盾的目标。一方面，RFID旨在方便快捷地识别物体，另一方面，用户希望保持必要的隐私而不被追踪到他们在哪里和在做什么。常见的RFID隐私保护认证协议可分为基于树的方案和基于组的方案，这些方案都不能同时满足效率和安全的双重目标。2013年，Sakai等人提出了一种基于随机跳表的认证协议(RSLA ),并声称RSLA可以抵抗折中攻击。在该研究中，作者分析了对RSLA的折衷攻击，并表明与基于平衡树的方案相比，在RSLA的隐私方面没有明显的优势。此外，有理由认为基于跳表的协议也容易受到折衷攻击。
papers.title_zh: 基于随机跳表协议的保密性

papers.title: Biclique cryptanalysis of the full-round KLEIN block cipher
papers.authors: Zahra Ahmadian, Mahmoud Salmasizadeh, Mohammad Reza Aref
papers.abstract: In this study, the authors evaluate the security of the lightweight block cipher KLEIN-64 using biclique cryptanalysis. They first point out some new weaknesses of the diffusion layer and key schedule of this algorithm. Then they exploit them to cryptanalyst the full round version of KLEIN-64 using an asymmetric biclique. The (worst case) computations and data complexity of this cryptanalysis are 262.84 and 239, respectively. A modified version of this cryptanalysis is also presented which is slightly faster at the expense of the data required.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项研究中，作者使用biclique密码分析评估了轻量级分组密码KLEIN-64的安全性。他们首先指出了该算法的扩散层和密钥调度的一些新的弱点。然后，他们利用它们，使用非对称双密码体制对KLEIN-64的完整版本进行密码分析。该密码分析的(最坏情况)计算量和数据复杂度分别为262.84和239。还提出了这种密码分析的修改版本，它以所需数据为代价稍微快一些。
papers.title_zh: 整轮KLEIN分组密码的双圈密码分析

papers.title: Modelling and analysis of rule-based network security middleboxes
papers.authors: Khaled Salah, Aslam Chaudary
papers.abstract: This study presents an analytical model for rule-based network security middleboxes as those of network firewalls, intrusion detection systems and email spam filters. In these systems, incoming packets carrying requests arrive at the middlebox and obtain queued for processing in multiple stages. The stages consist of first a main stage for packet processing and then subsequent stages of rulebase interrogation in which rules or conditions are checked sequentially until a match is triggered. The service at these stages is characterised to be mutually exclusive; that is, only one stage is active at any time. The authors derive useful formulas that can predict the middlebox performance, taking into account its incoming request rate, the queue size and the processing capacity of the middlebox, and thereby proper engineering capacity of the middlebox can be achieved.
papers.abstract_zh: 本研究提出了一个基于规则的网络安全中间包的分析模型，如网络防火墙、入侵检测系统和垃圾邮件过滤器。在这些系统中，携带请求的输入分组到达中间盒，并在多个阶段中排队等待处理。这些阶段首先包括数据包处理的主要阶段，然后是规则库询问的后续阶段，在这些阶段中，规则或条件被按顺序检查，直到触发匹配。这些阶段的服务具有互斥的特征；也就是说，任何时候都只有一个阶段是活动的。考虑到中间盒的输入请求率、队列长度和处理能力，作者推导出了预测中间盒性能的有用公式，从而可以获得合适的中间盒工程能力。
papers.title_zh: 基于规则的网络安全中间盒的建模与分析

papers.title: High accuracy android malware detection using ensemble learning
papers.authors: Suleiman Y. Yerima, Sakir Sezer, Igor Muttik
papers.abstract: With over 50 billion downloads and more than 1.3 million apps in Google's official market, Android has continued to gain popularity among smartphone users worldwide. At the same time there has been a rise in malware targeting the platform, with more recent strains employing highly sophisticated detection avoidance techniques. As traditional signature-based methods become less potent in detecting unknown malware, alternatives are needed for timely zero-day discovery. Thus, this study proposes an approach that utilises ensemble learning for Android malware detection. It combines advantages of static analysis with the efficiency and performance of ensemble machine learning to improve Android malware detection accuracy. The machine learning models are built using a large repository of malware samples and benign apps from a leading antivirus vendor. Experimental results and analysis presented shows that the proposed method which uses a large feature space to leverage the power of ensemble learning is capable of 97.3-99% detection accuracy with very low false positive rates.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着谷歌官方市场超过500亿次下载和超过130万个应用程序，Android在全球智能手机用户中继续受到欢迎。与此同时，针对该平台的恶意软件有所增加，最近的菌株采用了高度复杂的检测规避技术。随着传统的基于签名的方法在检测未知恶意软件方面变得不那么有效，需要替代方法来及时实现零日发现。因此，这项研究提出了一种利用集成学习进行Android恶意软件检测的方法。它结合了静态分析的优势和集成机器学习的效率和性能，以提高Android恶意软件检测的准确性。机器学习模型是使用领先的反病毒供应商的恶意软件样本和良性应用程序的大型存储库构建的。给出的实验结果和分析表明，所提出的方法使用大的特征空间来利用集成学习的能力，能够以非常低的假阳性率获得97.3-99%的检测准确度。
papers.title_zh: 基于集成学习的高精度android恶意软件检测

papers.title: Practical-time related-key attack on Hummingbird-2
papers.authors: Zhenqing Shi, Bin Zhang, Dengguo Feng
papers.abstract: Hummingbird-2, designed by Engels et al., is a lightweight cipher with built-in MAC functionality. In this study, the authors examine the security of Hummingbird-2 in the related-key model. First, the authors define a new cryptographic notion of an S-box, called combination points, based on its differential equation, and demonstrate some properties of combination points. A potential application of the new notion is to recover some partial input of an S-box, and the authors show this on Hummingbird-2 by recovering some internal state bits. Then, by carefully studying the differential distributions of the S-boxes, a set of key dependent S-boxes can be derived and be used to recover the subkey word of Hummingbird-2. At last, by the divide and conquer strategy, all the 128 key bits can be recovered with a complexity of 240, which is much lower than that (264) of the attack at FSE 2013. The attack has been fully implemented on a PC and the secret key has been recovered in a few hours. The results provide some new insights into the design of cryptographic S-boxes.
papers.abstract_zh: Engels等人设计的Hummingbird-2是一种内置MAC功能的轻量级密码。在这项研究中，作者在相关密钥模型中检验了Hummingbird-2的安全性。首先，作者基于S盒的微分方程定义了一种新的S盒密码概念，称为组合点，并证明了组合点的一些性质。新概念的一个潜在应用是恢复S盒的部分输入，作者通过恢复一些内部状态位在Hummingbird-2上展示了这一点。然后，通过仔细研究S盒的差分分布，可以导出一组密钥相关的S盒，并用于恢复蜂鸟-2的子密钥字。最后，通过分而治之的策略，128个密钥位可以全部恢复，复杂度为240，远低于FSE 2013攻击的复杂度(264)。攻击已经在一台PC上完全实施，密钥在几个小时内就被恢复了。这些结果为密码S盒的设计提供了一些新的见解。
papers.title_zh: 对蜂鸟-2的实时相关键攻击

papers.title: Watch your constants: malicious Streebog
papers.authors: Riham AlTawy, Amr M. Youssef
papers.abstract: In August 2012, the Streebog hash function was selected as the new Russian cryptographic hash standard (GOST R 34.11-2012). In this study, the authors investigate the new standard in the context of malicious hashing and present a practical collision for a malicious version of the full hash function. In particular, they apply the rebound attack to find three solutions for three different differential paths for four rounds. Then, using the freedom of the round constants they connect them to obtain a collision for the 12 rounds of the compression function. Additionally, and because of the simple processing of the counter, they bypass the barrier of the checksum finalisation step and transfer the compression function collision to the hash function output with no additional cost. The presented attack has a practical complexity and is verified by an example. Although the results of this study may not have a direct impact on the security of the current Streebog hash function, it presents an urge for the designers to publish the origin of the used parameters and the rational behind their choices in order for this function to gain enough confidence and widespread adoption by the security community.
papers.abstract_zh: 2012年8月，Streebog哈希函数被选为新的俄罗斯加密哈希标准(GOST R 34.11-2012)。在这项研究中，作者研究了恶意哈希环境中的新标准，并提出了完整哈希函数的恶意版本的实际冲突。特别是，他们应用反弹攻击来为四轮的三个不同的差分路径找到三个解决方案。然后，使用循环常数的自由度，他们将它们连接起来，以获得压缩函数的12个循环的碰撞。此外，由于计数器的简单处理，它们绕过校验和最终确定步骤的障碍，将压缩函数冲突转移到哈希函数输出，而没有额外的成本。该攻击具有实际的复杂性，并通过实例进行了验证。虽然这项研究的结果可能不会对当前Streebog哈希函数的安全性产生直接影响，但它促使设计者公布所用参数的来源及其选择背后的理由，以便该函数获得足够的信心并被安全社区广泛采用。
papers.title_zh: 注意你的常数:恶意的垃圾博客

papers.title: Enhanced inter-access service network handover authentication scheme for IEEE 802.16m network
papers.authors: Walid I. Khedr, Mahmoud I. Abdalla, Asmaa A. Elsheikh
papers.abstract: The 802.16m mobile worldwide interoperability for microwave access (WiMAX) standard is the amendment to the 802.16e standard. It introduced high mobility features that enable mobile broadband services at vehicular speeds beyond 120 km/h. However, handover latency in mobile WiMAX may affect real-time application sessions such as VoIP at very high vehicle speed. This makes it imperative to develop fast and secure handover schemes for such very high-speed vehicles. One of the main factors that affect handover performance in 802.16m standard is the delay introduced by the authentication procedure when a mobile user moves between base stations (BSs). In this study, a recently proposed intra-access service network (ASN) handover authentication scheme with privacy preservation is extended to a fast symmetrical key inter-ASN handover authentication scheme that avoids the involvement of third party. The proposed scheme solves the pairwise master key backward and forward security problems and provides mutual authentication between the mobile station (MS) and the target BS during inter-ASN handover event. Finally, the proposed scheme provides MS anonymity and reduces the need to a high-quality tamper-proof device in the BS that was required in the previous scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 802.16m移动微波接入全球互通(WiMAX)标准是对802.16e标准的修订。它引入了高移动性特性，支持车速超过120公里/小时的移动宽带服务。然而，移动WiMAX中的切换延迟可能会影响实时应用会话，如车速非常高的VoIP。这使得为这种非常高速的车辆开发快速和安全的切换方案成为当务之急。在802.16m标准中，影响切换性能的主要因素之一是当移动用户在基站(BSs)之间移动时由认证过程引入的延迟。在本研究中，最近提出的具有隐私保护的接入服务网络(ASN)内切换认证方案被扩展为避免第三方参与的快速对称密钥ASN间切换认证方案。所提出的方案解决了成对主密钥的前向和后向安全性问题，并且在ASN间切换事件期间提供了移动站(ms)和目标BS之间的相互认证。最后，所提出的方案提供了MS匿名，并且减少了对BS中的高质量防篡改设备的需求，而这在先前的方案中是需要的。
papers.title_zh: IEEE 802.16m网络的增强型接入服务网络间切换认证方案

papers.title: Exploring risk flow attack graph for security risk assessment
papers.authors: Fangfang Dai, Ying Hu, Kangfeng Zheng, Bin Wu
papers.abstract: Researchers have previously looked into the problem of determining the connection between invasive events and network risk, and attack graph (AG) was proposed to seek countermeasures. However, AG has proved to have various limitations in practical applications. To overcome such defects, this study presents a risk flow attack graph (RFAG)-based risk assessment approach. In particular, this approach applies a RFAG to represent network and attack scenarios, which are then fed to a network flow model for computing risk flow. A bi-objective sorting algorithm is employed to automatically infer the priority of risk paths and assist risk assessment, and a fuzzy comprehensive evaluation is performed to determine risk severity. Via the aforementioned processes, the authors simplify AG and follow the risk path of originating, transferring, redistributing and converging to assess security risk. The authors use a synthetic network scenario to illustrate this approach and evaluate its performance through a set of simulations. Experiments show that the approach is capable of effectively identifying network security situations and assessing critical risk.
papers.abstract_zh: 研究人员之前研究了确定入侵事件和网络风险之间的联系的问题，并提出了攻击图(AG)来寻求对策。然而，AG已被证明在实际应用中具有各种限制。为了克服这些缺陷，本研究提出了一种基于风险流攻击图的风险评估方法。特别是，这种方法应用RFAG来表示网络和攻击场景，然后将这些场景提供给网络流模型来计算风险流。采用双目标排序算法自动推断风险路径的优先级并辅助风险评估，通过模糊综合评价确定风险严重程度。通过前面提到的过程，作者简化了AG，并遵循起源、转移、再分布和汇聚的风险路径来评估安全风险。作者使用一个合成网络场景来说明这种方法，并通过一组模拟来评估其性能。实验表明，该方法能够有效识别网络安全状况和评估关键风险。
papers.title_zh: 探索用于安全风险评估的风险流攻击图

papers.title: Improved cryptanalysis on RIPEMD-128
papers.authors: Gaoli Wang, Hongbo Yu
papers.abstract: RIPEMD-128 is an ISO/IEC standard cryptographic hash function proposed in 1996 by Dobbertin, Bosselaers and Preneel. The compression function of RIPEMD-128 consists of two different and almost independent parallel lines denoted by line1 operation and line2 operation. The initial values and the output values of the last step of the two operations are combined, resulting in the final value of one iteration. In this study, the authors present collision differential characteristics for both 40-step line1 operation and 40-step line2 operation by choosing a proper message difference. By using message modification technique, they improve the probabilities of the differential characteristics so that they can give a collision attack on 40-step RIPEMD-128 hash function with a complexity of 235 computations. Meanwhile, they improve the distinguishing attack proposed by Landelle and Peyrin at EUROCRYPT 2013, and give a distinguisher on the full RIPEMD-128 hash function with a complexity of 290.4 by doing message modification.
papers.abstract_zh: RIPEMD-128是1996年由Dobbertin、Bosselaers和Preneel提出的ISO/IEC标准加密散列函数。RIPEMD-128的压缩函数由两条不同且几乎独立的平行线组成，分别用line1操作和line2操作表示。这两个操作的初始值和最后一步的输出值被组合，产生一次迭代的最终值。在这项研究中，作者通过选择适当的消息差，给出了40步线1操作和40步线2操作的碰撞差特征。通过使用消息修改技术，他们提高了差分特征的概率，从而可以对40步RIPEMD-128哈希函数进行具有235次计算复杂度的碰撞攻击。同时，他们改进了Landelle和Peyrin在EUROCRYPT 2013上提出的区分攻击，通过修改消息给出了一个复杂度为290.4的完整RIPEMD-128哈希函数的区分器。
papers.title_zh: 对RIPEMD-128的改进密码分析

papers.title: Crypto-based algorithms for secured medical image transmission
papers.authors: Ali Al-Haj, Gheith A. Abandah, Noor Hussein
papers.abstract: Booming telemedicine applications makes it deemed necessary to provide security services for such applications. The algorithms proposed in this field can be grouped into three classes: watermarking-based algorithms, crypto-based algorithms and hybrid algorithms. In this study, the authors propose two crypto-based algorithms capable of providing confidentiality, authenticity and integrity services to medical images exchanged in telemedicine applications. Strong cryptographic functions with internally generated symmetric keys and hash codes are used. The advanced encryption standard-Galois counter mode is used with the whirlpool hash function to provide confidentiality and authenticity, and the elliptic curve digital signature algorithm is used to provide authenticity and integrity. The proposed algorithms are based on the digital imaging and communication in medicine (DICOM) standard; however, unlike the standard, the algorithms provide confidentiality, authenticity and integrity for the header data, as well as for the pixel data of the DICOM images. Effectiveness of the proposed algorithms is evaluated and demonstrated through extensive experimentation using a benchmark set of DICOM images.
papers.abstract_zh: 蓬勃发展的远程医疗应用使得为这些应用提供安全服务成为必要。该领域提出的算法可以分为三类:基于水印的算法、基于密码的算法和混合算法。在这项研究中，作者提出了两种基于加密的算法，能够为远程医疗应用中交换的医学图像提供机密性、真实性和完整性服务。使用具有内部生成的对称密钥和散列码的强加密函数。高级加密标准-Galois计数器模式与whirlpool哈希函数一起使用，以提供机密性和真实性，椭圆曲线数字签名算法用于提供真实性和完整性。所提出的算法基于医学数字成像和通信(DICOM)标准；然而，与标准不同的是，这些算法为DICOM图像的标题数据以及像素数据提供了机密性、真实性和完整性。通过使用DICOM图像的基准集的大量实验，对所提出算法的有效性进行了评估和演示。
papers.title_zh: 基于密码的医学图像安全传输算法

papers.title: Constructing important features from massive network traffic for lightweight intrusion detection
papers.authors: Wei Wang, Yongzhong He, Jiqiang Liu, Sylvain Gombault
papers.abstract: Efficiently processing massive data is a big issue in high-speed network intrusion detection, as network traffic has become increasingly large and complex. In this work, instead of constructing a large number of features from massive network traffic, the authors aim to select the most important features and use them to detect intrusions in a fast and effective manner. The authors first employed several techniques, that is, information gain (IG), wrapper with Bayesian networks (BN) and Decision trees (C4.5), to select important subsets of features for network intrusion detection based on KDD'99 data. The authors then validate the feature selection schemes in a real network test bed to detect distributed denial-of-service attacks. The feature selection schemes are extensively evaluated based on the two data sets. The empirical results demonstrate that with only the most important 10 features selected from all the original 41 features, the attack detection accuracy almost remains the same or even becomes better based on both BN and C4.5 classifiers. Constructing fewer features can also improve the efficiency of network intrusion detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络流量变得越来越大和复杂，高效处理海量数据是高速网络入侵检测中的一个重要问题。在这项工作中，作者不是从大量的网络流量中构建大量的特征，而是旨在选择最重要的特征，并使用它们以快速有效的方式检测入侵。作者首先采用了几种技术，即信息增益(IG)，贝叶斯网络包装(BN)和决策树(C4.5)，以选择重要的网络入侵检测特征子集的基础上，KDD'99数据。然后，作者在真实的网络测试床上验证特征选择方案，以检测分布式拒绝服务攻击。基于这两个数据集，特征选择方案被广泛地评估。实验结果表明，仅从所有原始41个特征中选择最重要的10个特征，基于BN和C4.5分类器的攻击检测精度几乎保持不变甚至变得更好。构造较少的特征也可以提高网络入侵检测的效率。
papers.title_zh: 从海量网络流量中构建轻量级入侵检测的重要特征

papers.title: Cryptanalysis and improvement of a certificateless partially blind signature
papers.authors: Lin Cheng, Qiaoyan Wen
papers.abstract: Partially blind signature is an important technique in secure electronic cash (e-cash) system. The first concrete certificateless partially blind signature (CLPBS) scheme for e-cash was constructed in 2011. Recently it was found that this construction had a security weakness and a rescued scheme was given. Unfortunately, the formal security proof was not given. In this study, the authors first give cryptanalysis of their rescued scheme. They demonstrate that a malicious user in their rescued scheme can forge a signature on any message by replacing the signer's public key. In an e-cash system, blind signatures issued by the bank are viewed as e-cash. Once they apply their scheme to an untraceable e-cash system, a malicious user can forge valid electronic coins (i.e. valid signatures) without being detected by the bank. It will result in loss of the bank. Then, they propose a newly improved CLPBS scheme which achieves the strongest security level and has higher computational efficiency than the rescued scheme published earlier. Finally, they give an example of potential application to e-cash systems using their scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 部分盲签名是安全电子现金系统中的一项重要技术。第一个具体的无证书部分盲签名(CLPBS)方案是在2011年构造的。最近发现该建筑存在安全漏洞，并给出了补救方案。不幸的是，没有给出正式的安全性证明。在本研究中，作者首先对他们的拯救方案进行了密码分析。他们证明了在他们的拯救方案中，恶意用户可以通过替换签名者的公钥在任何消息上伪造签名。在电子现金系统中，银行签发的盲签名被视为电子现金。一旦他们将他们的方案应用于不可追踪的电子现金系统，恶意用户可以伪造有效的电子硬币(即有效的签名)而不被银行检测到。这将导致银行的损失。然后，他们提出了一个新的改进的CLPBS方案，该方案达到了最强的安全级别，并且比先前发表的拯救方案具有更高的计算效率。最后，他们给出了一个应用于电子现金系统的例子。
papers.title_zh: 一个无证书部分盲签名的密码分析和改进
